atk-vin02a1:13: Khuddakānaṃ ayaṃ dāni, tesaṃ bhavati vaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:14_0: 1. Tattha musāvādavaggassa tāva paṭhamasikkhāpade hatthakoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:14_1: Sakyānaṃ puttoti sakyaputto. Buddhakāle kira sakyakulato asīti purisasahassāni pabbajiṃsu,
atk-vin02a1:14_2: tesaṃ so aññataroti. Vādakkhittoti “vādaṃ karissāmī”ti evaṃ parivitakkitena vādena
atk-vin02a1:14_3: paravādisantikaṃ khitto pakkhitto pahito pesitoti attho. Vādamhi vā sakena cittena
atk-vin02a1:14_4: khitto. Yatra yatra vādo tatra tatreva sandissatītipi vādakkhitto. Avajānitvā avajānātīti
atk-vin02a1:14_5: attano vāde kañci dosaṃ sallakkhento “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānitvā puna kathento
atk-vin02a1:14_6: kathento niddosataṃ sallakkhetvā “mameva ayaṃ vādo”ti paṭijānāti. Paṭijānitvā avajānātīti
atk-vin02a1:14_7: kismiñcideva vacane ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhento “ayaṃ mama vādo”ti paṭijānitvā puna kathento
atk-vin02a1:14_8: kathento tattha dosaṃ sallakkhetvā “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānāti. Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti
atk-vin02a1:14_9: aññena kāraṇena aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicarati paṭicchādeti ajjhottharati, “rūpaṃ aniccaṃ
atk-vin02a1:14_10: jānitabbato”ti vatvā puna “jātidhammato”tiādīni vadati. Kurundiyaṃ pana “etassa paṭicchādanahetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:14_11: aññaṃ bahuṃ kathetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yaṃ taṃ paṭijānanañca avajānanañca,
atk-vin02a1:14_12: tassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ “ko āha, kiṃ āha, kismiṃ āhā”ti evamādi bahuṃ bhāsatīti.
atk-vin02a1:14_13: Puna mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “avajānitvā paṭijānanto paṭijānitvā avajānanto eva ca aññenaññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:14_14: paṭicaratī”ti vuttaṃ. Sampajānamusā bhāsatīti jānanto musā bhāsati. Saṅketaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:14_15: visaṃvādetīti purebhattādīsu “asukasmiṃ nāma kāle asukasmiṃ nāma padese vādo hotū”ti
atk-vin02a1:14_16: saṅketaṃ katvā saṅketato pure vā pacchā vā gantvā “passatha bho, titthiyā na āgatā
atk-vin02a1:15: 2. Sampajānamusāvādeti jānitvā jānantassa ca musā bhaṇane.
atk-vin02a1:16_0: 3. Visaṃvādanapurekkhārassāti visaṃvādanacittaṃ purato katvā vadantassa. Vācāti micchāvācāpariyāpannavacanasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-vin02a1:16_1: cetanā. Girāti tāya cetanāya samuṭṭhāpitasaddaṃ dasseti. Byappathoti vacanapatho;
atk-vin02a1:16_2: vācāyeva hi aññesampi diṭṭhānugatimāpajjantānaṃ pathabhūtato byappathoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:16_3: Vacībhedoti vacīsaññitāya vācāya bhedo; pabhedagatā vācā eva evaṃ vuccati. Vācasikā
atk-vin02a1:16_4: viññattīti vacīviññatti. Evaṃ paṭhamapadena suddhacetanā, majjhe tīhi taṃsamuṭṭhāpitasaddasahitā
atk-vin02a1:16_5: cetanā, ante ekena viññattisahitā cetanā “kathitā”ti veditabbā. Anariyavohārāti anariyānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:17_0: Evaṃ sampajānamusāvādaṃ dassetvā idāni ante vuttānaṃ sampajānamusāvādasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:17_1: anariyavohārānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ dassento “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”tiādimāha. Tattha adiṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:17_2: diṭṭhaṃ meti evaṃ vadato vacanaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā vā cetanā eko anariyavohāroti iminā
atk-vin02a1:17_3: nayena attho veditabbo. Apicettha cakkhuvasena aggahitārammaṇaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ, sotavasena
atk-vin02a1:17_4: aggahitaṃ asutaṃ, ghānādivasena munitvā tīhi indriyehi ekābaddhaṃ viya katvā patvā
atk-vin02a1:17_5: aggahitaṃ amutaṃ, aññatra pañcahi indriyehi suddhena viññāṇeneva aggahitaṃ aviññātanti
atk-vin02a1:17_6: veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “adiṭṭhaṃ nāma na cakkhunā diṭṭha”nti evaṃ oḷārikeneva nayena
atk-vin02a1:17_7: desanā katāti. Diṭṭhādīsu ca attanāpi parenapi diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhameva. Evaṃ sutamutaviññātānīti
atk-vin02a1:17_8: ayameko pariyāyo. Aparo nayo yaṃ attanā diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhameva taṃ. Esa nayo sutādīsu.
atk-vin02a1:17_9: Yaṃ pana parena diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ attanā sutaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ mutādīnipi.
atk-vin02a1:18_0: 4. Idāni tesaṃ anariyavohārānaṃ vasena āpattiṃ āropetvā dassento “tīhākārehī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:18_1: Tassattho “tīhi ākārehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti
atk-vin02a1:18_3: tattha “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”nti idha “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti, tattha ca “āpatti
atk-vin02a1:18_4: pārājikassā”ti “idha āpatti pācittiyassā”ti evaṃ vatthumatte āpattimatte ca viseso,
atk-vin02a1:19_0: 9. Tīhākārehi diṭṭhe vematikotiādīnampi attho “diṭṭhassa hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto
atk-vin02a1:19_1: diṭṭhe vematiko”ti evamādiduṭṭhadosapāḷivaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Pāḷimattameva
atk-vin02a1:19_2: hi ettha viseso, atthe pana satheravāde kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:20_0: 11. Sahasā bhaṇatīti avīmaṃsitvā anupadhāretvā vā vegena diṭṭhampi “adiṭṭhaṃ me”ti
atk-vin02a1:20_1: bhaṇati. Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇatīti mandattā jaḷattā pakkhalanto “cīvara”nti
atk-vin02a1:20_2: vattabbe “cīra”nti ādiṃ bhaṇati. Yo pana sāmaṇerena “api bhante mayhaṃ upajjhāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:20_3: passitthā”ti vutto keḷiṃ kurumāno “tava upajjhāyo dārusakaṭaṃ yojetvā gato bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin02a1:20_4: vā siṅgālasaddaṃ sutvā “kassāyaṃ bhante saddo”ti vutto “mātuyā te yānena gacchantiyā
atk-vin02a1:20_5: kaddame laggacakkaṃ uddharantānaṃ ayaṃ saddo”ti vā evaṃ neva davā na ravā aññaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:20_6: so āpattiṃ āpajjatiyeva. Aññā pūraṇakathā nāma hoti, eko gāme thokaṃ telaṃ labhitvā
atk-vin02a1:20_7: vihāraṃ āgato sāmaṇeraṃ bhaṇati – “tvaṃ ajja kuhiṃ gato, gāmo ekatelo ahosī”ti vā
atk-vin02a1:20_8: pacchikāya ṭhapitaṃ pūvakhaṇḍaṃ labhitvā “ajja gāme pacchikāhi pūve cāresu”nti vā,
atk-vin02a1:21: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:24: 12. Dutiyasikkhāpade omasantīti ovijjhanti. Khuṃsentīti akkosanti. Vambhentīti padhaṃsenti.
atk-vin02a1:25_0: 13. Bhūtapubbanti idaṃ vatthuṃ bhagavā omasavādagarahaṇatthaṃ āhari. Nandivisālo
atk-vin02a1:25_1: nāmāti nandīti tassa balībaddassa nāmaṃ, visāṇāni panassa visālāni, tasmā “nandivisālo”ti
atk-vin02a1:25_2: vuccati. Bodhisatto tena samayena nandivisālo nāma hoti. Brāhmaṇo taṃ yāgubhattādīhi
atk-vin02a1:25_3: ativiya posesi. Atha so brāhmaṇaṃ anukampamāno “gaccha tva”ntiādimāha. Tattheva aṭṭhāsīti
atk-vin02a1:25_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikālepi parakhuṃsanaṃ amanāpatoyeva paccesi, tasmā brāhmaṇassa dosaṃ
atk-vin02a1:25_5: dassetukāmo aṭṭhāsi. Sakaṭasataṃ atibaddhaṃ pavaṭṭesīti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā heṭṭhārukkhe
atk-vin02a1:25_6: datvā ekābaddhaṃ katvā muggamāsavālukādīhi puṇṇaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭento, kiñcāpi
atk-vin02a1:25_7: pubbe patiṭṭhitārappadesaṃ puna are patte pavaṭṭitaṃ hoti, bodhisatto pana purimasakaṭena
atk-vin02a1:25_8: patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne pacchimasakaṭaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ sakaṭasatappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ pavaṭṭesi.
atk-vin02a1:25_9: Bodhisattānañhi sithilakaraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tena cattamano ahūti tena brāhmaṇassa
atk-vin02a1:25_10: dhanalābhena attano kammena ca so nandivisālo attamano ahosi.
atk-vin02a1:26_0: 15. Akkosenapīti ettha pana yasmā parato “dve akkosā – hīno ca akkoso ukkaṭṭho ca
atk-vin02a1:26_1: akkoso”ti vibhajitukāmo, tasmā yathā pubbe “hīnenapi akkosena khuṃsentī”ti vuttaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:26_2: evaṃ avatvā “akkosena” iccevamāha. Venajātīti tacchakajāti; veṇukārajātītipi vadanti.
atk-vin02a1:27_0: Rathakārajātīti cammakārajāti. Pukkusajātīti pupphachaḍḍakajāti. Avakaṇṇakādi dāsānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:27_1: nāmaṃ hoti; tasmā hīnaṃ. Oññātanti avaññātaṃ; “uññāta”ntipi paṭhanti. Avaññātanti
atk-vin02a1:27_2: vambhetvā ñātaṃ. Hīḷitanti jigucchitaṃ. Paribhūtanti kimetenātiti paribhavakataṃ.
atk-vin02a1:28_0: Koṭṭhakakammanti tacchakakammaṃ. Muddāti hatthamuddāgaṇanā. Gaṇanāti acchiddakādiavasesagaṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:28_1: Lekhāti akkharalekhā. Madhumehābādho vedanāya abhāvato “ukkaṭṭho”ti vutto. Pāṭikaṅkhāti
atk-vin02a1:28_2: icchitabbā. Yakārena vā bhakārena vāti yakārabhakāre yojetvā yo akkoso. Kāṭakoṭacikāya
atk-vin02a1:28_3: vāti “kāṭa”nti purisanimittaṃ, “koṭacikā”ti itthinimittaṃ; etehi vā yo akkoso, eso hīno nāma akkosoti.
atk-vin02a1:29_0: 16. Idāni tesaṃ jātiādīnaṃ pabhedavasena āpattiṃ āropetvā dassento “upasampanno upasampanna”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:29_1: Tattha khuṃsetukāmo vambhetukāmo maṅkukattukāmoti akkositukāmo padhaṃsitukāmo garahitukāmo
atk-vin02a1:29_2: nittejaṃ kattukāmoti attho. Hīnena hīnanti hīnena jātivacanena hīnajātikaṃ. Etena
atk-vin02a1:30_0: Ettha ca hīnena hīnaṃ vadanto kiñcāpi saccaṃ vadati, omasitukāmatāya panassa vācāya
atk-vin02a1:30_1: vācāya pācittiyaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhena hīnaṃ vadanto ca kiñcāpi alikaṃ bhaṇati, omasitukāmatāya
atk-vin02a1:30_2: pana imināva sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ āpajjati, na purimena. Yopi “aticaṇḍālosi, atibrāhmaṇosi,
atk-vin02a1:30_3: duṭṭhacaṇḍālosi, duṭṭhabrāhmaṇosī”tiādīni vadati, sopi āpattiyā kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a1:31_0: 26. Santi idhekacceti vāre pana pariharitvā vuttabhāvena dukkaṭaṃ. Eseva nayo ye
atk-vin02a1:31_1: nūna…pe… na mayanti vāresupi. Anupasampanne pana catūsupi vāresu dukkaṭameva. Corosi
atk-vin02a1:31_2: gaṇṭhibhedakosītiādivacanehi pana upasampannepi anupampannepi sabbavāresu dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a1:31_3: Davakamyatāya pana upasampannepi anupasampannepi sabbavāresu dubbhāsitaṃ. Davakamyatā
atk-vin02a1:31_4: nāma keḷihasādhippāyatā. Imasmiñca sikkhāpade ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunīādayo sabbasattā
atk-vin02a1:32_0: 35. Atthapurekkhārassātiādīsu pāḷiyā atthaṃ vaṇṇayanto atthapurekkhāro; pāḷiṃ vācento
atk-vin02a1:32_1: dhammapurekkhāro; anusiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā “idānipi caṇḍālosi, pāpaṃ mā akāsi, mā tamo
atk-vin02a1:32_2: tamaparāyaṇo ahosī”tiādinā nayena kathento anusāsanīpurekkhāro nāmāti veditabbo. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:33_0: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:33_1: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti. Dubbhāsitāpatti
atk-vin02a1:33_2: panettha vācācittato samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, akusalacittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:36_1: pubbabhāgo, “iminā ca iminā ca idaṃ kataṃ; evaṃ vutte evaṃ vakkhāmā”tiādikaṃ sakasakapakkhe
atk-vin02a1:36_2: sammantanaṃ. Kalahoti āpattigāmiko kāyavācāvītikkamo. Vivādoti viggāhikakathā. Taṃ
atk-vin02a1:36_3: vivādaṃ āpannānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ. Pesuññanti pisuṇavācaṃ, piyabhāvassa suññakaraṇavācanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:37: 37. Bhikkhupesuññeti bhikkhūnaṃ pesuññe; bhikkhuto sutvā bhikkhunā bhikkhussa upasaṃhaṭapesuññeti attho.
atk-vin02a1:38_0: 38. Dvīhākārehīti dvīhi kāraṇehi. Piyakamyassa vāti “evaṃ ahaṃ etassa piyo bhavissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a1:38_1: attano piyabhāvaṃ patthayamānassa vā. Bhedādhippāyassa vāti “evamayaṃ etena saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:38_2: bhijjissatī”ti parassa parena bhedaṃ icchantassa vā. Jātitopītiādi sabbaṃ purimasikkhāpade
atk-vin02a1:38_3: vuttanayameva. Idhāpi bhikkhuniṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe anupasampannā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:39_0: Na piyakamyassa na bhedādhippāyassāti ekaṃ akkosantaṃ ekañca khamantaṃ disvā “aho
atk-vin02a1:39_1: nillajjo, īdisampi nāma bhavantaṃ puna vattabbaṃ maññissatī”ti evaṃ kevalaṃ pāpagarahitāya
atk-vin02a1:39_2: bhaṇantassa anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato
atk-vin02a1:39_3: kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:42_0: 44. Catutthasikkhāpade – appatissāti appatissavā. Upāsakāti vutte vacanampi na sotukāmā;
atk-vin02a1:42_1: anādarāti attho. Appatissayā vā anīcavuttinoti attho. Asabhāgavuttikāti visabhāgajīvikā,
atk-vin02a1:42_2: yathā bhikkhūsu vattitabbaṃ; evaṃ appavattavuttinoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:43_0: 45. Padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti ekato padaṃ padaṃ dhammaṃ vāceyya; koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-vin02a1:43_1: vāceyyāti attho. Yasmā pana taṃ koṭṭhāsanāmakaṃ padaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ
atk-vin02a1:43_2: dassetuṃ “padaṃ anupadaṃ anvakkharaṃ anubyañjana”nti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-vin02a1:43_3: padanti eko gāthāpādo adhippeto. Anupadanti dutiyapādo. Anvakkharanti ekekamakkharaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:43_4: Anubyañjananti purimabyañjanena sadisaṃ pacchābyañjanaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci vā ekamakkharaṃ
atk-vin02a1:43_5: anvakkharaṃ, akkharasamūho anubyañjanaṃ, akkharānubyañjanasamūho padaṃ. Paṭhamapadaṃ
atk-vin02a1:43_6: padameva, dutiyaṃ anupadanti evamettha nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:44_0: Idāni padaṃ nāma ekato paṭṭhapetvā ekato osāpentīti gāthābandhaṃ dhammaṃ vācento
atk-vin02a1:44_1: “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti ekamekaṃ padaṃ sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ ekato ārabhitvā ekatoyeva
atk-vin02a1:44_2: niṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ vācentassa padagaṇanāya pācittiyā veditabbā. Anupadaṃ nāma pāṭekkaṃ
atk-vin02a1:44_3: paṭṭhapetvā ekato osāpentīti therena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti vutte sāmaṇero taṃ
atk-vin02a1:44_4: padaṃ apāpuṇitvā “manoseṭṭhā manomayā”ti dutiyapadaṃ ekato bhaṇati, ime pāṭekkaṃ
atk-vin02a1:44_5: paṭṭhapetvā ekato osāpenti nāma. Evaṃ vācentassāpi anupadagaṇanāya pācittiyā. Anvakkharaṃ
atk-vin02a1:44_6: nāma rūpaṃ aniccanti vuccamāno “rū”ti opātetīti “rūpaṃ aniccanti bhaṇa sāmaṇerā”ti
atk-vin02a1:44_7: vuccamāno rūkāramattameva ekato vatvā tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ vācentassāpi anvakkharagaṇanāya
atk-vin02a1:44_8: pācittiyā. Gāthābandhepi ca esa nayo labbhatiyeva. Anubyañjanaṃ nāma rūpaṃ aniccanti
atk-vin02a1:44_9: vuccamāno vedanā aniccāti saddaṃ nicchāretīti “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, vedanā
atk-vin02a1:44_10: aniccā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vācayamāno therena “rūpaṃ anicca”nti vuccamāno sāmaṇero sīghapaññatāya
atk-vin02a1:44_11: “vedanā aniccā”ti imaṃ aniccapadaṃ therassa “rūpaṃ anicca”nti etena aniccapadena
atk-vin02a1:44_12: saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇanto vācaṃ nicchāreti. Evaṃ vācentassāpi anubyañjanagaṇanāya pācittiyā.
atk-vin02a1:44_13: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – imesu padādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ekato bhaṇati tena tena āpattiṃ āpajjatīti.
atk-vin02a1:45_0: Buddhabhāsitoti sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ dhammapadaṃ cariyāpiṭakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:45_1: udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ suttanipāto vimānavatthu petavatthu brahmajālādīni ca
atk-vin02a1:45_3: Isibhāsitoti bāhiraparibbājakehi bhāsito sakalo paribbājakavaggo, bāvariyassa antevāsikānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:45_4: soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pucchāti evamādi. Devatābhāsitoti devatāhi bhāsito; so devatāsaṃyuttadevaputtasaṃyuttamārasaṃyuttabrahmasaṃyuttasakkasaṃyuttādivasena veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:46_0: Atthūpasañhitoti aṭṭhakathānissito. Dhammūpasañhitoti pāḷinissito; ubhayenāpi vivaṭṭūpanissitameva
atk-vin02a1:46_1: vadati. Kiñcāpi vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ vadati, tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhadhammaṃyeva pana
atk-vin02a1:46_2: padaso vācentassa āpatti. Vivaṭṭūpanissitepi nānābhāsāvasena gāthāsilokabandhādīhi
atk-vin02a1:46_3: abhisaṅkhate anāpatti. Tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhepi kulumbasuttaṃ rājovādasuttaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:46_4: catuparivaṭṭaṃ nandopanandanti īdise āpattiyeva. Apalāladamanampi vuttaṃ, mahāpaccariyampana
atk-vin02a1:46_5: paṭisiddhaṃ. Meṇḍakamilindapañhesu therassa sakapaṭibhāne anāpatti, yaṃ rañño saññāpanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:46_7: pana abuddhavacanāniyevāti vuttaṃ. Sīlūpadeso nāma dhammasenāpatinā vuttoti vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:46_9: atthi, tesu sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā vibhattā, dhutaṅgapañhe paṭipadā vibhattā;
atk-vin02a1:46_10: tasmā tesu āpattīti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana saṅgītiṃ anāruḷhesu rājovādatikkhindriyacatuparivaṭṭanandopanandakulumbasuttesuyeva
atk-vin02a1:46_11: āpattīti vatvā avasesesu yaṃ buddhavacanato āharitvā vuttaṃ, tadeva āpattivatthu
atk-vin02a1:47: 48. Ekato uddisāpentoti anupasampannena saddhiṃ ekato uddesaṃ gaṇhantopi ekato vadati anāpattīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:48_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – upasampanno ca anupasampanno ca nisīditvā uddisāpenti. Ācariyo
atk-vin02a1:48_1: nisinnānaṃ bhaṇāmīti tehi saddhiṃ ekato vadati, ācariyassa āpatti. Anupasampannena
atk-vin02a1:48_2: saddhiṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti. Dvepi ṭhitā gaṇhanti, eseva nayo. Daharabhikkhu nisinno,
atk-vin02a1:48_3: sāmaṇero ṭhito, nisinnassa bhaṇāmīti bhaṇato anāpatti. Sace daharo tiṭṭhati, itaro
atk-vin02a1:48_4: nisīdati, ṭhitassa bhaṇāmīti bhaṇatopi anāpatti. Sace bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare eko
atk-vin02a1:48_5: sāmaṇero nisinno hoti, tasmiṃ nisinne padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa ācariyassa acittakāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:48_6: Sace sāmaṇero upacāraṃ muñcitvā ṭhito vā nisinno vā hoti, yesaṃ vāceti, tesu apariyāpannattā
atk-vin02a1:48_7: ekena disābhāgena palāyanakaganthaṃ nāma gaṇhātīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tasmā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:48_8: Ekato sajjhāyaṃ karontopi anupasampannena saddhiṃ upasampanno ekato sajjhāyaṃ karonto
atk-vin02a1:48_9: tena saddhiṃyeva bhaṇati, anāpatti. Anupasampannassa santike uddesaṃ gaṇhantassapi
atk-vin02a1:48_10: tena saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa anāpatti. Ayampi hi ekato sajjhāyaṃ karoticceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:49_0: Yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ bhaṇantaṃ opātetīti sace ekagāthāya eko pādo na āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:49_1: sesaṃ āgacchati, ayaṃ yebhuyyena paguṇagantho nāma. Etena nayena suttepi veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:49_2: Taṃ opātentassa evaṃ bhaṇāhīti ekatopi bhaṇantassa anāpatti. Osārentaṃ opātetīti
atk-vin02a1:49_3: suttaṃ uccārentaṃ parisamajjhe parisaṅkamānaṃ evaṃ vadehīti tena saddhiṃ ekatopi
atk-vin02a1:49_4: vadantassa anāpatti. Yaṃ pana mahāpaccariyādīsu “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vutto yadi
atk-vin02a1:49_5: vadati, “anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi, natthibhāvoyeva cassa
atk-vin02a1:49_6: yutto. Kasmā? Kiriyasamuṭṭhānattā. Itarathā hi kiriyākiriyaṃ bhaveyya. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a1:50: Padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ – vācato ca vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:53_0: 49. Pañcamasikkhāpade – muṭṭhassatī asampajānāti pubbabhāge satisampajaññassa akaraṇavasenetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:53_1: vuttaṃ, bhavaṅgotiṇṇakāle pana kuto satisampajaññanti! Vikūjamānāti vippalapamānā.
atk-vin02a1:53_2: Kākacchamānāti nāsāya kākasaddaṃ viya niratthakasaddaṃ muñcamānā. Upāsakāti paṭhamataraṃ uṭṭhitaupāsakā.
atk-vin02a1:54_0: 50. Etadavocunti “bhagavatā āvuso rāhula sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti bhikkhū sikkhāpadagāraveneva
atk-vin02a1:54_1: etaṃ avocuṃ. Pakatiyā pana te bhagavati ca gāravena āyasmato ca rāhulassa sikkhākāmatāya
atk-vin02a1:54_2: tassa āyasmato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgatassa cūḷamañcakaṃ vā apassenaṃ vā yaṃ atthi taṃ
atk-vin02a1:54_3: paññapetvā cīvaraṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā ussīsakaraṇatthāya denti. Tatridaṃ tassāyasmato
atk-vin02a1:54_4: sikkhākāmatāya – bhikkhū kira taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā muṭṭhisammuñjaniñca
atk-vin02a1:54_5: kacavarachaḍḍanakañca bahi khipanti. Athaññehi “āvuso kenidaṃ pātita”nti vutte aññe
atk-vin02a1:54_6: evaṃ vadanti – “bhante, rāhulo imasmiṃ padese sañcari, tena nu kho pātita”nti. So
atk-vin02a1:54_7: panāyasmā “na mayhaṃ bhante idaṃ kamma”nti ekadivasampi avatvā taṃ paṭisāmetvā bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:54_8: khamāpetvā gacchati. Vaccakuṭiyā seyyaṃ kappesīti taṃyeva sikkhākāmataṃ anubrūhanto
atk-vin02a1:54_10: seyyaṃ kappesi. Sā kira kuṭi kavāṭabaddhā gandhaparibhaṇḍakatā samosaritapupphadāmā
atk-vin02a1:55_0: 51. Uttaridirattatirattanti bhagavā sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya tirattaṃ parihāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:55_1: adāsi. Na hi yuttaṃ kuladārake pabbājetvā nānuggahetunti. Sahaseyyanti ekato seyyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:55_2: Seyyāti kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ sayanampi vuccati, yasmiṃ senāsane sayanti, tampi.
atk-vin02a1:55_3: Tattha senāsanaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “seyyā nāma sabbacchannā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāyappasāraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:55_4: dassetuṃ anupasampanne nipanne bhikkhu nipajjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā ayamettha attho
atk-vin02a1:55_5: – “senāsanasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ pavisitvā kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ kappeyya vidaheyya
atk-vin02a1:55_6: sampādeyyā”ti. Sabbacchannātiādinā pana tassā senāsanasaṅkhātāya seyyāya lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:55_7: vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paṭicchannaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:55_8: ayaṃ sabbacchannā nāma seyyā. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṃ gahetvā vācuggatavasena
atk-vin02a1:55_9: “sabbacchannā nāma pañcahi chadanehi channā”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṃ? Atha kho dussakuṭiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:55_10: vasantassāpi na sakkā anāpatti kātuṃ, tasmā yaṃ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṃ idha
atk-vin02a1:55_11: chadanañca paricchannañca veditabbaṃ. Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi
atk-vin02a1:55_12: sahaseyyā na bhaveyya. Yaṃ pana senāsanaṃ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāva chadanaṃ āhacca pākārena
atk-vin02a1:55_13: vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenāpi parikkhittaṃ, ayaṃ sabbaparicchannā nāma
atk-vin02a1:55_14: seyyā. Chadanaṃ anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā
atk-vin02a1:55_15: parikkhittāpi sabbaparicchannāyevāti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yassā pana upari
atk-vin02a1:55_16: bahutaraṃ ṭhānaṃ channaṃ, appaṃ acchannaṃ, samantato vā bahutaraṃ parikkhittaṃ, appaṃ
atk-vin02a1:55_17: aparikkhittaṃ, ayaṃ yebhuyyena channā yebhuyyena paricchannā nāma. Iminā hi lakkhaṇena
atk-vin02a1:55_18: samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmako pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti, satagabbhaṃ vā catussālaṃ
atk-vin02a1:55_19: vā, ekaseyyāicceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “catutthe divase atthaṅgate
atk-vin02a1:55_20: sūriye anupasampanne nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassā”tiādi.
atk-vin02a1:56_0: Tattha ca nipajjanamatteneva pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana sambahulā sāmaṇerā, eko bhikkhu,
atk-vin02a1:56_1: sāmaṇeragaṇanāya pācittiyā. Te ce uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjanti, tesaṃ payoge payoge bhikkhussa
atk-vin02a1:56_2: āpatti. Bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa
atk-vin02a1:56_3: āpatti. Sace pana sambahulā bhikkhū eko sāmaṇero sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti, tassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:56_4: nipajjanenapi bhikkhūnaṃ āpattiyeva. Ubhayesaṃ sambahulabhāvepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:57_0: Apicettha ekāvāsādikampi catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yo hi ekasmiṃ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena
atk-vin02a1:57_1: saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassa catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya devasikā āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:57_2: Yopi ekasmiṃyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
atk-vin02a1:57_3: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
atk-vin02a1:57_4: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṃ kappeti,
atk-vin02a1:58_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma “bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato
atk-vin02a1:58_1: tiracchānagatenapi saddhiṃ hoti, tatra tiracchānagatassa paricchedo methunadhammāpattiyā
atk-vin02a1:58_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a1:59_0: Yadi pana thambhānaṃ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassa
atk-vin02a1:59_1: bhittiyā upari ṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā
atk-vin02a1:59_2: teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati, heṭṭhāpāsāde sayitabhikkhussa anāpatti. Sace
atk-vin02a1:59_3: chadane chiddaṃ hoti, tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati, nānūpacāre
atk-vin02a1:59_4: uparimatale chadanabbhantare sayitassa āpatti, heṭṭhimatale sayitassa anāpatti. Sace
atk-vin02a1:59_5: antopāsādeneva ārohitvā sabbatalāni paribhuñjanti, ekūpacārāni honti, tesu yattha
atk-vin02a1:60_0: Sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭakasenāsane sayitassa vāḷasaṅghāṭādīsu kapotādayo pavisitvā
atk-vin02a1:60_1: sayanti, āpattiyeva. Parikkhepassa bahigate nibbakosabbhantare sayanti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:60_2: Parimaṇḍalaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṃ cepi senāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:60_3: hoti, tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṃ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre
atk-vin02a1:60_4: sabbagabbhe pavisanti, ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:60_5: āpatti. Sace sapamukhā gabbhā honti, pamukhassa upari acchannaṃ uccavatthukaṃ cepi
atk-vin02a1:60_6: hoti, pamukhe sayito gabbhe sayitānaṃ āpattiṃ na karoti. Sace pana gabbhacchadaneneva
atk-vin02a1:60_7: saddhiṃ sambaddhacchadanaṃ hoti, tatra sayito sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti. Kasmā? Sabbacchannattā
atk-vin02a1:60_8: sabbaparicchannattā ca, gabbhaparikkhepoyeva hissa parikkhepoti. Eteneva hi nayena
atk-vin02a1:60_9: aṭṭhakathāsu lohapāsādaparikkhepassa catūsu dvārakoṭṭhakesu āpatti vuttā.
atk-vin02a1:61_0: Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā
atk-vin02a1:61_1: pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathina”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ andhakaraṭṭhe pāṭekkasannivesā ekacchadanā
atk-vin02a1:61_2: gabbhapāḷiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yañca tattha “bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
atk-vin02a1:61_3: neva aṭṭhakathāsu atthi; na pāḷiyā sameti. Dasahatthubbedhāpi hi jagati parikkhepasaṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:61_4: na gacchati. Tasmā yampi tattha dutiyasikkhāpade jagatiyā pamāṇaṃ vatvā “etaṃ ekūpacāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:61_5: paricchannaṃ nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatussālasannivesā
atk-vin02a1:61_6: mahāpāsādā ekasmiṃ okāse pāde dhovitvā paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:61_7: tesupi sahaseyyāpattiyā na muccati. Sace tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne upacāraṃ paricchinditvā
atk-vin02a1:62_0: Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṃ karonti, ekena dvārena
atk-vin02a1:62_1: pavisitvā ekasmiṃ paricchede anupasampanno sayati, ekasmiṃ bhikkhu, anāpatti. Pākāre
atk-vin02a1:62_2: godhādīnaṃ pavisanamattampi chiddaṃ hoti, ekasmiñca paricchede godhā sayanti, anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:62_3: Na hi chiddena gehaṃ ekūpacāraṃ nāma hoti. Sace pākāramajjhe chinditvā dvāraṃ yojenti,
atk-vin02a1:62_4: ekūpacāratāya āpatti. Taṃ dvāraṃ kavāṭena pidahitvā sayanti, āpattiyeva. Na hi dvārapidahanena
atk-vin02a1:62_5: gehaṃ nānūpacāraṃ nāma hoti, dvāraṃ vā advāraṃ. Kavāṭañhi saṃvaraṇavivaraṇehi yathāsukhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:62_6: vaḷañjanatthāya kataṃ, na vaḷañjanūpacchedanatthāya. Sace pana taṃ dvāraṃ puna iṭṭhakāhi
atk-vin02a1:62_7: pidahanti, advāraṃ hoti, purime nānūpacārabhāveyeva tiṭṭhati. Dīghapamukhaṃ cetiyagharaṃ
atk-vin02a1:62_8: hoti. Ekaṃ kavāṭaṃ anto, ekaṃ bahi, dvinnaṃ kavāṭānaṃ antare anupasampanno antocetiyaghare
atk-vin02a1:63_0: Tatra yassa “siyā ayaṃ ekūpacāranānūpacāratā nāma udositasikkhāpade vuttā, idha pana
atk-vin02a1:63_1: ‘seyyā nāma sabbacchannā sabbaparicchannā yebhuyyena channā yebhuyyena paricchannā’ti
atk-vin02a1:63_2: ettakameva vuttaṃ, pihitadvāro ca gabbho sabbaparicchannova hoti. Tasmā tattha anto
atk-vin02a1:63_3: sayiteneva saddhiṃ āpatti, bahi sayitena anāpattī”ti. So evaṃ vattabbo – “apihitadvāre
atk-vin02a1:63_4: pana kasmā bahi sayitena āpattī”ti? Pamukhassa gabbhena saddhiṃ sabbacchannattā.
atk-vin02a1:63_5: “Kiṃ pana gabbhe pihite chadanaṃ viddhastaṃ hotī”ti? Na viddhastaṃ, gabbhena saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:63_6: pamukhassa sabbaparicchannatā na hoti. “Kiṃ parikkhepo viddhasto”ti? Addhā vakkhati
atk-vin02a1:63_7: “na viddhasto, kavāṭena upacāro paricchanno”ti. Evaṃ dūrampi gantvā puna ekūpacāranānūpacārataṃyeva paccāgamissati.
atk-vin02a1:64_0: Apica yadi byañjanamatteyeva attho suviññeyyo siyā, sabbacchannāti vacanato pañcannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:64_1: aññatarena chadanena channā eva seyyā siyā, na aññena. Evañca sati padaracchannādīsu
atk-vin02a1:64_2: anāpatti siyā. Tato yadatthaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, sveva attho parihāyeyya. Parihāyatu
atk-vin02a1:64_3: vā mā vā, kathaṃ avuttaṃ gahetabbanti; ko vā vadati “avuttaṃ gahetabba”nti? Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:64_4: aniyatesu – “paṭicchannaṃ nāma āsanaṃ kuṭṭena vā kavāṭena vā kilañjena vā sāṇipākārena
atk-vin02a1:64_5: vā rukkhena vā thambhena vā koṭṭhalikāya vā yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ hotī”ti. Tasmā
atk-vin02a1:64_6: yathā tattha yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ paṭicchannameva, evamidhāpi gahetabbaṃ. Tasmā
atk-vin02a1:64_7: senāsanaṃ khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā aññena saddhiṃ sambaddhaṃ vā asambaddhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:64_8: vā dīghaṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā ekabhūmakaṃ vā, anekabhūmakaṃ vā, yaṃ yaṃ ekūpacāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:64_9: sabbattha yena kenaci paṭicchādanena sabbacchanne sabbaparicchanne yebhuyyena vā
atk-vin02a1:64_10: channe yebhuyyena vā paricchanne sahaseyyāpatti hotīti.
atk-vin02a1:65_0: 53. Upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha sabbacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanneti
atk-vin02a1:65_1: evamādīsupi mahāpaccariyaṃ dukkaṭamevāti vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sabbacchanne
atk-vin02a1:65_2: yebhuyyenaparicchanne pācittiyaṃ, sabbacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne pācittiyaṃ, yebhuyyenachanne
atk-vin02a1:65_3: upaḍḍhaparicchanne pācittiyaṃ, sabbaparicchanne yebhuyyenachanne pācittiyaṃ, sabbaparichanne
atk-vin02a1:65_4: upaḍḍhacchanne pācittiyaṃ, yebhuyyenaparicchanne upaḍḍhacchanne pācittiyaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:65_5: vuttapācittiyena saddhiṃ satta pācittiyānī”ti vuttaṃ. “Sabbacchanne cūḷakaparicchanne
atk-vin02a1:65_6: dukkaṭaṃ, yebhuyyenachanne cūḷakaparicchanne dukkaṭaṃ, sabbaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne
atk-vin02a1:65_7: dukkaṭaṃ, yebhuyyenaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ dukkaṭena saha pañca
atk-vin02a1:66_1: cūḷakacchanne cūḷakaparicchanne anāpatti, sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanneti ca ettha
atk-vin02a1:66_2: senambamaṇḍapavaṇṇaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Imināpetaṃ veditabbaṃ – “yathā jagati parikkhepasaṅkhaya
atk-vin02a1:67: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:70_1: hotīti puññakāmatāya katvā ṭhapitaṃ hoti. Yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkamīti asukasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:70_2: nāma ṭhāne āvasathāgāraṃ paññattaṃ atthīti manussānaṃ sutvā upasaṅkami. Gandhagandhinīti
atk-vin02a1:70_3: agarukuṅkumādīnaṃ gandhānaṃ gandho gandhagandho, so assā atthīti gandhagandhinī.
atk-vin02a1:70_4: Sāṭakaṃ nikkhipitvāti appeva nāmassa imampi vippakāraṃ passantassa rāgo uppajjeyyāti
atk-vin02a1:70_5: cintetvā evamakāsi. Okkhipitvāti adho khipitvā. Accayoti aparādho. Maṃ accagamāti
atk-vin02a1:70_6: maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:70_7: Ayameva hi viseso – paṭhamasikkhāpade catutthadivase āpatti idha paṭhamadivasepi.
atk-vin02a1:70_9: eva dukkaṭaṃ. Sesāhi anāpatti. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:73_0: 60. Sattamasikkhāpade – gharaṇīti gharasāminī. Nivesanadvāreti nivesanassa mahādvāre.
atk-vin02a1:73_1: Gharasuṇhāti tasmiṃ ghare suṇhā. Āvasathadvāreti ovarakadvāre. Vissaṭṭhenāti suniggatena
atk-vin02a1:73_2: saddena. Vivaṭenāti suṭṭhu pakāsena asaṃvutena. Dhammo desetabboti ayaṃ saraṇasīlādibhedo
atk-vin02a1:73_3: dhammo kathetabbo. Aññātunti ājānituṃ. Viññunā purisaviggahenāti viññunā purisena,
atk-vin02a1:73_4: purisaviggahaṃ gahetvāpi ṭhitena na yakkhena na petena na tiracchānagatena.
atk-vin02a1:74_0: 66. Anāpatti viññunā purisaviggahenāti viññunā purisaviggahena saddhiṃ ṭhitāya bahumpi
atk-vin02a1:74_1: dhammaṃ desentassa anāpatti. Chappañcavācāhīti chahi pañcahi vācāhi yo deseti, tassapi
atk-vin02a1:74_2: anāpatti. Tattha eko gāthāpādo ekavācāti evaṃ sabbattha vācāpamāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin02a1:74_3: aṭṭhakathaṃ dhammapadaṃ jātakādivatthuṃ vā kathetukāmo hoti, chappañcapadamattameva
atk-vin02a1:74_4: kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Pāḷiyā saddhiṃ kathentena ekapadaṃ pāḷito pañca aṭṭhakathātoti
atk-vin02a1:74_5: evaṃ cha padāni anatikkāmetvāva kathetabbo. Padasodhamme vuttappabhedo hi idhāpi
atk-vin02a1:74_6: sabbo dhammoyeva. Tasmiṃ desetīti tasmiṃ khaṇe deseti. Sampadānatthe vā etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:74_7: Tassā desetīti attho. Aññissā mātugāmassāti ekissā desetvā puna āgatāgatāya aññissāpi
atk-vin02a1:74_8: desetīti evaṃ ekāsane nisinno mātugāmasatasahassannampi desetīti attho. Mahāpaccariyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:74_9: vuttaṃ samaṃ nisinnānaṃ mātugāmānaṃ “tumhākaṃ ekekissā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ desessāmi, taṃ
atk-vin02a1:74_10: suṇāthāti deseti, anāpatti. Paṭhamaṃ ekekissā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ kathessāmīti ābhogaṃ
atk-vin02a1:74_11: katvā jānāpetvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati, na pacchāti. Pañhaṃ pucchati pañhaṃ puṭṭho kathetīti
atk-vin02a1:74_12: mātugāmo “dīghanikāyo nāma bhante kimatthaṃ dīpetī”ti pucchati. Evaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho
atk-vin02a1:74_13: bhikkhu sabbaṃ cepi dīghanikāyaṃ katheti, anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a1:75: Padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ – vācato ca vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:78_0: 67. Aṭṭhamasikkhāpade – vatthukathāya tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ catutthapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:78_1: vuttanayameva. Ayameva hi viseso – tattha abhūtaṃ ārocesuṃ, idha bhūtaṃ. Bhūtampi
atk-vin02a1:78_2: puthujjanā ārocesuṃ, na ariyā. Ariyānañhi payuttavācā nāma natthi, attano guṇe ārocayamāne
atk-vin02a1:78_3: pana aññe na paṭisedhesuṃ, tathāuppanne ca paccaye sādiyiṃsu, tathāuppannabhāvaṃ ajānantā.
atk-vin02a1:79_0: “Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesu”ntiādimhi pana ye uttarimanussadhammassa
atk-vin02a1:79_1: vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, te ārocesunti veditabbaṃ. “Kacci pana vo bhikkhave bhūta”nti pucchite
atk-vin02a1:79_2: pana sabbepi “bhūtaṃ bhagavā”ti paṭijāniṃsu. Ariyānampi hi abbhantare bhūto uttarimanussadhammoti.
atk-vin02a1:79_3: Atha bhagavā ariyamissakattā “moghapurisā”ti avatvā “kathañhi nāma tumhe bhikkhave”ti
atk-vin02a1:79_4: vatvā “udarassa kāraṇā”tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā ariyā aññesaṃ sutvā “ayyo kira, bhante,
atk-vin02a1:79_5: sotāpanno”tiādinā nayena pasannehi manussehi pucchiyamānā apaññatte sikkhāpade anādīnavadassino
atk-vin02a1:79_6: suddhacittatāya attano ca paresañca visesādhigamaṃ paṭijāniṃsu. Evaṃ paṭijānantehi
atk-vin02a1:79_7: ca tehi yaṃ aññe udarassa kāraṇā uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-vin02a1:79_8: uppādesuṃ, taṃ suddhacittatāya sādiyantehipi udarassa kāraṇā uttarimanussadhammassa
atk-vin02a1:79_9: vaṇṇo bhāsito viya hoti. Tasmā sabbasaṅgāhikeneva nayena “kathañhi nāma tumhe, bhikkhave,
atk-vin02a1:79_10: udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissathā”ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:79_11: Sesaṃ catutthapārājikavatthusadisameva. Sikkhāpadavibhaṅgepi kevalaṃ tattha pārājikañceva
atk-vin02a1:79_12: thullaccayañca idha bhūtattā pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a1:80_0: 77. “Upasampannassa bhūtaṃ ārocetī”ti uttarimanussadhammameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Parinibbānakāle
atk-vin02a1:80_1: hi antarā vā atikaḍḍhiyamānena upasampannassa bhūtaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sutapariyattisīlaguṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:80_2: pana anupasampannassāpi ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ādikammikassa anāpatti. “Ummattakassā”ti
atk-vin02a1:80_3: idaṃ pana idha na vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Diṭṭhisampannānaṃ ummādassa vā cittakkhepassa vā
atk-vin02a1:80_4: abhāvāti. Mahāpaccariyampi hi vicāritaṃ “jhānalābhī pana parihīne jhāne ummattako
atk-vin02a1:80_5: bhaveyya, tassapi bhūtārocanapaccayā anāpatti na vattabbā, bhūtasseva abhāvato”ti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:81_0: Bhūtārocanaṃ nāmetaṃ pubbe avuttehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti – kāyato vācato
atk-vin02a1:81_1: kāyavācato cāti. Kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:84_0: 78. Navamasikkhāpade – duṭṭhullā nāma āpatti cattāri ca pārājikāni terasa ca saṅghādisesāti
atk-vin02a1:84_1: imissā pāḷiyā “pārājikāni duṭṭhullasaddatthadassanatthaṃ vuttāni, saṅghādisesaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:84_2: idha adhippeta”nti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – sace pārājikaṃ ārocentassa
atk-vin02a1:84_3: pācittiyaṃ na bhaveyya, yathā samānepi bhikkhu-bhikkhunīnaṃ upasampannasadde yattha
atk-vin02a1:84_4: bhikkhunī anadhippetā hoti, tattha bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampannoti vuccati;
atk-vin02a1:84_5: evamidha samānepi pārājikasaṅghādisesānaṃ duṭṭhullasadde yadi pārājikaṃ anadhippetaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:84_6: “duṭṭhullā nāma āpatti terasa saṅghādisesā”ti etadeva vattabbaṃ siyā. Tattha bhaveyya
atk-vin02a1:84_7: “yo pārājikaṃ āpanno, so bhikkhubhāvato cuto, tasmā tassa āpattiṃ ārocento dukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:84_8: āpajjatī”ti. Evaṃ sati akkosantopi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyameva ca āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:84_9: Vuttañhetaṃ – “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce
atk-vin02a1:84_10: asuddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati, āpatti omasavādassā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:84_11: Evaṃ pāḷiyā vicāriyamānāya pārājikaṃ ārocentassāpi pācittiyameva dissati. Kiñcāpi
atk-vin02a1:84_12: dissati, atha kho sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā aṭṭhakathācariyāva ettha pamāṇaṃ, na
atk-vin02a1:84_13: aññā vicāraṇā. Pubbepi ca āvocumha – “buddhena dhammo vinayo ca vutto, yo tassa puttehi
atk-vin02a1:84_14: tatheva ñāto”tiādi. Aṭṭhakathācariyā hi buddhassa adhippāyaṃ jānanti.
atk-vin02a1:85_0: Imināpi cetaṃ pariyāyena veditabbaṃ. Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti hi vuttaṃ. Bhikkhusammutiyā
atk-vin02a1:85_1: ca ārocanaṃ āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya puna tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ anāpajjanatthāya bhagavatā
atk-vin02a1:85_2: anuññātaṃ, na tassa bhikkhuno avaṇṇamattappakāsanatthāya, sāsane cassa patiṭṭhānisedhanatthāya,
atk-vin02a1:85_3: na ca pārājikaṃ āpannassa puna tathārūpāya āpattiyā anāpajjanena bhikkhubhāvo nāma
atk-vin02a1:85_4: atthi. Tasmā “pārājikāni duṭṭhullasaddatthadassanatthaṃ vuttāni, saṅghādisesaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:85_5: idhādhippeta”nti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, taṃ suvuttameva.
atk-vin02a1:86_0: 80. Atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantātiādīsu pana yā ayaṃ bhikkhusammuti vuttā,
atk-vin02a1:86_1: sā na katthaci āgatā, idha vuttattāyeva pana abhiṇhāpattikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā evamesa
atk-vin02a1:86_2: paresu hirottappenāpi āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjissatīti tassa bhikkhuno hitesitāya tikkhattuṃ
atk-vin02a1:87_0: 82. Aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ āroceti āpatti dukkaṭassāti pañcapi āpattikkhandhe ārocentassa
atk-vin02a1:87_1: dukkaṭaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana pārājikaṃ ārocentassāpi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. Anupasampannassa
atk-vin02a1:87_2: duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha ādito pañca sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo
atk-vin02a1:88_0: 83. Vatthuṃ ārocetīti “ayaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpanno, duṭṭhullaṃ āpanno, attakāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:88_1: āpanno” kāyasaṃsaggaṃ āpannoti evaṃ vadantassa anāpatti. Āpattiṃ ārocetīti ettha
atk-vin02a1:88_2: “ayaṃ pārājikaṃ āpanno, saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:88_3: dubbhāsitaṃ āpanno”ti vadati anāpatti. “Ayaṃ asuciṃ mocetvā saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”tiādinā
atk-vin02a1:88_4: pana nayena vatthunā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ ghaṭetvā ārocentasseva āpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:89: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:92_0: 86. Dasamasikkhāpade – jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavīti imehi padehi jātapathaviñca
atk-vin02a1:92_1: ajātapathaviñca dasseti. Appapāsāṇādīsu appā pāsāṇā etthāti appapāsāṇāti evamattho
atk-vin02a1:92_2: daṭṭhabbo. Tattha muṭṭhippamāṇato upari pāsāṇāti veditabbā, muṭṭhippamāṇā sakkharā.
atk-vin02a1:92_3: Kathalāti kapālakhaṇḍāni. Marumbāti kaṭasakkharā. Vālikāti vālukāyeva. Yebhuyyena
atk-vin02a1:92_4: paṃsukāti tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu, eko pāsāṇādīsu aññataro. Adaḍḍhāpīti
atk-vin02a1:92_5: uddhanapattapacanakumbhakārāvāpādivasena tathā tathā adaḍḍhā. Sā pana visuṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a1:92_6: suddhapaṃsuādīsu aññatarāva veditabbā. Yebhuyyenasakkharāti bahutarā sakkharā. Hatthikucchiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:92_7: kira ekapacchipūraṃ āharāpetvā doṇiyaṃ dhovitvā pathaviyā yebhuyyena sakkharabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a1:92_8: ñatvā sayaṃ bhikkhū pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇiṃsu. Yāni pana majjhe “appapaṃsu appamattikā”ti
atk-vin02a1:92_9: dve padāni, tāni yebhuyyenapāsāṇādipañcakameva pavisanti tesaṃyeva hi dvinnaṃ pabhedadassanametaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:92_10: Sayaṃ khaṇati āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha pahāre pahāre pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sakiṃ
atk-vin02a1:92_11: āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti sacepi sakaladivasaṃ khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekaṃyeva pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:92_12: Sace pana kusito hoti, punappunaṃ āṇāpetabbo. Taṃ āṇāpetvā khaṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya
atk-vin02a1:93_0: Ayaṃ pana pāḷimuttakavinicchayo – “pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Khatāyeva
atk-vin02a1:93_1: hi pokkharaṇī nāma hoti, tasmā ayaṃ kappiyavohāro. Esa nayo “vāpiṃ taḷākaṃ āvāṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:93_2: khaṇā”tiādīsupi. “Imaṃ okāsaṃ khaṇa, imasmiṃ okāse pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vattuṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:93_3: na vaṭṭati. “Kandaṃ khaṇa, mūlaṃ khaṇā”ti aniyāmetvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Imaṃ valliṃ
atk-vin02a1:93_4: khaṇa, imasmiṃ okāse kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā khaṇā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pokkharaṇiṃ sodhentehi
atk-vin02a1:93_5: yo kuṭehi ussiñcituṃ sakkā hoti tanukakaddamo, taṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭati, bahalaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:93_6: Ātapena sukkhakaddamo phalati, tatra yo heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddho, tameva apanetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:93_7: vaṭṭati. Udakena gataṭṭhāne udakapappaṭako nāma hoti, vātappahārena calati, taṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:94_0: Pokkharaṇīādīnaṃ taṭaṃ bhijjitvā udakasāmantā patati, sace omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:94_1: chindituṃ vā bhindituṃ vā vaṭṭati, cātumāsato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana udakeyeva
atk-vin02a1:94_2: patati, deve atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhepi udakeyeva udakassa patitattā vaṭṭati. Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:94_3: soṇḍiṃ khaṇanti, sace tattha paṭhamameva sukhumarajaṃ patati, tañce devena ovaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:94_4: hoti, cātumāsaccayena akappiyapathavīsaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Udake pariyādiṇṇe soṇḍiṃ
atk-vin02a1:94_5: sodhentehi taṃ vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace paṭhamameva udakena pūrati, pacchā rajaṃ
atk-vin02a1:94_6: patati, taṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha hi deve vassantepi udakeyeva udakaṃ patatīti.
atk-vin02a1:94_7: Piṭṭhipāsāṇe sukhumarajaṃ hoti, deve phusāyante allīyati, tampi cātumāsaccayena vikopetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:94_8: na vaṭṭati. Sace pana akatapabbhāre vammiko uṭṭhito hoti, yathāsukhaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:94_9: Sace abbhokāse uṭṭhahati, omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhoyeva vaṭṭati. Rukkhādīsu āruḷhaupacikāmattikāyapi
atk-vin02a1:95_0: Gokaṇṭako nāma gāvīnaṃ khuracchinnakaddamo vuccati. Sace pana heṭṭhimatalena bhūmisambandho
atk-vin02a1:95_1: hoti, ekadivasampi na vaṭṭati. Kasitaṭṭhānepi naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantassa
atk-vin02a1:95_2: eseva nayo. Purāṇasenāsanaṃ hoti acchadanaṃ vā vinaṭṭhacchadanaṃ vā, atirekacātumāsaṃ
atk-vin02a1:95_3: ovaṭṭhaṃ jātapathavīsaṅkhyameva gacchati. Tato avasesaṃ chadaniṭṭhakaṃ vā gopānasīādikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:95_4: upakaraṇaṃ vā “iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhāmi gopanasiṃ bhittipādaṃ padarattharaṇaṃ pāsāṇatthambhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:95_5: gaṇhāmī”ti saññāya gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Tena saddhiṃ mattikā patati, anāpatti. Bhittimattikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:95_6: gaṇhantassa pana āpatti. Sace yā yā atintā taṃ taṃ gaṇhāti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:96_0: Antogehe mattikāpuñjo hoti, tasmiṃ ekadivasaṃ ovaṭṭhe gehaṃ chādenti, sace sabbo
atk-vin02a1:96_1: tinto cātumāsaccayena jātapathavīyeva. Athassa uparibhāgoyeva tinto, anto atinto,
atk-vin02a1:96_2: yattakaṃ tintaṃ taṃ kappiyakārakehi kappiyavohārena apanāmetvā sesaṃ yathāsukhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:96_3: vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati. Udakena temetvā ekābaddhāyeva hi jātapathavī hoti, na itarāti.
atk-vin02a1:97_0: Abbhokāse mattikāpākāro hoti, atirekacātumāsaṃ ce ovaṭṭho jātapathavīsaṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:97_1: Tattha laggapaṃsuṃ pana allahatthena chupitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace iṭṭhakapākāro
atk-vin02a1:97_2: hoti, yebhuyyenakathalaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, yathāsukhaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati. Abbhokāse
atk-vin02a1:97_3: ṭhitamaṇḍapatthambhaṃ ito cito ca sañcāletvā pathaviṃ vikopentena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:97_4: ujukameva uddharituṃ vaṭṭati. Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā sukkhakhāṇukaṃ vā gaṇhantassa
atk-vin02a1:97_5: eseva nayo. Navakammatthaṃ pāsāṇaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā daṇḍakehi uccāletvā pavaṭṭentā gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:97_6: tattha pathavī bhijjati, sace suddhacittā pavaṭṭenti, anāpatti. Atha pana tena apadesena
atk-vin02a1:97_7: pathaviṃ bhinditukāmāyeva honti, āpatti. Sākhādīni kaḍḍhantānampi pathaviyaṃ dārūni
atk-vin02a1:98_0: Pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhisūcikaṇṭakādīsupi yaṃkiñci ākoṭetuṃ vā pavesetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. Passāvadhārāya
atk-vin02a1:98_1: vegena pathaviṃ bhindissāmīti evaṃ passāvampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, karontassa bhijjati,
atk-vin02a1:98_2: āpatti. Visamabhūmiṃ samaṃ karissāmīti sammuñjaniyā ghaṃsitumpi na vaṭṭati, vattasīseneva
atk-vin02a1:98_3: hi sammajjitabbaṃ. Keci kattarayaṭṭhiyā bhūmiṃ koṭṭenti, pādaṅguṭṭhakena vilikhanti,
atk-vin02a1:98_4: “caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmā”ti punappunaṃ bhūmiṃ bhindantā caṅkamanti, sabbaṃ na
atk-vin02a1:98_5: vaṭṭati. Vīriyasampaggahatthaṃ pana samaṇadhammaṃ karontena suddhacittena caṅkamituṃ
atk-vin02a1:98_6: vaṭṭati, “hatthaṃ dhovissāmā”ti pathaviyaṃ ghaṃsanti, na vaṭṭati. Aghaṃsantena pana
atk-vin02a1:98_7: allahatthaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā rajaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Keci kaṇḍukacchuādīhi ābādhikā
atk-vin02a1:99_0: 87. Khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vāti antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi sammajjanīsalākāyapi sayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:99_1: vā khaṇati, aññena vā khaṇāpeti. Bhindati vā bhedāpeti vāti antamaso udakampi chaḍḍento
atk-vin02a1:99_2: sayaṃ vā bhindati, aññena vā bhindāpeti. Dahati vā dahāpeti vāti antamaso pattampi
atk-vin02a1:99_3: pacanto sayaṃ vā dahati, aññena vā dahāpeti. Yattakesu ṭhānesu aggiṃ deti vā dāpeti
atk-vin02a1:99_4: vā tattakāni pācittiyāni. Pattaṃ pacantenapi hi pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva hi pacitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:99_5: Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pattapacanakapālassa pana upari aggiṃ
atk-vin02a1:99_6: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dārūnaṃ upari ṭhapeti, so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā pathaviṃ dahati,
atk-vin02a1:100_0: Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṃyeva upari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Tesaṃ anupādānattā. Na
atk-vin02a1:100_1: hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Sukkhakhāṇusukkharukkhādīsupi aggiṃ dātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:100_2: na vaṭṭati. Sace pana pathaviṃ appattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmīti deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:100_3: Pacchā nibbāpetuṃ na sakkoti, avisayattā anāpatti. Tiṇukkaṃ gahetvā gacchanto hatthe
atk-vin02a1:100_4: ḍayhamāne bhūmiyaṃ pāteti, anāpatti. Patitaṭṭhāneyeva upādānaṃ datvā aggiṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:100_5: vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Daḍḍhapathaviyā ca yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ usumāya anugataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:100_6: sabbaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭatīti tattheva vuttaṃ. Yo pana ajānanako bhikkhu araṇīsahitena
atk-vin02a1:100_7: aggiṃ nibbattetvā hatthena ukkhipitvā “kiṃ karomī”ti vadati, “jālehī”ti vattabbo,
atk-vin02a1:100_8: “hattho ḍayhatī”ti vadati, “yathā na ḍayhati tathā karohī”ti vattabbo. “Bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:100_9: pātehī”ti pana na vattabbo. Sace hatthe ḍayhamāne pāteti “pathaviṃ dahissāmī”ti apātitattā
atk-vin02a1:100_10: anāpatti. Patitaṭṭhāne pana aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:101_0: 88. Anāpatti imaṃ jānātiādīsu “imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṃ jāna, mahāmattikaṃ jāna,
atk-vin02a1:101_1: thusamattikaṃ jāna, mahāmattikaṃ dehi, thusamattikaṃ dehi, mattikaṃ āhara, paṃsuṃ
atk-vin02a1:101_2: āhara, mattikāya attho, paṃsunā attho, imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi,
atk-vin02a1:101_3: imaṃ mattikaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi, imaṃ paṃsuṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:102_0: Asañciccāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni vā pavaṭṭentassa kattaradaṇḍena vā āhacca āhacca gacchantassa
atk-vin02a1:102_1: pathavī bhijjati, sā “tena bhindissāmī”ti evaṃ sañcicca abhinnattā asañcicca bhinnā
atk-vin02a1:102_2: nāma hoti. Iti asañcicca bhindantassa anāpatti. Asatiyāti aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:102_3: kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṃ vilikhanto tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:102_4: evaṃ asatiyā vilikhantassa vā bhindantassa vā anāpatti. Ajānantassāti antogehe ovaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:102_5: channaṃ pathaviṃ “akappiyapathavī”ti na jānāti, “kappiyapathavī”ti saññāya vikopeti,
atk-vin02a1:102_6: “khaṇāmi bhindāmi dahāmī”ti vā na jānāti, kevalaṃ saṅgopanatthāya khaṇittādīni vā
atk-vin02a1:102_7: ṭhapeti, ḍayhamānahattho vā aggiṃ pāteti, evaṃ ajānantassa anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:103: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:108_0: 89. Senāsanavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – anādiyantoti tassā vacanaṃ agaṇhanto. Dārakassa
atk-vin02a1:108_1: bāhuṃ ākoṭesīti ukkhittaṃ pharasuṃ niggahetuṃ asakkonto manussānaṃ cakkhuvisayātīte
atk-vin02a1:108_2: mahārājasantikā laddhe rukkhaṭṭhakadibbavimāne nipannassa dārakassa bāhuṃ thanamūleyeva
atk-vin02a1:108_3: chindi. Na kho metaṃ patirūpantiādimhi ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā – himavante kira pakkhadivasesu
atk-vin02a1:108_4: devatāsannipāto hoti, tattha rukkhadhammaṃ pucchanti – “tvaṃ rukkhadhamme ṭhitā na
atk-vin02a1:108_5: ṭhitā”ti? Rukkhadhammo nāma rukkhe chijjamāne rukkhadevatāya manopadosassa akaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:108_6: Tattha yā devatā rukkhadhamme aṭṭhitā hoti, sā devatāsannipātaṃ pavisituṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a1:108_7: Iti sā devatā imañca rukkhadhamme aṭṭhānapaccayaṃ ādīnavaṃ addasa, bhagavato ca sammukhā
atk-vin02a1:108_9: Tenassā etadahosi – “na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ…pe… voropeyya”nti. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavato
atk-vin02a1:108_10: etamatthaṃ āroceyyanti idaṃ panassā “ayaṃ bhikkhu sapitiko putto, addhā bhagavā imaṃ
atk-vin02a1:108_11: imassa ajjhācāraṃ sutvā mariyādaṃ bandhissati, sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessatī”ti paṭisañcikkhantiyā
atk-vin02a1:108_12: ahosi. Sacajja tvaṃ devateti sace ajja tvaṃ devate. Pasaveyyāsīti janeyyāsi uppādeyyāsi.
atk-vin02a1:108_13: Evañca pana vatvā bhagavā taṃ devataṃ saññāpento –
atk-vin02a1:109: “Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye;
atk-vin02a1:110: Tamahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi, rasmiggāho itaro jano”ti. ;
atk-vin02a1:111: Imaṃ gāthamabhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne sā devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Puna bhagavā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desento –
atk-vin02a1:112: “Yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi;
atk-vin02a1:113: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇa”nti. ;
atk-vin02a1:114_0: Imaṃ gāthamabhāsi. Tatra paṭhamagāthā dhammapade saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā, dutiyā suttanipāte,
atk-vin02a1:114_1: vatthu pana vinayeti. Atha bhagavā dhammaṃ desentoyeva tassā devatāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:114_2: āvajjanto patirūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ disvā “gaccha, devate, asukasmiṃ okāse rukkho vivitto,
atk-vin02a1:114_3: tasmiṃ upagacchā”ti āha. So kira rukkho na āḷaviraṭṭhe, jetavanassa antoparikkhepe,
atk-vin02a1:114_4: yassa devaputtassa pariggaho ahosi, so cuto; tasmā “vivitto”ti vutto. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:114_5: ca pana sā devatā sammāsambuddhato laddhaparihārā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā ahosi. Yadā devatāsamāgamo
atk-vin02a1:114_6: hoti, tadā mahesakkhadevatāsu āgacchantīsu aññā appesakkhā devatā yāva mahāsamuddacakkavāḷapabbatā
atk-vin02a1:114_7: tāva paṭikkamanti. Ayaṃ pana attano vasanaṭṭhāne nisīditvāva dhammaṃ suṇāti. Yampi
atk-vin02a1:114_8: paṭhamayāme bhikkhū pañhaṃ pucchanti, majjhimayāme devatā, taṃ sabbaṃ tattheva nisīditvā
atk-vin02a1:114_9: suṇāti. Cattāro ca mahārājānopi bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā gacchantā taṃ devataṃ disvāva gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:115_0: 90. Bhūtagāmapātabyatāyāti ettha bhavanti ahuvuñcāti bhūtā; jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā
atk-vin02a1:115_1: vaḍḍhitā cāti attho. Gāmoti rāsi; bhūtānaṃ gāmoti bhūtagāmo; bhūtā eva vā gāmo bhūtagāmo;
atk-vin02a1:115_2: patiṭṭhitaharitatiṇarukkhādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pātabyassa bhāvo pātabyatā; chedanabhedanādīhi
atk-vin02a1:115_3: yathāruci paribhuñjitabbatāti attho. Tassā bhūtagāmapātabyatāya; nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:116_0: 91. Idāni taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ vibhajitvā dassento bhūtagāmo nāma pañca bījajātānītiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:116_1: Tattha bhūtagāmo nāmāti bhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā yasmiṃ sati bhūtagāmo hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:116_2: “pañca bījajātānī”ti āhāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi “yāni vā panaññānipi
atk-vin02a1:116_3: atthi mūle jāyantī”tiādīni na samenti. Na hi mūlabījādīni mūlādīsu jāyanti, mūlādīsu
atk-vin02a1:116_4: jāyamānāni pana tāni bījākatāni, tasmā evamettha vaṇṇanā veditabbā – bhūtagāmo nāmāti
atk-vin02a1:116_5: vibhajitabbapadaṃ. Pañcāti tassa vibhāgaparicchedo. Bījajātānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:116_6: Tassattho – bījehi jātāni bījajātāni; rukkhādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Aparo nayo – bījāni
atk-vin02a1:116_7: ca tāni vijātāni ca pasūtāni nibbattapaṇṇamūlānīti bījajātāni. Etena allavālikādīsu
atk-vin02a1:116_8: ṭhapitānaṃ nibbattapaṇṇamūlānaṃ siṅgiverādīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti.
atk-vin02a1:117_0: Idāni yehi bījehi jātattā rukkhādīni bījajātānīti vuttāni, tāni dassento “mūlabīja”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:117_1: Tesaṃ uddeso pākaṭo eva. Niddese yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyanti mūle sañjāyantīti
atk-vin02a1:117_2: ettha bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassitaṃ, tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo, yāni vā
atk-vin02a1:117_4: gacchavallirukkhādīni jāyanti sañjāyanti, tāni yamhi mūle jāyanti ceva sañjāyanti
atk-vin02a1:117_5: ca tañca, pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ haliddādi ca sabbampi etaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma. Eseva nayo khandhabījādīsu.
atk-vin02a1:118_0: 92. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiya”nti tattha saññāvasena āpattānāpattibhedaṃ
atk-vin02a1:118_1: pātabyatābhedañca dassento bīje bījasaññītiādimāha. Tattha yathā “sālīnaṃ cepi odanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:118_2: bhuñjatī”tiādīsu sālitaṇḍulānaṃ odano “sālīnaṃ odano”ti vuccati, evaṃ bījato sambhūto
atk-vin02a1:118_3: bhūtagāmo “bīja”nti vuttoti veditabbo. Yaṃ pana “bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato”tiādīsu
atk-vin02a1:118_4: vuttaṃ bhūtagāmaparimocanaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ bījaṃ, taṃ dukkaṭavatthu. Atha vā yadetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:118_5: “bhūtagāmo nāmā”ti sikkhāpadavibhaṅgassa ādipadaṃ, tena saddhiṃ yojetvā yaṃ bījaṃ
atk-vin02a1:118_6: bhūtagāmo nāma hoti, tasmiṃ bīje bījasaññī satthakādīni gahetvā sayaṃ vā chindati
atk-vin02a1:118_7: aññena vā chedāpeti, pāsāṇādīni gahetvā sayaṃ vā bhindati aññena vā bhedāpeti, aggiṃ
atk-vin02a1:118_8: upasaṃharitvā sayaṃ vā pacati aññena vā pacāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassāti evamettha
atk-vin02a1:118_9: attho veditabbo. Yathārutaṃ pana gahetvā bhūtagāmavinimuttassa bījassa chindanādibhedāya
atk-vin02a1:119_0: Ayañhettha vinicchayakathā – bhūtagāmaṃ vikopentassa pācittiyaṃ bhūtagāmaparimocitaṃ
atk-vin02a1:119_1: pañcavidhampi bījagāmaṃ vikopentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Bījagāmabhūtagāmo nāmesa atthi udakaṭṭho,
atk-vin02a1:119_2: atthi thalaṭṭho. Tattha udakaṭṭho sāsapamattikā tilabījakādibhedā sapaṇṇikā apaṇṇikā
atk-vin02a1:119_3: ca sabbā sevālajāti antamaso udakapappaṭakaṃ upādāya “bhūtagāmo”ti veditabbo. Udakapappaṭako
atk-vin02a1:119_4: nāma upari thaddho pharusavaṇṇo, heṭṭhā mudu nīlavaṇṇo hoti. Tattha yassa sevālassa
atk-vin02a1:119_5: mūlaṃ orūhitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, tassa pathavī ṭhānaṃ. Yo udake sañcarati,
atk-vin02a1:119_6: tassa udakaṃ. Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ yattha katthaci vikopentassa uddharitvā vā ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-vin02a1:119_7: saṅkāmentassa pācittiyaṃ. Udake sañcarantaṃ vikopentasseva pācittiyaṃ. Hatthehi pana
atk-vin02a1:119_8: ito cito ca viyūhitvā nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati, sakalañhi udakaṃ tassa ṭhānaṃ. Tasmā na so
atk-vin02a1:119_9: ettāvatā ṭhānantaraṃ saṅkāmito hoti. Udakato pana udakena vinā sañcicca ukkhipituṃ
atk-vin02a1:119_10: na vaṭṭati, udakena saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā puna udake pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Parissāvanantarena
atk-vin02a1:119_11: nikkhamati, kappiyaṃ kārāpetvāva udakaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Uppalinīpaduminīādīni jalajavallitiṇāni
atk-vin02a1:119_12: udakato uddharantassa vā tattheva vikopentassa vā pācittiyaṃ. Parehi uppāṭitāni vikopentassa
atk-vin02a1:119_13: dukkaṭaṃ. Tāni hi bījagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Tilabījakasāsapamattakasevālopi udakato
atk-vin02a1:119_15: dukkaṭavatthukānī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sampuṇṇabhūtagāmo
atk-vin02a1:119_16: na hoti, tasmā dukkaṭa”nti vuttaṃ, tampi na sameti, bhūtagāme hi pācittiyaṃ, bījagāme
atk-vin02a1:119_17: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo nāma tatiyo koṭṭhāso neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin02a1:119_18: āgato. Atha etaṃ bījagāmasaṅgahaṃ gacchissatīti, tampi na yuttaṃ, abhūtagāmamūlattā
atk-vin02a1:119_19: tādisassa bījagāmassāti. Apica “garukalahukesu garuke ṭhātabba”nti etaṃ vinayalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:120_0: Thalaṭṭhe – chinnarukkhānaṃ avasiṭṭho haritakhāṇu nāma hoti. Tattha kakudhakarañjapiyaṅgupanasādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:120_1: khāṇu uddhaṃ vaḍḍhati, so bhūtagāmena saṅgahito. Tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu uddhaṃ na
atk-vin02a1:120_2: vaḍḍhati, so bījagāmena saṅgahito. Kadaliyā pana aphalitāya khāṇu bhūtagāmena saṅgahito,
atk-vin02a1:120_3: phalitāya bījagāmena. Kadalī pana phalitā yāva nīlapaṇṇā, tāva bhūtagāmeneva saṅgahitā,
atk-vin02a1:120_4: tathā phalito veḷu. Yadā pana aggato paṭṭhāya sussati, tadā bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:120_5: Katarabījagāmena? Phaḷubījagāmena. Kiṃ tato nibbattati? Na kiñci. Yadi hi nibbatteyya,
atk-vin02a1:120_6: bhūtagāmeneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya. Indasālādirukkhe chinditvā rāsiṃ karonti, kiñcāpi
atk-vin02a1:120_7: rāsikatadaṇḍakehi ratanappamāṇāpi sākhā nikkhamanti, bījagāmeneva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:120_8: Tattha maṇḍapatthāya vā vatiatthāya vā valliāropanatthāya vā bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇanti,
atk-vin02a1:120_9: mūlesu ceva paṇṇesu ca niggatesu puna bhūtagāmasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Mūlamattesu pana
atk-vin02a1:120_10: paṇṇamattesu vā niggatesu bījagāmena saṅgahitā eva.
atk-vin02a1:121_0: Yāni kānici bījāni pathaviyaṃ vā udakena siñcitvā ṭhapitāni, kapālādīsu vā allapaṃsuṃ
atk-vin02a1:121_1: pakkhipitvā nikkhittāni honti, sabbāni mūlamatte paṇṇamatte vā niggatepi bījāniyeva.
atk-vin02a1:121_2: Sacepi mūlāni ca upari aṅkuro ca niggacchati, yāva aṅkuro harito na hoti, tāva bījāniyeva.
atk-vin02a1:121_3: Muggādīnaṃ pana paṇṇesu uṭṭhitesu vīhiādīnaṃ vā aṅkure harite nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇe jāte
atk-vin02a1:121_4: bhūtagāmasaṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Tālaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭhamaṃ sūkaradāṭhā viya mūlaṃ niggacchati.
atk-vin02a1:121_5: Niggatepi yāva upari pattavaṭṭi na niggacchati, tāva bījagāmoyeva. Nāḷikerassa tacaṃ
atk-vin02a1:121_6: bhinditvā dantasūci viya aṅkuro niggacchati, yāva migasiṅgasadisā nīlapattavaṭṭi
atk-vin02a1:121_7: na hoti, tāva bījagāmoyeva. Mūle aniggatepi tādisāya pattavaṭṭiyā jātāya amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:122_0: Ambaṭṭhiādīni vīhiādīhi vinicchinitabbāni. Vandākā vā aññā vā yā kāci rukkhe jāyitvā
atk-vin02a1:122_1: rukkhaṃ ottharati, rukkhova tassā ṭhānaṃ, taṃ vikopentassa vā tato uddharantassa
atk-vin02a1:122_2: vā pācittiyaṃ. Ekā amūlikā latā hoti, aṅguliveṭhako viya vanappagumbadaṇḍake veṭheti,
atk-vin02a1:122_3: tassāpi ayameva vinicchayo. Gehamukhapākāravedikācetiyādīsu nīlavaṇṇo sevālo hoti,
atk-vin02a1:122_4: yāva dve tīṇi pattāni na sañjāyanti tāva aggabījasaṅgahaṃ gacchati. Pattesu jātesu
atk-vin02a1:122_5: pācittiyavatthu. Tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu sudhālepampi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Anupasampannena
atk-vin02a1:122_6: littassa uparisnehalepo dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace nidāghasamaye sukkhasevālo tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:122_7: taṃ sammuñjanīādīhi ghaṃsitvā apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo dukkaṭavatthu,
atk-vin02a1:122_8: anto abbohāriko. Dantakaṭṭhapūvādīsu kaṇṇakampi abbohārikameva. Vuttañhetaṃ – “sace
atk-vin02a1:122_9: gerukaparikammakatā bhitti kaṇṇakitā hoti, coḷakaṃ temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:123_1: Ahicchattakaṃ yāva makuḷaṃ hoti, tāva dukkaṭavatthu. Pupphitakālato paṭṭhāya abbohārikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:123_2: Allarukkhato pana ahicchattakaṃ gaṇhanto rukkhattacaṃ vikopeti, tasmā tattha pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:123_3: Rukkhapappaṭikāyapi eseva nayo. Yā pana indasālakakudhādīnaṃ pappaṭikā rukkhato muccitvā
atk-vin02a1:123_4: tiṭṭhati, taṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti. Niyyāsampi rukkhato muccitvā ṭhitaṃ sukkharukkhe
atk-vin02a1:123_5: vā laggaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Allarukkhato na vaṭṭati. Lākhāyapi eseva nayo. Rukkhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:123_6: cāletvā paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā pariṇatakaṇikārādipupphaṃ vā pātentassa pācittiyameva. Hatthakukkuccena
atk-vin02a1:123_7: mudukesu indasālanuhīkhandhādīsu vā tatthajātakatālapaṇṇādīsu vā akkharaṃ chindantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:124_0: Sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphaṃ ocinantānaṃ sākhaṃ onāmetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tehi pana pupphehi
atk-vin02a1:124_1: pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbaṃ. Pānīyavāsatthikena sāmaṇeraṃ ukkhipitvā ocināpetabbāni. Phalasākhāpi
atk-vin02a1:124_2: attanā khāditukāmena na onāmetabbā. Sāmaṇeraṃ ukkhipitvā phalaṃ gāhāpetabbaṃ. Yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a1:124_3: gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā uppāṭentehi sāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:124_4: Tesaṃ pana ussāhajananatthaṃ anākaḍḍhantena kaḍḍhanākāraṃ dassentena viya agge gahetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:124_5: vaṭṭati. Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhati, tesaṃ sākhaṃ makkhikābījanādīnaṃ atthāya kappiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:124_6: akārāpetvā gahitaṃ tace vā patte vā antamaso nakhenapi vilikhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Allasiṅgiverādīsupi
atk-vin02a1:124_7: eseva nayo. Sace pana kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā sītale padese ṭhapitassa mūlaṃ sañjāyati,
atk-vin02a1:124_8: uparibhāge chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace aṅkuro jāyati, heṭṭhābhāge chindituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:124_9: Mūle ca nīlaṅkure ca jāte na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:125_0: Chindati vā chedāpeti vāti antamaso sammuñjanosalākāyapi tiṇāni chindissāmīti bhūmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:125_1: sammajjanto sayaṃ vā chindati, aññena vā chedāpeti. Bhindati vā bhedāpeti vāti antamaso
atk-vin02a1:125_2: caṅkamantopi chijjanakaṃ chijjatu, bhijjanakaṃ bhijjatu, caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmīti
atk-vin02a1:125_3: sañcicca pādehi akkamanto tiṇavalliādīni sayaṃ vā bhindati aññena vā bhedāpeti. Sacepi
atk-vin02a1:125_4: hi tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā gaṇṭhiṃ karontassa bhijjati, gaṇṭhipi na kātabbo. Tālarukkhādīsu
atk-vin02a1:125_5: pana corānaṃ anāruhanatthāya dārumakkaṭakaṃ ākoṭenti, kaṇṭake bandhanti, bhikkhussa
atk-vin02a1:125_6: evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace dārumakkaṭako rukkhe allīnamattova hoti, rukkhaṃ na pīḷeti,
atk-vin02a1:125_7: vaṭṭati. “Rukkhaṃ chinda, lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā uppāṭehī”ti vattumpi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:125_8: aniyāmitattā. Niyāmetvā pana “imaṃ rukkhaṃ chindā”tiādi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Nāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:125_10: chinda bhinda uppāṭehī”tiādivacanampi aniyāmitameva hoti. “Imaṃ ambarukkha”ntiādivacanameva
atk-vin02a1:125_11: hi niyāmitaṃ nāma, taṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:126_0: Pacati vā pacāpeti vāti antamaso pattampi pacitukāmo tiṇādīnaṃ upari sañcicca aggiṃ
atk-vin02a1:126_1: karonto sayaṃ vā pacati, aññena vā pacāpetīti sabbaṃ pathavīkhaṇanasikkhāpade vuttanayena
atk-vin02a1:126_2: veditabbaṃ. Aniyāmetvā pana “mugge paca, māse pacā”tiādi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Ime mugge
atk-vin02a1:126_3: paca, ime māse pacā”ti evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:127_0: Anāpatti imaṃ jānātiādīsu “imaṃ mūlabhesajjaṃ jāna, imaṃ mūlaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā dehi,
atk-vin02a1:127_1: imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā āhara, iminā pupphena vā phalena vā paṇṇena vā attho, imaṃ
atk-vin02a1:127_2: rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā phalaṃ vā kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Ettāvatā bhūtagāmaparimocanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:127_3: kataṃ hoti. Paribhuñjantena pana bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:128_0: Kappiyakaraṇañcettha iminā suttānusārena veditabbaṃ – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi
atk-vin02a1:128_1: samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ aggiparijitaṃ satthaparijitaṃ nakhaparijitaṃ abījaṃ
atk-vin02a1:128_2: nibbaṭṭabījameva pañcama”nti. Tattha “aggiparijita”nti agginā parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ
atk-vin02a1:128_3: daḍḍhaṃ phuṭṭhanti attho. “Satthaparijita”nti satthena parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ chinnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:128_4: viddhaṃ vāti attho. Esa nayo nakhaparijite. Abījanibbaṭṭabījāni sayameva kappiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:128_5: Agginā kappiyaṃ karontena kaṭṭhaggigomayaggiādīsu yena kenaci antamaso lohakhaṇḍenapi
atk-vin02a1:128_6: ādittena kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tañca kho ekadese phusantena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:128_7: Satthena karontena yassa kassaci lohamayasatthassa antamaso sūcinakhacchedanānampi
atk-vin02a1:128_8: tuṇḍena vā dhārāya vā chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:128_9: Nakhena kappiyaṃ karontena pūtinakhena na kātabbaṃ. Manussānaṃ pana sīhabyagghadīpimakkaṭādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:128_10: sakuntānañca nakhā tikhiṇā honti, tehi kātabbaṃ. Assamahiṃsasūkaramigagorūpādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:128_11: khurā atikhiṇā, tehi na kātabbaṃ, katampi akataṃ hoti. Hatthinakhā pana khurā na
atk-vin02a1:128_12: honti, tehi vaṭṭati. Yehi pana kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tehi tatthajātakehipi uddharitvā gahitakehipi
atk-vin02a1:128_13: chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:129_0: Tattha sacepi bījānaṃ pabbatamatto rāsi rukkhasahassaṃ vā chinditvā ekābaddhaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:129_1: ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti, ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi
atk-vin02a1:129_2: vā kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti. Ucchū ca dārūni ca ekato baddhāni honti, ucchuṃ
atk-vin02a1:129_3: kappiyaṃ karissāmīti dāruṃ vijjhati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace pana yāya rajjuyā vā valliyā
atk-vin02a1:129_4: vā baddhāni, taṃ vijjhati, na vaṭṭati. Ucchukhaṇḍānaṃ pacchiṃ pūretvā āharanti, ekasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:129_5: khaṇḍe kappiye kate sabbaṃ katameva hoti. Maricapakkādīhi missetvā bhattaṃ āharanti,
atk-vin02a1:129_6: “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutte sacepi bhattasitthe vijjhati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Tilataṇḍulādīsupi
atk-vin02a1:129_7: eseva nayo. Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā na santiṭṭhanti, tattha ekamekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:129_8: vijjhitvā kappiyaṃ kātabbameva. Kapitthaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati,
atk-vin02a1:129_9: bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ. Ekābaddhaṃ hoti, kaṭāhepi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:130_0: Asañciccāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni vā pavaṭṭentassa sākhaṃ vā kaḍḍhantassa kattaradaṇḍena
atk-vin02a1:130_1: vā bhūmiṃ paharitvā gacchantassa tiṇāni chijjanti, tāni tena chindissāmīti evaṃ sañcicca
atk-vin02a1:130_2: acchinnattā asañcicca chinnāni nāma honti. Iti asañcicca chindantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:131: Asatiyāti aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā hatthena vā tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā chindanto tiṭṭhati, evaṃ asatiyā chindantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:132_0: Ajānantassāti etthabbhantare bījagāmoti vā bhūtagāmoti vā na jānāti, chindāmītipi
atk-vin02a1:132_1: na jānāti, kevalaṃ vatiyā vā palālapuñje vā nikhādanaṃ vā khaṇittiṃ vā kudālaṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:132_2: saṅgopanatthāya ṭhapeti, ḍayhamānahattho vā aggiṃ pāteti, tatra ce tiṇāni chijjanti
atk-vin02a1:132_3: vā ḍayhanti vā anāpatti. Manussaviggahapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin02a1:132_4: “sace bhikkhu rukkhena vā ajjhotthaṭo hoti, opāte vā patito sakkā ca hoti rukkhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:132_5: chinditvā bhūmiṃ vā khaṇitvā nikkhamituṃ, jīvitahetupi attanā na kātabbaṃ. Aññena
atk-vin02a1:132_6: pana bhikkhunā bhūmiṃ vā khaṇitvā rukkhaṃ vā chinditvā allarukkhato vā daṇḍakaṃ chinditvā
atk-vin02a1:132_7: taṃ rukkhaṃ pavaṭṭetvā nikkhāmetuṃ vaṭṭati, anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kāraṇaṃ na
atk-vin02a1:132_8: dissati – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, davaḍāhe ḍayhamāne paṭaggiṃ dātuṃ, parittaṃ kātu”nti
atk-vin02a1:132_9: idaṃ pana ekameva suttaṃ dissati. Sace etassa anulomaṃ “attano na vaṭṭati, aññassa
atk-vin02a1:132_10: vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ na sakkā laddhuṃ. Attano atthāya karonto attasinehena
atk-vin02a1:132_11: akusalacitteneva karoti, paro pana kāruññena, tasmā anāpattīti ce. Etampi akāraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:132_12: Kusalacittenāpi hi imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. Sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttattā na sakkā
atk-vin02a1:132_13: paṭisedhetuṃ. Gavesitabbā ettha yutti. Aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vā saddhāya gantabbanti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:133: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:136_0: 94. Dutiyasikkhāpade – anācāraṃ ācaritvāti akātabbaṃ katvā; kāyavacīdvāresu āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:136_1: āpajjitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena vacanena aññaṃ vacanaṃ paṭicarati
atk-vin02a1:136_2: paṭicchādeti ajjhottharati; idāni taṃ paṭicaraṇavidhiṃ dassento “ko āpanno”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:136_3: Tatrāyaṃ vacanasambandho – so kira kiñci vītikkamaṃ disvā “āvuso, āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti
atk-vin02a1:136_4: saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno “ko āpanno”ti vadati. “Tato tva”nti vutte “ahaṃ
atk-vin02a1:136_5: kiṃ āpanno”ti vadati. Atha “pācittiyaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ vā”ti vutte vatthuṃ pucchanto
atk-vin02a1:136_6: “ahaṃ kismiṃ āpanno”ti vadati. Tato “asukasmiṃ nāma vatthusmi”nti vutte “ahaṃ kathaṃ
atk-vin02a1:136_7: āpanno, kiṃ karonto āpannomhī”ti pucchati. Atha “idaṃ nāma karonto āpanno”ti vutte
atk-vin02a1:136_8: “kaṃ bhaṇathā”ti vadati. Tato “taṃ bhaṇāmā”ti vutte “kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:137_0: Apicettha ayaṃ pāḷimuttakopi aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇavidhi – bhikkhūhi “tava sipāṭikāya
atk-vin02a1:137_1: kahāpaṇo diṭṭho, kissevamasāruppaṃ karosī”ti vutto “sudiṭṭhaṃ, bhante, na paneso
atk-vin02a1:137_2: kahāpaṇo; tipumaṇḍalaṃ eta”nti bhaṇanto vā “tvaṃ suraṃ pivanto diṭṭho, kissevaṃ karosī”ti
atk-vin02a1:137_3: vutto “sudiṭṭho, bhante, na panesā surā, bhesajjatthāya sampāditaṃ ariṭṭha”nti bhaṇanto
atk-vin02a1:137_4: vā “tvaṃ paṭicchanne āsane mātugāmena saddhiṃ nisinno diṭṭho, kissevamasāruppaṃ karosī”ti
atk-vin02a1:137_5: vutto “yena diṭṭhaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ, viññū panettha dutiyo atthi, so kissa na diṭṭho”ti
atk-vin02a1:137_6: bhaṇanto vā, “īdisaṃ tayā kiñci diṭṭha”nti puṭṭho “na suṇāmī”ti sotamupanento vā,
atk-vin02a1:137_7: sotadvāre pucchantānaṃ cakkhuṃ upanento vā, aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti veditabbo. Aññavādakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:137_8: ropetūti aññavādakaṃ āropetu; patiṭṭhāpetūti attho. Vihesakaṃ ropetūti etasmimpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:138_0: 98. Aññavādake vihesake pācittiyanti ettha aññaṃ vadatīti aññavādakaṃ; aññenaññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:138_1: paṭicaraṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vihesetīti vihesakaṃ; tuṇhībhūtassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmiṃ aññavādake
atk-vin02a1:139: 100. Aropite aññavādaketi kammavācāya anāropite aññavādake. Aropite vihesaketi etasmimpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:140_0: 101. Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññītiādīsu yaṃ taṃ aññavādakavihesakaropanakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:140_1: tañce dhammakammaṃ hoti, so ca bhikkhu tasmiṃ dhammakammasaññī aññavādakañca vihesakañca
atk-vin02a1:140_2: karoti, athassa tasmiṃ aññavādake ca vihesake ca āpatti pācittiyassāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:141_0: 102. Ajānanto pucchatīti āpattiṃ vā āpannabhāvaṃ ajānantoyeva “kiṃ tumhe bhaṇatha,
atk-vin02a1:141_1: ahaṃ na jānāmī”ti pucchati. Gilāno vā na kathetīti mukhe tādiso byādhi hoti, yena
atk-vin02a1:141_2: kathetuṃ na sakkoti. Saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vātiādīsu saṅghamajjhe kathite tappaccayā
atk-vin02a1:141_3: saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā vivādo vā bhavissati, so mā ahosīti maññamāno na
atk-vin02a1:141_4: kathetīti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:142_0: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, siyā kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:142_1: siyā akiriyaṃ, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarantassa hi kiriyaṃ hoti, tuṇhībhāvena vihesantassa
atk-vin02a1:142_2: akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:145_0: 103. Tatiyasikkhāpade – dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpentīti “chandāya dabbo mallaputto”tiādīni
atk-vin02a1:145_1: vadantā taṃ āyasmantaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi avajānāpenti, avaññāya olokāpenti, lāmakato
atk-vin02a1:145_2: vā cintāpentī”ti attho. Lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Ojjhāpentītipi
atk-vin02a1:145_3: pāṭho. Ayamevattho. Chandāyāti chandena pakkhapātena; attano attano sandiṭṭhasambhattānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:145_4: paṇītāni paññapetīti adhippāyo. Khiyyantīti “chandāya dabbo mallaputto”tiādīni vadantā pakāsenti.
atk-vin02a1:146_0: 105. Ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyanti ettha yena vacanena ujjhāpenti, taṃ ujjhāpanakaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:146_1: Yena ca khiyyanti taṃ khiyyanakaṃ. Tasmiṃ ujjhāpanake khiyyanake. Pācittiyanti vatthudvaye
atk-vin02a1:147_0: 106. Ujjhāpanakaṃ nāma upasampannaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakaṃ vā…pe… appamattakavissajjanakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:147_1: vāti etesaṃ padānaṃ “maṅkukattukāmo”ti iminā sambandho. Avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo ayasaṃ
atk-vin02a1:147_2: kattukāmoti imesaṃ pana vasena upasampannantiādīsu “upasampannassā”ti evaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmo
atk-vin02a1:147_3: kātabbo. Ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha pana yasmā “khiyyanakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:147_4: nāmā”ti evaṃ mātikāpadaṃ uddharitvāpi “ujjhāpanakaṃ nāmā”ti imassa padassa vuttavibhaṅgoyeva
atk-vin02a1:147_5: vattabbo hoti, aññavādakasikkhāpade viya añño viseso natthi, tasmā taṃ visuṃ anuddharitvā
atk-vin02a1:147_6: avibhajitvā nigamanameva ekato katanti veditabbaṃ. Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññītiādīsu
atk-vin02a1:147_7: yaṃ tassa upasampannassa sammutikammaṃ kataṃ tañce dhammakammaṃ hoti, so ca bhikkhu
atk-vin02a1:147_8: tasmiṃ dhammakammasaññī ujjhāpanakañca khiyyanakañca karoti, athassa tasmiṃ ujjhāpanake
atk-vin02a1:147_9: ca khiyyanake ca āpatti pācittiyassāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:148_0: Anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vāti ettha upasampannaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:148_1: anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpeti avajānāpeti, tassa vā taṃ santike khiyyatīti attho. Upasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:148_2: saṅghena asammatanti kammavācāya asammataṃ kevalaṃ “taveso bhāro”ti saṅghena āropitabhāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:148_3: bhikkhūnaṃ vā phāsuvihāratthāya sayameva taṃ bhāraṃ vahantaṃ, yatra vā dve tayo bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:148_4: viharanti, tatra vā tādisaṃ kammaṃ karontanti adhippāyo. Anupasampannaṃ saṅghena
atk-vin02a1:148_5: sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi anupasampannassa terasa sammutiyo dātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:148_6: na vaṭṭanti. Atha kho upasampannakāle laddhasammutiko pacchā anupasampannabhāve ṭhito,
atk-vin02a1:148_7: taṃ sandhāya “saṅghena sammataṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ. Yassa pana byattassa sāmaṇerassa kevalaṃ
atk-vin02a1:148_8: saṅghena vā sammatena vā bhikkhunā “tvaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti bhāro kato, tādisaṃ
atk-vin02a1:149: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:152_0: 108. Catutthasikkhāpade – hemantike kāleti hemantakāle himapātasamaye. Kāyaṃ otāpentāti
atk-vin02a1:152_1: mañcapīṭhādīsu nisinnā bālātapena kāyaṃ otāpentā. Kāle ārociteti yāgubhattādīsu yassa
atk-vin02a1:152_2: kassaci kāle ārocite. Ovaṭṭhaṃ hotīti himavassena ovaṭṭhaṃ tintaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:153_0: 110. Avassikasaṅketeti vassikavassānamāsāti evaṃ apaññatte cattāro hemantike cattāro
atk-vin02a1:153_1: ca gimhike aṭṭha māseti attho. Maṇḍape vāti sākhāmaṇḍape vā padaramaṇḍape vā. Rukkhamūle
atk-vin02a1:153_2: vāti yassa kassaci rukkhassa heṭṭhā. Yattha kākā vā kulalā vā na ūhadantīti yattha
atk-vin02a1:153_3: dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasamānā ete kākakulalā vā aññe vā sakuntā taṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:153_4: na ūhadanti, tādise rukkhamūle nikkhipituṃ anujānāmīti. Tasmā yattha gocarappasutā
atk-vin02a1:153_5: sakuntā vissamitvā gacchanti, tassa rukkhassa mūle nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Yasmiṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:153_6: dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasanti, tassa rukkhassa mūle na nikkhipitabbaṃ. “Aṭṭha
atk-vin02a1:153_7: māse”ti vacanato yesu janapadesu vassakāle na vassati, tesupi cattāro māse nikkhipituṃ
atk-vin02a1:153_8: na vaṭṭatiyeva. “Avassikasaṅkete”ti vacanato yattha hemante devo vassati, tattha
atk-vin02a1:153_9: hemantepi ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati. Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:153_10: visuddhaṃ nabhaṃ hoti, evarūpe kāle kenacideva karaṇīyena ajjhokāse mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:154_0: Abbhokāsikenāpi vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ, tassa hi sace puggalikamañcako atthi, tattheva
atk-vin02a1:154_1: sayitabbaṃ. Saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantena vettena vā vākena vā vītamañcako gahetabbo. Tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:154_2: asati purāṇamañcako gahetabbo. Tasmimpi asati navavāyimo vā onaddhako vā gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:154_3: Gahetvā ca pana “ahaṃ ukkaṭṭharukkhamūliko ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsiko”ti cīvarakuṭimpi akatvā
atk-vin02a1:154_4: asamaye ajjhokāse rukkhamūle vā paññapetvā nipajjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana catugguṇenapi
atk-vin02a1:154_5: cīvarena katakuṭi atementaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti, sattāhavaddalikādīni bhavanti,
atk-vin02a1:155_0: Araññe paṇṇakuṭīsu vasantānaṃ sīlasampadāya pasannacittā manussā navaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:155_1: denti “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti vasitvā gacchantehi sāmantavihāre sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:155_2: pesetvā gantabbaṃ, sabhāgānaṃ abhāve anovassake nikkhipitvā gantabbaṃ, anovassake
atk-vin02a1:155_3: asati rukkhe laggetvā gantabbaṃ. Cetiyaṅgaṇe sammajjaniṃ gahetvā bhojanasālaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:155_4: vā uposathāgāraṅgaṇaṃ vā pariveṇadivāṭṭhānaaggisālādīsu vā aññataraṃ sammajjitvā
atk-vin02a1:155_5: dhovitvā puna sammajjanīmāḷakeyeva ṭhapetabbā. Uposathāgārādīsu aññatarasmiṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:156_0: Yo pana bhikkhācāramaggaṃ sammajjantova gantukāmo hoti, tena sammajjitvā sace antarāmagge
atk-vin02a1:156_1: sālā atthi, tattha ṭhapetabbā. Sace natthi, valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-vin02a1:156_2: “yāvāhaṃ gāmato nikkhamāmi, tāva na vassissatī”ti jānantena yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā
atk-vin02a1:156_3: puna paccāgacchantena pākatikaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbā. Sace vassissatīti jānanto ajjhokāse
atk-vin02a1:156_4: ṭhapeti, dukkaṭanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sace pana tatra tatreva sammajjanatthāya
atk-vin02a1:156_5: sammajjanī nikkhittā hoti, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tatra tatreva nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:156_6: Āsanasālaṃ sammajjantena vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tatridaṃ vattaṃ – majjhato paṭṭhāya pādaṭṭhānābhimukhā
atk-vin02a1:156_7: vālikā haritabbā. Kacavaraṃ hatthehi gahetvā bahi chaḍḍetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:157_0: 111. Masārakoti mañcapāde vijjhitvā tattha aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato. Bundikābaddhoti
atk-vin02a1:157_1: aṭanīhi mañcapāde ḍaṃsāpetvā pallaṅkasaṅkhepena kato. Kuḷīrapādakoti assameṇḍakādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:157_2: pādasadisehi pādehi kato. Yo vā pana koci vaṅkapādako, ayaṃ vuccati kuḷīrapādako.
atk-vin02a1:157_3: Āhaccapādakoti ayaṃ pana “āhaccapādako nāma mañco aṅge vijjhitvā kato hotī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:157_4: parato pāḷiyaṃyeva vutto, tasmā aṭaniyo vijjhitvā tattha pādasikhaṃ pavesetvā upari
atk-vin02a1:157_5: āṇiṃ datvā katamañco “āhaccapādako”ti veditabbo. Pīṭhepi eseva nayo. Anto saṃveṭhetvā
atk-vin02a1:157_6: baddhaṃ hotīti heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ majjhe saṅkhittaṃ paṇavasaṇṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:157_7: baddhaṃ hoti, taṃ kira majjhe sīhabyagghacammaparikkhittampi karonti. Akappiyacammaṃ
atk-vin02a1:157_8: nāmettha natthi. Senāsanañhi sovaṇṇamayampi vaṭṭati, tasmā taṃ mahagghaṃ hoti. Anupasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:157_9: santharāpeti tassa palibodhoti yena santharāpitaṃ, tassa palibodho. Leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantassa
atk-vin02a1:157_10: āpatti pācittiyassāti thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantassa pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:158_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – thero bhojanasālāyaṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā daharaṃ āṇāpeti
atk-vin02a1:158_1: “gaccha divāṭṭhāne mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapehī”ti. So tathā katvā nisinno. Thero yathāruciṃ
atk-vin02a1:158_2: vicaritvā tattha gantvā thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā ṭhapeti, tato paṭṭhāya therassa
atk-vin02a1:158_3: palibodho. Nisīditvā sayaṃ gacchanto neva uddharati, na uddharāpeti, leḍḍupātātikkame
atk-vin02a1:158_4: pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana thero tattha thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvā caṅkamantova
atk-vin02a1:158_5: daharaṃ “gaccha tva”nti bhaṇati, tena “idaṃ bhante mañcapīṭha”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:158_6: Sace thero vattaṃ jānāti “tvaṃ gaccha, ahaṃ pākatikaṃ karissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin02a1:158_7: bālo hoti anuggahitavatto “gaccha, mā idha tiṭṭha, neva nisīdituṃ na nipajjituṃ demī”ti
atk-vin02a1:158_8: daharaṃ tajjetiyeva. Daharena “bhante sukhaṃ sayathā”ti kappaṃ labhitvā vanditvā
atk-vin02a1:158_9: gantabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ gate therasseva palibodho. Purimanayeneva cassa āpatti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:159_0: Atha pana āṇattikkhaṇeyeva daharo “mayhaṃ bhante bhaṇḍakadhovanādi kiñci karaṇīyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:159_1: atthī”ti vadati, thero ca naṃ “tvaṃ paññapetvā gacchāhī”ti vatvā bhojanasālato nikkhamitvā
atk-vin02a1:159_2: aññattha gacchati, pāduddhārena kāretabbo. Sace tattheva gantvā nisīdati purimanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:159_3: cassa leḍḍupātātikkame āpatti. Sace pana thero sāmaṇeraṃ āṇāpeti, sāmaṇere tattha
atk-vin02a1:159_4: mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā nisinnepi bhojanasālato aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
atk-vin02a1:159_5: Gantvā nisinno puna gamanakāle leḍḍupātātikkame āpattiyā kāretabbo. Sace pana āṇāpento
atk-vin02a1:159_6: mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā tattheva nisīdāti āṇāpeti, yatricchati tatra gantvā āgantuṃ
atk-vin02a1:159_7: labhati. Sayaṃ pana pākatikaṃ akatvā gacchantassa leḍḍupātātikkame pācittiyaṃ. Antarasannipāte
atk-vin02a1:159_8: mañcapīṭhāni paññapetvā nisinnehi gamanakāle ārāmikānaṃ imaṃ paṭisāmethāti vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:160_0: Mahādhammasavanaṃ nāma hoti tattha uposathāgāratopi bhojanasālatopi āharitvā mañcapīṭhāni
atk-vin02a1:160_1: paññapenti. Āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodho. Sace āgantukā “idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa idaṃ
atk-vin02a1:160_2: ācariyassā”ti gaṇhanti, tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃyeva palibodho. Gamanakāle pākatikaṃ akatvā
atk-vin02a1:160_3: leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantānaṃ āpatti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ puna vuttaṃ – “yāva aññe na nisīdanti,
atk-vin02a1:160_4: tāva yehi paññattaṃ, tesaṃ bhāro. Aññesu āgantvā nisinnesu nisinnakānaṃ bhāro. Sace
atk-vin02a1:160_5: te anuddharitvā vā anuddharāpetvā vā gacchanti, dukkaṭaṃ. Kasmā? Anāṇattiyā paññapitattā”ti.
