atk-vin02a1:160_6: Dhammāsane paññatte yāva ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā nāgacchati, tāva paññāpakānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:160_7: palibodho, tasmiṃ āgantvā nisinne tassa palibodho. Sakalaṃ ahorattaṃ dhammasavanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:160_8: hoti, añño ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā uṭṭhahati, añño nisīdati, yo yo āgantvā nisīdati,
atk-vin02a1:160_9: tassa tassa bhāro. Uṭṭhahantena pana “idamāsanaṃ tumhākaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:160_10: Sacepi itarasmiṃ anāgateyeva paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāya gacchati, tasmiñca antoupacāraṭṭheyeva
atk-vin02a1:160_11: itaro āgantvā nisīdati, uṭṭhāya gato āpattiyā na kāretabbo. Sace pana itarasmiṃ anāgateyeva
atk-vin02a1:160_12: paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāyāsanā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamati, āpattiyā kāretabbo. Sabbattha
atk-vin02a1:160_13: ca “leḍḍupātātikkame paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiye pācittiya”nti ayaṃ nayo mahāpaccariyaṃ vutto.
atk-vin02a1:161_0: 112. Cimilikaṃ vātiādīsu cimilikā nāma sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:161_1: katā hoti, taṃ heṭṭhā pattharitvā upari kaṭasārakaṃ pattharanti. Uttarattharaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:161_2: nāma mañcapīṭhānaṃ upari attharitabbakaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ. Bhūmattharaṇaṃ nāma bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:161_3: attharitabbā kaṭasārakādivikati. Taṭṭikaṃ nāma tālapaṇṇehi vā vākehi vā katataṭṭikā.
atk-vin02a1:161_4: Cammakhaṇḍo nāma sīhabyagghadīpitaracchacammādīsupi yaṃkiñci cammaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin02a1:161_5: hi senāsanaparibhoge paṭikkhittacammaṃ nāma na dissati, tasmā sīhacammādīnaṃ pariharaṇeyeva
atk-vin02a1:161_6: paṭikkhepo veditabbo. Pādapuñchanī nāma rajjukehi vā pilotikāhi vā pādapuñchanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:161_7: katā. Phalakapīṭhaṃ nāma phalakamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ. Atha vā phalakañceva dārumayapīṭhañca;
atk-vin02a1:161_8: etena sabbampi dārubhaṇḍādi saṅgahitaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vitthāreneva vuttaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:161_9: “ādhārakaṃ pattapidhānaṃ pādakathalikaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanīpattakaṃ yaṃkiñci dārubhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a1:161_10: antamaso pānīyauḷuṅkaṃ pānīyasaṅkhaṃ ajjhokāse nikkhipitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭa”nti.
atk-vin02a1:161_11: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana esa nayo dutiyasikkhāpade dassito. Ajjhokāse rajanaṃ pacitvā
atk-vin02a1:161_12: rajanabhājanaṃ rajanauḷuṅko rajanadoṇikāti sabbaṃ aggisālāya paṭisāmetabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin02a1:161_13: aggisālā natthi, anovassake pabbhāre nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tasmimpi asati yattha olokentā
atk-vin02a1:161_14: bhikkhū passanti, tādise ṭhāne ṭhapetvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:162: Aññassa puggaliketi yasmiṃ vissāsaggāho na ruhati, tassa santake dukkaṭaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana vissāso ruhati, tassa santakaṃ attano puggalikamiva hotīti mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:163_0: 113. Āpucchaṃ gacchatīti yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti, attano
atk-vin02a1:163_1: palibodhaṃ viya maññati, yo tathārūpaṃ āpucchitvā gacchati, tassa anāpatti. Otāpento
atk-vin02a1:163_2: gacchatīti ātape otāpento āgantvā uddharissāmīti gacchati; evaṃ gacchato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:163_3: Kenaci palibuddhaṃ hotīti senāsanaṃ kenaci upaddutaṃ hotīti attho. Sacepi hi vuḍḍhataro
atk-vin02a1:163_4: bhikkhu uṭṭhāpetvā gaṇhāti, sacepi yakkho vā peto vā āgantvā nisīdati, koci vā issaro
atk-vin02a1:163_5: āgantvā gaṇhāti, senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hoti, sīhabyagghādīsu vā pana taṃ padesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:163_6: āgantvā ṭhitesupi senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hotiyeva. Evaṃ kenaci palibuddhe anuddharitvāpi
atk-vin02a1:163_7: gacchato anāpatti. Āpadāsūti jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyesu. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:164: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:167_0: 116. Dutiyasenāsanasikkhāpade – bhisīti mañcakabhisi vā pīṭhakabhisi vā. Cimilikādīnipi
atk-vin02a1:167_1: purimasikkhāpade vuttappakārāniyeva. Nisīdananti sadasaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paccattharaṇanti
atk-vin02a1:167_2: pāvāro kojavoti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Tiṇasanthāroti yesaṃ kesañci tiṇānaṃ santhāro.
atk-vin02a1:167_3: Esa nayo paṇṇasanthāre. Parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassāti ettha paṭhamapādaṃ atikkāmentassa
atk-vin02a1:167_4: dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyātikkame pācittiyaṃ. Aparikkhittassa upacāro nāma senāsanato dve leḍḍupātā.
atk-vin02a1:168_0: Anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti ettha bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo. Tasmiṃ asati
atk-vin02a1:168_1: sāmaṇero, tasmiṃ asati ārāmiko, tasmimpi asati yena vihāro kārito so vihārasāmiko,
atk-vin02a1:168_2: tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo. Tasmimpi asati catūsu pāsāṇesu mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:168_3: mañce avasesamañcapīṭhāni āropetvā upari bhisiādikaṃ dasavidhampi seyyaṃ rāsiṃ karitvā
atk-vin02a1:168_4: dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānāni pidahitvā gamiyavattaṃ pūretvā
atk-vin02a1:168_5: gantabbaṃ. Sace pana senāsanaṃ ovassati, chadanatthañca tiṇaṃ vā iṭṭhakā vā ānītā
atk-vin02a1:168_6: honti, sace ussahati, chādetabbaṃ. No ce sakkoti, yo okāso anovassako, tattha mañcapīṭhādīni
atk-vin02a1:168_7: nikkhipitvā gantabbaṃ. Sace sabbampi ovassati, ussahantena antogāme upāsakānaṃ ghare
atk-vin02a1:168_8: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace tepi “saṅghikaṃ nāma bhante bhāriyaṃ, aggidāhādīnaṃ bhāyāmā”ti
atk-vin02a1:168_9: na sampaṭicchanti, ajjhokāsepi pāsāṇānaṃ upari mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:168_10: nikkhipitvā tiṇehi ca paṇṇehi ca paṭicchādetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Yañhi tattha aṅgamattampi
atk-vin02a1:168_11: avasissati, taṃ aññesaṃ tattha āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upakāraṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-vin02a1:169_0: 117. Vihārassa upacāretiādīsu vihārassūpacāro nāma pariveṇaṃ. Upaṭṭhānasālāti pariveṇabhojanasālā.
atk-vin02a1:169_1: Maṇḍapoti pariveṇamaṇḍapo. Rukkhamūlanti pariveṇarukkhamūlaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva nayo kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:169_2: vutto. Kiñcāpi vutto, atha kho vihāroti antogabbho vā aññaṃ vā sabbaparicchannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:169_3: guttasenāsanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vihārassa upacāreti tassa bahi āsanne okāse. Upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:169_4: vāti bhojanasālāyaṃ vā. Maṇḍape vāti aparicchanne paricchanne vāpi bahūnaṃ sannipātamaṇḍape.
atk-vin02a1:169_5: Rukkhamūle vattabbaṃ natthi. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti vuttappakārañhi dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:169_6: antogabbhādimhi guttaṭṭhāne paññapetvā gacchantassa yasmā seyyāpi senāsanampi upacikāhi
atk-vin02a1:169_7: palujjati, vammikarāsiyeva hoti, tasmā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bahi pana upaṭṭhānasālādīsu
atk-vin02a1:169_8: paññapetvā gacchantassa seyyāmattameva nasseyya, ṭhānassa aguttatāya na senāsanaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:169_9: tasmā ettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vāti ettha yasmā na sakkā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:169_10: sahasā upacikāhi khāyituṃ, tasmā taṃ vihārepi santharitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:169_11: Vihārūpacāre pana taṃ vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantāpi disvā paṭisāmessanti.
atk-vin02a1:170_0: 118. Uddharitvā gacchatīti ettha uddharitvā gacchantena mañcapīṭhakavāṭaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:170_1: apanetvā saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse laggetvā gantabbaṃ. Pacchā āgantvā vasanakabhikkhunāpi
atk-vin02a1:170_2: puna mañcapīṭhaṃ vā paññapetvā sayitvā gacchantena tatheva kātabbaṃ. Antokuṭṭato
atk-vin02a1:170_3: seyyaṃ bahikuṭṭe paññapetvā vasantena gamanakāle gahitaṭṭhāneyeva paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:170_4: Uparipāsādato oropetvā heṭṭhāpāsāde vasantassapi eseva nayo. Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu
atk-vin02a1:170_5: mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvāpi gamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:171_0: Āpucchaṃ gacchatīti etthāyaṃ āpucchitabbānāpucchitabbavinicchayo – yā tāva bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:171_1: dīghasālā vā paṇṇasālā vā hoti, yaṃ vā rukkhatthambhesu, katagehaṃ upacikānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:171_2: hoti, tato pakkamantena tāva āpucchitvāva pakkamitabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi katipayāni divasāni
atk-vin02a1:171_3: ajaggiyamāne vammikāva santiṭṭhanti. Yaṃ pana pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu
atk-vin02a1:171_4: vā katasenāsanaṃ siluccayaleṇaṃ vā sudhālittasenāsanaṃ vā yattha upacikāsaṅkā natthi,
atk-vin02a1:171_5: tato pakkamantassa āpucchitvāpi anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭati, āpucchanaṃ pana vattaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:171_6: Sace tādisepi senāsane ekena passena upacikā ārohanti, āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ. Yo
atk-vin02a1:171_7: pana āgantuko bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetvā vasantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattanto attano
atk-vin02a1:171_8: senāsanaṃ aggahetvā vasati, yāva so na gaṇhāti, tāva taṃ senāsanaṃ purimabhikkhusseva
atk-vin02a1:171_9: palibodho. Yadā pana so senāsanaṃ gahetvā attano issariyena vasati, tato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:171_10: āgantukasseva palibodho. Sace ubhopi vibhajitvā gaṇhanti, ubhinnampi palibodho. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:171_11: pana vuttaṃ – “sace dve tayo ekato hutvā paññapenti, gamanakāle sabbehipi āpucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:171_12: Tesu ce paṭhamaṃ gacchanto ‘pacchimo jaggissatī’ti ābhogaṃ katvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:171_13: Pacchimassa ābhogena mutti natthi. Bahū ekaṃ pesetvā santharāpenti, gamanakāle sabbehi
atk-vin02a1:171_14: vā āpucchitabbaṃ, ekaṃ vā pesetvā āpucchitabbaṃ. Aññato mañcapīṭhādīni ānetvā aññatra
atk-vin02a1:171_15: vasitvāpi gamanakāle tattheva netabbāni. Sace aññāvāsato ānetvā vasamānassa añño
atk-vin02a1:171_16: vuḍḍhataro āgacchati, na paṭibāhitabbo, ‘mayā bhante aññāvāsato ānītaṃ, pākatikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:171_17: kareyyāthā’ti vattabbaṃ. Tena ‘evaṃ karissāmī’ti sampaṭicchite itarassa gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:171_18: Evamaññattha haritvāpi saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:171_19: corehi vā haṭaṃ gīvā na hoti, puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa pana gīvā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:171_20: Aññassa mañcapīṭhaṃ pana saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ gīvāyeva”.
atk-vin02a1:172_1: yena kenaci senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hoti. Sāpekkho gantvā tattha ṭhito āpucchati, kenaci
atk-vin02a1:172_2: palibuddho hotīti ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmīti evaṃ sāpekkho nadīpāraṃ vā gāmantaraṃ
atk-vin02a1:172_3: vā gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ, tattheva ṭhito kañci pesetvā āpucchati,
atk-vin02a1:172_4: nadīpūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibuddho hoti upadduto, na sakkoti paccāgantuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:172_5: evaṃbhūtassapi anāpatti. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayameva saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:175_0: 119. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpade – palibundhentīti paṭhamataraṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ atiharitvā
atk-vin02a1:175_1: rumbhitvā tiṭṭhanti. Therā bhikkhū vuṭṭhāpentīti “amhākaṃ āvuso pāpuṇātī”ti vassaggena
atk-vin02a1:175_2: gahetvā vuṭṭhāpenti. Anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappentīti “tumhākaṃ bhante mañcaṭṭhānaṃyeva
atk-vin02a1:175_3: pāpuṇāti, na sabbo vihāro. Amhākaṃ dāni idaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti anupavisitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:176_0: 120. Jānanti “anuṭṭhāpanīyo aya”nti jānanto; tenevassa vibhaṅge “vuḍḍhoti jānātī”tiādi
atk-vin02a1:176_1: vuttaṃ. Vuḍḍho hi attano vuḍḍhatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyo, gilāno gilānatāya, saṅgho pana
atk-vin02a1:176_2: bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakaācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ
atk-vin02a1:176_3: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā deti, tasmā yassa
atk-vin02a1:176_4: saṅghena dinno, sopi anuṭṭhāpanīyo. Kāmañcettha gilānassāpi saṅghoyeva anucchavikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:176_5: senāsanaṃ deti, gilāno pana “apaloketvā saṅghena adinnasenāsanopi na pīḷetabbo anukampitabbo”ti
atk-vin02a1:177_0: 121. Upacāreti ettha mañcapīṭhānaṃ tāva mahallake vihāre samantā diyaḍḍho hattho
atk-vin02a1:177_1: upacāro, khuddake yato pahoti tato diyaḍḍho hattho, pāde dhovitvā pavisantassa passāvatthāya
atk-vin02a1:177_2: nikkhamantassa ca yāva dvāre nikkhittapādadhovanapāsāṇato passāvaṭṭhānato ca mañcapīṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:177_3: tāva diyaḍḍhahatthavitthāro maggo upacāro nāma. Tasmiṃ mañcassa vā pīṭhassa vā upacāre
atk-vin02a1:177_4: ṭhitassa vā bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāre yo anupakhajja seyyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:177_5: kappetukāmo seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
atk-vin02a1:178_0: Abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vāti ettha abhinisīdanamattena abhinipajjanamatteneva
atk-vin02a1:178_1: vā pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana dvepi karoti, dve pācittiyāni. Uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nisīdato vā
atk-vin02a1:179_0: 122. Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vāti imasmiṃ ito pare ca
atk-vin02a1:179_1: “vihārassa upacāre”tiādike dukkaṭavārepi yathā idha abhinisīdanamatte abhinipajjanamatte
atk-vin02a1:179_2: ubhayakaraṇe payogabhede ca pācittiyappabhedo vutto, evaṃ dukkaṭappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:179_3: Evarūpena hi visabhāgapuggalena ekavihāre vā ekapariveṇe vā vasantena attho natthi,
atk-vin02a1:179_4: tasmā sabbatthevassa nivāso vārito. Aññassa puggaliketi idhāpi vissāsikassa puggalikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:180_0: 123. Āpadāsūti sace bahi vasantassa jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyo hoti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu
atk-vin02a1:180_1: yo pavisati, tassāpi anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti. Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:180_2: saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:183_0: 126. Sattamasikkhāpade – ekena payogena bahukepi dvāre atikkāmetīti ye catubhūmakapañcabhūmakā
atk-vin02a1:183_1: pāsādā chasattakoṭṭhakāni vā catussālāni, tādisesu senāsanesu hatthesu vā gīvāya
atk-vin02a1:183_2: vā gahetvā antarā aṭṭhapento ekena payogena atikkāmeti, ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:183_3: ṭhapetvā nānāpayogehi atikkāmentassa dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni. Hatthena anāmasitvā
atk-vin02a1:184_0: Aññaṃ āṇāpetīti ettha “imaṃ nikkaḍḍhā”ti āṇattimatte dukkaṭaṃ. Sace so sakiṃ āṇatto
atk-vin02a1:184_1: bahukepi dvāre atikkāmeti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana “ettakāni dvārāni nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti
atk-vin02a1:184_2: vā “yāva mahādvāraṃ tāva nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti vā evaṃ niyāmetvā āṇatto hoti, dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:185_1: antamaso rajanachallimpi; yo nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā; tassa vatthugaṇanāya
atk-vin02a1:185_2: dukkaṭāni. Gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitesu pana ekāva āpattīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:186: 127. Aññassa puggaliketi idhāpi vissāsikapuggalikaṃ attano puggalikasadisameva. Yathā ca idha; evaṃ sabbattha. Yatra pana viseso bhavissati, tatra vakkhāma.
atk-vin02a1:187_1: nikkaḍḍhituṃ labhati, so hi pakkhaṃ labhitvā saṅghampi bhindeyya. Alajjīādayo pana
atk-vin02a1:187_2: attano vasanaṭṭhānatoyeva nikkaḍḍhitabbā, sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:187_3: Ummattakassāti sayaṃ ummattakassa anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:188: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:191_1: vā tibhūmikādikuṭiyā vā. Mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdīti mañcaṃ sahasā abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā
atk-vin02a1:191_2: nisīdi. Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ; mañce nisīdīti attho. Abhīti idaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:191_3: padasobhanatthaṃ upasaggamattameva. Nippatitvāti nipatitvā nikkhamitvā vā. Tassa
atk-vin02a1:191_4: hi upari āṇīpi na dinnā, tasmā nikkhanto. Vissaramakāsīti virūpaṃ āturassaramakāsi.
atk-vin02a1:192_0: 131. Vehāsakuṭi nāma majjhimassa purisassa asīsaghaṭṭāti yā pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa
atk-vin02a1:192_1: sabbaheṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭeti, etena idha adhippetā vehāsakuṭi dassitā
atk-vin02a1:192_2: hoti, na vehāsakuṭilakkhaṇaṃ. Yā hi kāci upari acchinnatalā dvibhūmikā kuṭi tibhūmikādikuṭi
atk-vin02a1:192_3: vā “vehāsakuṭī”ti vuccati. Idha pana asīsaghaṭṭā adhippetā. Abhinisīdanādīsu pubbe
atk-vin02a1:193_0: 133. Avehāsakuṭiyāti bhūmiyaṃ katapaṇṇasālādīsu anāpatti. Na hi sakkā tattha parassa
atk-vin02a1:193_1: pīḷā kātuṃ. Sīsaghaṭṭāyāti yāyaṃ sīsaghaṭṭā hoti, tatthāpi anāpatti. Na hi sakkā
atk-vin02a1:193_2: tattha heṭṭhāpāsāde anoṇatena vicarituṃ, tasmā asañcaraṇaṭṭhānattā parapīḷā na bhavissati.
atk-vin02a1:193_3: Heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hotīti yassā heṭṭhā dabbasambhārādīnaṃ nikkhittattā aparibhogaṃ
atk-vin02a1:193_4: hoti, tatthāpi anāpatti. Padarasañcitaṃ hotīti yassā uparimatalaṃ dāruphalakehi vā
atk-vin02a1:193_5: ghanasanthataṃ hoti, sudhādiparikammakataṃ vā tatthāpi anāpatti. Paṭāṇi dinnā hotīti
atk-vin02a1:193_6: mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādasikhāsu āṇī dinnā hoti, yattha nisīdantepi na nippatanti, tādise
atk-vin02a1:193_7: mañcapīṭhe nisīdatopi anāpatti. Tasmiṃ ṭhitoti āhaccapādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā ṭhito
atk-vin02a1:193_8: upari nāgadantakādīsu laggitakaṃ cīvaraṃ vā kiñci vā gaṇhāti vā, aññaṃ vā laggeti,
atk-vin02a1:193_9: tassāpi anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato ca kāyacittato
atk-vin02a1:193_10: ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:196_0: 135. Navamasikkhāpade – yāva dvārakosāti ettha dvārakoso nāma piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa samantā
atk-vin02a1:196_1: kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “dvārabāhato paṭṭhāya diyaḍḍho hattho”ti
atk-vin02a1:196_2: vuttaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ pana “dvārassa ubhosu passesu kavāṭappamāṇa”nti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:196_3: “kavāṭaṃ nāma diyaḍḍhahatthampi hoti dvihatthampi aḍḍhateyyahatthampī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:196_4: taṃ suvuttaṃ. Tadeva hi sandhāya bhagavatāpi “piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa samantā hatthapāsā”ti
atk-vin02a1:196_5: ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddeso kato. Aggaḷaṭṭhapanāyāti sakavāṭakadvārabandhaṭṭhapanāya; sakavāṭakassa
atk-vin02a1:196_6: dvārabandhassa niccalabhāvatthāyāti attho. Dvāraṭṭhapanāyāti idampi hi padabhājanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:196_7: imamevatthaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – kavāṭañhi lahuparivaṭṭakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:196_8: vivaraṇakāle bhittiṃ āhanati, pidahanakāle dvārabandhaṃ. Tena āhananena bhitti kampati,
atk-vin02a1:196_9: tato mattikā calati, calitvā sithilā vā hoti patati vā. Tenāha bhagavā “yāva dvārakosā
atk-vin02a1:196_10: aggaḷaṭṭhapanāyā”ti. Tattha kiñcāpi “idaṃ nāma kattabba”nti neva mātikāyaṃ na padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:196_11: vuttaṃ, aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ pana “punappunaṃ chādāpesi punappunaṃ lepāpesī”ti adhikārato
atk-vin02a1:196_12: yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya punappunaṃ limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:197_0: Yaṃ pana padabhājane “piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa samantā hatthapāsā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yassa
atk-vin02a1:197_1: vemajjhe dvāraṃ hoti, uparibhāge uccā bhitti, tassa tīsu disāsu samantā hatthapāsā
atk-vin02a1:197_2: upacāro hoti, khuddakassa vihārassa dvīsu disāsu upacāro hoti. Tatrāpi yaṃ bhittiṃ
atk-vin02a1:197_3: vivariyamānaṃ kavāṭaṃ āhanati, sā aparipūraupacārāpi hoti. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pana
atk-vin02a1:197_4: tīsu disāsu samantā hatthapāsā dvārassa niccalabhāvatthāya lepo anuññāto. Sace panassa
atk-vin02a1:197_5: dvārassa adhobhāgepi lepokāso atthi, tampi limpituṃ vaṭṭati. Ālokasandhiparikammāyāti
atk-vin02a1:197_6: ettha ālokasandhīti vātapānakavāṭakā vuccanti, tepi vivaraṇakāle vidatthimattampi
atk-vin02a1:197_7: atirekampi bhittippadesaṃ paharanti. Upacāro panettha sabbadisāsu labbhati, tasmā
atk-vin02a1:197_8: sabbadisāsu kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso ālokasandhiparikammatthāya limpitabbo vā
atk-vin02a1:198: Setavaṇṇantiādikaṃ na mātikāya padabhājanaṃ. Iminā hi vihārassa bhārikattaṃ nāma natthīti padabhājaneyeva anuññātaṃ, tasmā sabbametaṃ yathāsukhaṃ kattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:199_0: Evaṃ lepakamme yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ dassetvā puna chadane kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ “dvatticchadanassā”tiādi
atk-vin02a1:199_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha dvatticchadanassa pariyāyanti chadanassa dvattipariyāyaṃ; pariyāyo
atk-vin02a1:199_2: vuccati parikkhepo, parikkhepadvayaṃ vā parikkhepattayaṃ vā adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:199_3: Appaharite ṭhitenāti aharite ṭhitena. Haritanti cettha sattadhaññabhedaṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:200_0: Sace harite ṭhito adhiṭṭhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha pana yasmimpi khette vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:200_1: bījaṃ na tāva sampajjati, vasse vā pana patite sampajjissati, tampi haritasaṅkhyameva
atk-vin02a1:200_2: gacchati. Tasmā evarūpe khettepi ṭhitena na adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, ahariteyeva ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:200_3: Tatrāpi ayaṃ paricchedo, piṭṭhivaṃsassa vā kūṭāgārakaṇṇikāya vā upari thupikāya vā
atk-vin02a1:200_4: passe nisinno chadanamukhavaṭṭiantena olokento yasmiṃ bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ passati,
atk-vin02a1:200_5: yasmiñca bhūmibhāge ṭhito, taṃ upari nisinnakaṃ passati, tasmiṃ ṭhāne adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:200_6: Tassa anto aharitepi ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labbhati. Kasmā? Vihārassa hi patantassa ayaṃ patanokāsoti.
atk-vin02a1:201_0: 136. Maggena chādentassāti ettha maggena chādanaṃ nāma aparikkhipitvā ujukameva chādanaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:201_1: taṃ iṭṭhakasilāsudhāhi labbhati. Dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvāti dve maggā sace ducchannā
atk-vin02a1:201_2: honti, apanetvāpi punappunaṃ chādetuṃ labbhati, tasmā yathā icchati; tathā dve magge
atk-vin02a1:201_3: adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃmaggaṃ “idāni evaṃ chādehī”ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṃ. Pariyāyenāti
atk-vin02a1:201_4: parikkhepena. Evaṃchadanaṃ pana tiṇapaṇṇehi labbhati. Tasmā idhāpi yathā icchati
atk-vin02a1:201_5: tathā dve pariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃ pariyāyaṃ “idāni evaṃ chādehī”ti āṇāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:201_6: pakkamitabbaṃ. Sace na pakkamati, tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ. Sabbampi cetaṃ chadanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:201_7: chadanūpari veditabbaṃ. Uparūparicchanno hi vihāro ciraṃ anovassako hotīti maññamānā
atk-vin02a1:201_8: evaṃ chādenti. Tato ce uttarinti tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vā pariyāyānaṃ vā upari catutthe
atk-vin02a1:202_0: 137. Karaḷe karaḷeti tiṇamuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṇamuṭṭhiyaṃ. Sesamettha uttānamevāti. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:202_1: – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:205_0: 140. Dasamasikkhāpade – jānaṃ sappāṇakanti sappāṇakaṃ etanti yathā tathā vā jānanto.
atk-vin02a1:205_1: Siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vāti tena udakena sayaṃ vā siñceyya, aññaṃ vā āṇāpetvā siñcāpeyya.
atk-vin02a1:205_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “siñceyyāti sayaṃ siñcatī”ti īdisānaṃ vacanānaṃ attho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:206_0: Tattha dhāraṃ avicchinditvā siñcantassa ekasmiṃ udakaghaṭe ekāva āpatti. Esa nayo
atk-vin02a1:206_1: sabbabhājanesu. Dhāraṃ vicchindantassa pana payoge payoge āpatti. Mātikaṃ sammukhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:206_2: karoti, divasampi sandatu, ekāva āpatti. Sace tattha tattha bandhitvā aññato aññato
atk-vin02a1:206_3: neti, payoge payoge āpatti. Sakaṭabhāramattañcepi tiṇaṃ ekapayogena udake pakkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:206_4: ekāva āpatti. Ekekaṃ tiṇaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā pakkhipantassa payoge payoge āpatti. Mattikāyapi
atk-vin02a1:206_5: aññesupi kaṭṭhagomayādīsu eseva nayo. Idaṃ pana mahāudakaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ, yaṃ
atk-vin02a1:206_6: tiṇe vā mattikāya vā pakkhittāya pariyādānaṃ gacchati, āvilaṃ vā hoti, yattha pāṇakā
atk-vin02a1:206_7: maranti, tādisaṃ udakaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:207: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:212_0: 141-144. Bhikkhunivaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – lābhino hontīti ettha na tesaṃ bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:212_1: denti, na dāpenti, mahākulehi pabbajitā pana kuladhītaro attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:212_2: ñātimanussānaṃ “kuto ayye ovādaṃ uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ labhathā”ti pucchantānaṃ “asuko
atk-vin02a1:212_3: ca asuko ca thero ovadatī”ti asītimahāsāvake uddisitvā kathānusārena tesaṃ sīlasutācārajātigottādibhedaṃ
atk-vin02a1:212_4: vijjamānaguṇaṃ kathayanti. Evarūpā hi vijjamānaguṇā kathetuṃ vaṭṭanti. Tato pasannacittā
atk-vin02a1:212_5: manussā therānaṃ cīvarādibhedaṃ mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ abhihariṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:213_0: Bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvāti tesaṃ kira santike tāsu ekā bhikkhunīpi na āgacchati,
atk-vin02a1:213_1: lābhataṇhāya pana ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayā tāsaṃ upassayaṃ agamaṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:213_2: – “bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā”ti. Tāpi bhikkhuniyo calacittatāya tesaṃ vacanaṃ akaṃsuyeva.
atk-vin02a1:213_3: Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo…pe… nisīdiṃsū”ti. Tiracchānakathanti saggamaggagamanepi
atk-vin02a1:213_4: tiracchānabhūtaṃ rājakathādimanekavidhaṃ niratthakakathaṃ. Iddhoti samiddho, sahitattho
atk-vin02a1:214_0: 145-147. Anujānāmi bhikkhaveti ettha yasmā te bhikkhū “mā tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:214_1: ovaditthā”ti vuccamānā adiṭṭhasaccattā tathāgate āghātaṃ bandhitvā apāyupagā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a1:214_2: tasmā nesaṃ taṃ apāyupagataṃ pariharanto bhagavā aññeneva upāyena te bhikkhunovādato
atk-vin02a1:214_3: paribāhire kattukāmo imaṃ bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ anujānīti veditabbo. Evaṃ idha
atk-vin02a1:214_4: paribāhire kattukāmatāya anujānitvā parato karontova “anujānāmi bhikkhave aṭṭhahaṅgehi
atk-vin02a1:214_5: samannāgata”ntiādimāha. Imāni hi aṭṭhaṅgāni chabbaggiyānaṃ supinantenapi na bhūtapubbānīti.
atk-vin02a1:215_0: Tattha sīlamassa atthīti sīlavā. Idāni yañca taṃ sīlaṃ, yathā ca taṃ tassa atthi
atk-vin02a1:215_1: nāma hoti, taṃ dassento “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādimāha. Tattha pātimokkhova
atk-vin02a1:215_2: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto samannāgatoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutāe.
atk-vin02a1:217_0: “Pātimokkhanti sīlaṃ patiṭṭhā ādi caraṇaṃ saṃyamo saṃvaro mokkhaṃ pamokkhaṃ kusalānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:217_1: dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā; saṃvaroti kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko
atk-vin02a1:217_2: avītikkamo. Saṃvutoti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato
atk-vin02a1:217_3: upapanno samupapanno sampanno samannāgato, tena vuccati ‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto’ti.
atk-vin02a1:217_4: Viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati, tena vuccati ‘viharatī”’ti.
atk-vin02a1:218_0: Ācāragocarasampannoti micchājīvapaṭisedhakena na veḷudānādinā ācārena, vesiyādiagocaraṃ
atk-vin02a1:218_1: pahāya saddhāsampannakulādinā ca gocarena sampanno. Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti
atk-vin02a1:218_2: appamattakesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, tāni vajjāni bhayato dassanasīloti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:218_3: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti adhisīlasikkhādibhāvena tidhā ṭhitesu sikkhāpadesu
atk-vin02a1:218_4: taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādāya sammā ādāya sādhukaṃ gahetvā avijahanto sikkhatīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:218_5: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana yo icchati, tena visuddhimaggato gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:219_0: Bahu sutamassāti bahussuto. Sutaṃ dhāretīti sutadharo; yadassa taṃ bahu sutaṃ nāma,
atk-vin02a1:219_1: taṃ na sutamattameva; atha kho naṃ dhāretīti attho. Mañjūsāyaṃ viya ratanaṃ sutaṃ
atk-vin02a1:219_2: sannicitamasminti sutasannicayo. Etena yaṃ so sutaṃ dhāreti, tassa mañjūsāya gopetvā
atk-vin02a1:219_3: sannicitaratanasseva cirakālenāpi avināsanaṃ dasseti. Idāni taṃ sutaṃ sarūpato dassento
atk-vin02a1:219_4: “ye te dhammā”tiādimāha, taṃ verañjakaṇḍe vuttanayameva. Idaṃ panettha nigamanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:219_5: – tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti, tasmā bahussuto. Dhātā, tasmā sutadharo. Vacasā
atk-vin02a1:219_6: paricitā manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā; tasmā sutasannicayo. Tattha vacasā
atk-vin02a1:219_7: paricitāti vācāya paguṇā katā. Manasānupekkhitāti manasā anupekkhitā, āvajjantassa
atk-vin02a1:219_8: dīpasahassena obhāsitā viya honti. Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca
atk-vin02a1:220_0: Ayaṃ pana bahussuto nāma tividho hoti – nissayamuccanako, parisupaṭṭhāpako, bhikkhunovādakoti.
atk-vin02a1:220_1: Tattha nissayamuccanakena upasampadāya pañcavassena sabbantimena paricchedena dve
atk-vin02a1:220_2: mātikā paguṇā vācuggatā kātabbā pakkhadivasesu dhammasāvanatthāya suttantato cattāro
atk-vin02a1:220_4: eko kathāmaggo, saṅghabhattamaṅgalāmaṅgalesu anumodanatthāya tisso anumodanā, uposathapavāraṇādijānanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:220_5: kammākammavinicchayo, samaṇadhammakaraṇatthaṃ samādhivasena vā vipassanāvasena vā
atk-vin02a1:220_6: arahattapariyosānamekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ettakaṃ uggahetabbaṃ. Ettāvatā hi ayaṃ bahussuto
atk-vin02a1:220_7: hoti cātuddiso, yattha katthaci attano issariyena vasituṃ labhati.
atk-vin02a1:221_0: Parisupaṭṭhāpakena upasampadāya dasavassena sabbantimena paricchedena parisaṃ abhivinaye
atk-vin02a1:221_1: vinetuṃ dve vibhaṅgā paguṇā vācuggatā kātabbā, asakkontena tīhi janehi saddhiṃ parivattanakkhamā
atk-vin02a1:221_2: kātabbā, kammākammañca khandhakavattañca uggahetabbaṃ. Parisāya pana abhidhamme vinayanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:221_3: sace majjhimabhāṇako hoti mūlapaṇṇāsako uggahetabbo, dīghabhāṇakena mahāvaggo, saṃyuttabhāṇakena
atk-vin02a1:221_4: heṭṭhimā vā tayo vaggā mahāvaggo vā, aṅguttarabhāṇakena heṭṭhā vā upari vā upaḍḍhanikāyo
atk-vin02a1:221_5: uggahetabbo, asakkontena tikanipātato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā uggahetumpi vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:221_6: pana “ekaṃ uggaṇhantena catukkanipātaṃ vā pañcakanipātaṃ vā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:221_7: Jātakabhāṇakena sāṭṭhakathaṃ jātakaṃ uggahetabbaṃ, tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati. Dhammapadampi
atk-vin02a1:221_8: saha vatthunā uggahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato tato samuccayaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:221_9: mūlapaṇṇāsakamattaṃ vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? “Na vaṭṭatī”ti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:221_10: itarāsu vicāraṇāyeva natthi. Abhidhamme kiñci uggahetabbanti na vuttaṃ. Yassa pana
atk-vin02a1:221_11: sāṭṭhakathampi vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakañca paguṇaṃ, suttante ca vuttappakāro
atk-vin02a1:221_12: gantho natthi, parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ na labhati. Yena pana suttantato vinayato ca
atk-vin02a1:221_13: vuttappamāṇo gantho uggahito, ayaṃ parisupaṭṭhāpako bahussuto hoti disāpāmokkho yenakāmaṅgamo,
atk-vin02a1:222_0: Bhikkhunovādakena pana sāṭṭhakathāni tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetabbāni, asakkontena catūsu
atk-vin02a1:222_1: nikāyesu ekassa aṭṭhakathā paguṇā kātabbā, ekanikāyena hi sesanikāyesupi pañhaṃ kathetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:222_2: sakkhissati. Sattasu pakaraṇesu catuppakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathā paguṇā kātabbā, tattha
atk-vin02a1:222_3: laddhanayena hi sesapakaraṇesu pañhaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhissati. Vinayapiṭakaṃ pana nānatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:222_4: nānākāraṇaṃ, tasmā taṃ saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya paguṇaṃ kātabbameva. Ettāvatā hi bhikkhunovādako
atk-vin02a1:223_0: Ubhayāni kho panassātiādi pana yasmā aññasmiṃ sakale navaṅgepi bāhussacce sati sāṭṭhakathaṃ
atk-vin02a1:223_1: vinayapiṭakaṃ vinā na vaṭṭatiyeva, tasmā visuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha vitthārenāti ubhatovibhaṅgena
atk-vin02a1:223_2: saddhiṃ. Svāgatānīti suṭṭhu āgatāni. Yathā āgatāni pana svāgatāni honti, taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:223_3: “suvibhattānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha suvibhattānīti suṭṭhu vibhattāni padapaccābhaṭṭhasaṅkaradosavirahitāni.
atk-vin02a1:223_4: Suppavattīnīti paguṇāni vācuggatāni. Suvinicchitāni suttasoti khandhakaparivārato
atk-vin02a1:223_6: ca suvinicchitāni akhaṇḍāni aviparītakkharāni. Etena aṭṭhakathā dīpitā, aṭṭhakathāto
atk-vin02a1:224_1: poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇoti
atk-vin02a1:224_2: madhurassaro, mātugāmo hi sarasampattirato, tasmā parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanampi vacanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:224_3: sarasampattirahitaṃ hīḷeti. Yebhuyyena bhikkhunīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpoti sabbāsaṃ piyo
atk-vin02a1:224_4: nāma dullabho, bahutarānaṃ pana paṇḍitānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ sīlācārasampattiyā piyo hoti
atk-vin02a1:224_5: manavaḍḍhanako. Paṭibalo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovaditunti suttañca kāraṇañca dassento
atk-vin02a1:224_6: vaṭṭabhayena tajjetvā bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ tādisaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ samattho hoti.
atk-vin02a1:224_8: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ vā sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu methunadhammaṃ vā anajjhāpannapubbo hoti. Mātugāmo
atk-vin02a1:224_9: hi pubbe katamanussaranto saṃvare ṭhitassāpi dhammadesanāya gāravaṃ na karoti. Atha
atk-vin02a1:224_10: vā tasmiyeva asaddhamme cittaṃ uppādeti. Vīsativasso vāti upasampadāya vīsativasso
atk-vin02a1:224_11: tato atirekavasso vā. Evarūpo hi visabhāgehi vatthūhi punappunaṃ samāgacchantopi
atk-vin02a1:224_12: daharo viya sahasā sīlavināsaṃ na pāpuṇāti, attano vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā ayuttaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:224_13: chandarāgaṃ vinetuṃ paṭibalo hoti, tena vuttaṃ – “vīsativasso vā hoti atirekavīsativasso vā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:225_0: Ettha ca “sīlavā”tiādi ekamaṅgaṃ, “bahussuto hotī”tiādi dutiyaṃ, “ubhayāni kho panassā”tiādi
atk-vin02a1:225_2: piyo hoti manāpo”ti pañcamaṃ, “paṭibalo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”nti chaṭṭhaṃ, “na
atk-vin02a1:226_0: 148. Ñatticatutthenāti pubbe vatthusmiṃ vutteneva. Garudhammehīti garukehi dhammehi,
atk-vin02a1:226_1: te hi gāravaṃ katvā bhikkhunīhi sampaṭicchitabbattā garudhammāti vuccanti. Ekatoupasampannāyāti
atk-vin02a1:226_2: ettha bhikkhunīnaṃ santike ekatoupasampannāya, yo garudhammena ovadati, tassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:227_0: 149. Pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvāti sace pāto asammaṭṭhaṃ sammaṭṭhampi vā puna tiṇapaṇṇādīhi
atk-vin02a1:227_1: uklāpaṃ pādappahārehi ca vikiṇṇavālikaṃ jātaṃ, sammajjitabbaṃ. Asammaṭṭhañhi taṃ
atk-vin02a1:227_2: disvā “ayyo attano nissitake daharabhikkhūpi vattapaṭipattiyaṃ na yojeti, dhammaṃyeva
atk-vin02a1:227_3: kathetī”ti tā bhikkhuniyo asotukāmā viya bhaveyyuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:227_4: Antogāmato pana bhikkhuniyo āgacchantiyo pipāsitā ca kilantā ca honti, tā pānīyañca
atk-vin02a1:227_5: hatthapādamukhasītalakaraṇañca paccāsīsanti, tasmiñca asati purimanayeneva agāravaṃ
atk-vin02a1:227_6: janetvā asotukāmāpi honti. Tena vuttaṃ – “pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:228_1: tāsaṃ āsanaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā. Dhammadesanāpattimocanatthaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:228_2: dutiyo icchitabbo. Tena vuttaṃ – “dutiyaṃ gahetvā nisīditabba”nti. Nisīditabbanti
atk-vin02a1:228_3: na vihārapaccante, atha kho vihāramajjhe uposathāgārassa vā bhojanasālāya vā dvāre
atk-vin02a1:228_4: sabbesaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ. Samaggātthāti sabbā āgatatthāti attho. Vattantīti
atk-vin02a1:228_5: āgacchanti; paguṇā vācuggatāti attho. Niyyādetabboti appetabbo. Osāretabboti pāḷi
atk-vin02a1:229_1: Ettha ca bhikkhuniyā bhikkhussa abhivādanaṃ nāma antogāme vā bahigāme vā antovihāre
atk-vin02a1:229_2: vā bahivihāre vā antaraghare vā rathikāya vā antamaso rājussāraṇāyapi vattamānāya
atk-vin02a1:229_3: deve vassamāne sakaddamāya bhūmiyā chattapattahatthāyapi hatthiassādīhi anubaddhāyapi
atk-vin02a1:229_4: kātabbameva. Ekābaddhāya pāḷiyā bhikkhācāraṃ pavisante disvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne “vandāmi
atk-vin02a1:229_5: ayyā”ti vandituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace antarantarā dvādasahatthe muñcitvā gacchanti, visuṃ
atk-vin02a1:229_6: visuṃ vanditabbā. Mahāsannipāte nisinne ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vandituṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo
atk-vin02a1:229_7: añjalikammepi. Yattha katthaci nisinnāya pana paccuṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ, tassa tassa
atk-vin02a1:229_8: sāmīcikammassa anurūpe padese ca kāle ca taṃ taṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:230_0: Sakkatvāti yathā kato sukato hoti, evaṃ katvā. Garuṃkatvāti tattha gāravaṃ janetvā.
atk-vin02a1:230_1: Mānetvāti manena piyaṃ katvā. Pūjetvāti imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ kiccānaṃ karaṇena pūjetvā.
atk-vin02a1:231_0: Abhikkhuke āvāseti ettha sace bhikkhunupassayato aḍḍhayojanabbhantare ovādadāyakā
atk-vin02a1:231_1: bhikkhū na vasanti, ayaṃ abhikkhuko āvāso nāma. Ettha vassaṃ na vasitabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:231_2: – “abhikkhuko nāma āvāso na sakkā hoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantu”nti. Na ca sakkā
atk-vin02a1:231_3: tato paraṃ pacchābhattaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā āgantuṃ. Sace tattha vassaṃ vasituṃ
atk-vin02a1:231_4: anicchamānā bhikkhuniyo ñātakā vā upaṭṭhākā vā evaṃvadanti – “vasatha, ayye, mayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:231_5: bhikkhū ānessāmā”ti vaṭṭati. Sace pana vuttappamāṇe padese vassaṃ upagantukāmā bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:231_6: āgantvā sākhāmaṇḍapepi ekarattaṃ vutthā honti; na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmā. Ettāvatāpi
atk-vin02a1:231_7: sabhikkhuko āvāso hoti, ettha vassaṃ upagantuṃ vaṭṭati. Upagacchantīhi ca pakkhassa
atk-vin02a1:231_8: terasiyaṃyeva bhikkhū yācitabbā – “mayaṃ ayyā tumhākaṃ ovādena vasissāmā”ti. Yato
atk-vin02a1:231_9: pana ujunā maggena aḍḍhayojane bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, tena pana maggena gacchantīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:231_10: jīvitantarāyo vā brahmacariyantarāyo vā hoti, aññena maggena gacchantīnaṃ atirekaḍḍhayojanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:231_11: hoti, ayaṃ abhikkhukāvāsaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati. Sace pana tato gāvutamatte añño bhikkhunupassayo
atk-vin02a1:231_12: khemaṭṭhāne hoti, tāhi bhikkhunīhi tā bhikkhuniyo yācitvā puna gantvā bhikkhū yācitabbā
atk-vin02a1:231_13: “ayyā amhākaṃ ujumagge antarāyo atthi, aññena maggena atirekaḍḍhayojanaṃ hoti. Antarāmagge
atk-vin02a1:231_14: pana amhākaṃ upassayato gāvutamatte añño bhikkhunupassayo atthi, ayyānaṃ santikā
atk-vin02a1:231_15: tattha āgataovādena vasissāmā”ti. Tehi bhikkhūhi sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Tato tāhi bhikkhunīhi
atk-vin02a1:231_16: taṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgantvā uposatho kātabbo, tā vā bhikkhuniyo disvā attano upassayameva
atk-vin02a1:232_0: Sace pana vassaṃ upagantukāmā bhikkhū cātuddase vihāraṃ āgacchanti, bhikkhunīhi ca
atk-vin02a1:232_1: “idha ayyā vassaṃ vasissathā”ti pucchitā “āmā”ti vatvā puna tāhi “tenahi ayyā mayampi
atk-vin02a1:232_2: tumhākaṃ ovādaṃ anujīvantiyo vasissāmā”ti vuttā dutiyadivase gāme bhikkhācārasampadaṃ
atk-vin02a1:232_3: apassantā “na sakkā idha vasitu”nti pakkamanti. Atha tā bhikkhuniyo uposathadivase
atk-vin02a1:232_4: vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū na passanti, ettha kiṃ kātabbanti? Yattha bhikkhū vasanti,
atk-vin02a1:232_5: tattha gantvā pacchimikāya vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ. “Pacchimikāya vassaṃ upagantuṃ āgamissantī”ti
atk-vin02a1:232_6: vā ābhogaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ santike ovādena vasitabbaṃ. Sace pana pacchimikāyapi na
atk-vin02a1:232_7: keci āgacchanti, antarāmagge ca rājabhayaṃ vā corabhayaṃ vā dubbhikkhaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:232_8: abhikkhukāvāse vasantiyā āpatti, vassacchedaṃ katvā gacchantiyāpi āpatti, sā rakkhitabbā.
atk-vin02a1:232_9: Āpadāsu hi abhikkhuke āvāse vasantiyā anāpatti vuttā. Sace āgantvā vassaṃ upagatā
atk-vin02a1:232_10: bhikkhū puna kenaci kāraṇena pakkamanti, vasitabbameva. Vuttañhetaṃ – “anāpatti vassūpagatā
atk-vin02a1:232_11: bhikkhū pakkantā vā honti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā āpadāsu ummattikāya
atk-vin02a1:232_12: ādikammikāyā”ti. Pavārentiyā pana yattha bhikkhū atthi, tattha gantvā pavāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:233_0: Anvaddhamāsanti addhamāse addhamāse. Dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbāti dve dhammā icchitabbā.
atk-vin02a1:233_1: Uposathapucchakanti uposathapucchanaṃ, tattha pannarasike uposathe pakkhassa cātuddasiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:233_2: cātuddasike terasiyaṃ gantvā uposatho pucchitabbo. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pakkhassa
atk-vin02a1:233_3: terasiyaṃyeva gantvā ‘ayaṃ uposatho cātuddasiko pannarasiko’ti pucchitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:233_4: Uposathadivase ovādatthāya upasaṅkamitabbaṃ. Pāṭipadadivasato pana paṭṭhāya dhammasavanatthāya
atk-vin02a1:233_5: gantabbaṃ. Iti bhagavā aññassa kammassa okāsaṃ adatvā nirantaraṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:233_6: santike gamanameva paññapesi. Kasmā? Mandapaññattā mātugāmassa. Mandapañño hi mātugāmo,
atk-vin02a1:233_7: tasmā niccaṃ dhammasavanaṃ bahūpakāraṃ. Evañca sati “yaṃ mayaṃ jānāma, tameva ayyā
atk-vin02a1:233_8: jānantī”ti mānaṃ akatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ payirūpāsamānā sātthikaṃ pabbajjaṃ karissanti,
atk-vin02a1:233_9: tasmā bhagavā evamakāsi. Bhikkhuniyopi “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmā”ti sabbāyeva
atk-vin02a1:234_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādaṃ gacchati. Manussā ujjhāyanti
atk-vin02a1:234_1: khiyyanti vipācenti ‘jāyāyo imā imesaṃ, jāriyo imā imesaṃ, idānime imāhi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:234_2: abhiramissantī’ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – ‘na, bhikkhave, sabbena bhikkhunisaṅghena
atk-vin02a1:234_3: ovādo gantabbo, gaccheyya ce, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi bhikkhave catūhi pañcahi
atk-vin02a1:234_4: bhikkhunīhi ovādaṃ gantu’nti. Punapi tatheva ujjhāyiṃsu. Puna bhagavā ‘anujānāmi,
atk-vin02a1:234_5: bhikkhave, dve tisso bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ gantu”’nti āha.
atk-vin02a1:235_0: Tasmā bhikkhunisaṅghena dve tisso bhikkhuniyo yācitvā pesetabbā – “ethayye, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-vin02a1:235_1: ovādūpasaṅkamanaṃ yācatha, bhikkhunisaṅgho ayyā…pe… ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. Tāhi bhikkhunīhi
atk-vin02a1:235_2: ārāmaṃ gantabbaṃ. Tato ovādapaṭiggāhakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā so
atk-vin02a1:235_3: bhikkhu ekāya bhikkhuniyā evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-vin02a1:235_4: pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira ayya bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:235_5: Tena bhikkhunā pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho
atk-vin02a1:235_6: bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira bhante
atk-vin02a1:235_7: bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. Pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo “atthi koci bhikkhu
atk-vin02a1:235_8: bhikkhunovādako sammato”ti. Sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pātimokkhuddesakena
atk-vin02a1:235_9: vattabbo “itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū”ti.
atk-vin02a1:236_0: Sace na hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo –
atk-vin02a1:236_1: “ko āyasmā ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”nti. Sace koci bhikkhu ussahati bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:236_2: ovadituṃ, so ca hoti aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato, sammannitvā vattabbo – “itthannāmo
atk-vin02a1:236_3: bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū”ti.
atk-vin02a1:237_0: Sace pana koci na ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṃ, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbo – “natthi
atk-vin02a1:237_1: koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho sampādetū”ti. Ettāvatā
atk-vin02a1:237_2: hi sakalaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanamārocitaṃ hoti. Tena bhikkhunā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-vin02a1:237_3: pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Bhikkhunisaṅghenapi tā bhikkhuniyo pesetabbā “gacchathayye,
atk-vin02a1:237_4: pucchatha ‘kiṃ ayya labhati bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”’nti. Tāhi “sādhu ayye”ti
atk-vin02a1:237_5: sampaṭicchitvā ārāmaṃ gantvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ – “kiṃ ayya
atk-vin02a1:237_6: labhati bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. Tena vattabbaṃ – “natthi koci bhikkhu
atk-vin02a1:237_7: bhikkhunovādako sammato, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho sampādetū”ti. Tāhi “sādhu ayyā”ti
atk-vin02a1:237_8: sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Ekato āgatānaṃ vasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, tāsu pana ekāya bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a1:238_0: Sace pana bhikkhunisaṅgho vā bhikkhusaṅgho vā na pūrati, ubhayatopi vā gaṇamattameva
atk-vin02a1:238_1: puggalamattaṃ vā hoti, ekā bhikkhunī vā bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi ovādatthāya pesitā
atk-vin02a1:238_2: hoti, tatrāyaṃ vacanakkamo – “bhikkhuniyo ayya bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandanti, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca
atk-vin02a1:238_3: yācanti, labhantu kira ayya bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. “Ahaṃ ayya bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-vin02a1:238_4: pāde vandāmi; ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācāmi, labhāmahaṃ ayya ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:239_0: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya ayyānaṃ pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira
atk-vin02a1:239_1: ayya bhikkhunīsaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. “Bhikkhuniyo ayya ayyānaṃ pāde vandanti,
atk-vin02a1:239_2: ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācanti, labhantu kira ayya bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:239_3: “Ahaṃ ayya ayyānaṃ pāde vandāmi, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācāmi, labhāmahaṃ ayya ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:240_0: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya ayyassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira
atk-vin02a1:240_1: ayya bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti. “Bhikkhuniyo ayya ayyassa pāde vandanti;
atk-vin02a1:240_2: ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācanti, labhantu kira ayya bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:240_3: “Ahaṃ ayya ayyassa pāde vandāmi, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācāmi, labhāmahaṃ ayya ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:241_0: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ayyānaṃ ayyassa
atk-vin02a1:241_1: pāde vandati vandanti vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati yācanti yācati, labhatu
atk-vin02a1:241_2: kira labhantu kira labhatu kira ayya bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī
atk-vin02a1:242_0: Tenapi bhikkhunā uposathakāle evaṃ vattabbaṃ – “bhikkhuniyo bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-vin02a1:242_1: pāde vandanti, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācanti, labhantu kira bhante bhikkhuniyo ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:242_2: “Bhikkhunī bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu
atk-vin02a1:243: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho bhante, bhikkhuniyo bhante, bhikkhunī bhante āyasmantānaṃ pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunī ovādūpasaṅkamana”nti.
atk-vin02a1:244_0: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhante, bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca bhikkhusaṅghassa āyasmantānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:244_1: pāde vandati vandanti vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati yācanti yācati, labhatu
atk-vin02a1:244_2: kira labhantu kira labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī
atk-vin02a1:245_0: Pātimokkhuddesakenāpi sace sammato bhikkhu atthi, purimanayeneva taṃ bhikkhuniyo,
atk-vin02a1:245_1: taṃ bhikkhunī, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī ca upasaṅkamantu upasaṅkamatu
atk-vin02a1:245_2: upasaṅkamatūti vattabbaṃ. Sace natthi, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho ca bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:245_3: ca bhikkhunī ca sampādetu sampādentu sampādetūti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:246: Ovādapaṭiggāhakena pāṭipade paccāharitvā tatheva vattabbaṃ. Ovādaṃ pana bālagilānagamike ṭhapetvā añño sacepi āraññako hoti, appaṭiggahetuṃ na labhati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-vin02a1:247: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā bālaṃ ṭhapetvā gilānaṃ ṭhapetvā gamikaṃ avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetu”nti.
atk-vin02a1:248_0: Tattha yo cātuddasikapannarasikesu vā uposathesu pāṭipade vā gantukāmo, so gamiko
atk-vin02a1:248_1: dutiyapakkhadivase gacchantopi aggahetuṃ na labhati, “na, bhikkhave, ovādo na gahetabbo,
atk-vin02a1:248_2: yo na gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatiyeva. Ovādaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:248_3: ca uposathagge anārocetuṃ vā pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ apaccāharituṃ vā na vaṭṭati. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:249: “Na, bhikkhave, ovādo na ārocetabbo. Yo na āroceyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:251: “Na, bhikkhave, ovādo na paccāharitabbo. Yo na paccāhareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:252_0: Tattha āraññakena paccāharaṇatthaṃ saṅketo kātabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-vin02a1:252_1: āraññakena bhikkhunā ovādaṃ gahetuṃ, saṅketañca kātuṃ, atra paṭiharissāmī”ti. Tasmā
atk-vin02a1:252_2: āraññako bhikkhu sace bhikkhunīnaṃ vasanagāme bhikkhaṃ labhati, tattheva caritvā
atk-vin02a1:252_3: bhikkhuniyo disvā ārocetvā gantabbaṃ. No cassa tattha bhikkhā sulabhā hoti, sāmantagāme
atk-vin02a1:252_4: caritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ gāmaṃ āgamma tatheva kātabbaṃ. Sace dūraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti, saṅketo
atk-vin02a1:252_5: kātabbo – “ahaṃ amukaṃ nāma tumhākaṃ gāmadvāre sabhaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ
atk-vin02a1:252_6: vā upasaṅkamissāmi, tattha āgaccheyyāthā”ti. Bhikkhunīhi tattha gantabbaṃ, agantuṃ
atk-vin02a1:252_7: na labbhati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā saṅketaṃ na gantabbaṃ. Yā
atk-vin02a1:253: Ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbanti ettha bhikkhunīhi cātuddase attanā pavāretvā uposathe bhikkhusaṅghe pavāretabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:254: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ajjatanāya pavāretvā aparajju bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretu”nti.
atk-vin02a1:255: Bhikkhunikhandhake vuttanayeneva cettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:256_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisaṅgho pavārento kolāhalamakāsi. Bhagavato
atk-vin02a1:256_1: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ paṭibalaṃ sammannituṃ
atk-vin02a1:256_2: bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ. Evañca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbā.
atk-vin02a1:256_3: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhunī yācitabbā, yācitvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
atk-vin02a1:257: “Suṇātu me, ayye saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ. Esā ñatti.
atk-vin02a1:258_0: “Suṇātu me, ayye saṅgho, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sammanneyya bhikkhunisaṅghassa
atk-vin02a1:258_1: atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ. Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā sammuti
atk-vin02a1:258_2: bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ, sā tuṇhassa; yassā nakkhamati, sā bhāseyya.
atk-vin02a1:259: “Sammatā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī bhikkhunisaṅghassa atthāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ. Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:260_0: Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a1:260_1: uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo – “bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya,
atk-vin02a1:260_2: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāreti – diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā. Vadatayya bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-vin02a1:260_3: bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissati. Dutiyampi ayya, tatiyampi
atk-vin02a1:261_0: Sace bhikkhunisaṅgho na pūrati, “bhikkhuniyo ayya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārenti – diṭṭhena
atk-vin02a1:261_1: vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatayya bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhuniyo anukampaṃ upādāya,
atk-vin02a1:261_2: passantiyo paṭikarissantī”ti ca, “ahaṃ ayya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāremi – diṭṭhena vā
atk-vin02a1:261_3: sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatu maṃ ayya bhikkhusaṅgho anukampaṃ upādāya, passantī
atk-vin02a1:262_0: Sace bhikkhusaṅgho na pūrati, “bhikkhunisaṅgho ayyā ayye pavāreti – diṭṭhena vā sutena
atk-vin02a1:262_1: vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadantayyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissatī”ti
atk-vin02a1:262_2: ca, “bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya ayyaṃ pavāreti – diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
atk-vin02a1:262_3: vadatayyo bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissatī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:263_0: Ubhinnaṃ apāripūriyā “bhikkhuniyo ayyā ayye pavārenti – diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya
atk-vin02a1:263_1: vā, vadantayyā bhikkhuniyo anukampaṃ upādāya, passantiyo paṭikarissantī”ti ca, “bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:263_2: ayya ayyaṃ pavārenti – diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatayyo bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:263_3: anukampaṃ upādāya, passantiyo paṭikarissantī”ti ca, “ahaṃ ayyā ayye pavāremi – diṭṭhena
atk-vin02a1:263_4: vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadantu maṃ ayyā anukampaṃ upādāya, passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti
atk-vin02a1:263_5: ca, “ahaṃ ayya ayyaṃ pavāremi – diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatu maṃ
atk-vin02a1:263_6: ayyo anukampaṃ upādāya, passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:264: Mānattacaraṇañca upasampadāpariyesanā ca yathāṭhāneyeva āvi bhavissati.
atk-vin02a1:265_0: Na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyenāti dasahi vā akkosavatthūhi aññena vā kenaci pariyāyena
atk-vin02a1:265_1: bhikkhu neva akkositabbo, na paribhāsitabbo, na bhayena tajjetabbo. Ovaṭoti pihito
atk-vin02a1:265_2: vārito paṭikkhitto. Vacanayeva vacanapatho. Anovaṭoti apihito avārito appaṭikkhitto.
atk-vin02a1:265_3: Tasmā bhikkhuniyā ādhipaccaṭṭhāne jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “evaṃ abhikkama, evaṃ paṭikkama,
atk-vin02a1:265_4: evaṃ nivāsehi, evaṃ pārupāhī”ti kenaci pariyāyena neva bhikkhu ovaditabbo, na anusāsitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:265_5: Dosaṃ pana disvā “pubbe mahātherā na evaṃ abhikkamanti, na paṭikkamanti, na nivāsenti,
atk-vin02a1:265_6: na pārupanti, īdisaṃ kāsāvampi na dhārenti, na evaṃ akkhīni añjentī”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin02a1:265_7: vijjamānadosaṃ dassetuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūhi pana “ayaṃ vuḍḍhasamaṇī evaṃ nivāseti,
atk-vin02a1:265_8: evaṃ pārupati, mā evaṃ nivāsehi, mā evaṃ pārupāhi, mā tilakammapaṇṇakammādīni karohī”ti
atk-vin02a1:266_0: Samaggamhayyāti bhaṇantanti “samaggā amha ayya” iti bhaṇantaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ. Aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:266_1: dhammaṃ bhaṇatīti aññaṃ suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā. Samaggamhayyāti vacanena hi
atk-vin02a1:266_2: ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti, tasmā ṭhapetvā ovādaṃ aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Ovādaṃ
atk-vin02a1:267_1: adhammakamme dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa pācittiyāni. Dhammakamme dutiyassa
atk-vin02a1:267_2: navakassa avasānapade anāpatti, sesesu sattarasa dukkaṭāni.
atk-vin02a1:268_0: 152. Uddesaṃ dentoti aṭṭhannaṃ garudhammānaṃ pāḷiṃ uddisanto. Paripucchaṃ dentoti
atk-vin02a1:268_1: tassāyeva paguṇāya garudhammapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathaṃ kathentoti attho. Osārehi ayyāti
atk-vin02a1:268_2: vuccamāno osāretīti evaṃ vuccamāno aṭṭhagarudhammapāḷiṃ osāretīti attho. Evaṃ uddesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:268_3: dento, paripucchaṃ dento, yo ca osārehīti vuccamāno aṭṭha garudhamme bhaṇati, tassa
atk-vin02a1:268_4: pācittiyena anāpatti. Aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭena anāpatti. Pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-vin02a1:268_5: pañhaṃ puṭṭho kathetīti bhikkhunī garudhammanissitaṃ vā khandhādinissitaṃ vā pañhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:268_6: pucchati, taṃ yo bhikkhu katheti, tassāpi anāpatti. Aññassatthāya bhaṇantanti catuparisatiṃ
atk-vin02a1:268_7: dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo suṇanti, tatrāpi bhikkhussa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:268_8: Sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyāti etāsaṃ desentassāpi anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a1:269: Padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ – vācato ca vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:272_0: 153. Dutiyasikkhāpade – pariyāyenāti vārena, paṭipāṭiyāti attho. Adhicetasoti adhicittavato,
atk-vin02a1:272_1: sabbacittānaṃ adhikena arahattaphalacittena samannāgatassāti attho. Appamajjatoti
atk-vin02a1:272_2: nappamajjato, appamādena kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:272_3: hoti. Muninoti “yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena
atk-vin02a1:272_4: vā, monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena ñāṇena samannāgatattā vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma vuccati,
atk-vin02a1:272_5: tassa munino. Monapathesu sikkhatoti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu
atk-vin02a1:272_6: tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato. Idañca pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, tasmā evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:272_7: pubbabhāge sikkhato imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:272_8: Sokā na bhavanti tādinoti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā
atk-vin02a1:272_9: sokā na santi. Atha vā tādinoti tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatassa evarūpassa munino sokā
atk-vin02a1:272_10: na bhavantīti ayamettha attho. Upasantassāti rāgādīnaṃ upasamena upasantassa. Sadā
atk-vin02a1:272_11: satīmatoti sativepullappattattā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa. Ākāse antalikkheti
atk-vin02a1:272_12: antalikkhasaṅkhāte ākāse, na kasiṇugghāṭime, na pana rūpaparicchede. Caṅkamatipi
atk-vin02a1:272_13: tiṭṭhatipīti tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “imā bhikkhuniyo maṃ ‘ettakameva ayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:272_14: jānātī’ti avamaññanti, handa dāni etāsaṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ dassemī”ti dhammabahumānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:272_15: uppādetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya evarūpaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:272_16: dassesi – “ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi…pe… antaradhāyatipī”ti. Tattha antaradhāyatipīti
atk-vin02a1:272_17: antaradhāyatipi adassanampi gacchatīti attho. Tañceva udānaṃ bhaṇati aññañca bahuṃ
atk-vin02a1:272_18: buddhavacananti thero kira attano bhātutherassa santike –
atk-vin02a1:277_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ uddisāpetvā cattāro māse sajjhāyi. Na ca paguṇaṃ kattumasakkhi. Tato
atk-vin02a1:277_1: naṃ thero “abhabbo tvaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane”ti vihārā nikkaḍḍhāpesi, so rodamāno dvārakoṭṭhake
atk-vin02a1:277_2: aṭṭhāsi. Atha bhagavā buddhacakkhunā veneyyasatte olokento taṃ disvā vihāracārikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:277_3: caramāno viya tassa santikaṃ gantvā “cūḷapanthaka, kasmā rodasī”ti āha. So tamatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:277_4: ārocesi. Athassa bhagavā suddhaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ datvā “idaṃ ‘rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa’nti
atk-vin02a1:277_5: parimajjāhī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā attano nivāsaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tassa
atk-vin02a1:277_6: ekamantaṃ parimajji, parimajjitaṭṭhānaṃ kāḷakamahosi. So “evaṃ parisuddhampi nāma
atk-vin02a1:277_7: vatthaṃ imaṃ attabhāvaṃ nissāya kāḷakaṃ jāta”nti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:277_8: ārabhi. Athassa bhagavā āraddhavīriyabhāvaṃ ñatvā “adhicetaso”ti imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:277_9: abhāsi. Thero gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmā thero pakatiyāva imaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:277_10: mamāyati, so taṃ imissā gāthāya mamāyanabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ taṃyeva bhaṇati. Aññañca
atk-vin02a1:277_11: antarantarā āharitvā bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “tañceva udānaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a1:278: 156. Ekato upasampannāyāti bhikkhunisaṅghe upasampannāya, bhikkhusaṅghe pana upasampannaṃ ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Idampi ca padasodhammasamuṭṭhānameva.
atk-vin02a1:281_0: 162. Tatiyasikkhāpade – aññatra samayā ovadati āpatti pācittiyassātiādīsu aṭṭhahi
atk-vin02a1:281_1: garudhammehi ovadantasseva pācittiyaṃ, aññena dhammena dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. Ekatoupasampannāyāti
atk-vin02a1:281_2: bhikkhunisaṅghe upasampannāya, bhikkhusaṅghe upasampannāya pana ovadato pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:281_3: Ito parampi yattha yattha “ekatoupasampannā”ti vuccati, sabbattha ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:282: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato, kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:284_0: Idaṃ panettha mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ – asammato ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye
atk-vin02a1:284_1: bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadati, tīṇi pācittiyāni. Aññena
atk-vin02a1:284_2: dhammena ovadato dve dukkaṭāni, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Kathaṃ? Asammatamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:284_3: upassayaṃ gantvā aññena dhammena ovadanamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, atthaṅgate sūriye ovadanamūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:284_4: pācittiyanti. Sammatassa atthaṅgate sūriye tattha gantvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadantassa
atk-vin02a1:284_5: ekā anāpatti, dve pācittiyāni. Kathaṃ? Sammatattā anāpatti, atthaṅgate sūriye ovadanamūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:284_6: ekaṃ, gantvā garudhammehi ovadanamūlakaṃ ekanti dve pācittiyāni. Tasseva aññena dhammena
atk-vin02a1:284_7: ovadato ekā anāpatti, ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Kathaṃ? Sammatattā anāpatti,
atk-vin02a1:284_8: gantvā aññena dhammena ovadanamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, atthaṅgate sūriye ovadanamūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:284_9: pācittiyanti. Divā pana gantvā ovadato sammatassa ca asammatassa ca rattiṃ ovadanamūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:284_10: ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ apanetvā avasesā āpattānāpattiyo veditabbāti.
atk-vin02a1:287_0: 164. Catutthasikkhāpade – na bahukatāti na katabahumānā, na dhamme bahumānaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:287_1: ovadantīti adhippāyo. “Bhikkhunovādakaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo”tiādīnaṃ ujjhāpanake vuttanayenevattho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:288_0: Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammatanti ettha asammato nāma sammatena vā saṅghena vā bhāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:288_1: katvā ṭhapito veditabbo. Anupasampannaṃ sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vāti ettha pana bhikkhukāle
atk-vin02a1:288_2: sammutiṃ labhitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito sammato, sammatena vā saṅghena vā ṭhapito
atk-vin02a1:288_3: bahussuto sāmaṇero asammatoti veditabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:289: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:292_0: 169. Pañcamasikkhāpade – visikhāyāti rathikāya. Piṇḍāya caratīti nibaddhacāravasena
atk-vin02a1:292_1: abhiṇhaṃ carati. Sandiṭṭhāti sandiṭṭhamittā ahesuṃ. Sesamettha padato uttānatthaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:292_2: vinicchayato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhi.
atk-vin02a1:292_3: Tatra hi bhikkhu paṭiggāhako, idha bhikkhunī, ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:295_0: 175. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpade – udāyīti lāḷudāyī. Paṭṭhoti paṭibalo, nipuṇo ceva samattho
atk-vin02a1:295_1: cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññatarā bhikkhunīti tasseva purāṇadutiyikā. Paṭibhānacittanti
atk-vin02a1:295_2: attano paṭibhānena katacittaṃ, so kira cīvaraṃ rajitvā tassa majjhe nānāvaṇṇehi vippakatamethunaṃ
atk-vin02a1:295_3: itthipurisarūpamakāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “majjhe paṭibhānacittaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā”ti. Yathāsaṃhaṭanti yathāsaṃharitameva.
atk-vin02a1:296_0: 176. Cīvaranti yaṃ nivāsituṃ vā pārupituṃ vā sakkā hoti, evañhi mahāpaccariyādīsu
atk-vin02a1:296_1: vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ sibbatīti ettha sibbissāmīti vicārentassāpi chindantassāpi dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:296_2: sibbantassa pana pācittiyaṃ. Ārāpathe ārāpatheti sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇe.
atk-vin02a1:296_3: Sace pana sakalasūciṃ anīharanto dīghasuttappavesanatthaṃ satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā
atk-vin02a1:296_4: nīharati, ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Sakiṃ āṇattoti sakiṃ “cīvaraṃ sibbā”ti vutto. Bahukampi
atk-vin02a1:296_5: sibbatīti sacepi sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ pariyosāpetvā cīvaraṃ niṭṭhāpeti, ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:296_6: Atha pana “imasmiṃ cīvare kattabbakammaṃ tava bhāro”ti vutto karoti, āṇattassa ārāpathe
atk-vin02a1:296_7: ārāpathe ekamekaṃ pācittiyaṃ, āṇāpakassa ekavācāya sambahulānipi. Punappunaṃ āṇattiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:297_0: Yepi sace ācariyupajjhāyesu attano ñātikānaṃ cīvaraṃ sibbantesu tesaṃ nissitakā “ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:297_1: vā kathinavattaṃ vā karomā”ti sibbanti, tesampi ārāpathagaṇanāya āpattiyo. Ācariyupajjhāyā
atk-vin02a1:297_2: attano ñātikānaṃ cīvaraṃ antevāsikehi sibbāpenti, ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, antevāsikānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:297_3: pācittiyaṃ. Antevāsikā attano ñātikānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyehi sibbāpenti, tatrāpi eseva
atk-vin02a1:297_4: nayo. Antevāsikānampi ācariyupajjhāyānampi ñātikāya cīvaraṃ hoti, ācariyupajjhāyā
atk-vin02a1:297_5: pana antevāsike vañcetvā sibbāpenti, ubhinnampi dukkaṭaṃ. Kasmā? Antevāsikānaṃ aññātikasaññāya
atk-vin02a1:297_6: sibbitattā, itaresaṃ akappiye niyojitattā. Tasmā “idaṃ te mātu cīvaraṃ, idaṃ bhaginiyā”ti
atk-vin02a1:298_0: 179. Aññaṃ parikkhāranti yaṃkiñci upāhanatthavikādiṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:298_1: – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:301_0: 181. Sattamasikkhāpade – pacchā gacchantīnaṃ corā acchindiṃsūti pacchā gacchantīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:301_1: pattacīvaraṃ corā hariṃsu. Dūsesunti tā bhikkhuniyo corā dūsayiṃsu, sīlavināsaṃ pāpayiṃsūti attho.
atk-vin02a1:302_0: 182-3. Saṃvidhāyāti saṃvidahitvā, gamanakāle saṅketaṃ katvāti attho. Kukkuṭasampādeti
atk-vin02a1:302_1: ettha yasmā gāmā nikkhamitvā kukkuṭo padasāva aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ kukkuṭasampādoti
atk-vin02a1:302_2: vuccati. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – sampadanti etthāti sampādo. Ke sampadanti? Kukkuṭā.
atk-vin02a1:302_3: Kukkuṭānaṃ sampādo kukkuṭasampādo. Atha vā sampādoti gamanaṃ, kukkuṭānaṃ sampādo
atk-vin02a1:302_4: ettha atthītipi kukkuṭasampādo. Kukkuṭasampāte itipi pāṭho, tattha yassa gāmassa
atk-vin02a1:302_5: gehacchadanapiṭṭhito kukkuṭo uppatitvā aññassa gehacchadanapiṭṭhiyaṃ patati, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:302_6: kukkuṭasampātoti vuccati. Vacanattho panettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Dvidhā vuttappakāropi
atk-vin02a1:302_7: cesa gāmo accāsanno hoti, upacāro na labbhati. Yasmiṃ pana gāme paccūse vassantassa
atk-vin02a1:302_8: kukkuṭassa saddo anantare gāme suyyati, tādisehi gāmehi sampuṇṇaraṭṭhe gāmantare
atk-vin02a1:302_9: gāmantare pācittiyanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, “gāmantare gāmantare
atk-vin02a1:302_10: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato pana sacepi ratanamattantaro gāmo hoti, yo tassa
atk-vin02a1:303_0: Tatrāyaṃ āpattivinicchayo – saṃvidhānakāle hi sace ubhopi bhikkhunupassaye vā antarārāme
atk-vin02a1:303_1: vā āsanasālāya vā titthiyaseyyāya vā ṭhatvā saṃvidahanti, anāpatti kappiyabhūmi kirāyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:303_2: Tasmā ettha saṃvidahanapaccayā dukkaṭāpattiṃ na vadanti, gacchantassa yathāvatthukameva.
atk-vin02a1:303_3: Sace pana antogāme bhikkhunupassayadvāre rathikāya aññesu vā catukkasiṅghāṭakahatthisālādīsu
atk-vin02a1:303_4: saṃvidahanti, bhikkhuno āpatti dukkaṭassa. Evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gāmato nikkhamanti,
atk-vin02a1:303_5: nikkhamane anāpatti, anantaragāmassa upacārokkamane pana bhikkhuno pācittiyaṃ. Tatrāpi
atk-vin02a1:303_6: “paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde pācittiya”nti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Gāmato nikkhamitvā
atk-vin02a1:303_7: pana yāva anantaragāmassa upacāraṃ na okkamanti, etthantare saṃvidahitepi bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a1:303_8: dukkaṭaṃ, anantaragāmassa upacārokkamane purimanayeneva āpatti. Sace dūraṃ gantukāmā
atk-vin02a1:303_9: honti, gāmūpacāragaṇanāya okkamane okkamane āpatti, tassa tassa pana gāmassa atikkamane
atk-vin02a1:303_10: anāpatti. Sace pana bhikkhunī “asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti upassayato nikkhamati,
atk-vin02a1:303_11: bhikkhupi tameva gāmaṃ sandhāya “asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti vihārato nikkhamati.
atk-vin02a1:303_12: Atha dvepi gāmadvāre samāgantvā “tumhe kuhiṃ gacchatha, asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ tumhe kuhinti,
atk-vin02a1:303_13: mayampi tatthevā”ti vatvā “ehi dāni, gacchāmā”ti saṃvidhāya gacchanti, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:303_14: Kasmā? Pubbameva gamissāmāti nikkhantattāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ neva pāḷiyā
atk-vin02a1:304_0: Addhayojane addhayojaneti ekamekaṃ addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa idāni atikkamissatīti
atk-vin02a1:304_1: paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde pācittiyaṃ. Imasmiñhi naye atikkamane āpatti, okkamane anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:305_0: 184. Bhikkhu saṃvidahatīti nagaradvāre vā rathikāya vā bhikkhuniṃ disvā “asukaṃ gāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:305_1: nāma gatapubbatthā”ti vadati, “nāmhi ayya gatapubbā”ti “ehi gacchāmā”ti vā “sve ahaṃ
atk-vin02a1:305_2: gamissāmi, tvampi āgaccheyyāsī”ti vā vadati. Bhikkhunī saṃvidahatīti gāmantare cetiyavandanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:305_3: gāmato nikkhamantaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “ayya kuhiṃ gacchathā”ti vadati. “Asukaṃ nāma
atk-vin02a1:305_4: gāmaṃ cetiyavandanattha”nti. “Ahampi ayya āgacchāmī”ti evaṃ bhikkhunīyeva saṃvidahati, na bhikkhu.
atk-vin02a1:306_0: 185. Visaṅketenāti ettha “purebhattaṃ gacchissāmā”ti vatvā pacchābhattaṃ gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:306_1: “ajja vā gamissāmā”ti vatvā sve gacchanti. Evaṃ kālavisaṅketeyeva anāpatti, dvāravisaṅkete
atk-vin02a1:306_2: pana maggavisaṅkete vā satipi āpattiyeva. Āpadāsūti raṭṭhabhede cakkasamāruḷhā janapadā
atk-vin02a1:306_3: pariyāyanti evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:307: Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:310_1: saṃvidahitvā. Uddhaṃgāmininti uddhaṃ nadiyā paṭisotaṃ gacchantiṃ. Yasmā pana yo uddhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:310_2: javanato ujjavanikāya nāvāya kīḷati, so “uddhaṃgāminiṃ abhiruhatī”ti vuccati. Tenassa
atk-vin02a1:310_3: padabhājane atthameva dassetuṃ “ujjavanikāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Adhogāmininti adho anusotaṃ
atk-vin02a1:310_4: gacchantiṃ. Yasmā pana yo adho javanato ojavanikāya nāvāya kīḷati, so “adhogāminiṃ
atk-vin02a1:310_5: abhiruhatī”ti vuccati. Tenassāpi padabhājane atthameva dassetuṃ “ojavanikāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:310_6: Tattha yaṃ titthasampaṭipādanatthaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho vā haranti, ettha anāpatti. Tiriyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:311_0: 189. Gāmantare gāmantareti ettha yassā nadiyā ekaṃ tīraṃ kukkuṭasampādagāmehi nirantaraṃ,
atk-vin02a1:311_1: ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññaṃ, tassā sagāmakatīrapassena gamanakāle gāmantaragaṇanāya pācittiyāni,
atk-vin02a1:311_2: agāmakatīrapassena gamanakāle addhayojanagaṇanāya. Yā pana yojanavitthatā hoti, tassā
atk-vin02a1:311_3: majjhena gamanepi addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyāni veditabbāni. Anāpatti tiriyaṃ taraṇāyāti
atk-vin02a1:311_4: ettha na kevalaṃ nadiyā, yopi mahātitthapaṭṭanato tāmalittiṃ vā suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:311_5: gacchati, tassāpi anāpatti. Sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu hi nadiyaṃyeva āpatti vicāritā, na samudde.
atk-vin02a1:312: 191. Visaṅketenāti idhāpi kālavisaṅketeneva anāpatti, titthavisaṅketena pana nāvāvisaṅketena vā gacchantassa āpattiyeva. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpadasadisameva saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:315_0: 192. Navamasikkhāpade – mahānāge tiṭṭhamāneti bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ, mahānāgesu
atk-vin02a1:315_1: tiṭṭhamānesūti attho. Atha vā mahānāge tiṭṭhamāne “adisvā”ti ayamettha pāṭhaseso
atk-vin02a1:315_2: daṭṭhabbo. Itarathā hi attho na yujjati. Antarākathāti avasānaṃ appatvā ārambhassa
atk-vin02a1:315_3: ca avasānassa ca vemajjhaṭṭhānaṃ pattakathā. Vippakatāti kayiramānā hoti. Saccaṃ
atk-vin02a1:315_4: mahānāgā kho tayā gahapatīti addhacchikena olokayamānā there pavisante disvā tehi
atk-vin02a1:316_1: laddhabbaṃ katanti attho. Padabhājane panassa bhikkhuniñca tassā paripācanākārañca
atk-vin02a1:316_2: dassetuṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā, paripāceti nāma pubbe adātukāmāna”ntiādi
atk-vin02a1:316_3: vuttaṃ. Pubbe gihisamārambhāti ettha pubbeti paṭhamaṃ. Samārambhoti samāraddhaṃ vuccati,
atk-vin02a1:316_4: paṭiyāditassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Gihīnaṃ samārambho gihisamārambho. Bhikkhuniyā paripācanato
atk-vin02a1:316_5: paṭhamameva yaṃ gihīnaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ bhattaṃ, tato aññatra taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:316_6: aññaṃ bhuñjantassa āpatti, taṃ pana bhuñjantassa anāpattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:316_7: pana yasmā ñātakapavāritehi bhikkhussatthāya asamāraddhopi piṇḍapāto atthato samāraddhova
atk-vin02a1:316_8: hoti, yathāsukhaṃ āharāpetabbato, tasmā byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthameva dassetuṃ “gihisamārambho
atk-vin02a1:316_9: nāma ñātakā vā honti pavāritā vā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:317_0: 195. Pakatipaṭiyattanti pakatiyā tasseva bhikkhuno atthāya paṭiyāditaṃ hoti “therassa
atk-vin02a1:317_1: dassāmā”ti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “tassa aññassā”ti avatvā “bhikkhūnaṃ dassāmāti paṭiyattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:318_0: 197. Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattīti yāgukhajjakaphalāphale sabbattha
atk-vin02a1:318_1: bhikkhuniparipācitepi anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato
atk-vin02a1:318_2: samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:321_0: 198. Dasamasikkhāpade – sabbo pāḷiattho ca vinicchayo ca dutiyaaniyate vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:321_1: veditabbo. Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ dutiyāniyatena ca upari upanandhassa catutthasikkhāpadena
atk-vin02a1:321_2: ca saddhiṃ ekaparicchedaṃ, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana visuṃ paññattanti.
atk-vin02a1:326_0: 203. Bhojanavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – āvasathapiṇḍoti āvasathe piṇḍo. Samantā
atk-vin02a1:326_2: āvasathaṃ katvā tattha puññakāmatāya piṇḍo paññatto hoti, yāgubhattabhesajjādi sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:326_3: tesaṃ tesaṃ dānatthāya ṭhapitaṃ hotīti attho. Hiyyopīti svepi. Apasakkantīti apagacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:326_4: Manussā ujjhāyantīti titthiye apassantā “titthiyā kuhiṃ gatā”“ime passitvā pakkantā”ti
atk-vin02a1:326_5: sutvā ujjhāyanti. Kukkuccāyantoti kukkuccaṃ karonto, akappiyasaññaṃ uppādentoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:327_0: 206. Sakkoti tamhā āvasathā pakkamitunti addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā gantuṃ sakkoti.
atk-vin02a1:327_1: Na sakkotīti ettakameva na sakkoti. Anodissāti imesaṃyeva vā ettakānaṃyeva vāti ekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:327_2: pāsaṇḍaṃ anuddisitvā sabbesaṃ paññatto hoti. Yāvadatthoti bhojanampi ettakanti aparicchinditvā
atk-vin02a1:327_3: yāvadattho paññatto hoti. Sakiṃ bhuñjitabbanti ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ, dutiyadivasato
atk-vin02a1:327_4: paṭṭhāya paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:328_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – ekakulena vā nānākulehi vā ekato hutvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vā
atk-vin02a1:328_1: nānāṭhānesu vā “ajja ekasmiṃ; sve ekasmi”nti evaṃ aniyamitaṭṭhāne vā paññattaṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:328_2: ṭhāne ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitvā dutiyadivase tasmiṃ ṭhāne aññasmiṃ vā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:328_3: Nānākulehi pana nānāṭhānesu paññattaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitvā dutiyadivase
atk-vin02a1:328_4: aññattha bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Paṭipāṭiṃ pana khepetvā puna ādito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:328_5: na vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ekapūganānāpūgaekagāmanānāgāmesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:328_6: Yopi ekakulassa vā nānākulānaṃ vā ekato paññatto taṇḍulādīnaṃ abhāvena antarantarā
atk-vin02a1:328_7: chijjati, sopi na bhuñjitabbo. Sace pana “na sakkoma dātu”nti upacchinditvā puna
atk-vin02a1:328_8: kalyāṇacitte uppanne dātuṃ ārabhanti, etaṃ puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:329_0: 208. Anāpatti gilānassāti gilānassa anuvasitvā bhuñjantassa anāpatti. Gacchanto vāti
atk-vin02a1:329_1: yo gacchanto antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ gataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati, tassāpi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:329_2: Āgacchantepi eseva nayo. Gantvā paccāgacchantopi antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ āgataṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:329_3: ca ekadivasaṃ bhuñjituṃ labhati. Gacchissāmīti bhuñjitvā nikkhantassa nadī vā pūrati
atk-vin02a1:329_4: corādibhayaṃ vā hoti, so nivattitvā khemabhāvaṃ ñatvā gacchanto puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:329_5: labhatīti sabbamidaṃ mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttaṃ. Odissa paññatto hotīti bhikkhūnaṃyeva
atk-vin02a1:329_6: atthāya uddisitvā paññatto hoti. Na yāvadatthoti yāvadatthaṃ paññatto na hoti, thokaṃ
atk-vin02a1:329_7: thokaṃ labbhati, tādisaṃ niccampi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbatthāti
atk-vin02a1:329_8: yāgukhajjakaphalāphalādibhede sabbattha anāpatti. Yāguādīni hi niccampi bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:329_9: vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:329_10: kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:332_0: 209. Dutiyasikkhāpade – parihīnalābhasakkāroti so kira ajātasattunā rājānaṃ mārāpetvāpi
atk-vin02a1:332_1: abhimāre yojetvāpi ruhiruppādaṃ katvāpi guḷhapaṭicchanno ahosi. Yadā pana divāyeva
atk-vin02a1:332_2: dhanapālakaṃ payojesi, tadā pākaṭo jāto. “Kathaṃ devadatto hatthiṃ payojesī”ti parikathāya
atk-vin02a1:332_3: uppannāya “na kevalaṃ hatthiṃ payojesi, rājānampi mārāpesi, abhimārepi pesesi, silampi
atk-vin02a1:332_4: pavijjhi, pāpo devadatto”ti pākaṭo ahosi. “Kena saddhiṃ idaṃ kammamakāsī”ti ca vutte
atk-vin02a1:332_5: “raññā ajātasattunā”ti āhaṃsu. Tato nāgarā “kathañhi nāma rājā evarūpaṃ coraṃ sāsanakaṇṭakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:332_6: gahetvā vicarissatī”ti uṭṭhahiṃsu. Rājā nagarasaṅkhobhaṃ ñatvā devadattaṃ nīhari.
atk-vin02a1:332_7: Tato paṭṭhāya cassa pañcathālipākasatāni upacchindi, upaṭṭhānampissa na agamāsi,
atk-vin02a1:332_8: aññepissa manussā na kiñci dātabbaṃ vā kātabbaṃ vā maññiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “parihīnalābhasakkāro”ti.
atk-vin02a1:332_9: Kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjatīti “mā me gaṇo bhijjī”ti parisaṃ posento “tvaṃ
atk-vin02a1:332_10: ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehi, tvaṃ dvinna”nti evaṃ viññāpetvā sapariso kulesu bhuñjati.
atk-vin02a1:333: 211. Cīvaraṃ parittaṃ uppajjatīti bhattaṃ agaṇhantānaṃ cīvaraṃ na denti, tasmā parittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-vin02a1:334: 212. Cīvarakārake bhikkhū bhattena nimantentīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā cirena cīvaraṃ niṭṭhāpente disvā “evaṃ lahuṃ niṭṭhāpetvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjissantī”ti puññakāmatāya nimantenti.
atk-vin02a1:335: 215. Nānāverajjaketi nānāvidhehi aññarajjehi āgate. “Nānāvirajjake”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho.
atk-vin02a1:336_0: 217-8. Gaṇabhojaneti gaṇassa bhojane. Idha ca gaṇo nāma cattāro bhikkhū ādiṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:336_1: tatuttariṃ bhikkhū adhippetā, teneva sabbantimaṃ paricchedaṃ dassento āha “yattha
atk-vin02a1:336_2: cattāro bhikkhū…pe… etaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti. Taṃ panetaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi
atk-vin02a1:336_3: pasavati nimantanato vā viññattito vā. Kathaṃ nimantanato pasavati? Cattāro bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:336_4: upasaṅkamitvā “tumhe, bhante, odanena nimantemi, odanaṃ me gaṇhatha ākaṅkhatha oloketha
atk-vin02a1:336_5: adhivāsetha paṭimānethā”ti evaṃ yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena vā pañcannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:336_6: bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimanteti. Evaṃ ekato nimantitā paricchinnakālavasena ajjatanāya
atk-vin02a1:336_7: vā svātanāya vā ekato gacchanti, ekato gaṇhanti, ekato bhuñjanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:336_8: sabbesaṃ āpatti. Ekato nimantitā ekato vā nānato vā gacchanti, ekato gaṇhanti, nānato
atk-vin02a1:336_9: bhuñjanti, āpattiyeva. Paṭiggahaṇameva hi ettha pamāṇaṃ. Ekato nimantitā ekato vā
atk-vin02a1:336_10: nānato vā gacchanti, nānato gaṇhanti, ekato vā nānato vā bhuñjanti, anāpatti. Cattāri
atk-vin02a1:336_11: pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā nānato nimantitā ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitesuyeva vā eko puttena
atk-vin02a1:336_12: eko pitarāti evampi nānato nimantitā ekato vā nānato vā gacchantu, ekato vā nānato
atk-vin02a1:336_13: vā bhuñjantu, sace ekato gaṇhanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, sabbesaṃ āpatti. Evaṃ tāva
atk-vin02a1:337_0: Kathaṃ viññattito? Cattāro bhikkhū ekato ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ
atk-vin02a1:337_1: catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”ti vā viññāpeyyuṃ, pāṭekkaṃ vā passitvā “mayhaṃ dehi, mayhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:337_2: dehī”ti evaṃ ekato vā nānato vā viññāpetvā ekato vā gacchantu nānato vā, bhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:337_3: gahetvāpi ekato vā bhuñjantu nānato vā, sace ekato gaṇhanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, sabbesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:338_0: Pādāpi phalitāti yathā mahācammassa parato maṃsaṃ dissati; evaṃ phālitā, vālikāya
atk-vin02a1:338_1: vā sakkharāya vā pahaṭamatte dukkhaṃ uppādenti, na sakkā hoti antogāme piṇḍāya carituṃ.
atk-vin02a1:338_2: Īdise gelaññe gilānasamayoti bhuñjitabbaṃ, na lesakappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:339_0: Cīvare kayiramāneti yadā sāṭakañca suttañca labhitvā cīvaraṃ karonti tadā; visuñhi
atk-vin02a1:339_1: cīvarakārasamayo nāma natthi. Tasmā yo tattha cīvare kattabbaṃ yaṃkiñci kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a1:339_2: mahāpaccariyañhi “antamaso sūcivedhanako”tipi vuttaṃ, tena cīvarakārasamayoti bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:339_3: Kurundiyaṃ pana vitthāreneva vuttaṃ. Yo cīvaraṃ vicāreti, chindati, moghasuttaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a1:339_4: āgantukapaṭṭaṃ ṭhapeti, paccāgataṃ sibbati, āgantukapaṭṭaṃ bandhati, anuvātaṃ chindati
atk-vin02a1:339_5: ghaṭṭeti āropeti, tattha paccāgataṃ sibbati, suttaṃ karoti valeti, pipphalikaṃ niseti,
atk-vin02a1:339_6: parivattanaṃ karoti, sabbopi cīvaraṃ karotiyevāti vuccati. Yo pana samīpe nisinno
atk-vin02a1:339_7: jātakaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ vā katheti, ayaṃ na cīvarakārako. Etaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ gaṇabhojane anāpattīti.
atk-vin02a1:340_0: Addhayojananti ettakampi addhānaṃ gantukāmena. Yo pana dūraṃ gantukāmo, tattha vattabbameva
atk-vin02a1:340_1: natthi. Gacchantenāti addhānaṃ gacchantena, addhayojanabbhantare gāvutepi bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:340_2: vaṭṭati. Gatena bhuñjitabbanti gatena ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ. Nāvābhiruhanepi eseva
atk-vin02a1:340_3: nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – abhiruḷhena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvāpi yāva na orohati tāva
atk-vin02a1:340_4: bhuñjitabbanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Catutthe āgateti ayaṃ antimaparicchedo, catutthepi
atk-vin02a1:340_5: āgate yattha na yāpenti; so mahāsamayo. Yattha pana sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā sannipatanti,
atk-vin02a1:340_6: tattha vattabbameva natthi. Tasmā tādise kāle “mahāsamayo”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:340_7: Yo koci paribbājakasamāpannoti sahadhammikesu vā titthiyesu vā aññataro, etesañhi
atk-vin02a1:341: 220. Anāpatti samayeti sattasu samayesu aññatarasmiṃ anāpatti. Dve tayo ekatoti yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā dve vā tayo vā ekato gahetvā bhuñjanti, tesampi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:342_1: gilānacatutthanti pañcannaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco
atk-vin02a1:342_2: cattāro bhikkhū “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimanteti. Tesu tayo gatā, eko na gato. Upāsako
atk-vin02a1:342_3: “eko bhante thero kuhi”nti pucchati. Nāgato upāsakāti. So aññaṃ taṅkhaṇappattaṃ kañci
atk-vin02a1:342_4: “ehi bhante”ti pavesetvā catunnampi bhattaṃ deti, sabbesaṃ anāpatti. Kasmā? Gaṇapūrakassa
atk-vin02a1:342_5: animantitattā. Tayo eva hi tattha nimantitā gaṇhiṃsu, tehi gaṇo na pūrati, gaṇapūrako
atk-vin02a1:342_6: ca animantito, tena gaṇo bhijjatīti idaṃ animantitacatutthaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:343_0: Piṇḍapātikacatutthe – nimantanakāle eko piṇḍapātiko hoti, so nādhivāseti. Gamanavelāya
atk-vin02a1:343_1: pana “ehi bhante”ti vutte anadhivāsitattā anāgacchantampi “etha bhikkhaṃ lacchathā”ti
atk-vin02a1:343_2: gahetvā gacchanti, so taṃ gaṇaṃ bhindati. Tasmā sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:344: Anupasampannacatutthe – sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ nimantitā honti, sopi gaṇaṃ bhindati.
atk-vin02a1:345: Pattacatutthe – eko sayaṃ agantvā pattaṃ peseti; evampi gaṇo bhijjati. Tasmā sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:346_0: Gilānacatutthe – gilānena saddhiṃ nimantitā honti, tattha gilānasseva anāpatti, itaresaṃ
atk-vin02a1:346_1: pana gaṇapūrako hoti. Na hi gilānena gaṇo bhijjati. Tasmā tesaṃ āpattiyeva. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:347_0: Samayaladdhako sayameva muccati, sesānaṃ gaṇapūrakattā āpattikaro hoti. Tasmā cīvaradānasamayaladdhakādīnampi
atk-vin02a1:347_1: vasena catukkāni veditabbāni. Sace pana adhivāsetvā gatesupi catūsu janesu eko paṇḍito
atk-vin02a1:347_2: bhikkhu “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇaṃ bhindissāmi, nimantanaṃ sādiyathā”ti vatvā yāgukhajjakāvasāne
atk-vin02a1:347_3: bhattatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ adatvā “ime tāva bhikkhū bhojetvā vissajjetha, ahaṃ
atk-vin02a1:347_4: pacchā anumodanaṃ katvā gamissāmī”ti nisinno. Tesu bhutvā gatesu “detha bhante patta”nti
atk-vin02a1:347_5: upāsakena pattaṃ gahetvā bhatte dinne bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā gacchati, sabbesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:347_6: anāpatti. Pañcannañhi bhojanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇabhojane visaṅketaṃ natthi. Odanena
atk-vin02a1:347_7: nimantitā kummāsaṃ gaṇhantāpi āpattiṃ āpajjanti. Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitāni.
