atk-vin02a1:347_8: Yāguādīsu pana visaṅketaṃ hoti, tāni tehi ekato gahitānīti. Evaṃ eko paṇḍito aññesampi anāpattiṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a1:348_0: Tasmā sace koci saṅghabhattaṃ kattukāmena nimantanatthāya pesito vihāraṃ āgamma “bhante,
atk-vin02a1:348_1: sve amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti avatvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅghabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:348_2: gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅgho bhattaṃ gaṇhātū”ti vā vadati, bhattuddesakena paṇḍitena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:348_3: nemantanikā gaṇabhojanato piṇḍapātikā ca dhutaṅgabhedato mocetabbā. Kathaṃ? Evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:348_4: tāva vattabbaṃ – “sve na sakkā upāsakā”ti. “Punadivase, bhante”ti. “Punadivasepi
atk-vin02a1:348_5: na sakkā”ti. Evaṃ yāva addhamāsampi haritvā puna vattabbo – “tvaṃ kiṃ avacā”ti? Sace
atk-vin02a1:348_6: punapi “saṅghabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, tato “imaṃ tāva upāsaka pupphaṃ kappiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:348_7: karohi, imaṃ tiṇa”nti evaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā puna “kiṃ kathayitthā”ti pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:348_8: Sace punapi tatheva vadati, “āvuso, tvaṃ piṇḍapātike vā mahāthere vā na lacchasi,
atk-vin02a1:348_9: sāmaṇere lacchasī”ti vattabbo. “Nanu, bhante asukasmiñca asukasmiñca gāme bhadante
atk-vin02a1:348_10: bhojesuṃ, ahaṃ kasmā na labhāmī”ti ca vutte “te nimantetuṃ jānanti, tvaṃ na jānāsī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:348_11: Te kathaṃ nimantesuṃ bhanteti? Te evamāhaṃsu – “amhākaṃ, bhante, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:348_12: Sace sopi tatheva vadati, vaṭṭati. Atha punapi “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, “na dāni
atk-vin02a1:348_13: tvaṃ, āvuso, bahū bhikkhū lacchasi, tayo eva lacchasī”ti vattabbo. “Nanu, bhante,
atk-vin02a1:348_14: asukasmiñca asukasmiñca gāme sakalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojesuṃ, ahaṃ kasmā na labhāmī”ti?
atk-vin02a1:348_15: “Tvaṃ nimantetuṃ na jānāsī”ti. “Te kathaṃ nimantesu”nti? Te “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-vin02a1:348_16: āhaṃsūti. Sace sopi “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Atha punapi “bhattamevā”ti
atk-vin02a1:348_17: vadati, tato vattabbo – “gaccha tvaṃ, natthamhākaṃ tava bhattenattho, nibaddhagocaro
atk-vin02a1:348_18: esa amhākaṃ, mayamettha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti. Taṃ “caratha, bhante”ti vatvā āgataṃ
atk-vin02a1:348_19: pucchanti – “kiṃ bho laddhā bhikkhū”ti. “Kiṃ etena bahu ettha vattabbaṃ, ‘therā sve
atk-vin02a1:348_20: piṇḍāya carissāmā’ti āhaṃsu. Mā dāni tumhe pamajjitthā”ti. Dutiyadivase cetiyavattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:348_21: katvā ṭhitā bhikkhū saṅghattherena vattabbā – “āvuso, dhuragāme saṅghabhattaṃ apaṇḍitamanusso
atk-vin02a1:348_22: pana agamāsi, gacchāma dhuragāme piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti. Bhikkhūhi therassa vacanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:348_23: kātabbaṃ, na dubbacehi bhavitabbaṃ, gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvāva piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ. Tesu
atk-vin02a1:348_24: pattāni gahetvā nisīdāpetvā bhojentesu bhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace āsanasālāya bhattaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:348_25: rathikāsu āhiṇḍantā ārocenti – “āsanasālāya, bhante, bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:349_0: Atha pana bhattaṃ ādāya tattha tattha gantvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, paṭikacceva
atk-vin02a1:349_1: vā vihāraṃ abhiharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne ṭhapetvā āgatāgatānaṃ denti, ayaṃ abhihaṭabhikkhā
atk-vin02a1:349_2: nāma vaṭṭati. Sace pana bhattasālāya dānaṃ sajjetvā taṃ taṃ pariveṇaṃ pahiṇanti “bhattasālāya
atk-vin02a1:349_3: bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti, na vaṭṭati. Ye pana manussā piṇḍacārike bhikkhū disvā āsanasālaṃ
atk-vin02a1:349_4: sammajjitvā tattha nisīdāpetvā bhojenti, na te paṭikkhipitabbā. Ye pana gāme bhikkhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:349_5: alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamante bhikkhū disvā “bhante bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, te
atk-vin02a1:349_6: paṭikkhipitabbā, na vā nivattitabbaṃ. Sace “nivattatha, bhante, bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-vin02a1:349_7: vadanti, “nivattathā”ti vuttapade nivattituṃ vaṭṭati. “Nivattatha bhante, ghare bhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:349_8: kataṃ, gāme bhattaṃ kata”nti vadanti, gehe ca gāme ca bhattaṃ nāma yassa kassaci
atk-vin02a1:349_9: hotīti nivattituṃ vaṭṭati. “Nivattatha, bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti sambandhaṃ katvā vadanti,
atk-vin02a1:349_10: nivattituṃ na vaṭṭati. Āsanasālato piṇḍāya carituṃ nikkhamante disvā “nisīdatha bhante
atk-vin02a1:349_11: bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Niccabhattanti dhuvabhattaṃ vuccati. “Niccabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:349_12: gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, bahūnampi ekato gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Salākabhattādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:350: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:353_0: 221. Tatiyasikkhāpade – na kho idaṃ orakaṃ bhavissati, yathayime manussā sakkaccaṃ
atk-vin02a1:353_1: bhattaṃ karontīti, yena niyāmena ime manussā sakkaccaṃ bhattaṃ karonti, tena ñāyati
atk-vin02a1:353_2: – “idaṃ sāsanaṃ idaṃ vā buddhappamukhe saṅghe dānaṃ na kho orakaṃ bhavissati, parittaṃ
atk-vin02a1:353_3: lāmakaṃ neva bhavissatī”ti. Kirapatikoti ettha “kiro”ti tassa kulaputtassa nāmaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:353_4: adhipaccaṭṭhena pana “kirapatiko”ti vuccati. So kira issaro adhipati māsautusaṃvaccharaniyāmena
atk-vin02a1:353_5: vetanaṃ datvā kammakārake kammaṃ kāreti. Badarā paṭiyattāti upacāravasena vadati.
atk-vin02a1:355_0: 226. Mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa dammīti ayaṃ bhattavikappanā nāma sammukhāpi
atk-vin02a1:355_1: parammukhāpi vaṭṭati. Sammukhā disvā “tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ, adisvā
atk-vin02a1:355_2: pañcasu sahadhammikesu “itthannāmassa vikappemī”ti vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Mahāpaccariyādīsu
atk-vin02a1:355_3: pana parammukhāvikappanāva vuttā. Sā cāyaṃ yasmā vinayakammena saṅgahitā, tasmā bhagavato
atk-vin02a1:355_4: vikappetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Bhagavati hi gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnepi saṅghamajjhe nisinnepi
atk-vin02a1:355_5: saṅghena gaṇappahonake bhikkhū gahetvā taṃ taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sukatameva hoti, bhagavā
atk-vin02a1:355_6: neva kammaṃ kopeti; na sampādeti. Na kopeti dhammissarattā, na sampādeti agaṇapūrakattā.
atk-vin02a1:356_0: 229. Dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjatīti dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekapatte pakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a1:356_1: missetvā ekaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti attho. Dve tīṇi kulāni nimantetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīdāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:356_2: ito cito ca āharitvā bhattaṃ ākiranti, sūpabyañjanaṃ ākiranti, ekamissakaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:356_3: ettha anāpattīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sace pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti, pacchimaṃ
atk-vin02a1:356_4: pacchimaṃ upari, taṃ uparito paṭṭhāya bhuñjantassa āpatti. Hatthaṃ pana anto pavesetvā
atk-vin02a1:356_5: paṭhamanimantanato ekampi kabaḷaṃ uddharitvā bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya yathā tathā vā
atk-vin02a1:356_6: bhuñjantassa anāpatti. Sacepi tattha khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā ākiranti, yena ajjhotthataṃ
atk-vin02a1:356_7: bhattaṃ ekarasaṃ hoti, koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjantassa anāpattīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:356_8: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ vā labhitvā nisinnassa
atk-vin02a1:356_9: tattheva aññepi khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ vā ākiranti, khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato
atk-vin02a1:356_10: anāpatti. Bhuñjantena pana paṭhamaṃ laddhamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ vā bhattapiṇḍaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a1:356_11: koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sappipāyāsepi eseva nayo”ti.
atk-vin02a1:357_0: Mahāupāsako bhikkhuṃ nimanteti, tassa kulaṃ upagatassa upāsakopi tassa puttadārabhātikabhaginiādayopi
atk-vin02a1:357_1: attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ āharitvā patte pakkhipanti, upāsakena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ abhuñjitvā
atk-vin02a1:357_2: pacchā laddhaṃ bhuñjantassa “anāpattī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:357_3: pana vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ “sace pāṭekkaṃ pacanti, attano attano pakkabhattato
atk-vin02a1:357_4: āharitvā denti, tattha pacchā āhaṭaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ. Yadi pana
atk-vin02a1:357_5: sabbesaṃ ekova pāko hoti, paramparabhojanaṃ na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāupāsako nimantetvā
atk-vin02a1:357_6: nisīdāpeti, añño manusso pattaṃ gaṇhāti, na dātabbaṃ. Kiṃ bhante na dethāti? Nanu
atk-vin02a1:357_7: upāsaka tayā nimantitamhāti! Hotu bhante, laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjathāti vadati, bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:357_8: vaṭṭati. Aññena āharitvā bhatte dinne āpucchitvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:358_0: Anumodanaṃ katvā gacchantaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmā “svepi bhante āgaccheyyāthā”ti sabbe
atk-vin02a1:358_1: nimantenti, punadivase āgantvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Sabbehi
atk-vin02a1:358_2: nimantitattā. Eko bhikkhu piṇḍāya caranto bhattaṃ labhati, tamañño upāsako nimantetvā
atk-vin02a1:358_3: ghare nisīdāpeti, na ca tāva bhattaṃ sampajjati. Sace so bhikkhu piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-vin02a1:358_4: laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti. Abhutvā nisinne “kiṃ bhante na bhuñjasī”ti vutte
atk-vin02a1:358_5: “tayā nimantitattā”ti vatvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjatha bhante”ti vutto bhuñjati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:359_0: Sakalena gāmenāti sakalena gāmena ekato hutvā nimantitasseva yattha katthaci bhuñjato
atk-vin02a1:359_1: anāpatti. Pūgepi eseva nayo. Nimantiyamāno bhikkhaṃ gahessāmīti bhaṇatīti “bhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:359_2: gaṇhā”ti nimantiyamāno “na mayhaṃ tava bhattenattho, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a1:359_3: Ettha pana mahāpadumatthero āha – “evaṃ vadanto imasmiṃ sikkhāpade animantanaṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:359_4: sakkoti, bhuñjanatthāya pana okāso kato hotīti neva gaṇabhojanato na cārittato muccatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:359_5: Mahāsumatthero āha – “yadaggena animantanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, tadaggena neva gaṇabhojanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:360_0: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ ettha
atk-vin02a1:360_1: hi bhojanaṃ kiriyā, avikappanaṃ akiriyā, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:363_0: 230. Catutthasikkhāpade – kāṇamātāti kāṇāya mātā. Sā kirassā dhītā abhirūpā ahosi,
atk-vin02a1:363_1: ye ye taṃ passanti, te te rāgena kāṇā honti, rāgandhā hontīti attho. Tasmā paresaṃ
atk-vin02a1:363_2: kāṇabhāvakaraṇato “kāṇā”ti vissutā ahosi. Tassā vasena mātāpissā “kāṇamātā”ti pākaṭā
atk-vin02a1:363_3: jātā. Āgatanti āgamanaṃ. Kismiṃ viyāti kīdisaṃ viya; lajjanakaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:363_4: Rittahatthaṃ gantunti rittā hatthā asmiṃ gamane tadidaṃ rittahatthaṃ, taṃ rittahatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:363_5: gamanaṃ gantuṃ lajjanakaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Parikkhayaṃ agamāsīti upāsikā
atk-vin02a1:363_6: ariyasāvikā bhikkhū disvā santaṃ adātuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā tāva dāpesi, yāva sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:363_7: parikkhayaṃ agamāsi. Dhammiyā kathāyāti ettha kāṇāpi mātu atthāya desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a1:363_8: suṇantī desanāpariyosāne sotāpannā ahosi. Uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti āsanato uṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin02a1:363_9: gato. Sopi puriso “satthā kira kāṇamātāya nivesanaṃ agamāsī”ti sutvā kāṇaṃ ānetvā
atk-vin02a1:364_0: 231. Imasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ uppannamatte appaññatteyeva sikkhāpade pātheyyavatthu
atk-vin02a1:364_1: udapādi, tasmā anantarameva cetaṃ dassetuṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:364_2: Sopi ca upāsako ariyasāvakattā sabbameva dāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “parikkhayaṃ agamāsī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:365_0: 233. Yaṃkiñci paheṇakatthāyāti paṇṇākāratthāya paṭiyattaṃ yaṃkiñci atirasakamodakasakkhalikādi
atk-vin02a1:365_1: sabbaṃ idha pūvotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Yaṃkiñci pātheyyatthāyāti maggaṃ gacchantānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:365_3: idha manthotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Tato ce uttarinti sacepi tatiyaṃ pattaṃ thūpīkataṃ
atk-vin02a1:366_0: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvāti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhāya samapūre patte gahetvā.
atk-vin02a1:366_1: Amutra mayā dvattipattapūrāti ettha sace dve gahitā, “atra mayā dve pattapūrā paṭiggahitā,
atk-vin02a1:366_2: tvaṃ ekaṃ gaṇheyyāsī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tenāpi aññaṃ passitvā “paṭhamaṃ āgatena dve pattapūrā
atk-vin02a1:366_3: gahitā, mayā eko, mā tvaṃ gaṇhī”ti vattabbaṃ. Yena paṭhamaṃ eko gahito, tassāpi paramparārocane
atk-vin02a1:366_4: eseva nayo. Yena pana sayameva tayo gahitā, tena aññaṃ disvā “mā kho ettha paṭiggaṇhi”
atk-vin02a1:366_5: cceva vattabbaṃ. Paṭikkamanaṃ nīharitvāti āsanasālaṃ haritvā, āsanasālaṃ gacchantena
atk-vin02a1:366_6: ca chaḍḍitasālā na gantabbā. Yattha mahā bhikkhusaṅgho nisīdati, tattha gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:366_7: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “yā laddhaṭṭhānato āsannā āsanasālā, tattha gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:366_8: Attano ‘sandiṭṭhānaṃ vā sambhattānaṃ vā ekanikāyikānaṃ vā dassāmī’ti aññattha gantuṃ
atk-vin02a1:366_9: na labbhati. Sace panassa nibaddhanisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, dūrampi gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:367_0: Saṃvibhajitabbanti sace tayo pattapūrā gahitā, ekaṃ attano ṭhapetvā dve bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-vin02a1:367_1: dātabbā. Sacce dve gahitā, ekaṃ attano ṭhapetvā eko saṅghassa dātabbo, yathāmittaṃ
atk-vin02a1:367_2: pana dātuṃ na labbhati. Yena eko gahito, na tena kiñci akāmā dātabbaṃ, yathāruci kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:368_0: 235. Gamane paṭippassaddheti antarāmagge upaddavaṃ vā disvā anatthikatāya vā “mayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:368_1: idāni na pesissāma, na gamissāmā”ti evaṃ gamane paṭippassaddhe upacchinne. Ñātakānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:368_2: pavāritānanti etesaṃ bahumpi dentānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa anāpatti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana
atk-vin02a1:368_3: “tesampi pātheyyapaheṇakatthāya paṭiyattato pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:369: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:372_0: 236. Pañcamasikkhāpade – bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritāti brāhmaṇena “gaṇhatha, bhante,
atk-vin02a1:372_1: yāva icchathā”ti evaṃ yāvadatthapavāraṇāya, sayañca “alaṃ, āvuso, thokaṃ thokaṃ dehī”ti
atk-vin02a1:373: 237. Kākoravasaddanti kākānaṃ oravasaddaṃ; sannipatitvā viravantānaṃ saddaṃ. Alametaṃ sabbanti ettha tikāraṃ avatvāva “alametaṃ sabbaṃ” ettakaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:374_0: 238-9. Bhuttāvīti bhuttavā. Tattha ca yasmā yena ekampi sitthaṃ saṅkhāditvā vā asaṅkhāditvā
atk-vin02a1:374_1: vā ajjhoharitaṃ hoti, so “bhuttāvī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tenassa padabhājane “bhuttāvī
atk-vin02a1:374_2: nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Pavāritoti katapavāraṇo, katapaṭikkhepo.
atk-vin02a1:374_3: Sopi ca yasmā na paṭikkhepamattena, atha kho pañcaṅgavasena, tenassa padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:374_4: “pavārito nāma asanaṃ paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā “asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti iminā
atk-vin02a1:374_5: vippakatabhojano, “pavārito”ti vutto. Yo ca vippakatabhojano, tena kiñci bhuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:374_6: kiñci abhuttaṃ, yañca bhuttaṃ; taṃ sandhāya “bhuttāvī”tipi saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tasmā
atk-vin02a1:374_7: bhuttāvīvacanena visuṃ kañci atthasiddhiṃ na passāma. “Dirattatirattaṃ, chappañcavācāhī”tiādīsu
atk-vin02a1:374_8: pana dirattādivacanaṃ viya pavāritapadassa parivārakabhāvena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya
atk-vin02a1:375_0: Asanaṃ paññāyatītiādīsu vippakatabhojanaṃ dissati, bhuñjamāno ceso puggalo hotīti
atk-vin02a1:375_1: attho. Bhojanaṃ paññāyatīti pavāraṇappahonakabhojanaṃ dissati. Odanādīnaṃ ce aññataraṃ
atk-vin02a1:375_2: paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ hotīti attho. Hatthapāse ṭhitoti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:375_3: gaṇhitvā dāyako aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse hotīti attho. Abhiharatīti so ce dāyako
atk-vin02a1:375_4: tassa taṃ bhattaṃ kāyena abhiharatīti attho. Paṭikkhepo paññāyatīti paṭikkhepo dissati;
atk-vin02a1:375_5: tañce abhihaṭaṃ so bhikkhu kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipatīti attho. Evaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:375_6: aṅgānaṃ vasena pavārito nāma hotīti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:376: “Pañcahi upāli ākārehi pavāraṇā paññāyati – asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhito, abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:377_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – “asana”ntiādīsu tāva yañca asnāti yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse
atk-vin02a1:377_1: ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati, taṃ “odano, kummāso, sattu, maccho, maṃsa”nti imesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:377_2: aññatarameva veditabbaṃ. Tattha odano nāma – sāli, vīhi, yavo, godhumo, kaṅgu, varako,
atk-vin02a1:377_3: kudrūsakoti sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍulehi nibbatto. Tattha “sālī”ti antamaso nīvāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:377_4: upādāya sabbāpi sālijāti. “Vīhī”ti sabbāpi vīhijāti. “Yavagodhumesu” bhedo natthi.
atk-vin02a1:377_6: upādāya sabbā setavaṇṇā varakajāti. “Kudrūsako”ti kāḷako dravo ceva sāmākādibhedā
atk-vin02a1:378_0: Nīvāravarakacorakā cettha “dhaññānulomā”ti vadanti. Dhaññāni vā hontu dhaññānulomāni
atk-vin02a1:378_1: vā, etesaṃ vuttappabhedānaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā “bhattaṃ pacissāmā”ti
atk-vin02a1:378_2: vā “yāguṃ pacissāmā”ti vā “ambilapāyāsādīsu aññataraṃ pacissāmā”ti vā yaṃkiñci sandhāya
atk-vin02a1:378_3: pacantu, sace uṇhaṃ sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:378_4: odanasaṅgahameva gacchati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Sace odhi na paññāyati, yāgusaṅgahaṃ
atk-vin02a1:379_0: Yopi pāyāso vā paṇṇaphalakaḷīramissakā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato otāritamattā abbhuṇhā
atk-vin02a1:379_1: hoti, āvajjitvā pivituṃ sakkā, hatthena gahitokāsepi odhiṃ na dasseti, pavāraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:379_2: na janeti. Sace pana usumāya vigatāya sītalībhūtā ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati, odhiṃ dasseti,
atk-vin02a1:379_3: puna pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Pubbe tanubhāvo na rakkhati. Sacepi dadhitakkādīni āropetvā
atk-vin02a1:379_4: bahupaṇṇaphalakaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattāpi taṇḍulā pakkhittā honti, bhojanakāle
atk-vin02a1:379_5: ce odhi paññāyati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Ayāguke nimantane “yāguṃ dassāmā”ti bhatte udakakañjikakhīrādīni
atk-vin02a1:379_6: ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti. Kiñcāpi tanukā honti, pavāraṇaṃ janetiyeva. Sace
atk-vin02a1:379_7: pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti, yāgusaṅgahameva gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:379_8: Yāgusaṅgahaṃ gatepi tasmiṃ vā aññasmiṃ vā yattha macchamaṃsaṃ pakkhipanti, sace sāsapamattampi
atk-vin02a1:379_9: macchamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ vā nhāru vā paññāyati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti.
atk-vin02a1:380_0: Suddharasako pana rasakayāgu vā na janeti. Ṭhapetvā vuttadhaññānaṃ taṇḍule aññehi
atk-vin02a1:380_1: veṇutaṇḍulādīhi vā kandamūlaphalehi vā yehi kehici kataṃ bhattampi pavāraṇaṃ na janeti,
atk-vin02a1:380_2: pageva ghanayāgu. Sace panettha macchamaṃsaṃ pakkhipanti, janeti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:380_3: “pupphaatthāya bhattampi pavāraṇaṃ janetī”ti vuttaṃ. Pupphiatthāya bhattaṃ nāma pupphikhajjakatthāya
atk-vin02a1:380_4: kuthitatūdake pakkhipitvā seditataṇḍulā vuccanti. Sace pana te taṇḍule sukkhāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:380_5: khādanti, vaṭṭati; neva sattusaṅkhyaṃ na bhattasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Puna tehi katabhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:380_6: pavāretiyeva. Te taṇḍule sappitelādīsu vā pacanti, pūvaṃ vā karonti, na pavārenti.
atk-vin02a1:380_7: Puthukā vā tāhi katasattubhattādīni vā na pavārenti.
atk-vin02a1:381_0: Kummāso nāma yavehi katakummāso. Aññehi pana muggādīhi katakummāso pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
atk-vin02a1:381_1: Sattu nāma sālivīhiyavehi katasattu. Kaṅguvarakakudrūsakasīsānipi bhajjitvā īsakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:381_2: koṭṭetvā thuse palāpetvā puna daḷhaṃ koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karonti. Sacepi taṃ allattā
atk-vin02a1:381_3: ekābaddhaṃ hoti, sattusaṅgahameva gacchati. Kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ taṇḍule
atk-vin02a1:381_4: koṭṭetvā denti, tampi cuṇṇaṃ sattusaṅgahameva gacchati. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:381_5: vīhīnaṃ vā vīhipalāpānaṃ vā taṇḍulā bhajjitataṇḍulā eva vā na pavārenti. Tesaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:381_6: taṇḍulādīnaṃ cuṇṇaṃ pavāreti. Kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ kuṇḍakampi pavāreti. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:381_7: pana ātapasukkhānaṃ vā kuṇḍakaṃ na pavāreti. Lājā vā tehi katabhattasattuādīni vā
atk-vin02a1:381_8: na pavārenti. Bhajjitapiṭṭhaṃ vā yaṃkiñci suddhakhajjakaṃ vā na pavāreti. Macchamaṃsapūritakhajjakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:381_9: pana sattumodako vā pavāreti. Maccho maṃsañca pākaṭameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – sacepi
atk-vin02a1:381_10: yāguṃ pivantassa yāgusitthamattāneva dve macchakhaṇḍāni vā maṃsakhaṇḍāni vā ekabhājane
atk-vin02a1:381_11: vā nānābhājane vā denti, tāni ce akhādanto aññaṃ yaṃkiñci pavāraṇappahonakaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:381_12: na pavāreti. Tato ekaṃ khāditaṃ, ekaṃ hatthe vā patte vā hoti, so ce aññaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:381_13: pavāreti. Dvepi khāditāni honti, mukhe sāsapamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ natthi, sacepi aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:382_0: Kappiyamaṃsaṃ khādanto kappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti. Kappiyamaṃsaṃ khādanto
atk-vin02a1:382_1: akappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kasmā? Avatthutāya. Yañhi bhikkhuno khādituṃ
atk-vin02a1:382_2: vaṭṭati, taṃyeva paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Idaṃ pana jānanto akappiyattā paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:382_3: ajānantopi paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitameva paṭikkhipati nāma, tasmā na pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:382_4: Sace pana akappiyamaṃsaṃ khādanto kappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti. Kasmā? Vatthutāya.
atk-vin02a1:382_5: Yañhi tena paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ pavāraṇāya vatthu. Yaṃ pana khādati, taṃ kiñcāpi paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:382_6: ṭhitaṃ, khādiyamānaṃ pana maṃsabhāvaṃ na jahati, tasmā pavāreti. Akappiyamaṃsaṃ khādanto
atk-vin02a1:382_7: akappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, purimanayeneva na pavāreti. Kappiyamaṃsaṃ vā akappiyamaṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a1:382_8: vā khādanto pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ yaṃkiñci kappiyabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:382_10: anesanāya uppannaṃ akappiyabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kappiyabhojanaṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:382_11: akappiyabhojanaṃ vā bhuñjantopi kappiyabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti. Akappiyabhojanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:382_12: paṭikkhipati, na pavāretīti sabbattha vuttanayeneva kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:383_0: Evaṃ “asana”ntiādīsu yañca asnāti, yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipanto
atk-vin02a1:383_1: pavāraṇaṃ āpajjati, taṃ ñatvā idāni yathā āpajjati, tassa jānanatthaṃ ayaṃ vinicchayo
atk-vin02a1:383_2: – “‘asanaṃ bhojana’nti ettha tāva yena ekasitthampi ajjhohaṭaṃ hoti, so sace pattamukhahatthānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:383_3: yattha katthaci pañcasu bhojanesu ekasmimpi sati aññaṃ pañcasu bhojanesu ekampi paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:383_4: pavāreti. Katthaci bhojanaṃ natthi, āmisagandhamattaṃ paññāyati, na pavāreti. Mukhe
atk-vin02a1:383_5: ca hatthe ca bhojanaṃ natthi, patte atthi, tasmiṃ pana āsane na bhuñjitukāmo, vihāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:383_6: pavisitvā bhuñjitukāmo, aññassa vā dātukāmo, tasmiṃ ce antare bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:383_7: na pavāreti. Kasmā? Vippakatabhojanabhāvassa upacchinnattā. Yopi aññatra gantvā bhuñjitukāmo
atk-vin02a1:383_8: mukhe bhattaṃ gilitvā sesaṃ ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge aññaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:383_9: tassāpi pavāraṇā na hotī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā ca patte; evaṃ hatthepi.
atk-vin02a1:383_10: Mukhepi vā vijjamānabhojanaṃ sace anajjhoharitukāmo hoti, tasmiñca khaṇe aññaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:383_11: na pavāreti. Ekasmiñhi pade vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sabbattha veditabbaṃ hoti. Apica kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:383_12: esa nayo dassitoyeva. Vuttañhi tattha “mukhe bhattaṃ gilitaṃ, hatthe bhattaṃ vighāsādassa
atk-vin02a1:383_13: dātukāmo, patte bhattaṃ bhikkhussa dātukāmo, sace tasmiṃ khaṇe paṭikkhipati, na pavāretī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:383_14: Hatthapāse ṭhitoti ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti, āsanassa pacchimantato paṭṭhāya,
atk-vin02a1:383_15: sace ṭhito, paṇhiantato paṭṭhāya, sace nipanno, yena passena nipanno, tassa pārimantato
atk-vin02a1:383_16: paṭṭhāya, dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:383_17: yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ, tassa orimantena paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyyahattho “hatthapāso”ti
atk-vin02a1:383_18: veditabbo. Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipantasseva pavāraṇā hoti, na tato paraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:384_0: Abhiharatīti hatthapāsabbhantare ṭhito gahaṇatthaṃ upanāmeti. Sace pana anantaranisinnopi
atk-vin02a1:384_1: bhikkhu hatthe vā ūrūsu vā ādhārake vā ṭhitapattaṃ anabhiharitvāva “bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti
atk-vin02a1:384_2: vadati, taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthi. Bhattapacchiṃ ānetvā purato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:384_3: “gaṇhāhī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Īsakaṃ pana uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā vā “gaṇhathā”ti
atk-vin02a1:384_4: vutte paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Therāsane nisinno thero dūre nisinnassa daharabhikkhussa
atk-vin02a1:384_5: pattaṃ pesetvā “ito odanaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadati, gaṇhitvā pana gato tuṇhī tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:384_6: daharo “alaṃ mayha”nti paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kasmā? Therassa dūrabhāvato dūtassa
atk-vin02a1:384_7: ca anabhiharaṇatoti. Sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu “idaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a1:385_0: Parivesanāya eko ekena hatthena odanapacchiṃ ekena kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā bhikkhū parivisati,
atk-vin02a1:385_1: tatra ce añño āgantvā “ahaṃ pacchiṃ dhāressāmi, tvaṃ odanaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gahitamattakameva
atk-vin02a1:385_2: karoti, parivesako eva pana taṃ dhāreti, tasmā sā abhihaṭāva hoti. Tato dātukāmatāya
atk-vin02a1:385_3: gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hoti. Sace pana parivisakena phuṭṭhamattāva hoti,
atk-vin02a1:385_4: itarova naṃ dhāreti, tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:385_5: Kaṭacchunā uddhaṭabhatte pana hoti. Kaṭacchuabhihāroyeva hi tassa abhihāro. Dvinnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:385_6: samabhārepi paṭikkhipanto pavāretiyevāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Anantarassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin02a1:385_7: bhatte diyyamāne itaro pattaṃ hatthehi pidahati, pavāraṇā natthi. Kasmā? Aññassa
atk-vin02a1:386: Paṭikkhepo paññāyatīti ettha vācāya abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthi. Kāyena abhihaṭaṃ pana kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotīti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:387_0: Tattha kāyena paṭikkhepo nāma aṅguliṃ vā hatthaṃ vā macchikabījaniṃ vā cīvarakaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:387_1: vā cāleti, bhamukāya vā ākāraṃ karoti, kuddho vā oloketi, vācāya paṭikkhepo nāma
atk-vin02a1:387_2: “ala”nti vā, “na gaṇhāmī”ti vā, “mā ākirā”ti vā, “apagacchā”ti vā vadati; evaṃ yena
atk-vin02a1:387_3: kenaci ākārena kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhitte pavāraṇā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:388_0: Eko abhihaṭe bhatte pavāraṇāya bhīto hattha apanetvā punappunaṃ patte odanaṃ ākirantaṃ
atk-vin02a1:388_1: “ākira ākira koṭṭetvā pūrehī”ti vadati, ettha kathanti? Mahāsumatthero tāva “anākiraṇatthāya
atk-vin02a1:388_2: vuttattā pavāraṇā hotī”ti āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana “‘ākira pūrehī’ti vadantassa
atk-vin02a1:388_3: nāma ‘kassaci pavāraṇā atthī’ti vatvā ‘na pavāretī”’ti āha. Aparo bhattaṃ abhiharantaṃ
atk-vin02a1:388_4: bhikkhuṃ sallakkhetvā “kiṃ āvuso itopi kiñci gaṇhissasi, dammi te kiñcī”ti āha. Tatrāpi
atk-vin02a1:388_5: “‘evaṃ nāgamissatī’ti vuttattā ‘pavāraṇā hotī”’ti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero
atk-vin02a1:388_6: pana “‘gaṇhissasī’ti vadantassa nāma ‘kassaci pavāraṇā atthī’ti vatvā ‘na pavāretī”’ti āha.
atk-vin02a1:389_0: Eko samaṃsakaṃ rasaṃ abhiharitvā “rasaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, taṃ sutvā paṭikkhipato
atk-vin02a1:389_1: pavāraṇā natthi. “Maccharasaṃ maṃsarasa”nti vutte paṭikkhipato hoti, “idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-vin02a1:389_2: vuttepi hotiyeva. Maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā “maṃsarasaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, tattha ce sāsapamattampi
atk-vin02a1:389_3: maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ atthi, taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Sace pana parissāvito hoti, “vaṭṭatī”ti abhayatthero āha.
atk-vin02a1:390_0: Maṃsarasena āpucchantaṃ mahāthero “muhuttaṃ āgamehī”ti vatvā “thālakaṃ āvuso āharā”ti
atk-vin02a1:390_1: āha. Ettha kathanti? Mahāsumatthero tāva “abhihārakassa gamanaṃ paṭhamaṃ upacchinnaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:390_2: tasmā pavāretī”ti āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana “ayaṃ kuhiṃ gacchati, kīdisaṃ etassa
atk-vin02a1:390_3: gamanaṃ, gaṇhantassāpi nāma pavāraṇā atthī”ti vatvā “na pavāretī”ti āha. Kaḷīrapanasādīhi
atk-vin02a1:390_4: missetvā maṃsaṃ pacanti, taṃ gahetvā “kaḷīrasūpaṃ gaṇhatha, panasabyañjanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-vin02a1:390_5: vadanti, evampi na pavāreti. Kasmā? Apavāraṇārahassa nāmena vuttattā. Sace pana “macchasūpaṃ
atk-vin02a1:390_6: maṃsasūpa”nti vā “imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā vadanti, pavāreti. Maṃsakarambako nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a1:390_7: taṃ dātukāmopi “karambakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati; na pavāreti. “Maṃsakarambaka”nti
atk-vin02a1:390_8: vā “ida”nti vā vutte pana pavāreti. Eseva nayo sabbesu macchamaṃsamissakesu.
atk-vin02a1:391_0: Yo pana nimantane bhuñjamāno maṃsaṃ abhihaṭaṃ “uddissa kata”nti maññamāno paṭikkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:391_1: pavāritova hotīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Missakakathā pana kurundiyaṃ suṭṭhu vuttā.
atk-vin02a1:391_2: Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ – piṇḍapātacāriko bhikkhu bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ
atk-vin02a1:391_3: gaṇhathā”ti vadati, na pavāreti. “Bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte pavāreti. Kasmā? Yenāpucchito,
atk-vin02a1:391_4: tassa atthitāya. Ayamettha adhippāyo – “yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, tatra ce
atk-vin02a1:391_5: yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā, na pavāreti. Yāgu mandā, bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ, pavāreti.
atk-vin02a1:391_6: Idañca sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ, kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:391_7: “Bhattamissakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, bhattaṃ bahukaṃ vā samaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:391_8: pavāretiyeva. Bhattaṃ vā yāguṃ vā anāmasitvā “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, tatra
atk-vin02a1:391_9: ce bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samakaṃ vā hoti, pavāreti. Appataraṃ na pavāreti. Idañca
atk-vin02a1:391_10: karambakena na samānetabbaṃ. Karambako hi maṃsamissakopi hoti amaṃsamissakopi, tasmā
atk-vin02a1:391_11: “karambaka”nti vutte pavāraṇā natthi. Idaṃ pana bhattamissakameva. Ettha vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:391_12: pavāraṇā hoti. Bahurase bhatte rasaṃ, bahukhīre khīraṃ bahusappimhi ca pāyāse sappiṃ
atk-vin02a1:391_13: gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā deti, taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthi.
atk-vin02a1:392_0: Yo pana gacchanto pavāreti, so gacchantova bhuñjituṃ labhati. Kaddamaṃ vā udakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:392_1: vā patvā ṭhitena atirittaṃ kāretabbaṃ. Sace antarā nadī pūrā hoti, nadītīre gumbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:392_2: anupariyāyantena bhuñjitabbaṃ. Atha nāvā vā setu vā atthi, taṃ abhiruhitvāpi caṅkamantenava
atk-vin02a1:392_3: bhuñjitabbaṃ, gamanaṃ na upacchinditabbaṃ. Yāne vā hatthiassapiṭṭhe vā candamaṇḍale
atk-vin02a1:392_4: vā sūriyamaṇḍale vā nisīditvā pavāritena yāva majjhanhikaṃ, tāva tesu gacchantesupi
atk-vin02a1:392_5: nisinneneva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Yo ṭhito pavāreti, ṭhiteneva, yo nisinno pavāreti, nisinneneva
atk-vin02a1:392_6: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Taṃ taṃ iriyāpathaṃ kopentena atirittaṃ kāretabbaṃ. Yo ukkuṭiko nisīditvā
atk-vin02a1:392_7: pavāreti, tena ukkuṭikeneva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Tassa pana heṭṭhā palālapīṭhaṃ vā kiñci
atk-vin02a1:392_8: vā nisīdanakaṃ dātabbaṃ. Pīṭhake nisīditvā pavāritena āsanaṃ acāletvāva catasso disā
atk-vin02a1:392_9: parivattantena bhuñjituṃ labbhati. Mañce nisīditvā pavāritena ito vā etto vā saṃsarituṃ
atk-vin02a1:392_10: na labbhati. Sace pana naṃ saha mañcena ukkhipitvā aññatra nenti, vaṭṭati. Nipajjitvā
atk-vin02a1:392_11: pavāritena nipanneneva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Parivattantena yena passena nipanno, tassa ṭhānaṃ nātikkametabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:393_0: Anatirittanti na atirittaṃ; na adhikanti attho. Taṃ pana yasmā kappiyakatādīhi sattahi
atk-vin02a1:393_1: vinayakammākārehi akataṃ vā gilānassa anadhikaṃ vā hoti, tasmā padabhājane “akappiyakata”ntiādi
atk-vin02a1:393_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha akappiyakatanti yaṃ tattha phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappehi
atk-vin02a1:393_3: kappiyaṃ akataṃ; yañca akappiyamaṃsaṃ vā akappiyabhojanaṃ vā, etaṃ akappiyaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a1:393_4: Taṃ akappiyaṃ “alametaṃ sabba”nti evaṃ atirittaṃ katampi akappiyakatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:393_5: Appaṭiggahitakatanti bhikkhunā appaṭiggahitaṃyeva purimanayeneva atirittaṃ kataṃ.
atk-vin02a1:393_6: Anuccāritakatanti kappiyaṃ kārāpetuṃ āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi anukkhittaṃ vā anapanāmitaṃ
atk-vin02a1:393_7: vā kataṃ. Ahatthapāse katanti kappiyaṃ kārāpetuṃ āgatassa hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitena
atk-vin02a1:393_8: kataṃ. Abhuttāvinā katanti yo “alametaṃ sabba”nti atirittaṃ karoti, tena pavāraṇappahonakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:393_9: bhojanaṃ abhuttena kataṃ. Bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena katanti idaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:393_10: Alametaṃ sabbanti avuttanti vacībhedaṃ katvā evaṃ avuttaṃ hoti. Iti imehi sattahi
atk-vin02a1:393_11: vinayakammākārehi yaṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ akataṃ, yañca na gilānātirittaṃ, tadubhayampi
atk-vin02a1:394_0: Atirittaṃ pana tasseva paṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṃ. Apicettha bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotīti
atk-vin02a1:394_1: anantare nisinnassa sabhāgassa bhikkhuno pattato ekampi sitthaṃ vā maṃsahīraṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:394_2: khāditvā katampi bhuttāvināva kataṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Āsanā avuṭṭhitenāti ettha
atk-vin02a1:394_3: pana asammohatthaṃ ayaṃ vinicchayo – dve bhikkhū pātova bhuñjamānā pavāritā honti
atk-vin02a1:394_4: – ekena tattheva nisīditabbaṃ, itarena niccabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā ānetvā upaḍḍhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:394_5: tassa bhikkhuno patte ākiritvā hatthaṃ dhovitvā sesaṃ tena bhikkhunā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:394_6: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Yañhi tassa hatthe laggaṃ, taṃ akappiyaṃ hoti. Sace pana paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:394_7: nisinno bhikkhu sayameva tassa pattato hatthena gaṇhāti, hatthadhovanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:394_8: Sace pana evaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjantassa puna kiñci byañjanaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:394_9: vā patte ākiranti, yena paṭhamaṃ kappiyaṃ kataṃ, so puna kātuṃ na labhati. Yena akataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:394_10: tena kātabbaṃ. Yañca akataṃ, taṃ kātabbaṃ. “Yena akata”nti aññena bhikkhunā yena
atk-vin02a1:394_11: paṭhamaṃ na kataṃ, tena kātabbaṃ. “Yañca akata”nti yena paṭhamaṃ kappiyaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:394_12: tenāpi yaṃ akataṃ taṃ kātabbaṃ. Paṭhamabhājane pana kātuṃ na labbhati. Tattha hi
atk-vin02a1:394_13: kariyamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ kataṃ hoti, tasmā aññasmiṃ bhājane kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
atk-vin02a1:394_14: adhippāyo. Evaṃ kataṃ pana tena bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:395_0: Kappiyaṃ karontena ca na kevalaṃ patteyeva, kuṇḍepi pacchiyampi yattha katthaci purato
atk-vin02a1:395_1: ṭhapetvā onāmitabhājane kātabbaṃ. Taṃ sacepi bhikkhusataṃ pavāritaṃ hoti, sabbesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:395_2: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, appavāritānampi vaṭṭati. Yena pana kappiyaṃ kataṃ, tassa na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:395_3: Sacepi pavāretvā piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ pattaṃ gahetvā avassaṃ bhuñjanake maṅgalanimantane
atk-vin02a1:395_4: nisīdāpenti, atirittaṃ kāretvāva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace tattha añño bhikkhu natthi, āsanasālaṃ
atk-vin02a1:395_5: vā vihāraṃ vā pattaṃ pesetvā kāretabbaṃ. Kappiyaṃ karontena pana anupasampannassa
atk-vin02a1:395_6: hatthe ṭhitaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Sace āsanasālāyaṃ abyatto bhikkhu hoti, sayaṃ gantvā kappiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:396_0: Gilānātirittanti ettha na kevalaṃ yaṃ gilānassa bhuttāvasesaṃ hoti, taṃ gilānātirittaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:396_1: atha kho yaṃkiñci gilānaṃ uddissa ajja vā sve vā yadā vā icchati, tadā khādissatīti
atk-vin02a1:396_2: āhaṭaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ “gilānātiritta”nti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ yāmakālikādīsu ajjhohāre ajjhohāre
atk-vin02a1:396_3: dukkaṭaṃ, taṃ asaṃsaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ. Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhāni honti, āhāratthāyapi
atk-vin02a1:397_0: 241. Sati paccayeti yāmakālikaṃ pipāsāya sati pipāsacchedanatthaṃ, sattāhakālikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:397_1: yāvajīvikañca tena tena upasametabbake ābādhe sati tassa upasamanatthaṃ paribhuñjato
atk-vin02a1:398: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:401_0: 242. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpade – anācāraṃ ācaratīti paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karoti. Upanandhīti
atk-vin02a1:401_1: upanāhaṃ janento tasmiṃ puggale attano kodhaṃ bandhi; punappunaṃ āghātaṃ janesīti
atk-vin02a1:401_2: attho. Upanaddho bhikkhūti so janitaupanāho bhikkhu.
atk-vin02a1:402_0: 243. Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyāti abhiharitvā “handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:402_1: pavāreyya. Padabhājane pana “handa bhikkhū”tiādiṃ anuddharitvā sādhāraṇameva abhihaṭṭhuṃ
atk-vin02a1:402_2: pavāraṇāya atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yāvatakaṃ icchasi tāvatakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vuttaṃ. Jānanti
atk-vin02a1:402_3: pavāritabhāvaṃ jānanto. Taṃ panassa jānanaṃ yasmā tīhākārehi hoti, tasmā “jānāti
atk-vin02a1:402_4: nāma sāmaṃ vā jānātī”tiādinā nayena padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Āsādanāpekkhoti āsādanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:403_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti yassa abhihaṭaṃ tasmiṃ paṭiggaṇhante abhihārakassa
atk-vin02a1:403_1: bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ. Itarassa pana sabbo āpattibhedo paṭhamasikkhāpade vutto, imasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:403_2: pana sikkhāpade sabbā āpattiyo abhihārakasseva veditabbā. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade
atk-vin02a1:404: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:407_0: 247. Sattamasikkhāpade – giraggasamajjoti girimhi aggasamajjo, girissa vā aggadese
atk-vin02a1:407_1: samajjo. So kira sattame divase bhavissatīti nagare ghosanā kariyati, nagarassa bahiddhā
atk-vin02a1:407_2: same bhūmibhāge pabbatacchāyāya mahājanakāyo sannipatati, anekappakārāni naṭanāṭakāni
atk-vin02a1:407_3: pavattanti, tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ mañcātimañce bandhanti. Sattarasavaggiyā apaññatte
atk-vin02a1:407_4: sikkhāpade daharāva upasampannā, te “nāṭakāni āvuso passissāmā”ti tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:407_5: Atha nesaṃ ñātakā “amhākaṃ ayyā āgatā”ti tuṭṭhacittā nhāpetvā vilimpetvā bhojetvā
atk-vin02a1:407_6: aññampi pūvakhādanīyādiṃ hatthe adaṃsu. Te sandhāya vuttaṃ – “manussā sattarasavaggiye
atk-vin02a1:408_0: 248-9. Vikāleti vigate kāle. Kāloti bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanakālo adhippeto, so ca sabbantimena
atk-vin02a1:408_1: paricchedena majjhanhiko, tasmiṃ vītivatteti adhippāyo. Tenevassa padabhājane “vikālo
atk-vin02a1:408_2: nāma majjhanhike vītivatte yāva aruṇuggamanā”ti vuttaṃ, ṭhitamajjhanhikopi kālasaṅgahaṃ
atk-vin02a1:408_3: gacchati. Tato paṭṭhāya pana khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā na sakkā, sahasā pivituṃ sakkā
atk-vin02a1:408_4: bhaveyya, kukkuccakena pana na kattabbaṃ. Kālaparicchedajānanatthañca kālatthambho
atk-vin02a1:409_0: Avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmāti ettha yaṃ tāva sakkhalimodakādipubbaṇṇāparaṇṇamayaṃ, tattha
atk-vin02a1:409_1: vattabbameva natthi. Yampi vanamūlādippabhedaṃ āmisagatikaṃ hoti, seyyathidaṃ – mūlakhādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:410_0: Tattha pana āmisagatikasallakkhaṇatthaṃ idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ – mūlakhādanīye
atk-vin02a1:410_1: tāva mūlakamūlaṃ khārakamūlaṃ caccumūlaṃ tambakamūlaṃ taṇḍuleyyakamūlaṃ vatthuleyyakamūlaṃ
atk-vin02a1:410_2: vajakalimūlaṃ jajjharīmūlanti evamādīni sūpeyyapaṇṇamūlāni āmisagatikāni. Ettha ca
atk-vin02a1:410_3: vajakalimūle jaraṭṭhaṃ chinditvā chaḍḍenti, taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ hoti. Aññampi evarūpaṃ
atk-vin02a1:410_4: eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ. Mūlakakhārakajajjharīmūlānaṃ pana jaraṭṭhānipi āmisagatikānevāti
atk-vin02a1:411_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mūlāni bhesajjāni haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ
atk-vin02a1:411_1: kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni
atk-vin02a1:411_2: neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
atk-vin02a1:412_0: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ cūḷapañcamūlaṃ mahāpañcamūlantiādinā nayena gaṇiyamānānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:412_1: gaṇanāya anto natthi. Khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇābhāvoyeva pana tesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:412_2: lakkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā yaṃkiñci mūlaṃ tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:412_3: khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharati, taṃ yāvakālikaṃ; itaraṃ yāvajīvikanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:412_4: Tesu bahuṃ vatvāpi hi imasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe ṭhātabbaṃ. Nāmasaññāsu pana vuccamānāsu
atk-vin02a1:412_5: taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva hoti, tasmā nāmasaññāya ādaraṃ akatvā lakkhaṇameva dassitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:413_0: Yathā ca mūle; evaṃ kandādīsupi yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ, tasseva vasena vinicchayo
atk-vin02a1:413_1: veditabbo. Yañca taṃ pāḷiyaṃ haliddādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa khandhatacapupphaphalampi
atk-vin02a1:414_0: Kandakhādanīye duvidho kando – dīgho ca rasso ca bhisakiṃsukakandādi vaṭṭo uppalakaserukakandādi,
atk-vin02a1:414_1: yaṃ “gaṇṭhī”tipi vadanti. Tattha sabbesaṃ kandānaṃ jiṇṇajaraṭṭhānañca challi ca sukhumamūlāni
atk-vin02a1:414_2: ca yāvajīvikāni. Taruṇo pana sukhakhādanīyo, sālakalyāṇīpotakakando kiṃsukapotakakando
atk-vin02a1:414_3: ambāṭakakando ketakakando māluvakando bhisasaṅkhāto padumapuṇḍarīkakando piṇḍālumasāluādayo
atk-vin02a1:414_4: ca khīravallikando āluvakando siggukando tālakando nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:414_5: kandā kadalikando veḷukando kaserukakandoti evamādayo tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
atk-vin02a1:415_0: Khīravallikando adhoto yāvajīviko, dhoto yāvakāliko. Khīrakākolījīvikausabhakalasuṇādikandā
atk-vin02a1:415_1: pana yāvajīvikā. Te pāḷiyaṃ – “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:416_0: Mūḷālakhādanīye pana padumamūḷālaṃ puṇḍarīkamuḷālasadisameva. Erakamūlaṃ kandulamūlanti
atk-vin02a1:416_1: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca
atk-vin02a1:416_3: pana yāvajīvikaṃ, taṃ sabbampi pāḷiyaṃ – “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti
atk-vin02a1:417_1: kaḷīrasaṅkhātā matthakā veṇukaḷīro naḷakaḷīro ucchukaḷīro mūlakakaḷīro sāsapakaḷīro
atk-vin02a1:417_2: satāvarikaḷīro sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ kaḷīrāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
atk-vin02a1:417_3: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako rukkhavalliādīnaṃ matthako yāvakāliko.
atk-vin02a1:418_1: khandhakāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:418_2: bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako khandho yāvakāliko. Uppalajātīnaṃ paṇṇadaṇḍako padumajātīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:418_3: sabbopi daṇḍako kāravindakadaṇḍādayo ca avasesasabbakhandhā yāvajīvikā.
atk-vin02a1:419: Tacakhādanīye ucchutacova eko yāvakāliko, sopi saraso. Seso sabbo yāvajīviko. Tesaṃ pana matthakakhandhatacānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:420_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimbakasāvaṃ, kuṭajakasāvaṃ, paṭolakasāvaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:420_1: phaggavakasāvaṃ nattamālakasāvaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva
atk-vin02a1:420_2: khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:421: Ettha hi etesampi saṅgaho sijjhati. Vuttakasāvāni ca sabbāni kappiyānīti veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a1:422_0: Pattakhādanīye mūlakaṃ khārako caccu tambako taṇḍuleyyako papunnāgo vatthuleyyako
atk-vin02a1:422_1: vajakali jajjharī sellu siggu kāsamaddako ummā cīnamuggo māso rājamāso ṭhapetvā mahānipphāvaṃ
atk-vin02a1:422_2: avasesanipphāvo aggimantho sunisannako setavaraṇo nāḷikā bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti etesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:422_3: pattāni aññāni ca evarūpāni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:422_4: bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni pattāni ekaṃsena yāvakālikāni. Yā panaññā mahānakhapiṭṭhimattā
atk-vin02a1:422_5: paṇṇaloṇi rukkhe ca gacche ca ārohati, tassā pattaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ. Brahmīpattañca yāvakālikanti
atk-vin02a1:422_6: dīpavāsino vadanti. Ambapallavaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, asokapallavaṃ pana yāvajīvikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:424_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:424_1: kappāsakapaṇṇaṃ yāni vā panaññānipi atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:425_0: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Na kevalañca paṇṇāniyeva tesaṃ pupphaphalādīnipi yāvajīvikāni.
atk-vin02a1:425_1: Paṇṇānaṃ phaggavapaṇṇaṃ ajjukapaṇṇaṃ phaṇijjakapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ tambūlapaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:426_0: Pupphakhādanīye mūlakapupphaṃ khārakapupphaṃ caccupupphaṃ tambakapupphaṃ vajakalipupphaṃ
atk-vin02a1:426_2: taruṇapupphāni setavaraṇapupphaṃ siggupupphaṃ uppalapadumajātikānaṃ pupphāni kaṇṇikamattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:426_3: agandhikapupphaṃ kaḷīrapupphaṃ jīvantīpupphanti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
atk-vin02a1:426_5: pana pupphaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ tassa gaṇanāya anto natthi. Pāḷiyaṃ panassa kasāvabhesajjeneva saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:427_1: phalāni yāni loke tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:427_2: bhojanīyatthañca pharanti, sabbāni tāni yāvakālikāni. Nāmagaṇanavasena nesaṃ na sakkā
atk-vin02a1:428_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, phalāni bhesajjāni – bilaṅgaṃ, pipphaliṃ, maricaṃ, harītakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:428_1: vibhītakaṃ, āmalakaṃ, goṭṭhaphalaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni
atk-vin02a1:428_2: neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
atk-vin02a1:429: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Tesampi aparipakkāni acchiva bimbavaraṇaketakakāsmarīādīnaṃ phalāni jātiphalaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ eḷā takkolanti evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:430_0: Aṭṭhikhādanīye labujaṭṭhi panasaṭṭhi ambāṭakaṭṭhi sālaṭṭhi khajjūrīketakatimbarūsakānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:430_1: taruṇaphalaṭṭhi tintiṇikaṭṭhi bimbaphalaṭṭhi uppala padumajātīnaṃ pokkharaṭṭhīti
atk-vin02a1:430_2: evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu manussānaṃ pakatiāhāravasena khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
atk-vin02a1:430_3: pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikāni. Madhukaṭṭhi punnāgaṭṭhi harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīni siddhatthakaṭṭhi
atk-vin02a1:430_4: rājikaṭṭhīti evamādīni aṭṭhīni yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ phalabhesajjeneva saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:431_0: Piṭṭhakhādanīye sattannaṃ tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:431_2: evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
atk-vin02a1:431_3: pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni. Adhotakaṃ tālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhaṃ assagandhādipiṭṭhāni
atk-vin02a1:431_4: ca yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvehi ca mūlaphalehi ca saṅghaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:432_0: Niyyāsakhādanīye eko ucchuniyyāsova sattāhakāliko. Sesā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, jatūni
atk-vin02a1:432_1: bhesajjāni – hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatuṃ hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ takaṃ takapattiṃ takapaṇṇiṃ sajjulasaṃ
atk-vin02a1:432_2: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaniyyāsā yāvajīvikā.
atk-vin02a1:432_3: Tattha yevāpanakavasena saṅgahitānaṃ ambaniyyāso kaṇikāraniyyāsoti evaṃ nāmavasena
atk-vin02a1:432_4: na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ. Evaṃ imesu mūlakhādanīyādīsu yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:432_5: sabbampi imasmiṃ atthe “avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmā”ti saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:433_0: Bhojanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanānītiādimhi yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ vuttameva. Khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti,
atk-vin02a1:433_1: paṭiggaṇhātīti yo bhikkhu vikāle etaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyañca paṭiggaṇhāti, tassa
atk-vin02a1:433_2: paṭiggahaṇe tāva āpatti dukkaṭassa. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:434: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:437_0: 252. Aṭṭhamasikkhāpade – belaṭṭhasīso nāma jaṭilasahassabbhantaro mahāthero. Araññe
atk-vin02a1:437_1: viharatīti jetavanassa avidūre padhānaghare ekasmiṃ āvāse vasati. Sukkhakuranti asūpabyañjanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:437_2: odanaṃ. So kira antogāme bhuñjitvā pacchā piṇḍāya caritvā tādisaṃ odanaṃ āharati,
atk-vin02a1:437_3: tañca kho appicchatāya, na paccayagiddhatāya. Thero kira sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā
atk-vin02a1:437_4: vītināmetvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ udakena temetvā bhuñjati, tato puna
atk-vin02a1:437_5: sattāhaṃ samāpattiyā nisīdati. Evaṃ dvepi tīṇipi cattāripi sattāhāni vītināmetvā
atk-vin02a1:437_6: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati. Tena vuttaṃ – “cirena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:438_0: 253. Kāro karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekaṃ, sannidhikāro assāti sannidhikāraṃ; sannidhikārameva
atk-vin02a1:438_1: sannidhikārakaṃ. Paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenevassa padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:439_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ sannidhikataṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:439_1: vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe tāva āpatti dukkaṭassa. Ajjhoharato
atk-vin02a1:439_2: pana ekamekasmiṃ ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ. Sacepi patto duddhoto hoti, yaṃ aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa
atk-vin02a1:439_3: lekhā paññāyati, gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti, so uṇhe otāpentassa
atk-vin02a1:439_4: paggharati, uṇhayāguyā vā gahitāya sandissati, tādise pattepi punadivase bhuñjantassa
atk-vin02a1:439_5: pācittiyaṃ. Tasmā pattaṃ dhovitvā puna tattha acchodakaṃ vā āsiñcitvā aṅguliyā vā
atk-vin02a1:439_6: ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo jānitabbo. Sace hi udake vā snehabhāvo patte vā aṅgulilekhā
atk-vin02a1:439_7: paññāyati, duddhoto hoti. Telavaṇṇapatte pana aṅgulilekhā paññāyati, sā abbohārikā.
atk-vin02a1:439_8: Yaṃ bhikkhū nirapekkhā sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajanti, tañce sāmaṇerā nidahitvā denti,
atk-vin02a1:439_9: sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭati. Tato
atk-vin02a1:440_0: Akappiyamaṃsesu manussamaṃse thullaccayena sadviṃ pācittiyaṃ, avasesesu dukkaṭena
atk-vin02a1:440_1: saddhiṃ. Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye ajjhoharato pācittiyaṃ. Āhāratthāya ajjhoharato
atk-vin02a1:440_2: dukkaṭena saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sace pavārito hutvā anatirittakataṃ ajjhoharati, pakatiāmise
atk-vin02a1:440_3: dve pācittiyāni, manussamaṃse thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, sesaakappiyamaṃse dukkaṭena
atk-vin02a1:440_4: saddhiṃ, yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve, nirāmisena ekameva.
atk-vin02a1:440_5: Āhāratthāya ajjhoharato vikappadvayepi dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhati. Sace vikāle ajjhoharati,
atk-vin02a1:440_6: pakatibhojane sannidhipaccayā ca vikālabhojanapaccayā ca dve pācittiyāni, akappiyamaṃsesu
atk-vin02a1:440_7: thullaccayañca dukkaṭañca vaḍḍhati. Yāmakālikesu vikālapaccayā anāpatti, anatirittapaccayā
atk-vin02a1:441_0: 255. Sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāyāti āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhato paṭiggahaṇapaccayā
atk-vin02a1:441_1: tāva dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhoharato pana sace nirāmisaṃ hoti, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:441_2: Atha āmisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ hoti, yathāvatthukaṃ pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:442_1: yāva majjhantikasaṅkhāto kālo, tāva bhuñjitabbato yāvakālikaṃ. Saddhiṃ anulomapānehi
atk-vin02a1:442_2: aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānaṃ yāva rattiyā pacchimayāmasaṅkhāto yāmo, tāva paribhuñjitabbato
atk-vin02a1:442_3: yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikaṃ. Sappiādi pañcavidhaṃ bhesajjaṃ sattāhaṃ nidhetabbato
atk-vin02a1:442_4: sattāho kālo assāti sattāhakālikaṃ. Ṭhapetvā udakaṃ avasesaṃ sabbampi yāvajīvaṃ pariharitvā
atk-vin02a1:443_0: Tattha aruṇodayeva paṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikaṃ satakkhattumpi nidahitvā yāvakālo nātikkamati
atk-vin02a1:443_1: tāva, yāmakālikaṃ ekaṃ ahorattaṃ, sattāhakālikaṃ sattarattaṃ, itaraṃ sati paccaye,
atk-vin02a1:443_2: yāvajīvampi paribhuñjantassa anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana imasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:443_3: ṭhāne pānakathā kappiyānulomakathā “kappati nu kho yāvakālikena yāmakālika”ntiādikathā
atk-vin02a1:443_4: ca kappiyabhūmikathā ca vitthāritā, taṃ mayaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva kathayissāma.
atk-vin02a1:444: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:447: 257. Navamasikkhāpade – paṇītabhojanānīti uttamabhojanāni. Kassa sampannaṃ na manāpanti sampattiyuttaṃ kassa na piyaṃ. Sādunti surasaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:448_0: 259. Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:448_1: bhuñjeyyāti ettha suddhāni sappiādīni viññāpetvā bhuñjanto pācittiyaṃ nāpajjati,
atk-vin02a1:448_2: sekhiyesu sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, odanasaṃsaṭṭhāni pana viññāpetvā bhuñjanto
atk-vin02a1:448_3: pācittiyaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo, ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo. Teneva ca “paṇītānī”ti
atk-vin02a1:448_4: avatvā “paṇītabhojanānī”ti sutte vuttaṃ. “Paṇītānī”ti hi vutte sappiādīnaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:448_5: hoti, “paṇītabhojanānī”ti vutte pana paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni sattadhaññanibbattāni bhojanāni
atk-vin02a1:449_0: Idāni viññāpeti payoge dukkaṭantiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayo – “sappinā bhattaṃ dehi, sappiṃ
atk-vin02a1:449_1: ākiritvā dehi, sappimissakaṃ katvā dehi, sahasappinā dehi, sappiñca bhattañca dehī”ti
atk-vin02a1:449_2: viññāpentassa viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ. “Sappibhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:449_3: dehī”ti vutte pana yasmā sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthi; tasmā sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭameva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:450_0: Sace pana “sappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte bhattaṃ datvā “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjā”ti navanītaṃ
atk-vin02a1:450_1: vā khīraṃ vā dadhiṃ vā deti, mūlaṃ vā pana deti, “iminā sappiṃ gahetvā bhuñjā”ti
atk-vin02a1:450_2: yathāvatthukameva. “Gosappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana gosappinā vā detu, gosappimhi
atk-vin02a1:450_3: asati, purimanayeneva gonavanītādīni vā gāviṃyeva vā detu “ito sappinā bhuñjā”ti
atk-vin02a1:450_4: yathāvatthukameva. Sace pana gosappinā yācito ajiyā sappiādīhi deti, visaṅketaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:450_5: Evañhi sati aññaṃ yācitena aññaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā anāpatti. Esa nayo ajiyā
atk-vin02a1:451_1: vutte akappiyasappinā deti, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi dukkaṭameva. Akappiyasappimhi
atk-vin02a1:451_2: asati purimanayeneva akappiyanavanītādīni deti “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjā”ti akappiyasappināva
atk-vin02a1:451_3: dinnaṃ hoti. “Akappiyasappinā”ti vutte kappiyena deti, visaṅketaṃ. “Sappinā”ti vutte
atk-vin02a1:451_4: sesesu navanītādīsu aññatarena deti, visaṅketameva. Esa nayo navanītena dehītiādīsupi.
atk-vin02a1:451_5: Yena yena hi viññatti hoti, tasmiṃ vā tassa mūle vā laddhe, taṃ taṃ laddhameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:452_0: Sace pana aññaṃ pāḷiyā āgataṃ vā anāgataṃ vā denti, visaṅketaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanavanītādīni
atk-vin02a1:452_1: ṭhapetvā aññehi navanītādīhi viññāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Yathā ca “sappibhattaṃ dehī”ti
atk-vin02a1:452_2: vutte sālibhattassa viya sappibhattassa abhāvā sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭameva hotīti
atk-vin02a1:452_3: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ navanītabhattaṃ dehītiādīsupi. Paṭipāṭiyā ekamekaṃ vitthāretvā vuccamānepi
atk-vin02a1:452_4: hi ayamevattho vattabbo siyā, so ca saṅkhepenapi sakkā ñātuṃ, kiṃ tattha vitthārena?
atk-vin02a1:453_0: Sace pana sabbehipi sappiādīhi ekaṭṭhāne vā nānāṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā paṭiladdhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:453_1: ekabhājane ākiritvā ekarasaṃ katvā tato kusaggenāpi jivhagge binduṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhoharati,
atk-vin02a1:453_2: nava pācittiyāni āpajjati. Vuttampi cetaṃ parivāre –
atk-vin02a1:458_0: 261. Agilāno gilānasaññīti ettha sace gilānasaññīpi hutvā bhesajjatthāya pañca bhesajjāni
atk-vin02a1:458_1: viññāpeti, mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo. Nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpento pana iminā
atk-vin02a1:458_2: sikkhāpadena kāretabbo. Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana etāni pāṭidesanīyavatthūni honti, sūpodanaviññattiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:459: Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:460: Kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇativajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:463_0: 263. Dasamasikkhāpade – catūsu paccayesu antamaso dantakaṭṭhampi sabbaṃ paṃsukūlameva
atk-vin02a1:463_1: assāti sabbapaṃsukūliko. So kira susāne chaḍḍitabhājanameva pattaṃ katvā tattha chaḍḍitacoḷakeheva
atk-vin02a1:463_2: cīvaraṃ katvā tattha chaḍḍitamañcapīṭhakāniyeva gahetvā paribhuñjati. Ayyavosāṭitakānīti
atk-vin02a1:463_3: ettha ayyā vuccanti kālaṅkatā pitipitāmahā. Vosāṭitakāni vuccanti tesaṃ atthāya susānādīsu
atk-vin02a1:463_4: chaḍḍitakāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni; manussā kira kālaṅkate ñātake uddissa yaṃ tesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:463_5: sajīvakāle piyaṃ hoti, taṃ etesu susānādīsu piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ katvā “ñātakā no paribhuñjantūti
atk-vin02a1:463_6: ṭhapenti. So bhikkhu taṃ gahetvā bhuñjati, aññaṃ paṇītampi diyyamānaṃ na icchati.
atk-vin02a1:463_7: Tena vuttaṃ – “susānepi rukkhamūlepi ummārepi ayyavosāṭitakāni sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:463_8: Theroti thiro ghanabaddho. Vaṭharoti thūlo; thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṃ bhikkhūti
atk-vin02a1:463_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Manussamaṃsaṃ maññe khādatīti manussamaṃsaṃ khādatīti naṃ sallakkhema;
atk-vin02a1:463_10: manussamaṃsaṃ khādantā hi īdisā bhavantīti ayaṃ tesaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:464_0: 264. Udakadantapone kukkuccāyantīti ettha te bhikkhū “adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:464_1: āhareyyā”ti padassa sammā atthaṃ asallakkhetvā kukkuccāyisuṃ, bhagavā pana yathāuppannassa
atk-vin02a1:464_2: vatthussa vasena pitā viya dārake te bhikkhū saññāpento anupaññattiṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a1:465_0: 265. Adinnanti kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa kāyakāyapaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:465_1: aññataravasena na dinnaṃ. Etadeva hi sandhāya padabhājane “adinnaṃ nāma appaṭiggahitakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:465_2: vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Dutiyapārājike pana “adinnaṃ nāma parapariggahitakaṃ vuccatī”ti
atk-vin02a1:465_3: vuttaṃ. Dinnanti idaṃ pana tasseva adinnassa paṭipakkhavasena lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:465_4: uddhaṭaṃ. Niddese cassa “kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā dente”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:465_5: aññasmiṃ dadamāne “hatthapāse ṭhito kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhātīti
atk-vin02a1:465_6: taṃ evaṃ diyyamānaṃ antamaso rathareṇumpi sace pubbe vuttalakkhaṇe hatthapāse ṭhito
atk-vin02a1:465_7: kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti, etaṃ evaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ dinnaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:465_8: Na “idaṃ gaṇha, idaṃ tava hotū”tiādivacanena nissaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:466_0: Tattha kāyenāti hatthādīsu yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena; antamaso pādaṅguliyāpi diyyamānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:466_1: kāyena dinnaṃ nāma hoti, paṭiggahaṇepi eseva nayo. Yena kenaci hi sarīrāvayavena
atk-vin02a1:466_2: gahitaṃ kāyena gahitameva hoti. Sacepi natthukaraṇiyā diyyamānaṃ nāsāpuṭena akallako
atk-vin02a1:466_3: vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti. Ābhogamattameva hi ettha pamāṇanti ayaṃ nayo mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:466_4: vutto. Kāyapaṭibaddhenāti kaṭacchuādīsu yena kenaci upakaraṇena dinnaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena
atk-vin02a1:466_5: dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Paṭiggahaṇepi eseva nayo. Yena kenaci sarīrapaṭibaddhena pattathālakādinā
atk-vin02a1:466_6: gahitaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena gahitameva hoti. Nissaggiyenāti kāyato ca kāyapaṭibaddhato
atk-vin02a1:466_7: ca mocetvā hatthapāse ṭhitassa kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā pātiyamānampi nissaggiyena
atk-vin02a1:466_8: payogena dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Ayaṃ tāva pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:467_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakavinicchayo – pañcaṅgehi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhati – thāmamajjhimassa
atk-vin02a1:467_1: purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ hoti, hatthapāso paññāyati, abhihāro paññāyati, devo vā
atk-vin02a1:467_2: manusso vā tiracchānagato vā kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā deti,
atk-vin02a1:467_3: taṃ ce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti. Evaṃ pañcahaṅgehi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-vin02a1:468_0: Tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ pavāraṇasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva hatthapāso veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:468_1: Sace pana dāyakapaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti, eko bhūmiyaṃ, bhūmaṭṭhassa ca sīsena
atk-vin02a1:468_2: ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ, yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:468_3: tassa orimantena hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ paricchinditabbaṃ. Sacepi eko kūpe hoti, eko
atk-vin02a1:468_4: kūpataṭe, eko vā pana rukkhe, eko pathaviyaṃ, vuttanayeneva hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ paricchinditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:468_5: Evarūpe hatthapāse ṭhatvā sacepi pakkhī mukhatuṇḍakena vā hatthī vā soṇḍāya gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:468_6: pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā deti, paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhati. Sace pana addhaṭṭhamaratanassāpi
atk-vin02a1:468_7: hatthino khandhe nisinno, tena soṇḍāya diyyamānaṃ gaṇhāti, vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:469_0: Eko bahūni bhattabyañjanabhājanāni sīse katvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ āgantvā ṭhitakova
atk-vin02a1:469_1: gaṇhathāti vadati, na tāva abhihāro paññāyati, tasmā na gahetabbaṃ. Sace pana īsakampi
atk-vin02a1:469_2: onamati, bhikkhunā hatthaṃ pasāretvā heṭṭhimabhājanaṃ ekadesenāpi sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:469_3: Ettāvatā sabbabhājanāni paṭiggahitāni honti, tato paṭṭhāya oropetvā vā ugghāṭetvā
atk-vin02a1:469_4: vā yaṃ icchati, taṃ gahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sabhattapacchiādimhi pana ekabhājane
atk-vin02a1:469_5: vattabbameva natthi, kājena bhattaṃ harantopi sace kājaṃ onāmetvā deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:469_6: Tiṃsahattho veṇu hoti, ekasmiṃ ante guḷakumbho baddho, ekasmiṃ sappikumbho, tañce
atk-vin02a1:469_7: paṭiggaṇhāti, sabbaṃ paṭiggahitameva. Ucchuyantadoṇito paggharantameva rasaṃ gaṇhathāti
atk-vin02a1:469_8: vadati, abhihāro na paññāyatīti na gahetabbo. Sace pana kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā hatthena
atk-vin02a1:470_0: Bahū pattā mañce vā pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake vā doṇiyaṃ vā phalake vā ṭhapitā honti, yattha
atk-vin02a1:470_1: ṭhitassa dāyako hatthapāse hoti, tattha ṭhatvā paṭiggahaṇasaññāya mañcādīni aṅguliyāpi
atk-vin02a1:470_2: phusitvā ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā nipannena vā yaṃ tesu pattesu diyyati, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:470_3: paṭiggahitaṃ hoti. Sacepi paṭiggahessāmīti mañcādīni āruhitvā nisīdati, vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:470_4: Sace pana mañcādīni hatthena gahetvā mañce nisīdati, vattabbameva natthi.
atk-vin02a1:471_0: Pathaviyaṃ pana sacepi kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā honti, yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vā sūciyā
atk-vin02a1:471_1: vā phusitvā nisinno hoti, tattha tattha diyyamānameva paṭiggahitaṃ hoti. “Yattha
atk-vin02a1:471_2: katthaci mahākaṭasārahatthattharaṇādīsu ṭhapitapatte paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:471_3: taṃ hatthapāsātikkamaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Hatthapāse pana sati yattha
atk-vin02a1:472_0: Tatthajātake pana paduminipaṇṇe vā kiṃsukapaṇṇādimhi vā na vaṭṭati. Na hi taṃ kāyapaṭibaddhasaṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:472_1: gacchati. Yathā ca tatthajātake; evaṃ khāṇuke bandhitvā ṭhapitamañcādimhi asaṃhārime
atk-vin02a1:472_2: phalake vā pāsāṇe vā na ruhatiyeva, tepi hi tatthajātakasaṅkhepupagā honti. Bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:472_3: atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesupi paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati, na hi tāni sandhāretuṃ
atk-vin02a1:472_4: samatthānīti. Mahantesu pana paduminipaṇṇādīsu ruhati. Sace hatthapāsaṃ atikkamma
atk-vin02a1:472_5: ṭhito dīghadaṇḍakena uḷuṅkena deti, āgantvā dehīti vattabbo. Vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā
atk-vin02a1:472_6: vā patte ākiratiyeva, puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Dūre ṭhatvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ khipantepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:473_0: Sace pattatthavikato nīhariyamāne patte rajanacuṇṇāni honti, sati udake dhovitabbo,
atk-vin02a1:473_1: asati rajanacuṇṇaṃ pucchitvā paṭiggahetvā vā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ. Sace piṇḍāya carantassa
atk-vin02a1:473_2: rajaṃ patati, paṭiggahetvā bhikkhā gaṇhitabbā. Appaṭiggahetvā gaṇhato vinayadukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:473_3: Taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjato anāpatti. Sace pana “paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vutte
atk-vin02a1:473_4: vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva, vinayadukkaṭaṃ natthi, puna paṭiggahetvā
atk-vin02a1:474_0: Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti, na sakkā hoti bhikkhaṃ gahetuṃ, “anupasampannassa
atk-vin02a1:474_1: dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā vihāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:474_2: vā āsanasālaṃ vā gantvā taṃ anupasampannassa datvā puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena
atk-vin02a1:475_0: Sace bhikkhācāre sarajaṃ pattaṃ bhikkhussa deti, so vattabbo – “imaṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-vin02a1:475_1: bhikkhaṃ vā gaṇheyyāsi, paribhuñjeyyāsi vā”ti tena tathā kātabbaṃ. Sace rajaṃ upari
atk-vin02a1:475_2: uppilavati, kañjikaṃ pavāhetvā sesaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace anto paviṭṭhaṃ hoti, paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:475_3: Anupasampanne asati hatthato amocentena, yattha anupasampanno atthi tattha netvā
atk-vin02a1:475_4: paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Sukkhabhatte patitarajaṃ apanetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace atisukhumaṃ
atk-vin02a1:475_5: hoti, uparibhattena saddhiṃ apanetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā vā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Yāguṃ vā sūpaṃ
atk-vin02a1:475_6: vā purato ṭhapetvā ālulentānaṃ bhājanato phusitāni uggantvā patte patanti, patto paṭiggahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:476_0: Uḷuṅkena āharitvā dentānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patanti, supatitā, abhihaṭattā
atk-vin02a1:476_1: doso natthi. Sacepi carukena bhatte ākiriyamāne carukato masi vā chārikā vā patati,
atk-vin02a1:476_2: abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso. Anantarassa bhikkhuno diyyamānaṃ pattato uppatitvā itarassa
atk-vin02a1:476_3: patte patati, supatitaṃ. Paṭiggahitameva hi taṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:477_0: Sace jajjharisākhādiṃ phāletvā ekassa bhikkhuno dentānaṃ sākhato phusitāni aññassa
atk-vin02a1:477_1: patte patanti, patto paṭiggahetabbo. Yassa pattassa upari phālenti, tassa patte patitesu
atk-vin02a1:477_2: dātukāmatāya abhihaṭattā doso natthi. Pāyāsassa pūretvā pattaṃ denti, uṇhattā heṭṭhā
atk-vin02a1:477_3: gahetuṃ na sakkoti, mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace tathāpi na sakkoti, ādhārakena gaṇhitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:478_0: Āsanasālāya pattaṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhu niddaṃ okkanto hoti, neva āhariyamānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:478_1: na diyyamānaṃ jānāti, appaṭiggahitaṃ hoti. Sace pana ābhogaṃ katvā nisinno hoti,
atk-vin02a1:478_2: vaṭṭati. Sacepi so hatthena ādhārakaṃ muñcitvā pādena pelletvā niddāyati, vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:478_3: Pādena ādhārakaṃ akkamitvā paṭiggaṇhantassa pana jāgarantassapi anādarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:478_4: hoti, tasmā na kātabbaṃ. Keci evaṃ ādhārakena paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhena
atk-vin02a1:478_5: paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā na vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Taṃ tesaṃ vacanamattameva. Atthato
atk-vin02a1:478_6: pana sabbampetaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhameva hoti. Kāyasaṃsaggepi cesa nayo dassitova. Yampi
atk-vin02a1:478_7: bhikkhussa diyyamānaṃ patati, tampi sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tatridaṃ suttaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:479: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ diyyamānaṃ patati, taṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ pariccattaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, dāyakehī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:480_0: Idañca pana suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ. Tasmā evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo – yaṃ diyyamānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:480_1: dāyakassa hatthato parigaḷitvā suddhāya vā bhūmiyā paduminipaṇṇavatthakaṭasārakādīsu
atk-vin02a1:480_2: vā patati, taṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana sarajāya bhūmiyā patati,
atk-vin02a1:480_3: taṃ rajaṃ puñchitvā vā dhovitvā vā paṭiggahetvā vā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace pana pavaṭṭantaṃ
atk-vin02a1:480_4: aññassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gacchati, tena āharāpetumpi vaṭṭati. Sace taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin02a1:480_5: vadati “tvaṃyeva khādā”ti tassāpi khādituṃ vaṭṭati. Anāṇattena pana tena na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:480_6: Anāṇattenāpi “itarassa dassāmī”ti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:480_7: itarassa bhikkhuno gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti? Bhagavatā ananuññātattā. Bhagavatā hi “sāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:480_8: gahetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vadantena yasseva taṃ diyyamānaṃ patati, tassa appaṭiggahitakampi
atk-vin02a1:480_9: taṃ gahetvā paribhogo anuññāto. “Pariccattaṃ taṃ bhikkhave dāyakehī”ti vacanena panettha
atk-vin02a1:480_10: parasantakābhāvo dīpito. Tasmā aññassa sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati, tassa
atk-vin02a1:480_11: pana āṇattiyā vaṭṭatīti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:481_0: Yasmā ca taṃ appaṭiggahitakattā anuññātaṃ, tasmā yathāṭhitaṃyeva anāmasitvā kenaci
atk-vin02a1:481_1: pidahitvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivasepi paribhuñcituṃ vaṭṭati, sannidhipaccayā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:481_2: Paṭiggahetvā pana paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Taṃdivasaṃyeva hi tassa sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhogo
atk-vin02a1:481_3: anuññāto, na tato paranti ayampi kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:482_0: Idāni abbohārikanayo vuccati – bhuñjantānañhi dantā khiyyanti, nakhā khiyyanti, pattassa
atk-vin02a1:482_1: vaṇṇo khiyyati, sabbaṃ abbohārikaṃ. Yampi satthakena ucchuādīsu phālitesu malaṃ paññāyati,
atk-vin02a1:482_2: etaṃ navasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Satthakaṃ dhovitvā phālitesu
atk-vin02a1:482_3: malaṃ na paññāyati, lohagandhamattaṃ hoti, taṃ abbohārikaṃ. Yampi satthakaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:482_4: pariharanti, tena phālitepi eseva nayo. Na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantīti.
atk-vin02a1:482_5: Mūlabhesajjādīni pisantānaṃ vā koṭṭentānaṃ vā nisadanisadapotakaudukkhalamusalādīni
atk-vin02a1:482_6: khiyyanti, pariharaṇakavāsiṃ tāpetvā bhesajjatthāya takke vā khīre vā pakkhipanti,
atk-vin02a1:482_7: tattha nīlikā paññāyati. Satthake vuttasadisova vinicchayo. Āmakatakkādīsu pana sayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:482_8: na pakkhipitabbā. Pakkhipati ce, sāmapākato na muccati.
atk-vin02a1:483_0: Deve vassante piṇḍāya carantassa sarīrato vā cīvarato vā kiliṭṭhaudakaṃ patte patati,
atk-vin02a1:483_1: taṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Rukkhamūlādīsu bhuñjantassa patitepi eseva nayo. Sace pana sattāhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:483_2: vassante deve suddhaṃ udakaṃ hoti, abbhokāsato vā patati, vaṭṭati. Sāmaṇerassa odanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:483_3: dentena tassa pattagataṃ acchupanteneva dātabbo. Patto vāssa paṭiggahetabbo. Appaṭiggahite
atk-vin02a1:483_4: odanaṃ chupitvā puna attano patte odanaṃ gaṇhantassa uggahitako hoti.
atk-vin02a1:484_0: Sace pana dātukāmo hutvā “āhara sāmaṇera pattaṃ, odanaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati, itaro ca
atk-vin02a1:484_1: “alaṃ mayha”nti paṭikkhipati, puna tavevetaṃ mayā pariccatta”nti ca vuttepi “na mayhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:484_2: etenattho”ti vadati. Satakkhattumpi pariccajatu, yāva attano hatthagataṃ paṭiggahitameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:485_0: Sace pana ādhārake ṭhitaṃ nirapekkho “gaṇhā”ti vadati, puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Sāpekkho
atk-vin02a1:485_1: ādhārake pattaṃ ṭhapetvā “etto pūvaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā gaṇhā”ti sāmaṇeraṃ vadati, sāmaṇero
atk-vin02a1:485_2: hatthaṃ dhovitvā sacepi satakkhattuṃ gahetvā attano pattagataṃ aphusantova attano
atk-vin02a1:485_3: patte pakkhipati, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Yadi pana attano pattagataṃ phusitvā
atk-vin02a1:485_4: tato gaṇhāti, sāmaṇerasantakena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hoti, puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Keci pana
atk-vin02a1:485_5: “sacepi gayhamānaṃ chijjitvā tattha patati, puna paṭiggahetabba”nti vadanti. Taṃ
atk-vin02a1:485_6: “ekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ gaṇha, ekaṃ pūvaṃ gaṇha, imassa guḷapiṇḍassa ettakaṃ padesaṃ gaṇhā”ti
atk-vin02a1:485_7: evaṃ paricchinditvā vutte veditabbaṃ. Idha pana paricchedo natthi. Tasmā yaṃ sāmaṇerassa
atk-vin02a1:485_8: patte patati, tadeva paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Hatthagataṃ pana yāva sāmaṇero vā “ala”nti
atk-vin02a1:485_9: na oramati, bhikkhu vā na vāreti, tāva bhikkhusseva santakaṃ, tasmā paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati.
atk-vin02a1:486_0: Sace attano vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā yāgupacanakabhājane kesañci atthāya odanaṃ pakkhipati,
atk-vin02a1:486_1: “sāmaṇera, bhājanassa upari hatthaṃ karohī”ti vatvā tassa hatthe pakkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:486_2: tassa hatthato bhājane patitañhi dutiyadivase bhājanassa akappiyabhāvaṃ na karoti,
atk-vin02a1:486_3: pariccattattā. Sace evaṃ akatvā pakkhipati, pattamiva bhājanaṃ nirāmisaṃ katvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:486_4: Dāyakā yāgukuṭaṃ ṭhapetvā gatā, taṃ daharasāmaṇero paṭiggaṇhāpetuṃ na sakkoti, bhikkhu
atk-vin02a1:486_5: pattaṃ upanāmeti, sāmaṇero kuṭassa gīvaṃ pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā āvajjeti,
atk-vin02a1:486_6: pattagatā yāgu paṭiggahitāva hoti. Atha vā bhikkhu bhūmiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapeti, sāmaṇero
atk-vin02a1:486_7: pavaṭṭetvā tattha āropeti, vaṭṭati. Pūvapacchibhattapacchiucchubhārādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:487_0: Sace paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ dve tayo sāmaṇerā denti, ekena vā balavatā ukkhittaṃ
atk-vin02a1:487_1: dve tayo bhikkhū gaṇhanti, vaṭṭati. Mañcassa vā pīṭhassa vā pāde telaghaṭaṃ vā phāṇitaghaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:487_2: vā navanītaghaṭaṃ vā laggenti, bhikkhussa mañcepi pīṭhepi nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Uggahitakaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:488_0: Nāgadantake vā aṅkusake vā dve telaghaṭā laggitā honti, upari paṭiggahitako heṭṭhā
atk-vin02a1:488_1: appaṭiggahitako, uparimaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhā paṭiggahitako upari appaṭiggahitako,
atk-vin02a1:488_2: uparimaṃ gahetvā itaraṃ gaṇhato uparimo uggahitako hoti. Heṭṭhāmañce appaṭiggahitakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:488_3: telathālakaṃ hoti, taṃ ce sammajjanto sammuñjaniyā ghaṭṭeti, uggahitakaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:488_4: Paṭiggahitakaṃ gaṇhissāmīti appaṭiggahitakaṃ gahetvā ñatvā puna ṭhapeti, uggahitakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:488_5: na hoti. Bahi nīharitvā sañjānāti, bahi aṭṭhapetvā haritvā tattheva ṭhapetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:488_6: natthi doso. Sace pana pubbe vivaritvā ṭhapitaṃ na pidahitabbaṃ; yathā pubbe ṭhitaṃ
atk-vin02a1:488_7: tatheva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace bahi ṭhapeti, puna na chupitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:489_0: Heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohanto nisseṇimajjhe sañjānāti, anokāsattā uddhaṃ vā adho vā haritvā
atk-vin02a1:489_1: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Paṭiggahitake telādimhi kaṇṇakaṃ uṭṭheti, siṅgiverādimhi ghanacuṇṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:490_0: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā āruḷho yottena phalapiṇḍiṃ otāretvā upari ṭhitova gaṇhathāti
atk-vin02a1:490_1: vadati, na gahetabbaṃ. Sace añño bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito yottapāsake gahetvā ukkhipitvā deti,
atk-vin02a1:490_2: vaṭṭati. Saphalaṃ mahāsākhaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā paṭiggaṇhāti, phalāni paṭiggahitāneva
atk-vin02a1:491_0: Antovatiyaṃ ṭhatvā vatiṃ chinditvā ucchuṃ vā timbarūsakaṃ vā denti, hatthapāse sati
atk-vin02a1:491_1: vaṭṭati. Vatidaṇḍakesu appaharitvā niggataṃ gaṇhantassa vaṭṭati. Paharitvā niggate
atk-vin02a1:491_2: aṭṭhakathāsu doso na dassito. Mayaṃ pana yaṃ ṭhānaṃ pahaṭaṃ, tato sayaṃpatitameva
atk-vin02a1:491_3: hotīti takkayāma. Tasmimpi aṭṭhatvā gacchante yujjati, suṅkaghātato pavaṭṭetvā bahipatitabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a1:491_4: viya. Vatiṃ vā pākāraṃ vā laṅghāpetvā denti, sace pana na puthulo pākāro, antopākāre
atk-vin02a1:491_5: ca bahipākāre ca ṭhitassa hatthapāso pahoti, hatthasatampi uddhaṃ gantvā sampattaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:492: Bhikkhu gilānaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ khandhena vahati, so phalāphalaṃ disvā gahetvā khandhe nisinnova deti, vaṭṭati. Aparo bhikkhuṃ vahanto khandhe nisinnassa bhikkhuno deti, vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:493_0: Bhikkhu phaliniṃ sākhaṃ chāyatthāya gahetvā gacchati, phalāni khādituṃ citte uppanne
atk-vin02a1:493_1: paṭiggahāpetvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati. Macchikavāraṇatthaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā paṭiggaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:493_2: khāditukāmo ce hoti, mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭati, khādantassa natthi doso.
atk-vin02a1:494_0: Bhikkhu paṭiggahaṇārahaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ manussānaṃ yāne ṭhapetvā maggaṃ gacchati, yānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:494_1: kaddame laggati, daharo cakkaṃ gahetvā ukkhipati, vaṭṭati, uggahitakaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:494_2: Nāvāya ṭhapetvā nāvaṃ arittena vā pājeti, hatthena vā kaḍḍhati, vaṭṭati. Uḷumpepi
atk-vin02a1:494_3: eseva nayo. Cāṭiyaṃ kuṇḍake vā ṭhapetvāpi taṃ anupasampannena gāhāpetvā anupasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:494_4: bāhāyaṃ gahetvā tarituṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmimpi asati anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvā taṃ bāhāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:495_0: Upāsakā gamikabhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyataṇḍule denti. Sāmaṇerā bhikkhūnaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:495_1: attano taṇḍule gahetuṃ na sakkonti, bhikkhū tesaṃ taṇḍule gaṇhanti. Sāmaṇerā attanā
atk-vin02a1:495_2: gahitataṇḍulesu khīṇesu itarehi taṇḍulehi yāguṃ pacitvā sabbesaṃ pattāni paṭipāṭiyā
atk-vin02a1:495_3: ṭhapetvā yāguṃ ākiranti. Paṇḍito sāmaṇero attano pattaṃ gahetvā therassa deti, therassa
atk-vin02a1:495_4: pattaṃ anutherassāti evaṃ sabbāni parivatteti, sabbehi sāmaṇerassa santakaṃ bhuttaṃ hoti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:496_0: Sacepi sāmaṇero apaṇḍito hoti, attano patte yāguṃ sayameva pātuṃ ārabhati, “āvuso
atk-vin02a1:496_1: tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ therehi paṭipāṭiyā yācitvāpi pivituṃ vaṭṭati, sabbehi
atk-vin02a1:496_2: sāmaṇerassa santakameva bhuttaṃ hoti, neva uggahitapaccayā na sannidhipaccayā vajjaṃ
atk-vin02a1:496_3: phusanti. Ettha pana mātāpitūnaṃ telādīni chāyādīnaṃ atthāya sākhādīni ca harantānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:496_4: imesañca viseso na dissati. Tasmā kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:497_0: Sāmaṇero bhattaṃ pacitukāmo taṇḍule dhovitvā niccāletuṃ na sakkoti. Bhikkhunā taṇḍule
atk-vin02a1:497_1: ca bhājanañca paṭiggahetvā taṇḍule dhovitvā niccāletvā bhājanaṃ uddhanaṃ āropetabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:497_2: aggi na kātabbo, pakkakāle vivaritvā pakkabhāvo jānitabbo. Sace duppakkaṃ hoti, pākatthāya
atk-vin02a1:497_3: pidahituṃ na vaṭṭati. Rajassa vā chārikāya vā apatanatthāya vaṭṭati, pakkakāle āropetumpi
atk-vin02a1:498_0: Sāmaṇero paṭibalo pacituṃ, khaṇo panassa natthi, katthaci gantukāmo. Bhikkhunā sataṇḍulodakabhājanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:498_1: paṭiggahetvā uddhanaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ jāletvā gacchāhīti vattabbo. Tato paraṃ purimanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:499_0: Bhikkhu yāguatthāya suddhaṃ bhājanaṃ āropetvā udakaṃ tāpeti, vaṭṭati. Tatte udake
atk-vin02a1:499_1: sāmaṇero taṇḍule pakkhipati, tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā aggi na kātabbo. Pakkayāguṃ
atk-vin02a1:500_0: Sāmaṇero yāguṃ pacati, hatthakukkuccako bhikkhu kīḷanto bhājanaṃ āmasati, pidhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:500_1: āmasati, uggataṃ pheṇaṃ chinditvā harati, tasseva pātuṃ na vaṭṭati, durupaciṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:500_2: nāma hoti. Sace pana dabbiṃ vā uḷuṅkaṃ vā gahetvā anukkhipanto āluḷeti, sabbesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:500_3: na vaṭṭati, sāmapākañceva hoti durupaciṇṇañca. Sace ukkhipati, uggahitakampi hoti.
atk-vin02a1:501_0: Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya caritvā ādhārake patto ṭhapito hoti, tatra ce añño lolabhikkhu
atk-vin02a1:501_1: kīḷanto pattaṃ āmasati, pattapidhānaṃ āmasati, tasseva tato laddhaṃ bhattaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:501_2: Sace pana pattaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhapeti, sabbesaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tatthajātakaphalāni sākhāya
atk-vin02a1:501_3: vā valliyā vā gahetvā cāleti, tasseva tato laddhaṃ phalaṃ na vaṭṭati, durupaciṇṇadukkaṭañca
atk-vin02a1:501_4: āpajjati. Phalarukkhaṃ pana apassayituṃ vā tattha kaṇḍake vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati, durupaciṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:502_0: Araññe patitaṃ pana ambaphalādiṃ disvā sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti āharitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:502_1: Sīhavighāsādiṃ disvāpi sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti paṭiggahetvā vā appaṭiggahetvā vā āharitvā
atk-vin02a1:502_2: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ, tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:502_3: neva āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇapaccayā na uggahitakapaccayā vajjaṃ phusati.
atk-vin02a1:503_0: Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya telādīni gahetvā gacchato antarāmagge byādhi uppajjati, tato
atk-vin02a1:503_1: yaṃ icchati, taṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ
atk-vin02a1:503_2: hoti, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Mātāpitūnaṃ taṇḍule āharitvā deti, te tatoyeva
atk-vin02a1:503_3: yāguādīni sampādetvā tassa denti, vaṭṭati sannidhipaccayā vā uggahitakapaccayā vā doso natthi.
atk-vin02a1:504_0: Bhikkhu pidahitvā udakaṃ tāpeti, yāva parikkhayā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace panettha
atk-vin02a1:504_1: chārikā patati, paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Dīghasaṇḍāsena thālakaṃ gahetvā telaṃ pacantassa
atk-vin02a1:504_2: chārikā patati, hatthena amuñcanteneva pacitvā otāretvā paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Sace aṅgārāpi
atk-vin02a1:504_3: dārūni vā paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitāni, mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:505_0: Bhikkhu ucchuṃ khādati, sāmaṇero “mayhampi dethā”ti vadati. “Ito chinditvā gaṇhā”ti
atk-vin02a1:505_1: vutto gaṇhāti, avasese puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Guḷapiṇḍakaṃ khādantassāpi
atk-vin02a1:505_2: eseva nayo. Vuttokāsato chinditvā gahitāvasesañhi ajahitapaṭiggahaṇameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:506_0: Bhikkhu guḷaṃ bhājento paṭiggahetvā koṭṭhāse karoti, bhikkhūpi sāmaṇerāpi āgantvā
atk-vin02a1:506_1: ekagahaṇeneva ekamekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhanti, gahitāvasesaṃ paṭiggahitameva hoti. Sace
atk-vin02a1:506_2: lolasāmaṇero gaṇhitvā gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapeti, tassa gahitāvasesaṃ appaṭiggahitakaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:507: Bhikkhu dhūmavaṭṭiṃ paṭiggahetvā dhūmaṃ pivati, mukhañca kaṇṭho ca manosilāya litto viya hoti, yāvakālikaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, yāvakālikena yāvajīvikasaṃsagge doso natthi.
atk-vin02a1:508_0: Pattaṃ vā rajanaṃ vā pacantassa kaṇṇanāsamukhacchiddehi dhūmo pavisati, byādhipaccayā
atk-vin02a1:508_1: pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā upasiṅghati, abbohārikattā vaṭṭati. Bhattuggāro tāluṃ āhacca
atk-vin02a1:508_2: antoyeva pavisati, avisayattā vaṭṭati. Mukhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ pana ajjhoharato vikāle āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:508_3: Dantantare laggassa āmisassa raso pavisati, āpattiyeva. Sace sukhumaṃ āmisaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:509_0: Upakaṭṭhe kāle nirudakaṭṭhāne bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā kakkhāretvā dve tayo kheḷapiṇḍe pātetvā
atk-vin02a1:509_1: udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletabbaṃ. Paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitasiṅgiverādīnaṃ aṅkurā
atk-vin02a1:509_2: nikkhamanti, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Loṇe asati samuddodakena loṇakiccaṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:509_3: vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ loṇodakaṃ loṇaṃ hoti, loṇaṃ vā udakaṃ hoti, raso vā
atk-vin02a1:509_4: phāṇitaṃ hoti, phāṇitaṃ vā raso hoti, mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭati. Himakarakā udakagatikā
atk-vin02a1:509_5: eva. Parihārikena katakaṭṭhinā udakaṃ pasādenti, taṃ abbohārikaṃ, āmisena saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:509_6: vaṭṭati. Āmisagatikehi kapitthaphalādīhi pasāditaṃ purebhattameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:510_0: Pokkharaṇīādīsu udakaṃ bahalaṃ hoti, vaṭṭati. Sace pana mukhe ca hatthe ca laggati,
atk-vin02a1:510_1: na vaṭṭati, paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne bahalaṃ udakaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:510_2: paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Sace sanditvā kandarādīni pavisitvā nadiṃ pūreti, vaṭṭati. Kakudhasobbhādayo
atk-vin02a1:510_3: honti, rukkhato patitehi pupphehi sañchannodakā, sace puppharaso na paññāyati, paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a1:510_4: natthi. Parittaṃ udakaṃ hoti, raso paññāyati, paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Pabbatakandarādīsu
atk-vin02a1:511_0: Pānīyaghaṭe sareṇukāni vā savaṇṭakhīrāni vā pupphāni pakkhittāni honti, paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:511_1: Pupphāni vā paṭiggahetvā pakkhipitabbāni. Pāṭalicampakamallikā pakkhittā honti, vāsamattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:511_2: tiṭṭhati taṃ abbohārikaṃ, dutiyadivasepi āmisena saddhiṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunā ṭhapitapupphavāsitakapānīyato
atk-vin02a1:511_3: sāmaṇero pānīyaṃ gahetvā pītāvasesaṃ tattheva ākirati, paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Padumasarādīsu
atk-vin02a1:511_4: udakaṃ santharitvā ṭhitaṃ pupphareṇuṃ ghaṭena vikkhambhetvā udakaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:511_5: Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ hoti, sace tassa rasaṃ pivitukāmo,
