atk-vin02a1:511_6: mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭati. Appaṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Ajānantassa
atk-vin02a1:511_7: rase paviṭṭhepi āpattiyeva. Acittakañhi idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:512_0: Mahābhūtesu kiṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ na vaṭṭatīti? Khīraṃ tāva vaṭṭati, kappiyamaṃsakhīraṃ
atk-vin02a1:512_1: vā akappiyamaṃsakhīraṃ vā hotu, pivantassa anāpatti. Assu kheḷo siṅghāṇikā muttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:512_2: karīsaṃ semhaṃ dantamalaṃ akkhigūthako kaṇṇagūthako sarīre uṭṭhitaloṇanti idaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:512_3: vaṭṭati. Yaṃ panettha ṭhānato cavitvā patte vā hatthe vā patati, taṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:512_4: Aṅgalaggaṃ paṭiggahitakameva. Uṇhaṃpāyāsaṃ bhuñjantassa sedo aṅgulianusārena ekābaddhova
atk-vin02a1:512_5: hutvā pāyāse santiṭṭhati, piṇḍāya vā carantassa hatthato pattassa mukhavaṭṭiṃto vā
atk-vin02a1:512_6: pattatalaṃ orohati, ettha paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Jhāmamahābhūtesu idaṃ nāma na
atk-vin02a1:512_7: vaṭṭatīti natthi, dujjhāpitaṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Sujjhāpitaṃ manussaṭṭhimpi cuṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:513_0: Cattāri mahāvikaṭāni asati kappiyakārake sāmampi gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Ettha
atk-vin02a1:513_1: ca dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhati. Chārikāya asati
atk-vin02a1:513_2: sukkhadāruṃ jhāpetvā chārikā gahetabbā. Sukkhadārumhi asati alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi
atk-vin02a1:513_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ pana catubbidhampi mahāvikaṭaṃ kālodissaṃ nāma sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva
atk-vin02a1:514: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:519_1: pabbajjaṃ samāpanno. Deti āpatti pācittiyassāti samatittikaṃ yāgupattaṃ ekapayogena
atk-vin02a1:519_2: deti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Avacchinditvā avacchinditvā deti, payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:519_3: Eseva nayo pūvabhattādīsu. Titthiye atitthiyasaññīti mātā vā pitā vā titthiyesu pabbajati,
atk-vin02a1:519_4: tesaṃ mātāpitusaññāya dentassāpi pācittiyameva hoti. Dāpetīti anupasampannena dāpeti.
atk-vin02a1:520_0: 273. Upanikkhipitvā detīti tathārūpe bhājane ṭhapetvā taṃ bhājanaṃ tesaṃ santike
atk-vin02a1:520_1: bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā deti, tesaṃ vā bhājanaṃ nikkhipāpetvā tattha deti, pattaṃ ādhārake
atk-vin02a1:520_2: vā bhūmiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvāpi “ito gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace titthiyo vadati “mayhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:520_3: nāma idaṃ santakaṃ, idha na ākirathā”ti ākiritabbaṃ. Tassa santakattā sahatthā dānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:521: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:524: 274. Dutiyasikkhāpade – paṭikkamanepīti āsanasālāyampi. Bhattavissagganti bhattakiccaṃ. Na sambhāvesīti na pāpuṇi.
atk-vin02a1:525_0: 276. Anācāranti vuttāvasesaṃ kāyavacīdvāravītikkamaṃ. Dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ
atk-vin02a1:525_1: vā vijahantassāti ettha yadi ṭhito vā nisinno vā uyyojeti; yo uyyojito, so vijahati,
atk-vin02a1:525_2: tassa ca āpatti nāma natthi. Tasmiṃ pana vijahantepi atthato itarena vijahitameva
atk-vin02a1:525_3: hoti. Tasmā yo uyyojeti, tassevāyaṃ āpatti. Tattha sace upacārabbhantare eko pādo
atk-vin02a1:525_4: hoti, dukkaṭaṃ. Sīmātikkame pācittiyaṃ. Ettha ca dassanūpacārassa abbhokāse dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:525_5: tathā savanūpacārassa. Sace pana antarā kuṭṭadvārapākārādayo honti, tehi antaritabhāvo
atk-vin02a1:525_6: dassanūpacārātikkamo, tassa vasena āpatti veditabbā. Na añño koci paccayo hotīti
atk-vin02a1:525_7: ṭhapetvā vuttappakāramanācāraṃ aññaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:526_0: 277. Kalisāsanaṃ āropetīti “kalī”ti kodho; tassa sāsanaṃ āropeti; kodhassa āṇaṃ āropeti;
atk-vin02a1:526_1: kodhavasena ṭhānanisajjādīsu dosaṃ dassetvā “passatha bho imassa ṭhānaṃ, nisajjaṃ
atk-vin02a1:526_2: ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ khāṇuko viya tiṭṭhati, sunakho viya nisīdati, makkaṭo viya ito
atk-vin02a1:526_3: cito ca viloketī”ti evaṃ amanāpavacanaṃ vadati “appeva nāma imināpi ubbāḷho pakkameyyā”ti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:527: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:530_0: 279. Tatiyasikkhāpade – sayanighareti sayaniyaghare. Yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnāti
atk-vin02a1:530_1: yasmā bhikkhā dinnā, yaṃ āgatena laddhabbaṃ taṃ vo laddhaṃ; gacchathāti adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a1:531_0: 280. Saha ubhohi janehīti sabhojanaṃ; tasmiṃ sabhojane. Atha vā sabhojaneti sabhoge.
atk-vin02a1:531_1: Rāgapariyuṭṭhitassa hi purisassa itthī bhogo itthiyā ca puriso. Tenevassa padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:531_2: – “itthī ceva hoti puriso cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mahallake ghareti mahallake sayanighare.
atk-vin02a1:531_3: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvāti tassa sayanighare gabbhassa yo piṭṭhasaṅghāṭo,
atk-vin02a1:531_4: tassa hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā; antosayanassa āsanne ṭhāne nisīdatīti attho. Īdisañca
atk-vin02a1:531_5: sayanigharaṃ mahācatussālādīsu hoti. Piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvāti iminā majjhātikkamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:531_6: dasseti. Tasmā yathā vā tathā vā katassa khuddakassa sayanigharassa majjhātikkame
atk-vin02a1:532: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:534: 284. Catutthapañcamasikkhāpadesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ aniyatadvaye vuttanayameva. Yathā ca sabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ, evametānipi paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:537: 294. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpade – dethāvuso bhattanti ettha taṃ kira bhattaṃ abhihaṭaṃ ahosi, tasmā evamāhaṃsu. Anabhihaṭe pana evaṃ vattuṃ na labbhati, payuttavācā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:538_0: 295. Tena hi bhikkhave paṭiggahetvā nikkhipathāti idaṃ pana bhagavā kulassa saddhānurakkhaṇatthāya
atk-vin02a1:538_1: āha. Yadi “bhājetvā khādathā”ti vadeyya, manussānaṃ pasādaññathattaṃ siyā. Ussāriyitthāti
atk-vin02a1:538_2: paṭihariyittha; gharaṃyeva naṃ gahetvā agamaṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:539_0: 298. Santaṃ bhikkhunti ettha kittāvatā santo hoti, kittāvatā asantoti? Antovihāre
atk-vin02a1:539_1: yattha ṭhitassa kulāni payirupāsanacittaṃ uppannaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ passe vā abhimukhe
atk-vin02a1:539_2: vā passati, yassa sakkā hoti pakativacanena ārocetuṃ, ayaṃ santo nāma. Ito cito ca
atk-vin02a1:539_3: pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ nāma natthi. Yo hi evaṃ pariyesitabbo, so asantoyeva. Apica
atk-vin02a1:539_4: antoupacārasīmāya bhikkhuṃ disvā āpucchissāmīti gantvā tattha yaṃ passati, so āpucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a1:539_5: No ce passati, asantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā paviṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:540_0: 302. Antarārāmanti antogāme vihāro hoti, taṃ gacchati. Bhattiyagharanti nimantitagharaṃ
atk-vin02a1:540_1: vā salākabhattādidāyakānaṃ vā gharaṃ. Āpadāsūti jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyesu sati
atk-vin02a1:541: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākirayaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:544_0: 303. Sattamasikkhāpade – mahānāmo nāma bhagavato cūḷapituputto māsamattena mahallakataro
atk-vin02a1:544_1: dvīsu phalesu patiṭṭhito ariyasāvako. Bhesajjaṃ ussannaṃ hotīti vajato āharitvā ṭhapitasappi bahu hoti.
atk-vin02a1:545_0: 306. Sāditabbāti tasmiṃ samaye rogo natthīti na paṭikkhipitabbā; roge sati viññāpessāmīti
atk-vin02a1:545_1: adhivāsetabbā. Ettakehi bhesajjehi pavāremīti nāmavasena sappitelādīsu dvīhi tīhi
atk-vin02a1:545_2: vā parimāṇavasena patthena nāḷiyā āḷhakenāti vā.Aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ viññāpetīti sappinā
atk-vin02a1:545_3: pavārito telaṃ viññāpeti, āḷhakena pavārito doṇaṃ. Na bhesajjena karaṇīyenāti missakabhattenapi
atk-vin02a1:545_4: ce yāpetuṃ sakkoti, na bhesajjakaraṇīyaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:546_0: 310. Pavāritānanti ye attano puggalikāya pavāraṇāya pavāritā; tesaṃ pavāritānurūpena
atk-vin02a1:546_1: viññattiyā anāpatti. Saṅghavasena pavāritesu pana pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetabbamevāti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:547: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:550: 311. Aṭṭhame – abbhuyyātoti abhiuyyāto; parasenaṃ abhimukho gamissāmīti nagarato niggatoti attho. Uyyuttanti katauyyogaṃ; gāmato nikkhantanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:551_0: 314. Dvādasapuriso hatthīti cattāro ārohakā ekekapādarakkhakā dve dveti evaṃ dvādasapuriso
atk-vin02a1:551_1: hoti. Tipuriso assoti eko ārohako dve pādarakkhakāti evaṃ tipuriso hoti. Catupuriso
atk-vin02a1:551_2: rathoti eko sārathi eko yodho dve āṇirakkhakāti evaṃ catupuriso hoti. Cattāro purisā
atk-vin02a1:551_3: sarahatthāti āvudhahatthā cattāro purisāti ayaṃ pacchimakoṭiyā caturaṅgasamannāgatā
atk-vin02a1:551_4: senā nāma. Īdisaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gacchato pade pade dukkaṭaṃ. Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvāti
atk-vin02a1:551_5: kenaci antaritā vā ninnaṃ oruḷhā vā na dissati; idha ṭhatvā na sakkā daṭṭhunti aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:551_6: ṭhānaṃ gantvā passato payoge payoge pācittiyanti attho.
atk-vin02a1:552_0: 315. Ekamekanti hatthiādīsu catūsu aṅgesu ekamekaṃ; antamaso ekapurisāruḷhakahatthimpi
atk-vin02a1:552_1: ekampi sarahatthaṃ purisaṃ. Anuyyuttā nāma rājā uyyānaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gacchati; evaṃ anuyyuttā hoti.
atk-vin02a1:553_0: 316. Āpadāsūti jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyesu sati ettha gato muñcissāmīti gacchato
atk-vin02a1:553_1: anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:556_0: 319. Navame – atthaṅgate sūriye senāya vasatīti tiṭṭhatu vā nisīdatu vā sayatu vā
atk-vin02a1:556_1: sacepi ākāse iddhiyā kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, pācittiyameva. Senā vā paṭisenāya
atk-vin02a1:556_2: ruddhā hotīti yathā sañcāro chijjati; evaṃ ruddhā hoti. Palibuddhoti verikena vā
atk-vin02a1:556_3: issarena vā ruddho. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:559_0: 322. Dasame – uggantvā uggantvā ettha yujjhantīti uyyodhikaṃ; sampahāraṭṭhānassetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:559_1: adhivacanaṃ. Balassa aggaṃ jānanti etthāti balaggaṃ; balagaṇanaṭṭhānanti attho. Senāya
atk-vin02a1:559_2: viyūhaṃ senābyūhaṃ; senānivesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīkanti
atk-vin02a1:559_3: yo pubbe vutto dvādasapuriso hatthīti tena hatthinā tayo hatthī. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:559_4: Sesaṃ uyyuttasenāsikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:564_0: 326. Surāpānavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – bhaddavatikāti eko gāmo, so bhaddikāya
atk-vin02a1:564_1: vatiyā samannāgatattā etaṃ nāma labhi. Pathāvinoti addhikā. Tejasā tejanti attano
atk-vin02a1:564_2: tejasā ānubhāvena nāgassa tejaṃ. Kāpotikāti kapotapādasamavaṇṇarattobhāsā. Pasannāti
atk-vin02a1:564_3: surāmaṇḍassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ananucchaviyaṃ bhikkhave sāgatassāti pañcābhiññassa
atk-vin02a1:564_4: sato majjapānaṃ nāma na anucchaviyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:565_0: 328. Pupphāsavo nāma madhukapupphādīnaṃ rasena kato. Phalāsavo nāma muddikaphalādīni
atk-vin02a1:565_1: madditvā tesaṃ rasena kato. Madhvāsavo nāma muddikānaṃ jātirasena kato; makkhikamadhunāpi
atk-vin02a1:565_2: kariyatīti vadanti. Guḷāsavo nāma ucchurasādīhi kariyati. Surā nāma piṭṭhakiṇṇapakkhittā;
atk-vin02a1:565_3: nāḷikerādīnampi rasena katā surātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tassāyeva kiṇṇapakkhittāya
atk-vin02a1:565_4: maṇḍe gahite merayotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti vadanti. Antamaso kusaggenapi pivatīti
atk-vin02a1:565_5: etaṃ suraṃ vā merayaṃ vā bījato paṭṭhāya kusaggena pivatopi pācittiyanti attho. Ekena
atk-vin02a1:565_6: pana payogena bahumpi pivantassa ekā āpatti. Vicchinditvā vicchinditvā pivato payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a1:566_0: 329. Amajjañca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasanti loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:566_1: vā hoti. Sūpasampāketi vāsagāhāpanatthaṃ īsakaṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā sūpaṃ pacanti,
atk-vin02a1:566_2: tasmiṃ anāpatti. Maṃsasampākepi eseva nayo. Telaṃ pana vātabhesajjatthaṃ majjena
atk-vin02a1:566_3: saddhiṃ pacanti, tasmimpi anatikkhittamajjeyeva anāpatti, yaṃ pana atikkhittamajjaṃ
atk-vin02a1:566_4: hoti, ettha majjassa vaṇṇagandharasā paññāyanti, tasmiṃ āpattiyeva. Amajjaṃ ariṭṭhanti
atk-vin02a1:566_5: yo ariṭṭho majjaṃ na hoti, tasmiṃ anāpatti. Āmalakādīnaṃyeva kira rasena ariṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:566_6: karonti, so majjavaṇṇagandharasoyeva hoti, na ca majjaṃ; taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:566_7: Yo pana sambhārapakkhitto, so majjaṃ hoti, bījato paṭṭhāya na vaṭṭati. Sesamettha
atk-vin02a1:566_8: uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:566_9: kāyakammaṃ akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti. Vatthuajānanatāya cettha acittakatā veditabbā,
atk-vin02a1:569_0: 330. Dutiye – aṅgulipatodakenāti aṅgulīhi upakacchakādighaṭṭanaṃ vuccati. Uttasantoti
atk-vin02a1:569_1: atihāsena kilamanto. Anassāsakoti upacchinnaassāsapassāsasañcāro hutvā. Anupasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:569_2: kāyena kāyanti ettha bhikkhunīpi anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitā, tampi khiḍḍādhippāyena
atk-vin02a1:570: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:573: 335. Tatiye – appakataññunoti yaṃ bhagavatā pakataṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ na jānantīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:574_0: 336. Udake hasadhammeti udakakīḷikā vuccati. Uparigopphaketi gopphakānaṃ uparibhāgappamāṇe.
atk-vin02a1:574_1: Hasādhippāyoti kīḷādhippāyo. Nimujjati vātiādīsu nimujjanatthāya orohantassa padavāre
atk-vin02a1:574_2: padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Nimujjanummujjanesu payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ. Nimujjitvā antoudakeyeva
atk-vin02a1:574_3: gacchantassa hatthavārapadavāresu sabbattha pācittiyaṃ. Palavatīti tarati. Hatthehi
atk-vin02a1:574_4: tarantassa hatthavāre hatthavāre pācittiyaṃ. Pādesupi eseva nayo. Yena yena aṅgena
atk-vin02a1:574_5: tarati, tassa tassa payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ. Tīrato vā rukkhato vā udake patati,
atk-vin02a1:574_6: pācittiyameva. Nāvāya kīḷatīti phiyārittādīhi nāvaṃ pājento vā tīre ussārento vā
atk-vin02a1:575_0: Hatthena vātiādīsupi payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Keci hatthena udake khittāya kathalāya
atk-vin02a1:575_1: patanuppatanavāresu dukkaṭaṃ vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Tattha hi ekapayogattā ekameva
atk-vin02a1:575_2: dukkaṭaṃ, apica uparigopphake vuttāni ummujjanādīni ṭhapetvā aññena yena kenaci ākārena
atk-vin02a1:575_3: udakaṃ otaritvā vā anotaritvā vā yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ antamaso binduṃ gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:575_4: khipanakīḷāyapi kīḷantassa dukkaṭameva, atthajotakaṃ pana akkharaṃ likhituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:576: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:579_0: 342. Catutthe – kathāyaṃ nasseyyāti kathaṃ ayaṃ dhammo tanti paveṇī nasseyya. Taṃ
atk-vin02a1:579_1: vā na sikkhitukāmoti yena paññattena vuccati, taṃ paññattaṃ na sikkhitukāmo. Apaññattenāti
atk-vin02a1:580_0: 344. Evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggahoti ettha gārayho ācariyuggaho na gahetabbo; paveṇiyā
atk-vin02a1:580_1: āgato ācariyuggahova gahetabbo. Kurundiyaṃ pana “lokavajje ācariyuggaho na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:580_2: paṇṇattivajje pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyeva
atk-vin02a1:580_3: ācariyānaṃ uggaho pamāṇaṃ, ajānantānaṃ kathā appamāṇanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ paveṇiyā
atk-vin02a1:581: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:584: 345. Pañcame – rūpūpahārādayo manussaviggahe vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīni anādariyasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:587_0: 350. Chaṭṭhe – bhaggāti janapadassa nāmaṃ. Saṃsumāragiranti nagarassa. Bhesakaḷāvananti
atk-vin02a1:587_1: tannissitavanassa. Taṃ pana migānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:588: 352. Padīpepīti padīpujjalanepi. Jotikepīti pattapacanasedakammādīsu jotikaraṇe. Tathārūpapaccayāti padīpādipaccayā.
atk-vin02a1:589_0: 354-5. Sayaṃ samādahatīti ettha jotiṃ samādahitukāmatāya araṇisaṇṭhapanato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:589_1: yāva jālā na uṭṭhahati, tāva sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭilātaṃ ukkhipatīti dayhamānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:589_2: alātaṃ patitaṃ ukkhipati, puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetīti attho. Evaṃ avijjhātaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-vin02a1:589_3: pakkhipantasseva dukkaṭaṃ, vijjhātaṃ puna jālāpentassa pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:590_0: 356. Tathārūpapaccayāti ṭhapetvā padīpādīni aññenapi tathārūpena paccayena samādahantassa
atk-vin02a1:590_1: anāpatti. Āpadāsūti duṭṭhavāḷamigaamanussehi upaddavo hoti, tattha samādahantassāpi
atk-vin02a1:590_2: anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:593: 364. Sattame – cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vāti ettha cuṇṇamattikānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:594_0: 366. Pāraṃ gacchanto nhāyatīti ettha sukkhāya nadiyā vālikaṃ ukkiritvā kataāvāṭakesupi
atk-vin02a1:594_1: nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati. Āpadāsūti bhamarādīhi anubaddhassa udake nimujjituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-vin02a1:594_2: Sesamettha uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:597_0: 368-9. Aṭṭhame – navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhenāti ettha alabhīti labho; labhoyeva
atk-vin02a1:597_1: lābho. Kiṃ alabhi? Cīvaraṃ. Kīdisaṃ? Navaṃ. Iti “navacīvaralābhenā”ti vattabbe anunāsikalopaṃ
atk-vin02a1:597_2: akatvā “navacīvaralābhenā”ti vuttaṃ; paṭiladdhanavacīvarenāti attho. Majjhe ṭhitapadadvaye
atk-vin02a1:597_3: panāti nipāto. Bhikkhunāti yena laddhaṃ tassa nidassanaṃ. Padabhājane pana byañjanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:597_4: anādiyitvā yaṃ laddhaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:597_5: Cīvaranti ettha yaṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā sakkā hoti, tadeva veditabbaṃ. Teneva
atk-vin02a1:597_7: pana “ayomalaṃ lohamalaṃ etaṃ kaṃsanīlaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Palāsanīlanti yo koci nīlavaṇṇo
atk-vin02a1:597_8: paṇṇaraso. Dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ ādātabbanti etaṃ kappabinduṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ; na nīlādīhi
atk-vin02a1:597_9: sakalacīvarassa dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ. Tañca pana kappaṃ ādiyantena cīvaraṃ rajitvā catūsu
atk-vin02a1:597_10: vā koṇesu tīsu vā dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā koṇe morassa akkhimaṇḍalamattaṃ vā maṅkulapiṭṭhimattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:597_11: vā ādātabbaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ “patte vā gaṇṭhiyaṃ vā na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:597_12: pana “vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Pāḷikappakaṇṇikakappādayo pana sabbattha paṭisiddhā,
atk-vin02a1:597_13: tasmā ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vaṭṭabinduṃ aññena kenacipi vikārena kappo na kātabbo.
atk-vin02a1:598_0: 371. Aggaḷetiādīsu etāni aggaḷādīni kappakatacīvare pacchā āropetvā kappakaraṇakiccaṃ
atk-vin02a1:598_1: natthi. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:601_0: 374. Navame – tassa vā adinnanti cīvarasāmikassa “paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:601_1: vā karohī”ti evaṃ vatvā adinnaṃ. Tassa vā avissasantoti yena vinayakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:601_2: tassa avissāsena vā. Tena pana dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paribhuñjantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:601_3: Sesamettha tiṃsakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayattā uttānamevāti. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato
atk-vin02a1:601_4: kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:604_0: 377-81. Dasame – apanidhentīti apanetvā nidhenti. Hasāpekkhoti hasādhippāyo. Aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:604_1: parikkhāranti pāḷiyā anāgataṃ pattatthavikādiṃ. Dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvāti “samaṇena
atk-vin02a1:604_2: nāma anihitaparikkhārena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dassāmīti
atk-vin02a1:604_3: nikkhipato anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:604_4: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:609: 382. Sappāṇakavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – issāso hotīti gihikāle dhanuggahācariyo hoti. Jīvitā voropitāti jīvitā viyojitā.
atk-vin02a1:610_0: Sikkhāpadepi voropeyyāti viyojeyya. Yasmā pana vohāramattamevetaṃ; na hettha kiñci
atk-vin02a1:610_1: viyojite sīsālaṅkāre sīsaṃ viya jīvitā voropite pāṇepi jīvitaṃ nāma visuṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:610_2: aññadatthu antaradhānameva gacchati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ padabhājane “jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:610_3: upacchindatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca sikkhāpade tiracchānagatoyeva “pāṇo”ti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:610_4: Taṃ khuddakampi mahantampi mārentassa āpattinānākaraṇaṃ natthi. Mahante pana upakkamamahantattā
atk-vin02a1:610_5: akusalamahattaṃ hoti. Pāṇe pāṇasaññīti antamaso mañcapīṭhaṃ sodhento maṅgulabījakepi
atk-vin02a1:610_6: pāṇasaññī nikkāruṇikatāya taṃ bhindanto apaneti, pācittiyaṃ. Tasmā evarūpesu ṭhānesu
atk-vin02a1:610_7: kāruññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā appamattena vattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sesaṃ manussaviggahe vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:613_0: 387. Dutiye – sappāṇakanti ye pāṇakā paribhogena maranti, tehi pāṇakehi sappāṇakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:613_1: tādisañhi jānaṃ paribhuñjato payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ. Pattapūrampi avicchinditvā
atk-vin02a1:613_2: ekapayogena pivato ekā āpatti. Tādisena udakena sāmisaṃ pattaṃ āviñchitvā dhovatopi
atk-vin02a1:613_3: tādise udake uṇhayāgupattaṃ nibbāpayatopi taṃ udakaṃ hatthena vā uḷuṅkena vā gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:613_4: nhāyatopi payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ. Udakasoṇḍiṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā pavisitvā bahinikkhamanatthāya
atk-vin02a1:613_5: vīciṃ uṭṭhāpayatopi. Soṇḍiṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā sodhentehi tato gahitaudakaṃ udakeyeva
atk-vin02a1:613_6: āsiñcitabbaṃ. Samīpamhi udake asati kappiyaudakassa aṭṭha vā dasa vā ghaṭe udakasaṇṭhānakappadese
atk-vin02a1:613_7: āsiñcitvā tattha āsiñcitabbaṃ. “Pavaṭṭitvā udake patissatī”ti uṇhapāsāṇe udakaṃ nāsiñcitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:613_8: Kappiyaudakena pana pāsāṇaṃ nibbāpetvā āsiñcituṃ vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:614: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:615_0: Vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti. Ettha ca paṭaṅgapāṇakānaṃ patanaṃ ñatvāpi suddhacittatāya
atk-vin02a1:615_1: dīpajālane viya sappāṇakabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi udakasaññāya paribhuñjitabbato paṇṇattivajjatā veditabbāti.
atk-vin02a1:618: 392. Tatiyasikkhāpade – ukkoṭentīti tassa tassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “akataṃ kamma”ntiādīni vadantā uccālenti; yathāpatiṭṭhitabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ na denti.
atk-vin02a1:619_0: 393. Yathādhammanti yo yassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamanāya dhammo vutto, teneva dhammenāti
atk-vin02a1:619_1: attho. Nihatādhikaraṇanti nihataṃ adhikaraṇaṃ; satthārā vuttadhammeneva vūpasamitaṃ
atk-vin02a1:620_0: 395. Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññīti yena kammena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ, tañce
atk-vin02a1:620_1: dhammakammaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ dhammakamme ayampi dhammakammasaññī hutvā yadi ukkoṭeti,
atk-vin02a1:620_2: pācittiyaṃ āpajjatīti attho. Etena nayena sesapadānipi veditabbāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-vin02a1:620_3: vitthāro pana “imesaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kati ukkoṭanā”tiādinā nayena parivāre
atk-vin02a1:620_4: vutto. Aṭṭhakathāsu taṃ sabbaṃ āharitvā tassevattho vaṇṇito. Mayaṃ pana taṃ tattheva
atk-vin02a1:620_5: vaṇṇayissāma. Idha āharitvā vaṇṇiyamāne hi suṭṭhutaraṃ sammoho bhaveyyāti na vaṇṇayimha.
atk-vin02a1:620_6: Sesamettha uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:623_0: 399. Catutthe – duṭṭhullā nāma āpattīti ettha cattāri pārājikāni atthuddhāravasena
atk-vin02a1:623_1: dassitāni, saṅghādisesāpatti pana adhippetā, taṃ chādentassa pācittiyaṃ. Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti
atk-vin02a1:623_2: dhure nikkhittamatte. Sacepi dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā āroceti, na rakkhati; dhuraṃ
atk-vin02a1:623_3: nikkhittamatteyeva pācittiyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sace pana evaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā paṭicchādanatthameva
atk-vin02a1:623_4: aññassa āroceti, sopi aññassāti etenupāyena samaṇasatampi samaṇasahassampi āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:623_5: āpajjatiyeva tāva, yāva koṭi na chijjati. Kadā pana koṭi chijjatīti? Mahāsumatthero
atk-vin02a1:623_6: tāva vadati – “āpattiṃ āpanno ekassa āroceti, so paṭinivattitvā tasseva āroceti;
atk-vin02a1:623_7: evaṃ koṭi chijjatī”ti. Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “ayañhi vatthupuggaloyeva. Āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:623_8: āpanno pana ekassa bhikkhuno āroceti, ayaṃ aññassa āroceti, so paṭinivattitvā yenassa
atk-vin02a1:623_9: ārocitaṃ, tasseva āroceti; evaṃ tatiyena puggalena dutiyassa ārocite koṭi chinnā hotī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:624_0: 400. Aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattinti avasese pañcāpattikkhandhe. Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ
atk-vin02a1:624_1: vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo
atk-vin02a1:624_2: cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro nāma. Sesamettha uttānamevāti. Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:624_3: – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:627_0: 402. Pañcamasikkhāpade – aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissantīti akkharāni likhantassa aṅguliyo
atk-vin02a1:627_1: dukkhā bhavissantīti cintesuṃ. Urassa dukkhoti gaṇanaṃ sikkhantena bahuṃ cintetabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:627_2: hoti, tenassa uro dukkho bhavissatīti maññiṃsu. Akkhīni dukkhā bhavissantīti rūpasuttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:627_3: sikkhantena kahāpaṇā parivattetvā parivattetvā passitabbā honti, tenassa akkhīni
atk-vin02a1:627_4: dukkhāni bhavissantīti maññiṃsu. Ḍaṃsādīsu ḍaṃsāti piṅgalamakkhikāyo. Dukkhānanti
atk-vin02a1:627_5: dukkhamānaṃ. Tibbānanti bahalānaṃ. Kharānanti tikhiṇānaṃ. Kaṭukānanti pharusānaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:627_6: amanāpatāya vā kaṭukarasasadisānaṃ. Asātānanti amadhurānaṃ. Pāṇaharānanti jīvitaharānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:628_0: 404. Sīmaṃ sammannatīti navaṃ sīmaṃ bandhati. Kurundiyaṃ pana udakukkhepaparicchindanepi
atk-vin02a1:628_1: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Paripuṇṇavīsativassoti paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇavīsativasso;
atk-vin02a1:628_2: gabbhavīsopi hi paripuṇṇavīsativassotveva saṅkhye gacchati. Yathāha –
atk-vin02a1:629_0: “Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhavīso upasampanno hoti. Atha kho
atk-vin02a1:629_1: āyasmato kumārakassapassa etadahosi – ‘bhagavatā paññattaṃ, na ūnavīsativasso puggalo
atk-vin02a1:629_2: upasampādetabboti. Ahañcamhi gabbhavīso upasampanno. Upasampanno nukhomhi, nanu kho
atk-vin02a1:629_3: upasampanno’ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Yaṃ bhikkhave mātukucchimhi paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:629_4: cittaṃ uppannaṃ, paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ tadupādāya sāvassa jāti. Anujānāmi,
atk-vin02a1:630_0: Tattha yo dvādasamāse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jāto, so tato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:630_1: yāva ekūnavīsatime vasse mahāpavāraṇā, taṃ atikkamitvā pāṭipade upasampādetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:631_0: Porāṇakattherā pana ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma
atk-vin02a1:631_1: pāṭipadadivase upasampādenti, taṃ kasmāti? Vuccate – ekasmiṃ vasse cha cātuddasikauposathā
atk-vin02a1:631_2: honti. Iti vīsatiyā vassesu cattāro māsā parihāyanti. Rājāno tatiye tatiye vasse
atk-vin02a1:631_3: vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhanti. Iti aṭṭhārasasu vassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhanti, tato uposathavasena
atk-vin02a1:631_4: parihīne cattāro māse apanetvā dve māsā avasesā honti, te dve māse gahetvā vīsativassāni
atk-vin02a1:631_5: paripuṇṇāni hontīti nikkaṅkhā hutvā nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipade upasampādenti.
atk-vin02a1:631_6: Ettha pana yo pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissati, taṃ sandhāya “ekūnavīsativassa”nti
atk-vin02a1:631_7: vuttaṃ. Tasmā yo mātukucchismiṃ dvādasamāse vasi, so ekavīsativasso hoti. Yo sattamāse
atk-vin02a1:631_8: vasi, so sattamāsādhikavīsativasso. Chamāsajāto pana na jīvati.
atk-vin02a1:632_0: 406. Anāpatti ūnavīsativassaṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassasaññīti ettha kiñcāpi upasampādentassa
atk-vin02a1:632_1: anāpatti, puggalo pana anupasampannova hoti. Sace pana so dasavassaccayena aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:632_2: upasampādeti, tañce muñcitvā gaṇo pūrati, sūpasampanno. Sopi ca yāva na jānāti, tāvassa
atk-vin02a1:632_3: neva saggantarāyo na mokkhantarāyo, ñatvā pana puna upasampajjitabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:633: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:637: 407. Chaṭṭhe – paṭiyālokanti sūriyālokassa paṭimukhaṃ; pacchimadisanti attho. Kammiyāti suṅkaṭṭhāne kammikā.
atk-vin02a1:638: 409. Rājānaṃ vā theyyaṃ gacchantīti rājānaṃ vā thenetvā vañcetvā rañño santakaṃ kiñci gahetvā idāni na tassa dassāmāti gacchanti.
atk-vin02a1:639_0: 411. Visaṅketenāti kālavisaṅketena divasavisaṅketena ca gacchato anāpatti. Maggavisaṅketena
atk-vin02a1:639_1: pana aṭavivisaṅketena vā āpattiyeva. Sesamettha bhikkhunivagge vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a1:639_2: Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:639_3: sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:642_0: 412. Sattame – padhūpento nisīdīti pajjhāyanto attānaṃyeva paribhāsanto nisīdi. Nāyyo
atk-vin02a1:642_1: so bhikkhu maṃ nippātesīti ayyo ayaṃ bhikkhu maṃ na nikkhāmesi; na maṃ gahetvā agamāsīti
atk-vin02a1:642_2: attho. Sesamettha bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhānasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:645: 417. Aṭṭhame – gaddhe bādhayiṃsūti gaddhabādhino; gaddhabādhino pubbapurisā assāti gaddhabādhipubbo, tassa gaddhabādhipubbassa gijjhaghātakakulappasutassāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:646_1: pañcavidhā. Tattha pañcānantariyakammā kammantarāyikā nāma. Tathā bhikkhunīdūsakakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:646_2: taṃ pana mokkhasseva antarāyaṃ karoti, na saggassa. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammā kilesantarāyikā
atk-vin02a1:646_4: Ariyūpavādā upavādantarāyikā nāma, te pana yāva ariye na khamāpenti tāvadeva, na
atk-vin02a1:646_5: tato paraṃ. Sañcicca āpannā āpattiyo āṇāvītikkamantarāyikā nāma, tāpi yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a1:646_6: vā paṭijānāti, na vuṭṭhāti vā na deseti vā tāvadeva, na tato paraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:647_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantarāyike jānāti, vinaye pana akovidattā
atk-vin02a1:647_1: paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti, tasmā rahogato evaṃ cintesi – “ime āgārikā
atk-vin02a1:647_2: pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti, bhikkhūpi
atk-vin02a1:647_3: manāpikāni cakkhuviññeyyāni rūpāni passanti…pe… kāyaviññeyye phoṭṭhabbe phusanti,
atk-vin02a1:647_4: mudukāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni paribhuñjanti, etaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā itthirūpā…pe…
atk-vin02a1:647_5: itthiphoṭṭhabbā eva na vaṭṭanti, etepi vaṭṭantī”ti. Evaṃ rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-vin02a1:647_6: sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:647_7: atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento viya sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruṃ upasaṃharanto viya pāpakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:647_8: diṭṭhigataṃ uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena
atk-vin02a1:647_9: paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ, natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto
atk-vin02a1:647_10: bhabbapuggalānaṃ āsaṃ chindanto jinassa āṇācakke pahāramadāsi. Tenāha – “tathāhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:648_1: Tiṇukkūpamā anudahanaṭṭhena. Aṅgārakāsūpamā mahābhitāpanaṭṭhena. Supinakūpamā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
atk-vin02a1:648_3: Asisūnūpamā adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena. Sattisūlūpamā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena. Sappasirūpamā sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhenāti
atk-vin02a1:648_4: ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana papañcasūdaniyaṃ majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:648_5: Evaṃ byākhoti evaṃ viya kho. Sesamettha pubbe vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:649: Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:652_0: 424-5. Navame – akaṭānudhammenāti anudhammo vuccati āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme
atk-vin02a1:652_1: vā pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge vā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena ukkhittakassa
atk-vin02a1:652_2: anulomavattaṃ disvā katā osāraṇā; so osāraṇasaṅkhāto anudhammo yassa na kato, ayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:652_3: akaṭānudhammo nāma, tādisena saddhinti attho. Tenevassa padabhājane “akaṭānudhammo
atk-vin02a1:653_0: Deti vā paṭiggaṇhāti vāti ekapayogena bahumpi dadato vā gaṇhato vā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:653_1: Vicchinditvā vicchinditvā dentassa ca gaṇhantassa ca payogagaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:653_2: Sesamettha uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:656_0: 428. Dasame – diṭṭhigataṃ uppannanti ariṭṭhassa viya etassāpi ayoniso ummujjantassa
atk-vin02a1:656_1: uppannaṃ. Nāsetūti ettha tividhā nāsanā – saṃvāsanāsanā, liṅganāsanā, daṇḍakammanāsanāti.
atk-vin02a1:656_2: Tattha āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhepanā saṃvāsanāsanā nāma. “Dūsako nāsetabbo mettiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:656_3: bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti ayaṃ liṅganāsanā nāma. “Ajjatagge te āvuso samaṇuddesa na ceva
atk-vin02a1:656_4: so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo”ti ayaṃ daṇḍakammanāsanā nāma. Ayaṃ idha adhippetā.
atk-vin02a1:656_5: Tenāha – “evañca pana bhikkhave nāsetabbo…pe… vinassā”ti. Tattha carāti gaccha. Pireti
atk-vin02a1:656_6: para amāmaka. Vinassāti nassa; yattha te na passāma, tattha gacchāti.
atk-vin02a1:657: 429. Upalāpeyyāti saṅgaṇheyya. Upaṭṭhāpeyyāti tena attano upaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpeyya. Sesaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:662_0: 434. Sahadhammikavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – etasmiṃ sikkhāpadeti etasmiṃ sikkhāpade
atk-vin02a1:662_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ na tāva sikkhissāmi. Āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha pana vācāya vācāya
atk-vin02a1:662_2: āpatti veditabbā. Sikkhamānena bhikkhave bhikkhunāti ovādaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā
atk-vin02a1:662_3: sikkhitukāmeneva hutvā ājānitabbañceva pucchitabbañca upaparikkhitabbañca. Sesamettha
atk-vin02a1:662_4: dubbacasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva padatthato veditabbaṃ. Vinicchayato uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:663: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:666_1: taṃ katheti. Vinayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti vinayassa vaṇṇo nāma pañcannampi sattannampi
atk-vin02a1:666_2: āpattikkhandhānaṃ vasena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā padabhājanena vaṇṇanā, taṃ bhāsati.
atk-vin02a1:666_3: Vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantānaṃ vinayapariyattimūlakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:666_4: vaṇṇaṃ guṇaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ bhāsati. Vinayadharo hi vinayapariyattimūlake pañcānisaṃse
atk-vin02a1:666_5: chānisaṃse sattānisaṃse aṭṭhānisaṃse navānisaṃse dasānisaṃse ekādasānisaṃse ca labhati
atk-vin02a1:666_6: te sabbe bhāsatīti attho. Katame pañcānisaṃse labhatīti? Attano sīlakkhandhasuguttiādike. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:667_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā vinayadhare puggale – attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti
atk-vin02a1:667_1: surakkhito, kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti, visārado saṅghamajjhe voharati, paccatthike
atk-vin02a1:667_2: sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhāti, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:668_0: Kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito? Idhekacco bhikkhu āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:668_1: āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati – alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccapakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā,
atk-vin02a1:669: Kathaṃ alajjitāya āpattiṃ āpajjati? Akappiyabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva madditvā vītikkamaṃ karoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:672: Kathaṃ aññāṇatāya āpajjati? Aññāṇapuggalo hi mando momūho kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto akattabbaṃ karoti, kattabbaṃ virādheti; evaṃ aññāṇatāya āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:673_0: Kathaṃ kukkuccapakatatāya āpajjati? Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ
atk-vin02a1:673_1: pucchitvā kappiyañce kattabbaṃ siyā, akappiyañce na kattabbaṃ, ayaṃ pana “vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-vin02a1:674_0: Kathaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitāya āpajjati? Acchamaṃsaṃ sūkaramaṃsanti khādati, dīpimaṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a1:674_1: migamaṃsanti khādati, akappiyabhojanaṃ kappiyabhojananti bhuñjati, vikāle kālasaññāya
atk-vin02a1:674_2: bhuñjati, akappiyapānakaṃ kappiyapānakanti pivati; evaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitāya āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:675_0: Kathaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitāya āpajjati? Sūkaramaṃsaṃ acchamaṃsanti khādati, migamaṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a1:675_1: dīpimaṃsanti khādati, kappiyabhojanaṃ akappiyabhojananti bhuñjati, kāle vikālasaññāya
atk-vin02a1:675_2: bhuñjati, kappiyapānakaṃ akappiyapānakanti pivati; evaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitāya āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:676_1: āpattiñca satisammosāya āpajjati; evamidhekacco bhikkhu imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:677_0: Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati. Kathaṃ lajjitāya nāpajjati?
atk-vin02a1:677_1: So hi “passatha bho, ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti
atk-vin02a1:677_2: imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi nāpajjati; evaṃ lajjitāya nāpajjati. Sahasā āpannampi
atk-vin02a1:677_3: desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti. Tato –
atk-vin02a1:678: “Sañcicca āpattiṃ na āpajjati, āpattiṃ na parigūhati;
atk-vin02a1:679: Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo”ti.
atk-vin02a1:681: Kathaṃ ñāṇatāya nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā kappiyameva karoti, akappiyaṃ na karoti; evaṃ ñāṇatāya nāpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:682_0: Kathaṃ akukkuccapakatatāya nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne
atk-vin02a1:682_1: vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ āpattiṃ anāpattiñca oloketvā kappiyañce
atk-vin02a1:682_2: hoti karoti, akappiyañce na karoti; evaṃ akukkuccapakatatāya nāpajjati.
atk-vin02a1:683_0: Kathaṃ akappiyādisaññitāya nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā akappiye
atk-vin02a1:683_1: kappiyasaññī na hoti, kappiye akappiyasaññī na hoti; suppatiṭṭhitā cassa sati hoti,
atk-vin02a1:683_2: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetabbaṃ vikappeti. Iti imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:683_3: nāpajjati. Āpattiṃ anāpajjanto akhaṇḍasīlo hoti parisuddhasīlo; evamassa attano sīlakkhandho
atk-vin02a1:684_0: Kathaṃ kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti? Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā
atk-vin02a1:684_1: bhikkhū “asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī”ti dūratopi tassa santikaṃ āgantvā
atk-vin02a1:684_2: kukkuccaṃ pucchanti, so tehi katassa kammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattigarukalahukādibhedaṃ
atk-vin02a1:684_3: sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ desāpetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpeti;
atk-vin02a1:685_0: Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatīti avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:685_1: sārajjaṃ okkamati, vinayadharassa taṃ na hoti. Kasmā? “Evaṃ kathentassa doso hoti;
atk-vin02a1:686_0: Paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma
atk-vin02a1:686_1: – attapaccatthikā ca sāsanapaccatthikā ca. Tattha mettiyabhummajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho
atk-vin02a1:686_2: ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ, ime attapaccatthikā nāma. Ye vā panaññepi
atk-vin02a1:686_3: dussīlā pāpadhammā, sabbe te attapaccatthikā. Viparītadassanā pana ariṭṭhabhikkhukaṇṭakasāmaṇeravesālikavajjiputtakā
atk-vin02a1:686_5: vatvā katapaggahā sāsanapaccatthikā nāma. Te sabbepi sahadhammena sakāraṇena vacanena
atk-vin02a1:686_6: yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ suniggahitaṃ katvā niggaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a1:687_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena.
atk-vin02a1:687_1: Tattha tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammo nāma. Terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa
atk-vin02a1:687_2: khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma. Cattāro maggā
atk-vin02a1:687_3: ca phalāni cāti ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma.
atk-vin02a1:688_0: Tattha keci therā “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo
atk-vin02a1:688_1: mamaccayena satthā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa pariyatti mūla”nti vadanti. Keci therā
atk-vin02a1:688_2: “ime ca subhadda bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assā”ti iminā suttena
atk-vin02a1:688_3: “sāsanassa paṭipattimūla”nti vatvā “yāva pañca bhikkhū sammā paṭipannā saṃvijjanti,
atk-vin02a1:688_4: tāva sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hotī”ti āhaṃsu. Itare pana therā pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi
atk-vin02a1:688_5: dhammābhisamayo natthī”ti āhaṃsu. Sace pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā
atk-vin02a1:688_6: honti, te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā dasavaggaṃ
atk-vin02a1:688_7: gaṇaṃ pūretvā majjhime janapadepi upasampadaṃ karissanti, etenupāyena vīsativaggagaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:688_8: saṅghaṃ pūretvā attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamayissanti.
atk-vin02a1:688_9: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo tividhassāpi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti evamayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:688_10: vinayadharo ime tāva pañcānisaṃse paṭilabhatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:689: Katame cha ānisaṃse labhatīti? Tassādheyyo uposatho, pavāraṇā, saṅghakammaṃ, pabbajjā, upasampadā, nissayaṃ deti sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
atk-vin02a1:690: Ye ime cātuddasiko, pannarasiko, sāmaggiuposatho, saṅghe uposatho, gaṇe puggale uposatho, suttuddeso, pārisuddhi, adhiṭṭhānauposathoti nava uposathā, sabbe te vinayadharāyattā.
atk-vin02a1:691_0: Yāpi ca imā cātuddasikā pannarasikā, sāmaggipavāraṇā, saṅghe pavāraṇā gaṇe puggale
atk-vin02a1:691_1: pavāraṇā, tevācikā, dvevācikā, samānavassikā pavāraṇāti nava pavāraṇāyo, tāpi vinayadharāyattā
atk-vin02a1:691_2: eva, tassa santakā, so tāsaṃ sāmī.
atk-vin02a1:692: Yānipi imāni apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammanti cattāri saṅghakammāni, tāni vinayadharāyattāni.
atk-vin02a1:693_0: Yāpi cāyaṃ upajjhāyena hutvā kulaputtānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca kātabbā, ayampi
atk-vin02a1:693_1: vinayadharāyattāva. Na hi añño dvipiṭakadharopi etaṃ kātuṃ labhati. So eva nissayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:693_2: deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Añño neva nissayaṃ dātuṃ labhati, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ.
atk-vin02a1:693_3: Sāmaṇerūpaṭṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanto pana vinayadharassa santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:693_4: sādituṃ labhati. Ettha ca nissayadānañceva sāmaṇerūpaṭṭhānañca ekamaṅgaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:694_0: Iti imesu chasu ānisaṃsesu ekena saddhiṃ purimā pañca cha honti, dvīhi saddhiṃ satta,
atk-vin02a1:694_1: tīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭha, catūhi saddhiṃ nava, pañcahi saddhiṃ dasa, sabbehi petehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:694_2: ekādasāti evaṃ vinayadharo puggalo pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava dasa ekādasa ca ānisaṃse
atk-vin02a1:694_3: labhatīti veditabbo. Evaṃ bhagavā ime ānisaṃse dassento vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:695_0: Ādissa ādissāti punappunaṃ vavatthapetvā visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:695_1: bhāsatīti vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya upālittherassa guṇaṃ bhāsati thometi pasaṃsati.
atk-vin02a1:695_2: Kasmā? Appeva nāma mama vaṇṇanaṃ sutvāpi bhikkhū upālissa santike vinayaṃ uggahetabbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:695_3: pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ, evamidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ bhavissati, pañcavassasahassāni pavattissatīti.
atk-vin02a1:696_0: Tedha bahū bhikkhūti te imaṃ bhagavato vaṇṇanaṃ sutvā “ime kirānisaṃse neva suttantikā
atk-vin02a1:696_1: na ābhidhammikā labhantī”ti yathāparikittitānisaṃsādhigame ussāhajātā bahū bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:696_2: therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti ayamettha
atk-vin02a1:697_0: 439-40. Uddissamāneti ācariyena antevāsikassa uddissamāne, so pana yasmā ācariye
atk-vin02a1:697_1: attano ruciyā uddisante vā ācariyaṃ yācitvā antevāsikena uddisāpente vā yo naṃ dhāreti,
atk-vin02a1:697_2: tasmiṃ sajjhāyaṃ karonte vā uddissamāno nāma hoti, tasmā “uddisante vā uddisāpente
atk-vin02a1:697_3: vā sajjhāyaṃ vā karonte”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Khuddānukhuddakehīti khuddakehi ca
atk-vin02a1:697_4: anukhuddakehi ca. Yāvadevāti tesaṃ saṃvattanamariyādaparicchedavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-vin02a1:697_5: hoti – etāni hi ye uddisanti, uddisāpenti sajjhāyanti vā, tesaṃ tāva saṃvattanti
atk-vin02a1:697_6: yāva “kappati nu kho, na kappati nu kho”ti kukkuccasaṅkhāto vippaṭisāro vihesā vicikicchāsaṅkhāto
atk-vin02a1:697_7: manovilekho ca uppajjatiyeva. Atha vā yāvadevāti atisayavavatthāpanaṃ; tassa saṃvattantīti
atk-vin02a1:697_8: iminā sambandho, kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya ativiya saṃvattantiyevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:697_9: Upasampannassa vinayaṃ vivaṇṇetīti upasampannassa santike tassa tasmiṃ vimatiṃ uppādetukāmo
atk-vin02a1:697_10: vinayaṃ vivaṇṇeti nindati garahati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:698: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:701_0: 444. Tatiye – anvaddhamāsanti anupaṭipāṭiyā addhamāse addhamāse; yasmā pana so uposathadivase
atk-vin02a1:701_1: uddisiyati, tasmā “anuposathika”nti padabhājane vuttaṃ. Uddissamāneti uddisiyamāne.
atk-vin02a1:701_2: Yasmā pana so pātimokkhuddesake uddisante uddisiyamāno nāma hoti, tasmā “uddisante”ti
atk-vin02a1:701_3: padabhājane vuttaṃ. Yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpannoti tasmiṃ anācāre ciṇṇe yaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin02a1:701_4: āpanno. Yathādhammo kāretabboti aññāṇena āpannattā tassā āpattiyā mokkho natthi,
atk-vin02a1:701_5: yathā pana dhammo ca vinayo ca ṭhito, tathā kāretabbo. Desanāgāminiñce āpanno hoti,
atk-vin02a1:701_6: desāpetabbo, vuṭṭhānagāminiñce, vuṭṭhāpetabboti attho. Sādhukanti suṭṭhu. Aṭṭhiṃkatvāti
atk-vin02a1:701_7: atthikabhāvaṃ katvā; atthiko hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:702_0: 447. Dhammakammetiādīsu mohāropanakammaṃ adhippetaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:702_1: – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:705: 449. Catutthe – pahāraṃ dentīti “āvuso pīṭhakaṃ paññapetha, pādadhovanaṃ āharathā”tiādīni vatvā tathā akarontānaṃ pahāraṃ denti.
atk-vin02a1:706_0: 451. Pahāraṃ deti āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha paharitukāmatāya pahāre dinne sacepi
atk-vin02a1:706_1: marati pācittiyameva. Pahārena hattho vā pādo vā bhijjati, sīsaṃ vā bhinnaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:706_2: pācittiyameva. “Yathāyaṃ saṅghamajjhe na virocati, tathā naṃ karomī”ti evaṃ virūpakaraṇādhippāyena
atk-vin02a1:706_3: kaṇṇaṃ vā nāsaṃ vā chindati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:707_0: 452. Anupasampannassāti gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā itthiyā vā purisassa vā antamaso
atk-vin02a1:707_1: tiracchānagatassāpi pahāraṃ deti, dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana rattacitto itthiṃ paharati, saṅghādiseso.
atk-vin02a1:708_0: 453. Kenaci viheṭhiyamānoti manussena vā tiracchānagatena vā viheṭhiyamāno. Mokkhādhippāyoti
atk-vin02a1:708_1: tato attano mokkhaṃ patthayamāno. Pahāraṃ detīti kāyakāyapaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:708_2: aññatarena pahāraṃ deti, anāpatti. Sacepi antarāmagge coraṃ vā paccatthikaṃ vā viheṭhetukāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:708_3: disvā “upāsaka, ettheva tiṭṭha, mā āgamī”ti vatvā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā āgacchantaṃ
atk-vin02a1:708_4: “gaccha re”ti muggarena vā satthakena vā paharitvā yāti, so ce tena pahārena marati,
atk-vin02a1:708_5: anāpattiyeva. Vāḷamigesupi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīni panassa
atk-vin02a1:711_0: 454. Pañcame – talasattikaṃ uggirantīti pahāradānākāraṃ dassetvā kāyampi kāyapaṭibaddhampi
atk-vin02a1:711_1: uccārenti. Te pahārasamuccitā rodantīti te pahāraparicitā pubbepi laddhapahārattā
atk-vin02a1:711_2: idāni ca pahāraṃ dassantīti maññamānā rodantīti attho. “Pahārassa muccitā”tipi sajjhāyanti,
atk-vin02a1:712_0: 457. Uggirati āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha sace uggiritvā viraddho pahāraṃ deti, avassaṃ
atk-vin02a1:712_1: dhāretuṃ asakkontassa pahāro sahasā patati, na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:712_2: Tena pahārena hatthādīsu yaṃkiñci bhijjati, dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a1:713_0: 458. Mokkhādhippāyo talasattikaṃ uggiratīti ettha pubbe vuttesu vatthūsu purimanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:713_1: talasattikaṃ uggirantassa anāpatti. Sacepi virajjhitvā pahāraṃ deti, anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:716_0: 459. Chaṭṭhe – anuddhaṃsentīti te kira sayaṃ ākiṇṇadosattā “evaṃ bhikkhū amhe neva
atk-vin02a1:716_1: codessanti, na sāressantī”ti attaparittāṇaṃ karontā paṭikacceva bhikkhū amūlakena
atk-vin02a1:716_2: saṅghādisesena codenti. Sesamettha terasakamhi amūlakasikkhāpade vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:717: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:720_0: 464. Sattame – upadahantīti uppādenti. Kukkuccaṃ upadahati āpatti pācittiyassāti
atk-vin02a1:720_1: vācāya vācāya āpatti. Anupasampannassāti sāmaṇerassa. Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe
atk-vin02a1:720_2: tayā nisinnaṃ nipannaṃ bhuttaṃ pītaṃ, saṅghamajjhe idañcidañca katantiādinā nayena
atk-vin02a1:720_3: kukkuccaṃ upadahati, vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīnipi
atk-vin02a1:723_1: Upassutinti sutisamīpaṃ; yattha ṭhatvā sakkā hoti tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotuṃ, tatthāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:723_2: Gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Mantentanti aññena
atk-vin02a1:723_3: saddhiṃ aññasmiṃ mantayamāne; “mantente”ti vā pāṭho, ayamevattho.
atk-vin02a1:724: 473. Vūpasamissāmīti upasamaṃ gamissāmi, kalahaṃ na karissāmi. Attānaṃ parimocessāmīti mama akārakabhāvaṃ kathetvā attānaṃ mocessāmi. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:725_0: Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, siyā kiriyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:725_1: sotukāmatāya gamanavasena, siyā akiriyaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā mantayamānānaṃ ajānāpanavasena,
atk-vin02a1:725_2: rūpiyaṃ aññavādakaṃ upassutīti imāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni ekaparicchedāni, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:725_3: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:728_0: 474. Navame – sace ca mayaṃ jāneyyāmāti sace mayaṃ jāneyyāma; cakāro pana nipātamattameva.
atk-vin02a1:728_1: Dhammikānanti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katattā dhammā etesu atthīti dhammikāni;
atk-vin02a1:728_2: tesaṃ dhammikānaṃ catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ. Khiyyati āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha vācāya
atk-vin02a1:728_3: vācāya pācittiyaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:731: 481. Dasame – vatthu vā ārocitanti codakena ca cuditakena ca attano kathā kathitā, anuvijjako sammato, ettāvatāpi vatthumeva ārocitaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:732: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:735: 484. Ekādasame – yathāmittatāti yathāmittatāya; yo yo mitto, tassa tassa detīti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo sabbapadesu. Sesaṃ ujjhāpanakādīsu vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a1:736: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:739_0: 489. Dvādasame – yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ tiṃsake pariṇāmanasikkhāpade vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a1:739_1: Ayameva hi viseso – tattha attano pariṇāmitattā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, idha puggalassa
atk-vin02a1:740: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:745: 494. Rājavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – orakoti parittako. Uparipāsādavaragatoti pāsādavarassa uparigato. Ayyānaṃ vāhasāti ayyānaṃ kāraṇā; tehi jānāpitattā jānāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:746_0: 497. Pitaraṃ patthetīti antaraṃ passitvā ghātetuṃ icchati. Rājantepuraṃ hatthisammaddantiādīsu
atk-vin02a1:746_1: hatthīhi sammaddo etthāti hatthisammaddaṃ; hatthisambādhanti attho. Assarathasammaddapadepi
atk-vin02a1:746_2: eseva nayo. “Sammatta”nti keci paṭhanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. “Rañño antepure hatthisammadda”ntipi
atk-vin02a1:746_3: pāṭho, tattha hatthīnaṃ sammaddaṃ hatthisammaddanti attho, rañño antepure hatthisammaddo
atk-vin02a1:746_4: atthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Rajanīyānīti tasmiṃ antepure edisāni rūpādīni.
atk-vin02a1:747_0: 498. Muddhāvasittassāti muddhani avasittassa. Anikkhanto rājā itoti anikkhantarājakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:747_1: tasmiṃ anikkhantarājake; sayanighareti attho. Ratanaṃ vuccati mahesī, niggatanti
atk-vin02a1:747_2: nikkhantaṃ, aniggataṃ ratanaṃ itoti aniggataratanakaṃ, tasmiṃ aniggataratanake; sayanighareti
atk-vin02a1:748: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:751_0: 502-3. Dutiye – vissaritvāti pamussitvā. Puṇṇapattaṃ nāma satato pañca kahāpaṇā.
atk-vin02a1:751_1: Kyāhaṃ karissāmīti kiṃ ahaṃ karissāmi. Ābharaṇaṃ omuñcitvāti mahālataṃ nāma navakoṭiagghanakaṃ alaṅkāraṃ apanetvā.
atk-vin02a1:753_0: 506. Aparikkhittassa upacāroti ettha upacāro nāma ārāmassa dve leḍḍupātā – “āvasathassa
atk-vin02a1:753_1: pana suppapāto vā musalapāto vā”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Uggaṇhāti āpatti pācittiyassāti
atk-vin02a1:753_2: ettha jātarūparajataṃ attano atthāya uggaṇhantassa vā uggaṇhāpentassa vā nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:753_3: pācittiyaṃ, saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyanavakammānaṃ atthāya dukkaṭaṃ, avasesaṃ muttādiratanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:753_4: attano vā saṅghādīnaṃ vā atthāya uggaṇhantassa vā uggaṇhāpentassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Kappiyavatthu
atk-vin02a1:753_5: vā akappiyavatthu vā hotu, antamaso mātu kaṇṇapiḷandhanatāḷapaṇṇampi gihisantakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:754_0: Sace pana mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ avassaṃ paṭisāmetabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti, attano
atk-vin02a1:754_1: atthāya gahetvā paṭisāmetabbaṃ. “Idaṃ paṭisāmetvā dehī”ti vutte pana “na vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-vin02a1:754_2: paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace “paṭisāmehī”ti pātetvā gacchanti, palibodho nāma hoti, paṭisāmetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:754_3: vaṭṭati. Vihāre kammaṃ karontā vaḍḍhakīādayo vā rājavallabhā vā attano upakaraṇabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a1:754_4: vā sayanabhaṇḍaṃ vā “paṭisāmetvā dethā”ti vadanti, chandenapi bhayenapi na kātabbameva,
atk-vin02a1:754_5: guttaṭṭhānaṃ pana dassetuṃ vaṭṭati. Balakkārena pātetvā gatesu ca paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:755_0: Ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vāti ettha sace mahāvihārasadiso mahārāmo hoti, tattha
atk-vin02a1:755_1: pākāraparikkhitte pariveṇe yattha bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā gahitaṃ bhavissatīti
atk-vin02a1:755_2: saṅkā uppajjati, tādise eva ṭhāne uggaṇhitvā vā uggaṇhāpetvā vā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Mahābodhidvārakoṭṭhakaambaṅgaṇasadisesu
atk-vin02a1:755_3: pana mahājanasañcaraṇaṭṭhānesu na gahetabbaṃ, palibodho na hoti. Kurundiyaṃ pana
atk-vin02a1:755_4: vuttaṃ “eko maggaṃ gacchanto nimanussaṭṭhāne kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ passati, ākiṇṇamanussepi
atk-vin02a1:755_5: jāte manussā tameva bhikkhuṃ āsaṅkanti, tasmā maggā okkamma nisīditabbaṃ. Sāmikesu
atk-vin02a1:755_6: āgatesu taṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace sāmike na passati patirūpaṃ karissatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:756_0: Rūpena vā nimittena vā saññāṇaṃ katvāti ettha rūpaṃ nāma antobhaṇḍikāya bhaṇḍaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:756_1: tasmā bhaṇḍikaṃ muñcitvā gaṇetvā ettakā kahāpaṇā vā jātarūparajataṃ vāti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:756_2: Nimittanti lañchanādi; tasmā lañchitāya bhaṇḍikāya mattikālañchananti vā lākhālañchananti
atk-vin02a1:756_3: vā nīlapilotikāya bhaṇḍikā katāti vā setapilotikāya katāti vā evamādi sabbaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:757_0: Bhikkhū patirūpāti lajjino kukkuccakā. Lolajātikānañhi hatthe ṭhapetuṃ na labhati.
atk-vin02a1:757_1: Yo pana neva tamhā āvāsā pakkamati, na sāmike passati, tenāpi attano cīvarādimūlaṃ
atk-vin02a1:757_2: na kātabbaṃ; thāvaraṃ pana senāsanaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā pokkharaṇī vā kāretabbā. Sace
atk-vin02a1:757_3: dīghassa addhuno accayena sāmiko āgacchati, “upāsaka tava santakena idaṃ nāma kataṃ,
atk-vin02a1:757_4: anumodāhī”ti vattabbo. Sace anumodati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce anumodati, “mama dhanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:758_0: 507. Ratanasammataṃ vissāsaṃ gaṇhātītiādīsu āmāsameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anāmāsaṃ na
atk-vin02a1:758_1: vaṭṭatiyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:761: 508. Tatiye – tiracchānakathanti ariyamaggassa tiracchānabhūtaṃ kathaṃ. Rājakathanti rājapaṭisaṃyutta kathaṃ. Corakathādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:762_0: 512. Santaṃ bhikkhunti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ cārittasikkhāpade vuttameva. Sace
atk-vin02a1:762_1: sambahulā kenaci kammena gāmaṃ pavisanti, “vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmī”ti sabbehi
atk-vin02a1:762_2: aññamaññaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ gāme taṃ kammaṃ na sampajjatīti aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchanti,
atk-vin02a1:762_3: gāmasatampi hotu, puna āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi. Sace pana ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā
atk-vin02a1:762_4: vihāraṃ gacchantā antarā aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitukāmā honti, puna āpucchitabbameva.
atk-vin02a1:763_0: Kulaghare vā āsanasālāya vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā telabhikkhāya vā sappibhikkhāya vā
atk-vin02a1:763_1: caritukāmo hoti, sace passe bhikkhu atthi, āpucchitvā gantabbaṃ. Asante natthīti
atk-vin02a1:763_2: gantabbaṃ. Vīthiṃ otaritvā bhikkhuṃ passati, āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi, anāpucchitvāpi
atk-vin02a1:763_3: caritabbameva. Gāmamajjhena maggo hoti, tena gacchantassa telādibhikkhāya carissāmīti
atk-vin02a1:763_4: citte uppanne sace passe bhikkhu atthi, āpucchitvā caritabbaṃ. Maggā anokkamma bhikkhāya
atk-vin02a1:763_5: carantassa pana āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi, aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne
atk-vin02a1:764_0: 515. Antarārāmantiādīsu na kevalaṃ anāpucchā kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā
atk-vin02a1:764_1: gacchantassapi anāpatti. Āpadāsūti sīho vā byaggho vā āgacchati, megho vā uṭṭheti,
atk-vin02a1:764_2: añño vā koci upaddavo uppajjati, anāpatti. Evarūpāsu āpadāsu bahigāmato antogāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:765: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:768_0: 517-20. Catutthe – bhedanameva bhedanakaṃ; taṃ assa atthīti bhedanakameva. Araṇiketi
atk-vin02a1:768_1: araṇidhanuke. Vidheti vedhake. Sesamettha uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:768_2: acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:772_0: 525. Chinditvā paribhuñjatīti ettha sace na chinditukāmo hoti, bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā
atk-vin02a1:772_1: pamāṇaṃ upari dasseti, uttānaṃ vā katvā paribhuñjati, ukkhipitvā vā tulāsaṅghāṭe
atk-vin02a1:772_2: ṭhapetvā aṭṭaṃ katvā paribhuñjati, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:775: 526. Chaṭṭhe – tūlaṃ onaddhametthāti tūlonaddhaṃ; tūlaṃ pakkhipitvā upari cimilikāya onaddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:778_0: 531-4. Sattame – nisīdanaṃ anuññātaṃ hotīti kattha anuññātaṃ? Cīvarakkhandhake paṇītabhojanavatthusmiṃ.
atk-vin02a1:778_1: Vuttañhi tattha – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kāyaguttiyā cīvaraguttiyā senāsanaguttiyā
atk-vin02a1:778_2: nisīdana”nti. Seyyathāpi purāṇāsikoṭṭhoti yathā nāma purāṇacammakāroti attho. Yathā
atk-vin02a1:778_3: hi cammakāro cammaṃ vitthataṃ karissāmīti ito cito ca samañchati, kaḍḍhati; evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:778_4: sopi taṃ nisīdanaṃ. Tena taṃ bhagavā evamāha – “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti
atk-vin02a1:778_5: santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte padese dvīsu
atk-vin02a1:778_6: ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā kariyanti, tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccati. Sesamettha
atk-vin02a1:781_0: 537. Aṭṭhame – kaṇḍupaṭicchādi anuññātā hotīti kattha anuññātā? Cīvarakkhandhake
atk-vin02a1:781_1: belaṭṭhasīsavatthusmiṃ. Vuttañhi tattha – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yassa kaṇḍu vā piḷakā
atk-vin02a1:781_2: vā assāvo vā thullakacchu vā ābādho tassa kaṇḍupaṭicchādi”nti.
atk-vin02a1:782_0: 539. Yassa adhonābhi ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti yassa bhikkhuno nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:782_1: upari. Kaṇḍūti kacchu. Piḷakāti lohitatuṇḍikā sukhumapiḷakā. Assāvoti arisabhagandaramadhumehādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:782_2: vasena asucipaggharaṇakaṃ. Thullakacchu vā ābādhoti mahāpiḷakābādho vuccati. Sesamettha
atk-vin02a1:785_0: 542. Navame – vassikasāṭikā anuññātā hotīti kattha anuññātā? Cīvarakkhandhake visākhāvatthusmiṃ.
atk-vin02a1:785_1: Vuttañhi tattha – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassikasāṭika”nti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:788: 547. Dasame – caturaṅgulomakoti catūhi aṅgulehi ūnakappamāṇo. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:798: Ṭhapitā ye ayaṃ dāni, tesaṃ bhavati vaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:799: 552. Paṭhamapāṭidesanīye tāva paṭikkamanakāleti piṇḍāya caritvā paṭiāgamanakāle. Sabbeva aggahesīti sabbameva aggahesi. Pavedhentīti kampamānā. Apehīti apagaccha.
atk-vin02a1:800_0: 553-5. Gārayhaṃ āvusotiādi paṭidesetabbākāradassanaṃ. Rathikāti racchā. Byūhanti
atk-vin02a1:800_1: anibbijjhitvā ṭhitā gatapaccāgataracchā. Siṅghāṭakanti catukkoṇaṃ vā tikoṇaṃ vā maggasamodhānaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:800_2: Gharanti kulagharaṃ. Etesu yattha katthaci ṭhatvā gaṇhantassa gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre
atk-vin02a1:800_3: ajjhohāragaṇanāya pāṭidesanīyaṃ. Hatthisālādīsu gaṇhantassāpi eseva nayo. Bhikkhunī
atk-vin02a1:800_4: rathikāya ṭhatvā deti, bhikkhu sacepi antarārāmādīsu ṭhatvā gaṇhāti, āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:800_5: “Antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāyā”ti hi vacanato bhikkhuniyā antaraghare ṭhatvā dadamānāya
atk-vin02a1:800_6: vasenettha āpatti veditabbā, bhikkhussa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ pana appamāṇaṃ. Tasmā sacepi
atk-vin02a1:800_7: vīthiādīsu ṭhito bhikkhu antarārāmādīsu ṭhatvā dadamānāya bhikkhuniyā gaṇhāti, anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:801_0: Yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
atk-vin02a1:801_1: Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassāti idaṃ āmisena asambhinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:801_2: sambhinne pana ekarase pāṭidesanīyameva. Ekato upasampannāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike
atk-vin02a1:801_3: upasampannāya. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya pana yathāvatthukameva.
atk-vin02a1:802_0: 556. Dāpeti na detīti aññātikā aññena kenaci dāpeti taṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti. Upanikkhipitvā
atk-vin02a1:802_1: detīti bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā “idaṃ ayya tumhākaṃ dammī”ti deti, evaṃ dinnaṃ “sādhu bhaginī”ti
atk-vin02a1:802_2: sampaṭicchitvā tāya eva vā bhikkhuniyā aññena vā kenaci paṭiggahāpetvā bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:802_3: vaṭṭati. Sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyāti etāsaṃ dadamānānaṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:803: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:807_0: 561. Attano bhattaṃ dāpeti na detīti ettha sacepi attano bhattaṃ deti, iminā sikkhāpadena
atk-vin02a1:807_1: anāpattiyeva, purimasikkhāpadena āpatti. Aññesaṃ bhattaṃ deti na dāpetīti ettha sacepi
atk-vin02a1:807_2: dāpeyya, iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti bhaveyya. Dentiyā pana neva iminā na purimena
atk-vin02a1:807_3: āpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:807_4: acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:810_0: 562. Tatiye – ubhatopasannanti dvīhi pasannaṃ upāsakenapi upāsikāyapi. Tasmiṃ kira
atk-vin02a1:810_1: kule ubhopi te sotāpannāyeva. Bhogena hāyatīti edisañhi kulaṃ sacepi asītikoṭidhanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:810_2: hoti, bhogehi hāyatiyeva. Kasmā? Yasmā tattha neva upāsikā na upāsako bhoge rakkhati.
atk-vin02a1:811_0: 569. Gharato nīharitvā dentīti āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā ānetvā denti. Sacepi anāgate
atk-vin02a1:811_1: bhikkhumhi paṭhamaṃyeva nīharitvā dvāre ṭhapetvā pacchā sampattassa denti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:811_2: Bhikkhuṃ pana disvā antogehato nīharitvā diyyamānaṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:811_3: Sesamettha uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:815_0: 573. Pañcannaṃ paṭisaṃviditanti pañcasu sahadhammikesu yaṃkiñci pesetvā khādanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:815_1: bhojanīyaṃ āharissāmāti paṭisaṃviditaṃ katampi appaṭisaṃviditamevāti attho. Ārāmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:815_2: ārāmūpacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti āraññakasenāsanārāmañca tassa upacārañca ṭhapetvā; upacārato
atk-vin02a1:815_3: nikkhantaṃ antarāmagge bhikkhuṃ disvā vā gāmaṃ āgatassa vā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katampi
atk-vin02a1:815_4: appaṭisaṃviditameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Sace sāsaṅkaṃ hoti sāsaṅkanti ācikkhitabbanti
atk-vin02a1:815_5: kasmā ācikkhitabbaṃ? Ārāme core vasante amhākaṃ nārocentīti vacanapaṭimocanatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:815_6: Corā vattabbā manussā idhūpacarantīti kasmā vattabbaṃ? Attano upaṭṭhākehi amhe gaṇhāpentīti
atk-vin02a1:816_0: Yāguyā paṭisaṃvidite tassā parivāro āhariyyatīti yāguyā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā “kiṃ
atk-vin02a1:816_1: suddhayāguyā dinnāya pūvabhattādīnipi etissā yāguyā parivāraṃ katvā dassāmā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:816_2: yaṃ kiñci āharanti, sabbaṃ paṭisaṃviditameva hoti. Bhattena paṭisaṃviditetiādīsupi
atk-vin02a1:816_3: eseva nayo. Asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā khādanīyādīni gahetvā gacchatīti
atk-vin02a1:816_4: sutvā aññānipi tena saddhiṃ attano deyyadhammaṃ āharanti, vaṭṭati. Yāguyā paṭisaṃviditaṃ
atk-vin02a1:816_5: katvā pūvaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā āharanti, etampi vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:817_0: 575. Gilānassāti appaṭisaṃviditepi gilānassa anāpatti. Paṭisaṃvidite vā gilānassa
atk-vin02a1:817_1: vā sesakanti ekassatthāya paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā āhaṭaṃ, tassa sesakaṃ aññassāpi bhuñjituṃ
atk-vin02a1:817_2: vaṭṭati. Catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā bahuṃ āhaṭaṃ hoti, aññesampi
atk-vin02a1:817_3: dātuṃ icchanti, etampi paṭisaṃviditasesakameva, sabbesampi vaṭṭati. Atha adhikameva
atk-vin02a1:817_4: hoti, sannidhiṃ mocetvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivasepi vaṭṭati. Gilānassa āhaṭāvasesepi
atk-vin02a1:817_5: eseva nayo. Yaṃ pana appaṭisaṃviditameva katvā ābhataṃ, taṃ bahiārāmaṃ pesetvā paṭisaṃviditaṃ
atk-vin02a1:817_6: kāretvā āharāpetabbaṃ, bhikkhūhi vā gantvā antarāmagge gahetabbaṃ. Yampi vihāramajjhena
atk-vin02a1:817_7: gacchantā vā vanacarakādayo vā vanato āharitvā denti, purimanayeneva paṭisaṃviditaṃ
atk-vin02a1:817_8: kāretabbaṃ. Tatthajātakanti ārāme jātakameva; mūlakhādanīyādiṃ aññena kappiyaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a1:817_9: dinnaṃ paribhuñjato anāpatti. Sace pana taṃ gāmaṃ haritvā pacitvā āharanti, na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:818: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:827_0: 576. Tattha parimaṇḍalanti samantato maṇḍalaṃ. Nābhimaṇḍalaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalanti uddhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:827_1: nābhimaṇḍalaṃ adho jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhikato
atk-vin02a1:827_2: paṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ otāretvā nivāsetabbaṃ, tato paraṃ otārentassa
atk-vin02a1:827_3: dukkaṭanti vuttaṃ. Yathā nisinnassa jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṃ paṭicchannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:827_4: hotīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ; evaṃ nivāsentassa pana nivāsanaṃ pamāṇikaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:827_5: Tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ – dīghato muṭṭhipañcakaṃ, tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyahatthaṃ. Tādisassa pana
atk-vin02a1:827_6: alābhe tiriyaṃ dvihatthapamāṇampi vaṭṭati jāṇumaṇḍalapaṭicchādanatthaṃ, nābhimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-vin02a1:827_7: pana cīvarenāpi sakkā paṭicchādetunti. Tattha ekapaṭṭacīvaraṃ evaṃ nivatthampi nivatthaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:828_0: Olambento nivāseti āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha na kevalaṃ purato ca pacchato ca olambetvā
atk-vin02a1:828_1: nivāsentasseva dukkaṭaṃ, ye panaññe “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihinivatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:828_2: nivāsenti hatthisoṇḍakaṃ macchavālakaṃ catukkaṇṇakaṃ tālavaṇṭakaṃ satavalikaṃ nivāsentī”tiādinā
atk-vin02a1:828_3: nayena khandhake nivāsanadosā vuttā, tathā nivāsentassāpi dukkaṭameva. Te sabbe vuttanayena
atk-vin02a1:828_4: parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa na honti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana tattheva āvi bhavissati.
atk-vin02a1:829_0: Asañciccāti purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsessāmīti evaṃ asañcicca; atha kho
atk-vin02a1:829_1: parimaṇḍalaṃyeva nivāsessāmīti virajjhitvā aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa anāpatti. Assatiyāti
atk-vin02a1:829_2: aññavihitassāpi tathā nivāsentassa anāpatti. Ajānantassāti ettha nivāsanavattaṃ ajānantassa
atk-vin02a1:829_3: mokkho natthi. Nivāsanavattañhi sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ, tassa anuggahaṇamevassa anādariyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:829_4: Taṃ pana sañcicca anuggaṇhantassa yujjati, tasmā uggahitavattopi yo āruḷhabhāvaṃ
atk-vin02a1:829_5: vā oruḷhabhāvaṃ vā na jānāti, tassa anāpatti. Kurundiyaṃ pana “parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ
atk-vin02a1:829_6: ajānantassa anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā mahāpiṇḍikamaṃso vā hoti,
atk-vin02a1:829_7: tassa sāruppatthāya jāṇumaṇḍalato aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:830_0: Gilānassāti jaṅghāya vā pāde vā vaṇo hoti, ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:830_1: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigā vā corā vā anubandhanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:831_0: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:831_2: āha. Upatissatthero pana “anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti vuttattā “lokavajjaṃ, akusalacittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:832_0: 577. Parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbanti “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihipārutaṃ
atk-vin02a1:832_1: pārupantī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ anekappakāraṃ gihipārupanaṃ apārupitvā idha vuttanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:832_2: ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanavattaṃ pūrentena parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ. Imāni
atk-vin02a1:832_3: ca dve sikkhāpadāni avisesena vuttāni. Tasmā vihārepi antaragharepi parimaṇḍalameva
atk-vin02a1:832_4: nivāsetabbañca pārupitabbañcāti. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbāni
atk-vin02a1:833_0: 578. Kāyaṃ vivaritvāti jattumpi urampi vivaritvā. Suppaṭicchannenāti na sasīsaṃ pārutena;
atk-vin02a1:833_1: atha kho gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ
atk-vin02a1:833_2: katvā paṭisaṃharitvā yāva maṇibandhaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaraghare gantabbaṃ. Dutiyasikkhāpade
atk-vin02a1:833_3: – galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sīsaṃ maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsato ca paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:834: 579. Vāsūpagatassāti vāsatthāya upagatassa rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā kāyaṃ vivaritvāpi nisīdato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:835: 580. Susaṃvutoti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpento; suvinītoti attho.
atk-vin02a1:836_0: 582. Okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhā khittacakkhu hutvā. Yugamattaṃ pekkhamānoti yugayuttako
atk-vin02a1:836_1: hi danto ājāneyyo yugamattaṃ pekkhati, purato catuhatthappamāṇaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ; imināpi
atk-vin02a1:836_2: ettakaṃ pekkhantena gantabbaṃ. Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentoti yo taṃtaṃdisābhāgaṃ
atk-vin02a1:836_3: pāsādaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vīthiṃ olokento gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:836_4: ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati. Nisīdantenāpi okkhittacakkhunāva nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:837_0: 584. Ukkhittakāyāti ukkhepena; itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ ekato vā ubhato
atk-vin02a1:837_1: vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho. Antoindakhīlato paṭṭhāya na evaṃ gantabbaṃ. Nisinnakāle
atk-vin02a1:837_2: pana dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenāpi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbanti.
atk-vin02a1:841_0: 588. Appasaddo antaraghareti ettha kittāvatā appasaddo hoti? Dvādasahatthe gehe ādimhi
atk-vin02a1:841_1: saṅghatthero, majjhe dutiyatthero, ante tatiyattheroti evaṃ nisinnesu saṅghatthero
atk-vin02a1:841_2: dutiyena saddhiṃ manteti, dutiyatthero tassa saddañceva suṇāti, kathañca vavatthapeti.
atk-vin02a1:841_3: Tatiyatthero pana saddameva suṇāti, kathaṃ na vavatthapeti. Ettāvatā appasaddo hoti.
atk-vin02a1:841_4: Sace pana tatiyatthero kathaṃ vavatthapeti, mahāsaddo nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a1:842: 590. Kāyaṃ paggahetvāti niccalaṃ katvā ujukena kāyena samena iriyāpathena gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca.
atk-vin02a1:847: 596-8. Khambhakato nāma kaṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho. Oguṇṭhitoti sasīsaṃ pāruto.
atk-vin02a1:848_0: 600. Ukkuṭikāyāti ettha ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādehi vā, aggapāde
atk-vin02a1:848_1: vā ukkhipitvā paṇhīhiyeva vā bhūmiṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ. Karaṇavacanaṃ panettha vuttalakkhaṇameva.
atk-vin02a1:851: 603. Ākirantepīti piṇḍapātaṃ dentepi. Pattasaññīti patte saññaṃ katvā.
atk-vin02a1:852_0: 604. Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti. Muggasūpo māsasūpoti
atk-vin02a1:852_1: ettha kulatthādīhi katasūpāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantiyevāti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Rasaraseti
atk-vin02a1:852_2: ettha ṭhapetvā dve sūpe avasesāni oloṇīsākasūpeyyamaccharasamaṃsarasādīni rasarasāti
atk-vin02a1:852_3: veditabbāni. Taṃ rasarasaṃ bahumpi gaṇhantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:853_0: 605. Samatittikanti samapuṇṇaṃ samabharitaṃ. Thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:853_1: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha thūpīkato nāma pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-vin02a1:853_2: kato; patte pakkhitto racito pūritoti attho. Evaṃ kataṃ agahetvā antomukhavaṭṭilekhāsamappamāṇo gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a1:854_0: Tattha thūpīkataṃ nāma “pañcahi bhojanehi kata”nti abhayatthero āha. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
atk-vin02a1:854_1: pana “piṇḍapāto nāma yāgupi bhattampi khādanīyampi cuṇṇapiṇḍopi dantakaṭṭhampi dasikasuttampī”ti
atk-vin02a1:854_2: idaṃ suttaṃ vatvā dasikasuttampi thūpīkataṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha. Tesaṃ vādaṃ sutvā bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:854_3: rohaṇaṃ gantvā cūḷasumanattheraṃ pucchiṃsu – “bhante thūpīkatapiṇḍapāto kena paricchinno”ti?
atk-vin02a1:854_4: Tesañca therānaṃ vādaṃ ārocesuṃ. Thero sutvā āha – “aho, cūḷanāgo sāsanato bhaṭṭho,
atk-vin02a1:854_5: ahaṃ etassa sattakkhattuṃ vinayaṃ vācento na kadāci evaṃ avacaṃ, ayaṃ kuto labhitvā
atk-vin02a1:854_6: evaṃ vadasī”ti. Bhikkhū theraṃ yāciṃsu – “kathetha dāni, bhante, kena paricchinno”ti?
atk-vin02a1:854_7: “Yāvakālikenāvuso”ti thero āha. Tasmā yaṃkiñci yāgubhattaṃ vā phalāphalaṃ vā āmisajātikaṃ
atk-vin02a1:854_8: samatittikameva gahetabbaṃ. Tañca kho adhiṭṭhānupagena pattena, itarena pana thūpīkatampi
atk-vin02a1:854_10: vaṭṭanti. Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatīti
atk-vin02a1:854_11: mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ. Yaṃ patte pakkhipiyamānaṃ pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādi
atk-vin02a1:854_12: heṭṭhā orohati, taṃ thūpīkataṃ nāma na hoti. Pūvavaṭaṃsakaṃ ṭhapetvā piṇḍapātaṃ denti,
atk-vin02a1:854_14: thūpīkataṃ na hoti. Bhattassa upari thālakaṃ vā pattaṃ vā ṭhapetvā pūretvā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a1:854_15: thūpīkataṃ nāma na hoti. Kurundiyampi vuttaṃ – “thālake vā paṇṇe vā pakkhipitvā taṃ
atk-vin02a1:855_0: Idha anāpattiyaṃ gilāno na āgato, tasmā gilānassapi thūpīkataṃ na vaṭṭati. Sabbattha
atk-vin02a1:855_1: pana paṭiggahetumeva na vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahitaṃ pana supaṭiggahitameva hoti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-vin02a1:858: 606. Sakkaccanti etthāpi asakkaccaṃ paṭiggahaṇeyeva āpatti, paṭiggahitaṃ pana supaṭiggahitameva. Sakkaccanti ca pattasaññīti cāti ubhayaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a1:859: 608. Sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā. Samasūpake vattabbaṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a1:861: 611. Paṭicchādetvā dentīti māghātasamayādīsu paṭicchannaṃ byañjanaṃ katvā denti. Viññattiyaṃ vattabbaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a1:863: 615. Nātimahanto kabaḷoti mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahantaṃ, kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddakaṃ, tesaṃ vemajjhappamāṇo. Khajjaketi ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:868: 619. Sakabaḷenāti ettha dhammaṃ kathento harītakaṃ vā laṭṭhimadhukaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti. Yattakena vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ na hoti, tattake mukhamhi sante kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:871: 622. Avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā.
atk-vin02a1:875: 626. Capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā.
atk-vin02a1:878_0: 627. Surusurukārakanti surusurūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā. Davoti parihāsavacanaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:878_1: taṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena “kiṃ buddho, silakabuddho, paṭibuddho; kiṃ dhammo, godhammo,
atk-vin02a1:878_2: ajadhammo; kiṃ saṅgho, migasaṅgho, pasusaṅgho”tiādinā nayena tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha
atk-vin02a1:879_0: 628. Hatthanillehakanti hatthaṃ nillehitvā nillehitvā. Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi
atk-vin02a1:879_1: nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati. Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo
atk-vin02a1:879_2: mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Pattanillehakaoṭṭhanillehakesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā
atk-vin02a1:879_3: ekaṅguliyāpi patto na nillehitabbo, ekaoṭṭhopi jivhāya na nillehitabbo, oṭṭhamaṃsehi
atk-vin02a1:879_4: eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:880_0: 631. Kokanadeti evaṃnāmake. Kokanadanti padumaṃ vuccati, so ca pāsādo padumasaṇṭhāno,
atk-vin02a1:880_1: tenassa kokanadotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakanti etaṃ paṭikkūlavasena
atk-vin02a1:880_2: paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā saṅghikampi puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhampi
atk-vin02a1:880_3: sarāvampi thālakampi na gahetabbameva, gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana hatthassa
atk-vin02a1:880_4: ekadeso āmisamakkhito na hoti, tena padesena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:881_0: 632. Uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:881_1: chaḍḍeti. Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti. Paṭiggahe
atk-vin02a1:881_2: vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchanto naṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti. Nīharitvāti bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti;
atk-vin02a1:882_1: Paṇṇacchattanti tālapaṇṇādīhi yehi kehici kataṃ. Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ
atk-vin02a1:882_2: pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva
atk-vin02a1:882_3: honti salākabaddhāni ca. Yampi tatthajātakadaṇḍakena kataṃ ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:882_4: tampi chattameva. Etesu yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. So taṃ chattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:882_5: dhārayamāno vā aṃse vā katvā ūrumhi vā ṭhapetvā yāva hatthena na muccati, tāvassa
atk-vin02a1:882_6: dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati, desentassa vuttanayena dukkaṭaṃ. Sace panassa añño chattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:882_7: dhāreti, chattapādukāya vā ṭhitaṃ hoti, hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na
atk-vin02a1:882_8: hoti. Tassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dhammaparicchedo panettha padasodhamme vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:883: 635. Daṇḍapāṇissāti ettha daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo daṇḍapāṇibhāvo panassa chattapāṇimhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:884: 636. Satthapāṇimhipi eseva nayo. Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
atk-vin02a1:885_0: 637. Āvudhapāṇissāti ettha kiñcāpi vuttaṃ – “āvudhaṃ nāma cāpo kodaṇḍo”ti, atha kho
atk-vin02a1:885_1: sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā saddhiṃ vā sarena
atk-vin02a1:885_2: dhanuṃ gahetvā suddhadhanuṃ vā suddhasaraṃ vā sajiyadhanuṃ vā nijjiyadhanuṃ vā gahetvā
atk-vin02a1:885_3: ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammo desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa dhanuṃ kaṇṭhepi
atk-vin02a1:885_4: paṭimukkaṃ hoti, yāva hatthena na gaṇhāti, tāva dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti.
atk-vin02a1:888_0: 638. Akkantassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantaraṃ appavesetvā kevalaṃ pādukaṃ akkamitvā
atk-vin02a1:888_1: ṭhitassa. Paṭimukkassāti paṭimuñcitvā ṭhitassa. Upāhanāyapi eseva nayo. Omukkoti
atk-vin02a1:889_0: 640. Yānagatassāti ettha sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito, sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:889_1: vaṃsena vayhati, ayutte vā vayhādike yāne, visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi
atk-vin02a1:889_2: nisinno yānagatotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:889_3: Visuṃ nisinnesupi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati, samappamāṇepi
atk-vin02a1:889_4: vaṭṭati. Purime yāne nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa vaṭṭati. Pacchime pana uccatarepi
atk-vin02a1:890_0: 641. Sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi mañcapīṭhe
atk-vin02a1:890_1: vā bhūmipadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sayanagatena pana sayanagatassa
atk-vin02a1:890_2: uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Nipannena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa
atk-vin02a1:890_3: vā desetuṃ vaṭṭati, nisinnenāpi ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā vaṭṭati. Ṭhitena ṭhitasseva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:891: 642. Pallatthikāyāti āyogapallatthikāya vā hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:892: 643. Veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhanena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati; evaṃ veṭhitasīsassa.
atk-vin02a1:894: 645. Chamāyaṃ nisinnenāti bhūmiyaṃ nisinnena. Āsane nisinnassāti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
atk-vin02a1:895_0: 647. Chapakassāti caṇḍālassa. Chapakīti caṇḍālī. Nilīnoti paṭicchanno hutvā. Yatra
atk-vin02a1:895_1: hi nāmāti yo hi nāma. Sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ katanti tattheva paripatīti “sabbo ayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:895_2: loko saṅkaraṃ gato nimmariyādo”ti imaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā tattheva tesaṃ dvinnampi antarā
atk-vin02a1:895_3: rukkhato patito. Patitvā ca pana ubhinnampi purato ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-vin02a1:897_0: Tattha ubho atthaṃ na jānantīti dvepi janā pāḷiyā atthaṃ na jānanti. Dhammaṃ na passareti
atk-vin02a1:897_1: pāḷiṃ na passanti. Katame te ubhoti? “Yo cāyaṃ mantaṃ vāceti, yo cādhammenadhīyatī”ti.
atk-vin02a1:897_2: Evaṃ brāhmaṇañca rājānañca ubhopi adhammikabhāve ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a1:898_0: Tato brāhmaṇo sālīnanti gāthamāha. Tassattho – jānāmahaṃ bho “ayaṃ adhammo”ti; api
atk-vin02a1:898_1: ca kho mayā dīgharattaṃ saputtadāraparijanena rañño santako sālīnaṃ odano bhutto.
atk-vin02a1:898_3: sucimaṃsūpasecano. Tasmā dhamme na vattāmīti yasmā evaṃ mayā rañño odano bhutto,
atk-vin02a1:898_4: aññe ca bahū lābhā laddhā, tasmā dhamme ahaṃ na vattāmi udare baddho hutvā, na dhammaṃ
atk-vin02a1:898_5: ajānanto. Ayañhi dhammo ariyehi vaṇṇito pasattho thomitoti jānāmi.
