atk-vin02a1:899_0: Atha naṃ chapako “dhiratthū”tiādinā gāthādvayena ajjhabhāsi. Tassattho – yo tayā
atk-vin02a1:899_1: dhanalābho ca yasalābho ca laddho, dhiratthu taṃ dhanalābhaṃ yasalābhañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-vin02a1:899_2: Kasmā? Yasmā ayaṃ tayā laddho lābho āyatiṃ apāyesu vinipātanahetunā sampati ca adhammacaraṇena
atk-vin02a1:899_3: vutti nāma hoti. Evarūpā yā vutti āyatiṃ vinipātena idha adhammacaraṇena vā nippajjati,
atk-vin02a1:902_0: Paribbaja mahābrahmeti mahābrāhmaṇa ito disā sīghaṃ palāyassu. Pacantaññepi pāṇinoti
atk-vin02a1:902_1: aññepi sattā pacanti ceva bhuñjanti ca; na kevalaṃ tvañceva rājā ca. Mā tvaṃ adhammo
atk-vin02a1:902_2: ācarito asmā kumbhamivābhidāti sace hi tvaṃ ito aparibbajitvā imaṃ adhammaṃ ācarissasi,
atk-vin02a1:902_3: tato tvaṃ so adhammo evaṃ ācarito yathā udakakumbhaṃ pāsāṇo bhindeyya; evaṃ bhecchati,
atk-vin02a1:904: Mā tvaṃ adhammo ācarito, asmā kumbhamivābhidā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:905: Ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnataṭṭhāne nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:906_0: 648. Na ṭhito nisinnassāti sacepi therupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ āsane
atk-vin02a1:906_1: nisinno mahāthero pañhaṃ pucchati, na kathetabbaṃ. Gāravena pana theraṃ uṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin02a1:906_2: pucchathāti vattuṃ na sakkā, passe ṭhitabhikkhussa kathemīti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:907_0: 649. Na pacchato gacchantenāti ettha sace purato gacchanto pacchato gacchantaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:907_1: pucchati, na kathetabbaṃ. Pacchimassa bhikkhuno kathemīti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Saddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:907_2: uggahitadhammaṃ pana sajjhāyituṃ vaṭṭati. Samadhurena gacchantassa kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:908: 650. Na uppathenāti etthāpi sace dvepi sakaṭapathe ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:909: 651. Asañciccāti paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañcicca kato nāma anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:910_0: 652. Na hariteti ettha yampi jīvarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin02a1:910_1: sākhā vā bhūmilaggā gacchati, sabbaṃ haritasaṅkhātameva. Khandhe nisīditvā appaharitaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:910_2: pātetuṃ vaṭṭati. Appaharitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentasseva sahasā nikkhamati, gilānaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:910_3: ṭhito hoti, vaṭṭati. Appaharite katoti appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palālaṇḍupakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:910_4: vā ṭhapetvā katopi pacchā haritaṃ ottharati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi
atk-vin02a1:911_0: 653. Na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesu
atk-vin02a1:911_1: pana aparibhogesu anāpatti. Deve vassante samantato udakogho hoti, anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:911_2: olokentasseva nikkhamati, vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ – “etādise kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:911_3: alabhantena kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sesaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a1:913_2: pañcāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhahanti,
atk-vin02a1:913_3: kiriyāni, saññāvimokkhāni, sacittakāni, lokavajjāni, kāyakammavacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanānīti.
atk-vin02a1:914_1: samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:915_1: ekādasa sikkhāpadāni dhammadesanasamuṭṭhānāni vācācittato samuṭṭhahanti, kiriyākiriyāni,
atk-vin02a1:915_2: saññāvimokkhāni, sacittakāni, lokavajjāni, vacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanānīti.
atk-vin02a1:917: Sabbasekhiyesu ābādhapaccayā anāpatti, thūpīkatapiṇḍapāte sūpabyañjanena paṭicchādane ujjhānasaññimhīti tīsu sikkhāpadesu gilāno natthīti.
atk-vin02a1:921_0: 655. Adhikaraṇasamathesu – sattāti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhyāparicchedo. Catubbidhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:921_1: adhikaraṇaṃ samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Tesaṃ vitthāro khandhake ca
atk-vin02a1:921_2: parivāre ca vutto, tassatthaṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:926: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:927: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medaninti.
atk-vin02a1:935: Kātuṃ pārājike tāva, hoti saṃvaṇṇanā ayaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:937_0: 656. Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati…pe… sāḷho migāranattāti ettha
atk-vin02a1:937_1: sāḷhoti tassa nāmaṃ; migāramātuyā pana nattā hoti, tena vuttaṃ – “migāranattā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:937_2: Navakammikanti navakammādhiṭṭhāyikaṃ. Paṇḍitāti paṇḍiccena samannāgatā. Byattāti
atk-vin02a1:937_3: veyyattikena samannāgatā. Medhāvinīti pāḷiggahaṇe satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya atthaggahaṇe
atk-vin02a1:937_4: paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā samannāgatā. Dakkhāti chekā; avirajjhitvā sīghaṃ kattabbakārinīti
atk-vin02a1:937_5: attho. Analasāti ālasiyavirahitā. Tatrupāyāyāti tesu tesu kammesu upāyabhūtāya. Vīmaṃsāyāti
atk-vin02a1:937_6: kattabbakammupaparikkhāya. Samannāgatāti sampayuttā. Alaṃ kātunti samatthā taṃ taṃ
atk-vin02a1:937_7: kammaṃ kātuṃ. Alaṃ saṃvidhātunti evañca evañca idaṃ hotūti evaṃ saṃvidahitumpi samatthā.
atk-vin02a1:937_8: Katākataṃ jānitunti katañca akatañca jānituṃ. Teti te ubho; sā ca sundarīnandā so
atk-vin02a1:937_9: ca sāḷhoti attho. Bhattaggeti parivesanaṭṭhāne. Nikūṭeti koṇasadisaṃ katvā dassite
atk-vin02a1:937_10: gambhīre. Vissaro me bhavissatīti virūpo me saro bhavissati; vippakārasaddo bhavissatīti
atk-vin02a1:937_11: attho. Patimānentīti apekkhamānā. Kyāhanti kiṃ ahaṃ. Jarādubbalāti jarāya dubbalā.
atk-vin02a1:938_0: 657-8. Avassutāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutā; tintā kilinnāti attho. Padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:938_1: panassa tameva rāgaṃ gahetvā “sārattā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sārattāti vatthaṃ viya
atk-vin02a1:938_2: raṅgajātena kāyasaṃsaggarāgena suṭṭhu rattā. Apekkhavatīti tasseva rāgassa vasena
atk-vin02a1:938_3: tasmiṃ purise pavattāya apekkhāya samannāgatā. Paṭibaddhacittāti tena rāgena tasmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:938_4: purise bandhitvā ṭhapitacittā viya. Esa nayo dutiyapadavibhaṅgepi. Purisapuggalassāti
atk-vin02a1:938_5: purisasaṅkhātassa puggalassa. Adhakkhakanti akkhakānaṃ adho. Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti
atk-vin02a1:938_6: jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ upari. Padabhājane pana padapaṭipāṭiyā eva “heṭṭhakkhakaṃ uparijāṇumaṇḍala”nti
atk-vin02a1:938_7: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca ubbhakapparampi ubbhajāṇumaṇḍaleneva saṅgahitaṃ. Sesaṃ mahāvibhaṅge
atk-vin02a1:938_8: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Purimāyo upādāyāti sādhāraṇapārājikehi pārājikāyo catasso
atk-vin02a1:938_9: upādāyāti attho. Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikāti idaṃ pana imissā pārājikāya nāmamattaṃ, tasmā
atk-vin02a1:939_0: 659. Evaṃ uddiṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ padānukkamena vibhajitvā idāni avassutādibhedena āpattibhedaṃ
atk-vin02a1:939_2: ceva purisassa ca kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutabhāve satīti attho. Kāyena kāyaṃ āmasatīti
atk-vin02a1:939_3: bhikkhunī yathāparicchinnena kāyena purisassa yaṃkiñci kāyaṃ puriso vā yena kenaci
atk-vin02a1:939_4: kāyena bhikkhuniyā yathāparicchinnaṃ kāyaṃ āmasati, ubhayathāpi bhikkhuniyā pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:939_5: Kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhanti vuttappakāreneva attano kāyena purisassa kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:939_6: Āmasatīti ettha sayaṃ vā āmasatu, tassa vā āmasanaṃ sādiyatu, thullaccayameva. Kāyapaṭibaddhena
atk-vin02a1:939_7: kāyanti attano vuttappakārakāyapaṭibaddhena purisassa kāyaṃ. Āmasatīti idhāpi sayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:939_8: vā āmasatu, tassa vā āmasanaṃ sādiyatu, thullaccayameva. Avasesapadesupi imināva
atk-vin02a1:940_0: Sace pana bhikkhu ceva bhikkhunī ca hoti, tatra ce bhikkhunī āmasati, bhikkhu niccalo
atk-vin02a1:940_1: hutvā cittena sādiyati, bhikkhu āpattiyā na kāretabbo. Sace bhikkhu āmasati, bhikkhunī
atk-vin02a1:940_2: niccalā hutvā citteneva adhivāseti, kāyaṅgaṃ acopayamānāpi pārājikakkhette pārājikena,
atk-vin02a1:940_3: thullaccayakkhette thullaccayena, dukkaṭakkhette dukkaṭena kāretabbā. Kasmā? “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
atk-vin02a1:940_4: sādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vinicchayo. Evaṃ pana sati kiriyāsamuṭṭhānatā
atk-vin02a1:940_5: na dissati, tasmā tabbahulanayena sā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:941: 660. Ubbhakkhakanti akkhakānaṃ upari. Adhojāṇumaṇḍalanti jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ heṭṭhā. Ettha ca adhokapparampi adhojāṇumaṇḍaleneva saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:942: 662. Ekatoavassuteti ettha kiñcāpi ekatoti avisesena vuttaṃ, tathāpi bhikkhuniyā eva avassute sati ayaṃ āpattibhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a1:943_0: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vinicchayo – bhikkhunī kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutā, purisopi
atk-vin02a1:943_1: tatheva. Adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale kāyappadese kāyasaṃsaggasādiyane sati bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a1:943_2: pārājikaṃ. Bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggarāgo, purisassa methunarāgo vā gehassitapemaṃ
atk-vin02a1:943_3: vā suddhacittaṃ vā hotu, thullaccayameva. Bhikkhuniyā methunarāgo, purisassa kāyasaṃsaggarāgo
atk-vin02a1:943_4: vā methunarāgo vā gahessitapemaṃ vā suddhacittaṃ vā hotu, dukkaṭaṃ. Bhikkhuniyā gehassitapemaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:943_5: purisassa vuttesu catūsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotu, dukkaṭameva. Bhikkhuniyā suddhacittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:943_6: purisassa vuttesu catūsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotu, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:944_0: Sace pana bhikkhu ceva hoti bhikkhunī ca ubhinnaṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgo, bhikkhussa saṅghādiseso,
atk-vin02a1:944_1: bhikkhuniyā pārājikaṃ. Bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggarāgo, bhikkhussa methunarāgo vā gehassitapemaṃ
atk-vin02a1:944_2: vā, bhikkhuniyā thullaccayaṃ, bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ methunarāgo vā gehassitapemaṃ
atk-vin02a1:944_3: vā, ubhinnampi dukkaṭameva. Yassa yattha suddhacittaṃ, tassa tattha anāpatti. Ubhinnampi
atk-vin02a1:945_0: 663. Anāpatti asañciccātiādīsu virajjhitvā vā āmasantiyā aññavihitāya vā “ayaṃ puriso
atk-vin02a1:945_1: vā itthī vā”ti ajānantiyā vā tena phuṭṭhāyapi taṃ phassaṃ asādiyantiyā vā āmasanepi
atk-vin02a1:946: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:949: 664. Dutiye pārājike – kacci no sāti kacci nu sā. Avaṇṇoti aguṇo. Akittīti nindā. Ayasoti parivāravipatti; parammukhagarahā vā.
atk-vin02a1:950: 665. Vajjapaṭicchādikāti idampi imissā pārājikāya nāmamattameva, tasmā padabhājane na vicāritaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:951_0: 666. Sā vā ārocetīti yā pārājikaṃ āpannā, sā sayaṃ āroceti. Aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:951_1: aññataranti bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇānaṃ catunnaṃ asādhāraṇānañca catunnameva aññataraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:951_2: Idañca pārājikaṃ pacchā paññattaṃ, tasmā “aṭṭhanna”nti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ. Purimena
atk-vin02a1:951_3: pana saddhiṃ yugaḷattā imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapitanti veditabbaṃ. Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti
atk-vin02a1:951_4: dhure nikkhittamatte. Vitthārakathā panettha sappāṇakavaggamhi duṭṭhullasikkhāpade
atk-vin02a1:951_5: vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Tatra hi pācittiyaṃ, idha pārājikanti ayameva viseso. Sesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:951_6: tādisameva. Vajjapaṭicchādikāti idampiimissā pārājikāya nāmamatthāmeva, tasmā padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:952: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:955_0: 669. Tatiye – dhammenāti bhūtena vatthunā. Vinayenāti codetvā sāretvā. Padabhājanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:955_1: panassa “yena dhammena yena vinayena ukkhitto suukkhitto hotī”ti imaṃadhippāyamattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:955_2: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Satthusāsanenāti ñattisampadāya ceva anusāvanasampadāya ca. Padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:955_3: panassa “jinasāsanena buddhasāsanenā”ti vevacanamattameva vuttaṃ. Saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:955_4: vātiādīsu yena saṅghena kammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ saṅghaṃ vā tattha sambahulapuggalasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin02a1:955_5: gaṇaṃ vā, ekapuggalaṃ vā taṃ kammaṃ vā na ādiyati, na anuvattati, na tattha ādaraṃ
atk-vin02a1:955_6: janetīti attho. Samānasaṃvāsakā bhikkhū vuccanti sahāyā, so tehi saddhiṃ natthīti
atk-vin02a1:955_7: ettha “ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā”ti ayaṃ tāva saṃvāso; samāno saṃvāso etesanti
atk-vin02a1:955_8: samānasaṃvāsakā.Evarūpā bhikkhū bhikkhussa tasmiṃ saṃvāse saha ayanabhāvena sahāyāti
atk-vin02a1:955_9: vuccanti. Idāni yena saṃvāsena te samānasaṃvāsakāti vuttā, so saṃvāso tassa ukkhittakassa
atk-vin02a1:955_10: tehi saddhiṃ natthi. Yehi ca saddhiṃ tassa so saṃvāso natthi, na tena te bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:955_11: attano sahāyā katā honti. Tasmā vuttaṃ “samānasaṃvāsakā bhikkhū vuccanti sahāyā,
atk-vin02a1:955_12: so tehi saddhiṃ natthi, tena vuccati akatasahāyo”ti. Sesaṃ saṅghabhedasikkhāpadādīsu
atk-vin02a1:956: Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:959_1: Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vātiādīsu pana yaṃ purisapuggalena
atk-vin02a1:959_2: hatthe gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇanti vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇepi.
atk-vin02a1:959_3: Hatthaggahaṇanti ettha ca hatthaggahaṇañca aññampi apārājikakkhette gahaṇañca ekajjhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:959_4: katvā hatthaggahaṇanti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tenevassa padabhājane “hatthaggahaṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:959_5: vā sādiyeyyāti hattho nāma kapparaṃ upādāya yāva agganakhā, etassa asaddhammassa
atk-vin02a1:959_6: paṭisevanatthāya ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
atk-vin02a1:959_7: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca asaddhammoti kāyasaṃsaggo veditabbo, na methunadhammo. Na hi methunassa
atk-vin02a1:959_8: sāmantā thullaccayaṃ hoti. “Viññū paṭibalo kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjitunti vacanampi cettha sādhakaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:965_0: Imāya parivāre vuttāya sedamocakagāthāya virujjhatīti ce? Na; methunadhammassa pubbabhāgattā.
atk-vin02a1:965_3: sikkhāpadāni methunadhammassa pubbabhāgoti vuttāni. Tasmā kāyasaṃsaggo methunadhammassa
atk-vin02a1:965_4: pubbabhāgattā paccayo hoti. Iti chejjā siyā methunadhammapaccayāti ettha iminā pariyāyena
atk-vin02a1:965_5: attho veditabbo. Etenupāyena sabbapadesu vinicchayo veditabbo. Apica “saṅketaṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:965_6: gaccheyyā”ti etassa padabhājane “itthannāmaṃ āgacchā”ti. Evaṃnāmakaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:966_0: 676. Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī assamaṇī hotīti anulomato vā paṭilomato vā ekantarikāya
atk-vin02a1:966_1: vā yena tena nayena aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentīyeva assamaṇī hoti. Yā pana ekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:966_2: vā vatthuṃ satta vā vatthūni satakkhattumpi pūreti, neva assamaṇī hoti. Āpannā āpattiyo
atk-vin02a1:966_3: desetvā muccati. Apicettha gaṇanūpikā āpatti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ “atthāpatti desitā
atk-vin02a1:966_4: gaṇanūpikā, atthāpatti desitā na gaṇanūpikā”ti. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – idāni nāpajjissāmīti
atk-vin02a1:966_5: dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desitā gaṇanūpikā desitagaṇanaṃ upeti pārājikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a1:966_6: Tasmā yā ekaṃ āpannā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desetvā puna kilesavasena āpajjati, puna
atk-vin02a1:966_7: deseti, evaṃ aṭṭha vatthūni pūrentīpi pārājikā na hoti. Yā pana āpajjitvā punapi
atk-vin02a1:966_8: aññaṃ vatthuṃ āpajjissāmīti saussāhāva deseti, tassā sā āpatti nagaṇanūpikā, desitāpi
atk-vin02a1:966_9: adesitā hoti, desitagaṇanaṃ na gacchati, pārājikasseva aṅgaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhame vatthumhi
atk-vin02a1:967: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:969_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā cattāro
atk-vin02a1:969_1: ime ca cattāroti evaṃ pātimokkhuddesamaggena uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti
atk-vin02a1:969_2: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ mahāvibhaṅge vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:977: 678. Udositanti bhaṇḍasālā. Māyyo evaṃ avacāti ayyo mā evaṃ avaca. Apināyyāti apinu ayyā. Accāvadathāti atikkamitvā vadatha; akkosathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:978_0: 679. Ussayavādikāti mānussayavasena kodhussayavasena vivadamānā. Yasmā pana sā atthato
atk-vin02a1:978_1: aṭṭakārikā hoti, tasmā “ussayavādikā nāma aḍḍakārikā vuccatī”ti padabhājane vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:978_2: Ettha ca aḍḍoti vohārikavinicchayo vuccati, yaṃ pabbajitā “adhikaraṇa”ntipi vadanti.
atk-vin02a1:978_3: Dutiyaṃ vā pariyesatīti sakkhiṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā pariyesati, dukkaṭaṃ. Gacchati vāti
atk-vin02a1:978_4: upassayo vā hotu bhikkhācāramaggo vā, yattha ṭhitāya “aḍḍaṃ karissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-vin02a1:978_5: tato vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gacchantiyā padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Ekassa ārocetīti
atk-vin02a1:978_6: dvīsu janesu yassa kassaci ekassa kathaṃ yo koci vohārikānaṃ āroceti. Dutiyassa ārocetīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:979_0: Ayaṃ panettha asammohatthāya vitthārakathā – yattha katthaci antamaso bhikkhunupassayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:979_1: āgatepi vohārike disvā bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ āroceti, bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ. Upāsako
atk-vin02a1:979_2: attano kathaṃ āroceti, bhikkhuniyā thullaccayaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ upāsako attano kathaṃ āroceti,
atk-vin02a1:979_3: bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ. Atha sā attano kathaṃ āroceti, thullaccayaṃ. Bhikkhunī upāsakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:979_4: vadati – “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti, so attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:979_5: ārocetu bhikkhuniyā vā, paṭhamārocane dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyārocane thullaccayaṃ. Upāsako
atk-vin02a1:979_6: bhikkhuniṃ vadati – “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti, etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:980_0: Bhikkhunī kappiyakārakena kathāpeti, tattha kappiyakārako vā bhikkhuniyā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:980_1: ārocetu, itaro vā attano kathaṃ, kappiyakārako vā ubhinnampi kathaṃ, itaro vā ubhinnampi
atk-vin02a1:980_2: kathaṃ ārocetu, yathā vā tathā vā ārociyamāne paṭhame ārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:980_3: dutiye thullaccayaṃ. Yathā vā tathā vā ārocitaṃ pana ubhinnampi kathaṃ sutvā vohārikehi
atk-vin02a1:980_4: vinicchaye kate aḍḍapariyosānaṃ nāma hoti, tasmiṃ aḍḍapariyosāne bhikkhuniyā jayepi
atk-vin02a1:980_5: parājayepi saṅghādiseso. Sace pana gatigataṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti, sutapubbaṃ vohārikehi.
atk-vin02a1:980_6: Atha te bhikkhuniñca aḍḍakārakañca disvāva “tumhākaṃ kathanakiccaṃ natthi, jānāma
atk-vin02a1:980_7: mayaṃ ettha pavatti”nti sayameva vinicchinitvā denti, evarūpe aḍḍapariyosānepi bhikkhuniyā anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:981_0: Paṭhamaṃ āpatti etassāti paṭhamāpattiko; vītikkamakkhaṇeyeva āpajjitabboti attho,
atk-vin02a1:981_1: taṃ paṭhamāpattikaṃ. Padabhājane pana adhippāyamattaṃ dassetuṃ “saha vatthujjhācārā
atk-vin02a1:981_2: āpajjati asamanubhāsanāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – saha vatthujjhācārā yaṃ bhikkhunī
atk-vin02a1:981_3: āpajjati, na tatiyāya samanubhāsanāya, ayaṃ paṭhamameva saha vatthujjhācārena āpajjitabbattā
atk-vin02a1:981_4: paṭhamāpattikoti. Bhikkhunisaṅghato nissāretīti nissāraṇīyo; taṃ nissāraṇīyaṃ. Padabhājane
atk-vin02a1:981_5: pana adhippāyamattaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅghamhā nissārīyatīti vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ āpannā
atk-vin02a1:981_6: bhikkhunī saṅghato nissārīyati, so nissāraṇīyoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Na hi so eva
atk-vin02a1:981_7: dhammo saṅghamhā kenaci nissārīyati. Tena pana dhammena bhikkhunī nissārīyati, tasmā
atk-vin02a1:982_0: Ākaḍḍhiyamānā gacchatīti aḍḍakārakamanussehi sayaṃ vā āgantvā dūtaṃ vā pesetvā ehīti
atk-vin02a1:982_1: vuccamānā vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gacchati, tato aḍḍakārako attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:982_2: ārocetu bhikkhuniyā vā, neva paṭhamārocane dukkaṭaṃ, na dutiyārocane thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:982_3: Amaccehi vinicchinitvā kate aḍḍapariyosānepi anāpattiyeva. Sacepi aḍḍakārako bhikkhuniṃ
atk-vin02a1:982_4: vadati “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvameva kathehī”ti; kathentiyāpi kathaṃ sutvā kate
atk-vin02a1:983_0: Rakkhaṃ yācatīti dhammikaṃ rakkhaṃ yācati, anāpatti. Idāni yathāyācitā rakkhā dhammikā
atk-vin02a1:983_1: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ anodissa ācikkhatīti āha. Tattha atītaṃ ārabbha atthi odissaācikkhanā,
atk-vin02a1:983_2: atthi anodissaācikkhanā, anāgataṃ ārabbhāpi atthi odissaācikkhanā, atthi anodissaācikkhanā.
atk-vin02a1:984_0: Kathaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissaācikkhanā hoti? Bhikkhunupassaye gāmadārakā dhuttādayo
atk-vin02a1:984_1: vā ye keci anācāraṃ vā ācaranti, rukkhaṃ vā chindanti, phalāphalaṃ vā haranti, parikkhāre
atk-vin02a1:984_2: vā acchindanti. Bhikkhunī vohārike upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ upassaye idaṃ nāma kata”nti
atk-vin02a1:984_3: vadati. “Kenā”ti vutte “asukena ca asukena cā”ti ācikkhati. Evaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissaācikkhanā
atk-vin02a1:984_4: hoti, sā na vaṭṭati. Tañce sutvā te vohārikā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a1:984_5: gīvā hoti. Daṇḍaṃ gaṇhissantīti adhippāyepi sati gīvāyeva hoti. Sace pana tassa daṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a1:984_6: gaṇhathāti vadati, pañcamāsakamatte gahite pārājikaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:985_0: “Kenā”ti vutte pana “asukenāti vattuṃ amhākaṃ na vaṭṭati, tumheyeva jānissatha. Kevalañhi
atk-vin02a1:985_1: mayaṃ rakkhaṃ yācāma, taṃ no detha, avahaṭabhaṇḍañca āharāpethā”ti vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:985_2: anodissa ācikkhanā hoti, sā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ vutte sacepi te vohārikā kārake gavesitvā
atk-vin02a1:985_3: tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ sāpateyyampi gahitaṃ bhikkhuniyā, neva gīvā na āpatti.
atk-vin02a1:986_0: Parikkhāraṃ harante disvā tesaṃ anatthakāmatāya coro coroti vattumpi na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:986_1: Evaṃ vuttepi hi yaṃ tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbampi bhikkhuniyā gīvā hoti. Attano
atk-vin02a1:986_2: vacanakaraṃ pana “iminā me parikkhāro gahito, taṃ āharāpehi, mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti
atk-vin02a1:986_3: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Dāsadāsīvāpiādīnaṃ atthāya aḍḍaṃ karonti, ayaṃ akappiyaaḍḍo nāma, na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:987_0: Kathaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissaācikkhanā hoti? Vuttanayeneva parehi anācārādīsu katesu
atk-vin02a1:987_1: bhikkhunī vohārike evaṃ vadati “amhākaṃ upassaye idañcidañca karonti, rakkhaṃ no
atk-vin02a1:987_2: detha āyatiṃ akaraṇatthāyā”ti. “Kena evaṃ kata”nti vutte ca “asukena asukena cā”ti
atk-vin02a1:987_3: ācikkhati. Evaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissaācikkhanā hoti, sāpi na vaṭṭati. Tesañhi daṇḍe
atk-vin02a1:987_4: kate purimanayeneva sabbaṃ bhikkhuniyā gīvā. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-vin02a1:988_0: Sace pana vohārikā “bhikkhunupassaye evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karontānaṃ imaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a1:988_1: karomā”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā āṇāya atiṭṭhamāne pariyesitvā daṇḍaṃ karonti, bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin02a1:989_0: Yo cāyaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vutto, bhikkhūnampi eseva nayo. Bhikkhunopi hi odissaācikkhanā
atk-vin02a1:989_1: na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ tathā ācikkhite daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ gīvā hoti. Vuttanayeneva daṇḍaṃ
atk-vin02a1:989_2: gaṇhāpentassa pārājikaṃ. Yo pana “daṇḍaṃ karissantī”ti jānantopi anodissa katheti,
atk-vin02a1:989_3: te ca pariyesitvā daṇḍaṃ karontiyeva, na doso. Vihārasīmāya rukkhādīni chindantānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:989_4: vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā pāsāṇehi koṭṭenti, na vaṭṭati. Sace dhārā bhijjati, kārāpetvā
atk-vin02a1:989_5: dātabbā. Upadhāvitvā tesaṃ parikkhāre gaṇhanti, tampi na kātabbaṃ, lahuparivattañhi
atk-vin02a1:989_6: cittaṃ, theyyacetanāya uppannāya mūlacchejjampi gaccheyya. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:990: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:994_0: 683. Anapaloketvāti anāpucchitvā. Gaṇaṃ vāti mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikaṃ. Pūganti
atk-vin02a1:994_1: dhammagaṇaṃ. Seṇinti gandhikaseṇidussikaseṇiādikaṃ. Yattha yattha hi rājāno gaṇādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:994_2: gāmanigame niyyātenti “tumheva ettha anusāsathā”ti, tattha tattha te eva issarā honti.
atk-vin02a1:994_3: Tasmā te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca rājānaṃ vā gaṇādike vā āpucchitvāpi bhikkhunisaṅgho
atk-vin02a1:994_4: āpucchitabbova. Ṭhapetvā kappanti titthiyesu vā aññabhikkhunīsu vā pabbajitapubbaṃ
atk-vin02a1:995_0: Corīvuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kenaci karaṇīyena pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu agantvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ
atk-vin02a1:995_1: yathānisinnaṭṭhāneyeva attano nissitakaparisāya saddhiṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā vācācittato
atk-vin02a1:995_2: samuṭṭhāti, khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gantvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:995_3: anāpucchā vuṭṭhāpanavasena kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:998_0: 692. Tatiye – parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti ettha ekaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:998_1: dutiyena atikkantamatte saṅghādiseso. Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāranti ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:998_2: ekena pādena atikkamati thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena atikkantamatte saṅghādiseso. Apicettha
atk-vin02a1:998_3: sakagāmato nikkhamantiyā gāmantarapaccayā anāpatti, nikkhamitvā pana gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā
atk-vin02a1:998_4: padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ, ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā
atk-vin02a1:998_5: atikkantamatte thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena atikkantamatte saṅghādiseso. Tato nikkhamitvā
atk-vin02a1:998_6: puna sakagāmaṃ pavisantiyāpi eseva nayo. Sace pana khaṇḍapākārena vā vatichiddena
atk-vin02a1:998_7: vā bhikkhunivihārabhūmiyeva sakkā hoti pavisituṃ, evaṃ pavisamānāya kappiyabhūmiṃ
atk-vin02a1:998_8: nāma paviṭṭhā hoti, tasmā vaṭṭati. Sacepi hatthipiṭṭhiādīhi vā iddhiyā vā pavisati,
atk-vin02a1:998_9: vaṭṭatiyeva. Padasā gamanameva hi idhādhippetaṃ. Teneva “paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a1:999_0: Dve gāmā bhikkhunivihārena sambaddhavatikā honti, yasmiṃ gāme bhikkhunivihāro, tattha
atk-vin02a1:999_1: piṇḍāya caritvā puna vihāraṃ pavisitvā sace vihāramajjhena itarassa gāmassa maggo
atk-vin02a1:999_2: atthi, gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Tato pana gāmato teneva maggena paccāgantabbaṃ. Sace gāmadvārena
atk-vin02a1:999_3: nikkhamitvā āgacchati, purimanayeneva āpattibhedo veditabbo. Sakagāmato kenaci karaṇīyena
atk-vin02a1:999_4: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ nikkhantāya puna pavisanakāle hatthi vā muccati, ussāraṇā vā
atk-vin02a1:999_5: hoti, itarā bhikkhuniyo sahasā gāmaṃ pavisanti, yāva aññā bhikkhunī āgacchati, tāva
atk-vin02a1:999_6: bahigāmadvāre ṭhātabbaṃ. Sace na āgacchati, dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā nāma hoti, pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1000_0: Pubbe mahāgāmo hoti, majjhe bhikkhunivihāro. Pacchā taṃ gāmaṃ cattāro janā labhitvā
atk-vin02a1:1000_1: visuṃ visuṃ vatiparikkhepaṃ katvā vibhajitvā bhuñjanti, vihārato ekaṃ gāmaṃ gantuṃ
atk-vin02a1:1000_2: vaṭṭati. Tato aparaṃ gāmaṃ dvārena vā vatichiddena vā pavisituṃ na vaṭṭati. Puna
atk-vin02a1:1000_3: vihārameva paccāgantuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Vihārassa catugāmasādhāraṇattā.
atk-vin02a1:1001_0: Antaravāsako temiyatīti yattha yathā timaṇḍalapaṭicchādanaṃ hoti; evaṃ nivatthāya
atk-vin02a1:1001_1: bhikkhuniyā vassakāle titthena vā atitthena vā otaritvā yattha katthaci uttarantiyā
atk-vin02a1:1001_2: ekadvaṅgulamattampi antaravāsako temiyati. Sesaṃ nadīlakkhaṇaṃ nadīnimittakathāya
atk-vin02a1:1001_3: āvi bhavissati. Evarūpaṃ nadiṃ titthena vā atitthena vā otaritvā uttaraṇakāle paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1001_4: pādaṃ uddharitvā tīre ṭhapentiyā thullaccayaṃ, dutiyapāduddhāre saṅghādiseso. Setunā
atk-vin02a1:1001_5: gacchati, anāpatti. Padasā otaritvā uttaraṇakāle setuṃ ārohitvā uttarantiyāpi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1001_6: Setunā pana gantvā uttaraṇakāle padasā gacchantiyā āpattiyeva. Yānanāvāākāsagamanādīsupi
atk-vin02a1:1001_7: eseva nayo. Orimatīrato pana paratīrameva akkamantiyā anāpatti. Rajanakammatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1001_8: gantvā dārusaṅkaḍḍhanādikiccena dve tisso ubhayatīresu vicaranti, vaṭṭati. Sace panettha
atk-vin02a1:1001_9: kāci kalahaṃ katvā itaraṃ tīraṃ gacchati, āpatti. Dve ekato uttaranti, ekā majjhe
atk-vin02a1:1001_10: nadiyā kalahaṃ katvā nivattitvā orimatīrameva āgacchati, āpatti. Itarissā pana ayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1001_11: pakkantaṭṭhāne ṭhitā hoti, tasmā paratīraṃ gacchantiyāpi anāpatti. Nhāyituṃ vā pātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:1001_12: vā otiṇṇā tameva tīraṃ paccuttarati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1002_0: Saha aruṇuggamanāti ettha sace sajjhāyaṃ vā padhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci kammaṃ kurumānā
atk-vin02a1:1002_1: purearuṇeyeva dutiyikāya santikaṃ gamissāmīti ābhogaṃ karoti, ajānantiyā eva cassā
atk-vin02a1:1002_2: aruṇo uggacchati, anāpatti. Atha pana “yāva aruṇuggamanā idheva bhavissāmī”ti vā
atk-vin02a1:1002_3: anābhogena vā vihārassa ekadese acchati, dutiyikāya hatthapāsaṃ na otarati, aruṇuggamane
atk-vin02a1:1002_4: saṅghādiseso. Hatthapāsoyeva hi idha pamāṇaṃ, hatthapāsātikkame ekagabbhopi na rakkhati.
atk-vin02a1:1003_0: Agāmake araññeti ettha “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇameva
atk-vin02a1:1003_1: araññaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ kevalaṃ gāmābhāvena “agāmaka”nti vuttaṃ, na viñjhāṭavisadisatāya.
atk-vin02a1:1003_2: Tādise araññe okkante dassanūpacāre vijahite sacepi savanūpacāro atthi, āpatti. Teneva
atk-vin02a1:1003_3: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace bhikkhunīsu mahābodhiaṅgaṇaṃ pavisantīsu ekā bahi tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a1:1003_4: tassāpi āpatti. Lohapāsādaṃ pavisantīsupi pariveṇaṃ pavisantīsupi eseva nayo. Mahācetiyaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1003_5: vandamānāsu ekā uttaradvārena nikkhamitvā gacchati, tassāpi āpatti. Thūpārāmaṃ pavisantīsu
atk-vin02a1:1003_6: ekā bahi tiṭṭhati, tassāpi āpattī”ti. Ettha ca dassanūpacāro nāma yattha ṭhitaṃ dutiyikā
atk-vin02a1:1003_7: passati. Sace pana sāṇipākārantarikāpi hoti, dassanūpacāraṃ vijahati nāma. Savanūpacāro
atk-vin02a1:1003_8: nāma yattha ṭhitā maggamūḷhasaddena viya dhammasavanārocanasaddena viya ca “ayye”ti
atk-vin02a1:1003_9: saddāyantiyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Ajjhokāse dūrepi dassanūpacāro nāma hoti. So evarūpe
atk-vin02a1:1003_10: savanūpacāre vijahite na rakkhati, vijahitamatteva āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
atk-vin02a1:1004_0: Ekā maggaṃ gacchantī ohīyati. Saussāhā ce hutvā idāni pāpuṇissāmīti anubandhati,
atk-vin02a1:1004_1: anāpatti. Sace purimāyo aññena maggena gacchanti, pakkantā nāma honti, anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:1004_2: Dvinnaṃ gacchantīnaṃ ekā anubandhituṃ asakkontī “gacchatu aya”nti ohīyati, itarāpi
atk-vin02a1:1004_3: “ohīyatu aya”nti, gacchati, dvinnampi āpatti. Sace pana gacchantīsu purimāpi aññaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1004_4: maggaṃ gaṇhāti, pacchimāpi aññaṃ, ekā ekissā pakkantaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, dvinnampi anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1005_0: 693. Pakkhasaṅkantā vāti titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā, sesaṃ uttānameva. Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1005_1: – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1008_0: 694-8. Catutthe – pādapīṭhaṃ nāma dhotapādaṭṭhapanakaṃ. Pādakaṭhalikā nāma adhotapādaṭṭhapanakaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1008_1: Anaññāya gaṇassa chandanti tasseva kārakagaṇassa chandaṃ ajānitvā. Vatte vattantinti
atk-vin02a1:1009: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1012: 701. Pañcame – ekato avassuteti ettha “bhikkhuniyā avassutabhāvo daṭṭhabbo”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panetaṃ na vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā sameti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1013: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1016: 705-6. Chaṭṭhe – yato tvanti yasmā tvaṃ. Uyyojeti āpatti dukkaṭassātiādikā saṅghādisesapariyosānā āpattiyo kassā hontīti? Uyyojikāya. Vuttañcetaṃ parivārepi –
atk-vin02a1:1017: “Na deti na paṭiggaṇhāti, paṭiggaho tena na vijjati;
atk-vin02a1:1018: Āpajjati garukaṃ na lahukaṃ, tañca paribhogapaccayā;
atk-vin02a1:1020: Ayañhi gāthā imaṃ uyyojikaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Itarissā pana āpattibhedo paṭhamasikkhāpade vibhattoti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1021: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1024: 709. Sattame – yāvatatiyakapadattho mahāvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1025: Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1028_0: 715. Aṭṭhame – kismiñcideva adhikaraṇeti catunnaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Padabhājane pana
atk-vin02a1:1028_1: kevalaṃ adhikaraṇavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”tiādi
atk-vin02a1:1031_0: 723. Navame – saṃsaṭṭhāti missībhūtā. Ananulomikenāti pabbajitānaṃ ananulomena kāyikavācasikena.
atk-vin02a1:1031_2: vācasikena ca saṃsaṭṭhā. Pāpo kittisaddo etāsanti pāpasaddā. Pāpo ājīvasaṅkhāto siloko
atk-vin02a1:1031_3: etāsanti pāpasilokā. Sesaṃ uttānameva saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:1034_0: 727. Dasame – evācārāti evaṃācārā. Yādiso tumhākaṃ ācāro, tādisā ācārāti attho. Esa
atk-vin02a1:1034_1: nayo sabbattha. Uññāyāti avaññāya nīcaṃ katvā jānanāya. Paribhavenāti kiṃ imā karissantīti
atk-vin02a1:1034_2: evaṃ paribhavitvā jānanena. Akkhantiyāti asahanatāya; kodhenāti attho. Vebhassiyāti
atk-vin02a1:1034_3: balavabhassabhāvena; attano balappakāsanena samutrāsanenāti attho. Dubbalyāti tumhākaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1034_4: dubbalabhāvena. Sabbattha uññāya ca paribhavena cāti evaṃ samuccayattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1034_5: Viviccathāti vinā hotha. Sesaṃ uttānameva saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:1036_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesāti ettha channaṃ paṭhamāpattikānaṃ anantarā
atk-vin02a1:1036_1: sañcarittaṃ, dve duṭṭhadosāti imāni tīṇi sikkhāpadāni mahāvibhaṅgato pakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a1:1036_2: nava paṭhamāpattikā, catunnaṃ yāvatatiyakānaṃ anantarā mahāvibhaṅgatopi cattāro yāvatatiyake
atk-vin02a1:1036_3: pakkhipitvā aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā veditabbā. Evaṃ sabbepi pātimokkhuddesamaggena uddiṭṭhā
atk-vin02a1:1036_4: kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ uttānameva
atk-vin02a1:1036_5: aññatra pakkhamānattā. Taṃ pana khandhake vitthārena vaṇṇayissāmāti.
atk-vin02a1:1043: Ye tesaṃ dāni bhavati, ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanākkamo.
atk-vin02a1:1044: 733. Āmattikāpaṇanti amattāni vuccanti bhājanāni; tāni ye vikkiṇanti, te vuccanti āmattikā; tesaṃ āpaṇo āmattikāpaṇo; taṃ vā pasāressantīti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1045_0: 734. Pattasannicayaṃ kareyyāti pattasannidhiṃ kareyya; ekāhaṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā vā
atk-vin02a1:1045_1: avikappetvā vā pattaṃ ṭhapeyyāti attho. Sesaṃ mahāvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1045_2: Ayameva hi viseso – tattha dasāhaṃ parihāro, idha ekāhampi natthi. Sesaṃ tādisameva.
atk-vin02a1:1046: Idampi kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, akiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1049: 738. Dutiye – duccoḷāti virūpacoḷā; jiṇṇacoḷāti attho. Apayyāhīti api ayyāhi.
atk-vin02a1:1050_0: 740. Ādissa dinnanti sampattā bhājentūti vatvāpi idaṃ gaṇassa idaṃ tumhākaṃ dammīti
atk-vin02a1:1050_1: vatvā vā dātukamyatāya pādamūle ṭhapetvā vā dinnampi ādissa dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Etaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1050_2: sabbampi akālacīvaraṃ. Ayyāya dammīti evaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ pana yathādāneyeva upanetabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1051: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1054_0: 743-5. Tatiye – handāti gaṇha. Sayaṃ acchindatīti ekaṃ datvā ekaṃ acchindantiyā ekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1054_1: nissaggiyaṃ, bahūsu bahūni. Sace saṃharitvā ṭhapitāni ekato acchindati, vatthugaṇanāya
atk-vin02a1:1054_2: āpattiyo. Bandhitvā ṭhapitesu pana ekāva āpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1055: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1058_0: 748. Catutthe – kayenāti mūlena. Na me āvuso sappinā attho; telena me atthoti idaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1058_1: kira sā āhaṭasappiṃ datvā telampi āharissatīti maññamānā āha. Viññāpetvāti jānāpetvā;
atk-vin02a1:1059_0: 752. Taññeva viññāpetīti yaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ taṃ thokaṃ nappahoti, tasmā puna
atk-vin02a1:1059_1: taññeva viññāpetīti attho. Aññañca viññāpetīti sace paṭhamaṃ sappiviññattaṃ, yamakaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1059_2: pacitabbanti ca vejjena vuttattā telena attho hoti, tato telenāpi me atthoti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1059_3: aññañca viññāpeti. Ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvāti sace kahāpaṇassa sappi ābhataṃ hoti, iminā
atk-vin02a1:1059_4: mūlena diguṇaṃ telaṃ labbhati, tenāpi ca idaṃ kiccaṃ nipphajjati, tasmā telaṃ āharāti
atk-vin02a1:1059_5: evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā viññāpetīti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1060: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1063_0: 753. Pañcame – na me sikkhamāneti idaṃ kira sā kuladhītā “ayaṃ addhā evaṃ vuttā idaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1063_1: telaṃ ṭhapetvā sappimpi me attano kulagharā āharissatī”ti maññamānā āha. Cetāpetvāti
atk-vin02a1:1063_2: jānāpetvā icceva attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha catutthasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1066_0: 758. Chaṭṭhe – chandakanti “idaṃ nāma dhammakiccaṃ karissāma, yaṃ sakkotha; taṃ dethā”ti
atk-vin02a1:1066_1: evaṃ paresaṃ chandañca ruciñca uppādetvā gahitaparikkhārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Aññadatthikenāti
atk-vin02a1:1066_2: aññassatthāya dinnena. Aññuddisikenāti aññaṃ uddisitvā dinnena. Saṅghikenāti saṅghassa pariccattena.
atk-vin02a1:1067_0: 762. Sesakaṃ upanetīti yadatthāya dinno, taṃ cetāpetvā avasesaṃ aññassatthāya upaneti.
atk-vin02a1:1067_1: Sāmike apaloketvāti “tumhehi cīvaratthāya dinno, amhākañca cīvaraṃ atthi, telādīhi
atk-vin02a1:1067_2: pana attho”ti evaṃ āpucchitvā upaneti. Āpadāsūti tathārūpesu upaddavesu; bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:1067_3: vihāraṃ chaḍḍetvā pakkamanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu yaṃ vā taṃ vā cetāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1068: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1071: 764. Sattame – saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakena. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1074: 769. Aṭṭhame – mahājanikenāti gaṇassa pariccattena. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1077: 774. Navamasikkhāpade – saññācikenāti idaṃ padaṃ ito adhikataraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1080: 778. Dasame – pariveṇaṃ undriyatīti pariveṇaṃ vinassati; paripatatīti attho. Idañca padaṃ puggalikena saññācikenāti idañca ettakameva nānākaraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ pubbasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1083: 784. Ekādasame – garupāvuraṇanti sītakāle pāvuraṇaṃ. Catukkaṃsaparamanti ettha kaṃso nāma catukkahāpaṇiko hoti; tasmā padabhājane “soḷasakahāpaṇagghanaka”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1086: 789. Dvādasame – lahupāvuraṇanti uṇhakāle pāvuraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ sikkhāpadadvayepi uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1087: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1089_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammāti ettha mahāvibhaṅge cīvaravaggato
atk-vin02a1:1089_1: dhovanañca paṭiggahaṇañcāti dve sikkhāpadāni apanetvā akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvaranti
atk-vin02a1:1089_2: adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājitasikkhāpadena ca parivattetvā acchinnacīvarena ca paṭhamavaggo
atk-vin02a1:1089_3: pūretabbo. Puna eḷakalomavaggassa ādito satta sikkhāpadāni apanetvā satta aññadatthikāni
atk-vin02a1:1089_4: pakkhipitvā dutiyavaggo pūretabbo. Tatiyavaggato paṭhamapattaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ āraññakasikkhāpadanti
atk-vin02a1:1089_6: pūretabbo. Iti bhikkhunīnaṃ dvādasa sikkhāpadāni ekatopaññattāni, aṭṭhārasa ubhatopaññattānīti
atk-vin02a1:1089_7: evaṃ sabbepi pātimokkhuddesamaggena “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā
atk-vin02a1:1089_8: dhammā”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1097: Saṅgītā ye ayaṃ dāni, hoti tesampi vaṇṇanā.
atk-vin02a1:1098_0: 793. Tattha lasuṇavaggassa tāva paṭhamasikkhāpade – dve tayo bhaṇḍiketi dve vā tayo
atk-vin02a1:1098_1: vā poṭṭalike; sampuṇṇamiñjānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na mattaṃ jānitvāti pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā
atk-vin02a1:1099_0: Aññataraṃ haṃsayoninti suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniṃ. So tāsaṃ ekekanti so haṃso jātissaro ahosi,
atk-vin02a1:1099_1: atha pubbasinehena āgantvā tāsaṃ ekekaṃ pattaṃ deti, taṃ tāpanatālanacchedanakkhamaṃ suvaṇṇameva hoti.
atk-vin02a1:1100_0: 795. Māgadhakanti magadhesu jātaṃ. Magadharaṭṭhe jātalasuṇameva hi idha lasuṇanti
atk-vin02a1:1100_1: adhippetaṃ, tampi bhaṇḍikalasuṇameva, na ekadvitimiñjakaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ pana jātadesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1100_2: avatvā “māgadhakaṃ nāma bhaṇḍikalasuṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ajjhohāre ajjhohāreti ettha sace
atk-vin02a1:1100_3: dve tayo bhaṇḍike ekatoyeva saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharati, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Bhinditvā ekekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1101_0: 797. Palaṇḍukādīnaṃ vaṇṇena vā miñjāya vā nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ – vaṇṇena tāva palaṇḍuko
atk-vin02a1:1101_1: paṇḍuvaṇṇo hoti. Bhañjanako lohitavaṇṇo. Haritako haritapaṇṇavaṇṇo. Miñjāya pana
atk-vin02a1:1101_2: palaṇḍukassa ekā miñjā hoti, bhañjanakassa dve, haritakassa tisso. Cāpalasuṇo amiñjako,
atk-vin02a1:1101_3: aṅkuramattameva hi tassa hoti. Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana “palaṇḍukassa tīṇi miñjāni,
atk-vin02a1:1101_4: bhañjanakassa dve, haritakassa eka”nti vuttaṃ. Ete palaṇḍukādayo sabhāveneva vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a1:1101_5: Sūpasampākādīsu pana māgadhakampi vaṭṭati. Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā
atk-vin02a1:1101_6: vā telādīsu vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilasākādīsu vā uttaribhaṅgesu vā yattha katthaci
atk-vin02a1:1101_7: antamaso yāgubhattepi pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1102: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1105_0: 799. Dutiye – sambādheti paṭicchannokāse. Tassa vibhāgadassanatthaṃ pana “ubho upakacchakā
atk-vin02a1:1105_1: muttakaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ekampi lomanti kattariyā vā saṇḍāsakena vā khurena vā yena
atk-vin02a1:1105_2: kenaci ekapayogena vā nānāpayogena vā ekaṃ vā bahūni vā saṃharāpentiyā payogagaṇanāya
atk-vin02a1:1106_0: 801. Ābādhapaccayāti kaṇḍukacchuādiābādhapaccayā saṃharāpentiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1106_1: Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1106_2: nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1109: 803-4. Tatiye – talaghātaketi muttakaraṇatalaghātane. Antamaso uppalapattenāpīti ettha pattaṃ tāva mahantaṃ, kesarenāpi pahāraṃ dentiyā āpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a1:1110_0: 805. Ābādhapaccayāti gaṇḍaṃ vā vaṇaṃ vā paharituṃ vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1110_1: – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1113_0: 806. Catutthe – purāṇarājorodhāti purāṇe gihibhāve rañño orodhā. Cirāciraṃ gacchatīti
atk-vin02a1:1113_1: cirena cirena gacchati. Dhārethāti sakkotha. Kassidaṃ kammanti vutte anārocitepi
atk-vin02a1:1113_2: etā mayi āsaṅkaṃ karissantīti maññamānā evamāha – “mayhidaṃ kamma”nti.
atk-vin02a1:1114_0: 807. Jatumaṭṭhaketi jatunā kate maṭṭhadaṇḍake. Vatthuvasenevetaṃ vuttaṃ, yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a1:1114_1: pana daṇḍakaṃ pavesentiyā āpattiyeva. Tenāha – “antamaso uppalapattampi muttakaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1114_2: pavesetī”ti. Etampi ca atimahantaṃ, kesaramattampi pana pavesentiyā āpatti eva. Sesaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1117: 810. Pañcame – atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantīti atianto pavesetvā udakena dhovanaṃ kurumānā.
atk-vin02a1:1118_0: 812. Kesaggamattampi atikkāmetīti vitthārato tatiyaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā aṅgulaṃ gambhīrato
atk-vin02a1:1118_1: dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari kesaggamattampi pavesentiyā pācittiyanti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1118_2: mahāpaccariyaṃ – “ekissā aṅguliyā tīṇi pabbāni ādātuṃ na labhati, tiṇṇaṃ vā catunnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1118_3: vā ekekampi pabbaṃ ādātuṃ na labhatī”ti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīnipi talaghātake vuttasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1121_0: 815. Chaṭṭhe – bhattavissagganti bhattakiccaṃ. Pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhitvāti
atk-vin02a1:1121_1: ekena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ ekena bījaniṃ gahetvā bījamānā samīpe ṭhatvāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1121_2: Accāvadatīti pubbepi tumhe evaṃ bhuñjatha, ahaṃ evaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karomī”ti pabbajitacārittaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1122_0: 817. Yaṃkiñci pānīyanti suddhaudakaṃ vā hotu, takkadadhimatthurasakhīrādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1122_1: Yā kāci bījanīti antamaso cīvarakaṇṇopi. Hatthapāse tiṭṭhati āpatti pācittiyassāti
atk-vin02a1:1122_2: idha ṭhānapaccayāva pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Pahārapaccayā pana khandhake dukkaṭaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1123_0: 819. Deti dāpetīti pānīyaṃ vā sūpādiṃ vā imaṃ pivatha, iminā bhuñjathāti deti; tālavaṇṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1123_1: iminā bījantā bhuñjathāti deti; aññena vā ubhayampi dāpeti, anāpatti. Anupasampannaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1123_2: āṇāpetīti upatiṭṭhanatthaṃ sāmaṇeriṃ āṇāpeti, anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1124: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1127_0: 822. Sattame – bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti idaṃ payogadukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1127_1: nāma, tasmā na kevalaṃ paṭiggahaṇeyeva hoti, paṭiggaṇhitvā pana araññato āharaṇepi
atk-vin02a1:1127_2: sukkhāpanepi vaddalidivase bhajjanatthāya uddhanasajjanepi kapallasajjanepi dabbisajjanepi
atk-vin02a1:1127_3: dārūni ādāya aggikaraṇepi kapallamhi dhaññapakkhipanepi dabbiyā saṅghaṭṭanesupi koṭṭanatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1127_4: udukkhalamusalādisajjanesupi koṭṭanapapphoṭanadhovanādīsupi yāva mukhe ṭhapetvā ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1127_5: dantehi saṅkhādati, tāva sabbapayogesu dukkaṭāni, ajjhoharaṇakāle pana ajjhoharaṇagaṇanāya
atk-vin02a1:1127_6: pācittiyāni. Ettha ca viññatti ceva bhojanañca pamāṇaṃ. Tasmā sayaṃ viññāpetvā aññāya
atk-vin02a1:1127_7: bhajjanakoṭṭanapacanāni kārāpetvā bhuñjantiyāpi āpatti. Aññāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhajjanādīni
atk-vin02a1:1127_8: katvā bhuñjantiyāpi āpatti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “idaṃ āmakadhaññaṃ nāma
atk-vin02a1:1127_9: mātarampi viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pācittiyameva, aviññattiyā laddhaṃ sayaṃ bhajjanādīni
atk-vin02a1:1127_10: katvā vā kārāpetvā vā bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭaṃ. Aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ sayaṃ vā bhajjanādīni
atk-vin02a1:1127_11: katvā tāya vā kārāpetvā aññāya vā kārāpetvā bhuñjantiyāpi dukkaṭamevā”ti. Punapi
atk-vin02a1:1127_12: vuttaṃ “aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ, sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā bhuñjantiyā pācittiyameva.
atk-vin02a1:1127_13: Bhajjanādīni kārāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pana dukkaṭa”nti. Taṃ pubbāparaviruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a1:1127_14: na hi bhajjanādīnaṃ karaṇe vā kārāpane vā viseso atthi. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “aññāya
atk-vin02a1:1128_1: labbhamānaṃ pana navakammatthāya sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1128_2: Aparaṇṇaṃ viññāpetīti ṭhapetvā satta dhaññāni muggamāsādiṃ vā lābukumbhaṇḍādiṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:1128_3: aññaṃ yaṃkiñci ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne viññāpentiyā anāpatti. Āmakadhaññaṃ pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:1129: Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1132_0: 824. Aṭṭhame – nibbiṭṭho rājabhaṭo rañño bhati keṇi etenāti nibbiṭṭharājabhaṭo, ekaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1132_1: ṭhānantaraṃ keṇiyā gahetvā tato laddhaudayoti attho. Taññeva bhaṭapathaṃ yācissāmīti
atk-vin02a1:1132_2: rañño keṇiṃ datvā puna taṃyeva ṭhānantaraṃ yācissāmīti cintento. Paribhāsīti tā bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin02a1:1133_0: 826. Sayaṃ chaḍḍetīti cattāripi vatthūni ekapayogena chaḍḍentiyā ekāva āpatti, pāṭekkaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1133_1: chaḍḍentiyā vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. Āṇattiyampi eseva nayo. Dantakaṭṭhachaḍḍanepi
atk-vin02a1:1133_2: bhikkhuniyā pācittiyameva. Bhikkhussa sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1134: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1137_0: 830-2. Navame – yaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimanti khettaṃ vā hotu nāḷikerādiārāmo
atk-vin02a1:1137_1: vā, yattha katthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne etāni vatthūni chaḍḍentiyā purimanayeneva
atk-vin02a1:1137_2: āpattibhedo veditabbo. Khette vā ārāme vā nisīditvā bhuñjamānā ucchuādīni vā khādantī;
atk-vin02a1:1137_3: gacchamānā ucchiṭṭhodakacalakādīni haritaṭṭhāne chaḍḍeti, antamaso udakaṃ pivitvā
atk-vin02a1:1137_4: matthakacchinnanāḷikerampi chaḍḍeti, pācittiyameva. Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ. Kasitaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a1:1137_5: pana nikkhittabīje yāva aṅkuraṃ na uṭṭhahati, tāva sabbesaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Anikkhittabījesu
atk-vin02a1:1137_6: khettakoṇādīsu vā asañjātaropimesu khettamariyādādīsu vā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati. Manussānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1137_7: kacavarachaḍḍanaṭṭhānepi vaṭṭati. Chaḍḍitakhetteti manussesu sassaṃ uddharitvā gatesu
atk-vin02a1:1137_8: chaḍḍitakhettaṃ nāma hoti, tattha vaṭṭati. Yattha pana lāyitampi pubbaṇṇādi puna
atk-vin02a1:1137_9: uṭṭhahissatīti rakkhanti, tattha yathāvatthukameva. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1140_0: 835. Dasame – yaṃkiñci naccanti naṭādayo vā naccantu soṇḍā vā, antamaso morasuvamakkaṭādayopi,
atk-vin02a1:1140_1: sabbampetaṃ naccameva. Yaṃkiñci gītanti yaṃkiñci naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ hotu, ariyānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1140_3: dhammabhāṇakagītaṃ vā, sabbampetaṃ gītameva. Yaṃkiñci vāditanti tantibaddhādivādanīyabhaṇḍavāditaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1140_4: vā hotu, kuṭabherivāditaṃ vā, antamaso udakabherivāditampi, sabbampetaṃ vāditameva.
atk-vin02a1:1141_0: 836. Dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassāti padavāragaṇanāya āpatti dukkaṭassa. Yattha
atk-vin02a1:1141_1: ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vāti ekapayogena olokentī passati, tesaṃyeva gītavāditaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1141_2: suṇāti, ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana ekaṃ disaṃ oloketvā naccaṃ passati, puna aññato
atk-vin02a1:1141_3: oloketvā gāyante passati aññato vādente, pāṭekkā āpattiyo. Bhikkhunī sayampi naccituṃ
atk-vin02a1:1141_4: vā gāyituṃ vā vādituṃ vā na labhati, aññe “nacca, gāya, vādehī”ti vattumpi na labhati.
atk-vin02a1:1141_5: “Cetiyassa upahāraṃ detha, upāsakā”ti vattumpi “tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti
atk-vin02a1:1141_6: vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitumpi na labhati. Sabbattha pācittiyanti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin02a1:1141_7: vuttaṃ. Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ. “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1142_0: 837. Ārāme ṭhitāti ārāme ṭhatvā antarārāme vā bahiārāme vā naccādīni passati vā suṇāti
atk-vin02a1:1142_1: vā, anāpatti. Sati karaṇīyeti salākabhattādīnaṃ vā atthāya aññena vā kenaci karaṇīyena
atk-vin02a1:1142_2: gantvā gataṭṭhāne passati vā suṇāti vā, anāpatti. Āpadāsūti tādisena upaddavena upaddutā
atk-vin02a1:1142_3: samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati, evaṃ pavisitvā passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1143: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1148_1: anobhāsite. Tenevassa padabhājane “anāloke”ti vuttaṃ. Sallapeyya vāti gehassitakathaṃ katheyya.
atk-vin02a1:1149_0: 841. Arahopekkhā aññavihitāti na rahoassādāpekkhā rahoassādato aññavihitāva hutvā
atk-vin02a1:1149_1: ñātiṃ vā pucchati, dāne vā pūjāya vā manteti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1149_2: – kāyacittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1152: 842. Dutiye – paṭicchanne okāseti idameva nānaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1155: 846. Tatiye – ajjhokāseti nānaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1158_0: 850-3. Catutthe – nikaṇṇikanti kaṇṇamūlaṃ vuccati; kaṇṇamūle jappeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a1:1158_1: Sati karaṇīyeti salākabhattādīnaṃ āharaṇatthāya vihāre vā dunnikkhittaṃ paṭisāmanatthāya.
atk-vin02a1:1161: 854. Pañcame – gharaṃ sodhentāti tesaṃ kira etadahosi – “theriyā koci kāyikavācasiko vītikkamo na dissati, gharampi tāva sodhemā”ti, tato gharaṃ sodhentā naṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-vin02a1:1162: 856. Anovassakaṃ atikkāmentiyāti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyaṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyaṃ, upacārātikkame eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:1163: 858. Gilānāyāti yā tādisena gelaññena āpucchituṃ na sakkoti. Āpadāsūti ghare aggi vā uṭṭhito hoti, corā vā; evarūpe upaddave anāpucchā pakkamati, anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1164: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1167: 860. Chaṭṭhe – abhinisīdeyyāti nisīdeyya. Nisīditvā gacchantiyā ekā āpatti, anisīditvā nipajjitvā gacchantiyā ekā, nisīditvā nipajjitvā gacchantiyā dve.
atk-vin02a1:1168: 863. Dhuvapaññatteti bhikkhunīnaṃ atthāya niccapaññatte. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ…pe… tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1174: 869. Aṭṭhame – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1177_0: 875. Navame – abhisapeyyāti sapathaṃ kareyya. Nirayena abhisapati nāma “niraye nibbattāmi,
atk-vin02a1:1177_1: avīcimhi nibbattāmi, niraye nibbattatu, avīcimhi nibbattatū”ti evamādinā nayena akkosati.
atk-vin02a1:1177_2: Brahmacariyena abhisapati nāma “gihinī homi, odātavatthā homi, paribbājikā homi,
atk-vin02a1:1177_3: itarā vā edisā hotū”ti evamādinā nayena akkosati; vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ. Ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a1:1177_4: pana nirayañca brahmacariyañca “sunakhī sūkarī kāṇā kuṇī”tiādinā nayena akkosantiyā
atk-vin02a1:1178_0: 878. Atthapurekkhārāyāti aṭṭhakathaṃ kathentiyā. Dhammapurekkhārāyāti pāḷiṃ vācentiyā.
atk-vin02a1:1178_1: Anusāsanipurekkhārāyāti “idānipi tvaṃ edisā, sādhu viramassu, no ce viramasi, addhā
atk-vin02a1:1178_2: puna evarūpāni kammāni katvā niraye uppajjissasi, tiracchānayoniyā uppajjissasī”ti
atk-vin02a1:1178_3: evaṃ anusāsaniyaṃ ṭhatvā vadantiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1179: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1182_0: 879. Dasame – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a1:1182_1: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalakammaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1187_0: 883-6. Naggavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – brahmacariyaṃ ciṇṇenāti brahmacariyena ciṇṇena;
atk-vin02a1:1187_1: atha vā brahmacariyassa caraṇenāti; evaṃ karaṇatthe vā sāmiatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1187_2: veditabbaṃ. Acchinnacīvarikāyāti idaṃ udakasāṭikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na aññaṃ cīvaraṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1187_3: Tasmā udakasāṭikāya acchinnāya vā naṭṭhāya vā naggāya nhāyantiyā anāpatti. Sacepi
atk-vin02a1:1187_4: udakasāṭikacīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, na sakkā nivāsetvā bahi gantuṃ, evampi naggāya
atk-vin02a1:1188: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1191: 887. Dutiye – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1194_0: 893-4. Tatiye – anantarāyikinīti dasasu antarāyesu ekenapi antarāyena anantarāyā.
atk-vin02a1:1194_1: Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā sacepi pacchā sibbati, āpattiyevāti attho. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1195: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1198_0: 898-9. Catutthe – pañca ahāni pañcāhaṃ, pañcāhameva pañcāhikaṃ. Saṅghāṭīnaṃ cāro
atk-vin02a1:1198_1: saṅghāṭicāro; paribhogavasena vā otāpanavasena vā saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena saṅghāṭīti laddhanāmānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1198_2: pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ parivattananti attho. Tasmāyeva padabhājane “pañcamaṃ divasaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1198_3: pañca cīvarānī”tiādimāha. Āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha ca ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā āpatti; pañcasu pañca.
atk-vin02a1:1199_0: 900. Āpadāsūti mahagghaṃ cīvaraṃ, na sakkā hoti corabhayādīsu paribhuñjituṃ; evarūpe
atk-vin02a1:1199_1: upaddave anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1199_2: acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1202: 903. Pañcame – cīvarasaṅkamanīyanti saṅkametabbaṃ cīvaraṃ; aññissā santakaṃ anāpucchā gahitaṃ puna paṭidātabbacīvaranti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1203_0: 906. Āpadāsūti sace apārutaṃ vā anivatthaṃ vā corā haranti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu dhārentiyā
atk-vin02a1:1203_1: anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1203_2: acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1206_0: 909-10. Chaṭṭhe – aññaṃ parikkhāranti yaṃkiñci thālakādīnaṃ vā sappitelādīnaṃ vā
atk-vin02a1:1206_1: aññataraṃ. Ānisaṃsanti “kittakaṃ agghanakaṃ dātukāmatthā”ti pucchati, “ettakaṃ nāmā”ti
atk-vin02a1:1206_2: vadanti, “āgametha tāva, idāni vatthaṃ mahagghaṃ, katipāhena kappāse āgate samagghaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1206_3: bhavissatī”ti evaṃ vatvā nivārentiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1207: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1210: 911. Sattame – pakkamiṃsūti aññāsampi āgamanaṃ āgamentī “addhā amhākampi āgamessatī”ti tattha tattha agamaṃsu. Paṭibāheyyāti paṭisedheyya.
atk-vin02a1:1211: 915. Ānisaṃsanti “ekissā ekaṃ sāṭakaṃ nappahoti, āgametha tāva, katipāhena uppajjissati, tato bhājessāmī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1212: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1215_0: 916-8. Aṭṭhame – naṭā nāma ye nāṭakaṃ nāṭenti. Naṭakā nāma ye naccanti. Laṅghakā
atk-vin02a1:1215_1: nāma ye vaṃsavarattādīsu laṅghanakammaṃ karonti. Sokajjhāyikā nāma māyākārā. Kumbhathūṇikā
atk-vin02a1:1215_2: nāma ghaṭakena kīḷanakā; bimbisakavādakātipi vadanti. Deti āpatti pācittiyassāti
atk-vin02a1:1215_3: ettha cīvaragaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1216: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1219_0: 921-4. Navame – dubbalacīvarapaccāsāyāti dubbalāya cīvarapaccāsāya. Ānisaṃsanti kiñcāpi
atk-vin02a1:1219_1: “na mayaṃ ayye sakkomā”ti vadanti, “idāni pana tesaṃ kappāso āgamissati, saddho pasanno
atk-vin02a1:1219_2: puriso āgamissati, addhā dassatī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1220: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1223_0: 927. Dasame – kathinuddhāraṃ na dassantīti kīdiso kathinuddhāro dātabbo, kīdiso na
atk-vin02a1:1223_1: dātabboti? Yassa atthāramūlako ānisaṃso mahā, ubbhāramūlako appo, evarūpo na dātabbo.
atk-vin02a1:1223_2: Yassa pana atthāramūlako ānisaṃso appo, ubbhāramūlako mahā, evarūpo dātabbo. Samānisaṃsopi
atk-vin02a1:1224: 931. Ānisaṃsanti bhikkhunisaṅgho jiṇṇacīvaro, kathinānisaṃsamūlako mahālābhoti evarūpaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1225: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1230_0: 933. Tuvaṭṭavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – tuvaṭṭeyyunti nipajjeyyuṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1230_1: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1233_0: 937. Dutiye – ekaṃ attharaṇañceva pāvuraṇañca etāsanti ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā; saṃhārimānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1233_1: pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādīnaṃ ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tuvaṭṭentīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1234_0: 940. Vavatthānaṃ dassetvāti majjhe kāsāvaṃ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi
atk-vin02a1:1234_1: ṭhapetvā nipajjantīnaṃ anāpattīti attho. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ –
atk-vin02a1:1234_2: kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1237_0: 941. Tatiye – uḷārasambhāvitāti uḷārakulā pabbajitattā guṇehi ca uḷārattā uḷārāti
atk-vin02a1:1237_1: sambhāvitā. Issāpakatāti issāya apakatā; abhibhūtāti attho. Saññatti bahulā etāsanti
atk-vin02a1:1237_2: saññattibahulā; divasaṃ mahājanaṃ saññāpayamānāti attho. Viññatti bahulā etāsanti
atk-vin02a1:1237_3: viññattibahulā. Viññattīti hetūdāharaṇādīhi vividhehi nayehi ñāpanā veditabbā, na yācanā.
atk-vin02a1:1238: 943. Caṅkamane nivattanagaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Tiṭṭhati vātiādīsu payogagaṇanāya. Uddisati vātiādīsu padādigaṇanāya. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1239: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1242_0: 949. Catutthe – sati antarāyeti dasavidhe antarāye sati. Pariyesitvā na labhatīti
atk-vin02a1:1242_1: aññaṃ upaṭṭhāyikaṃ na labhati. Gilānāyāti sayaṃ gilānāya. Āpadāsūti tathārūpe upaddave
atk-vin02a1:1243: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1246_0: 952. Pañcame – aññaṃ āṇāpetīti ettha sace nikkaḍḍhāti āṇattā ekapayogena bahūnipi
atk-vin02a1:1246_1: dvārāni atikkāmeti, ekā āpatti. Atha imañcimañca dvāraṃ atikkāmehīti evaṃ āṇattā
atk-vin02a1:1247: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1250: 955. Chaṭṭhe – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1253: 961. Sattamaaṭṭhamanavamesu sabbaṃ uttānameva. Sabbāni eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānāni, kiriyāni, nosaññāvimokkhāni, acittakāni, paṇṇattivajjāni, kāyakammāni, ticittāni tivedanānīti.
atk-vin02a1:1257_0: 975. Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti sacepi dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā pakkamati, āpattiyevāti
atk-vin02a1:1257_1: attho. Pavāretvā pañca yojanāni gacchantiyāpi anāpatti. Chasu vattabbameva natthi.
atk-vin02a1:1257_2: Sace pana tīṇi gantvā teneva maggena paccāgacchati, na vaṭṭati. Aññena maggena āgantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1258_0: 976. Antarāyeti dasavidhe antarāye – paraṃ gacchissāmīti nikkhantā, nadīpūro pana
atk-vin02a1:1258_1: āgato, corā vā magge honti, megho vā uṭṭhāti, nivattituṃ vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1258_2: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1263_0: 978. Cittāgāravaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – rājāgāranti rañño kīḷanagharaṃ. Cittāgāranti
atk-vin02a1:1263_1: kīḷanacittasālaṃ. Ārāmanti kīḷanaupavanaṃ. Uyyānanti kīḷanuyyānaṃ. Pokkharaṇīnti
atk-vin02a1:1263_2: kīḷanapokkharaṇiṃ. Tasmāyeva padabhājane “yattha katthaci rañño kīḷitu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1263_3: Dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha padavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Yattha ṭhitā
atk-vin02a1:1263_4: passatīti ettha pana sace ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitā padaṃ anuddharamānā pañcapi passati,
atk-vin02a1:1263_5: ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ oloketvā passantiyā pana pāṭekkā āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a1:1264_0: 981. Ārāme ṭhitāti ajjhārāme rājāgārādīni karonti, tāni passantiyā anāpatti. Gacchantī
atk-vin02a1:1264_1: vā āgacchantī vāti piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya gacchantiyā maggo hoti, tāni passati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1264_2: Sati karaṇīye gantvāti rañño santikaṃ kenaci karaṇīyena gantvā passati, anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1264_3: Āpadāsūti kenaci upaddutā pavisitvā passati, anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1265: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1268: 982. Dutiye – abhinisīdanābhinipajjanesu payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1269: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1272_0: 988. Tatiye – ujjavujjaveti yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite
atk-vin02a1:1272_1: ekā āpatti. Kantanato pana pubbe kappāsavicinanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbapayogesu hatthavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1273_0: 989. Kantitasuttanti dasikasuttādiṃ saṅghāṭetvā kantati, dukkantitaṃ vā paṭikantati.
atk-vin02a1:1273_1: Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1276: 992. Catutthe – yāguṃ vātiādīsu taṇḍulakoṭṭanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesu pubbapayogesu payogagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Yāgubhattesu bhājanagaṇanāya, khādanīyādīsu rūpagaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
atk-vin02a1:1277_0: 993. Yāgupāneti manussehi saṅghassatthāya kariyamāne yāgupāne vā saṅghabhatte vā
atk-vin02a1:1277_1: tesaṃ sahāyikabhāvena yaṃkiñci pacantiyā anāpatti. Cetiyapūjāya sahāyikā hutvā gandhādīni
atk-vin02a1:1277_2: pūjeti, vaṭṭati. Attano veyyāvaccakarassāti sacepi mātāpitaro āgacchanti, yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a1:1277_3: bījaniṃ vā sammuñjanidaṇḍakaṃ vā kārāpetvā veyyāvaccakaraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāva yaṃkiñci
atk-vin02a1:1277_4: pacituṃ vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīni tatiyasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1280: 996. Pañcame – asati antarāyeti dasavidhe antarāye asati. Dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā vinicchinantī āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva vinicchināti.
atk-vin02a1:1281_0: 998. Pariyesitvā na labhatīti sahāyikā bhikkhuniyo na labhati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1281_1: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1284_0: 999. Chaṭṭhe – sabbaṃ naggavagge āgārikasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1284_1: pana viseso, taṃ chasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Idaṃ “sahatthā”ti vuttattā eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1284_2: kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1287_0: 1007. Sattame – puna pariyāyenāti punavāre. Āpadāsūti mahagghacīvaraṃ sarīrato mocetvā
atk-vin02a1:1287_1: supaṭisāmitampi corā haranti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anissajjitvā nivāsentiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1288: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1291: 1008. Aṭṭhame – anissajjitvāti rakkhaṇatthāya adatvā; “imaṃ jaggeyyāsī”ti evaṃ anāpucchitvāti attho.
atk-vin02a1:1292_0: 1012. Pariyesitvā na labhatīti paṭijaggikaṃ na labhati. Gilānāyāti vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:1292_1: asamatthāya. Āpadāsūti raṭṭhe bhijjante āvāse chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu
atk-vin02a1:1295_1: parūpaghātakaraṃ. Parittanti yakkhaparittanāgamaṇḍalādibhedaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1296: Padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ – vācato vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1299: 1018. Dasame vāceyyāti padaṃ viseso, sesaṃ navame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin02a1:1304: 1025. Ārāmavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā, upacāraṃ okkamantiyāti ettha paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1305_0: 1027. Sīsānulokikāti paṭhamaṃ pavisantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ sīsaṃ anulokentī pavisati,
atk-vin02a1:1305_1: anāpatti. Yattha bhikkhuniyoti yattha bhikkhuniyo paṭhamataraṃ pavisitvā sajjhāyacetiyavandanādīni
atk-vin02a1:1305_2: karonti, tattha tāsaṃ santikaṃ gacchāmīti gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Āpadāsūti kenaci upaddutā
atk-vin02a1:1305_3: hoti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1306: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1309_0: 1028. Dutiye – āyasmā kappitakoti ayaṃ jaṭilasahassabbhantaro thero. Saṃharīti saṅkāmesi.
atk-vin02a1:1309_1: Saṃhaṭoti saṅkāmito. Kāsāvaṭoti nhāpitā kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā kammaṃ karonti, taṃ sandhāyāhaṃsu. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1310: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1313_0: 1036. Tatiye – anusāsanipurekkhārāyāti idānipi tvaṃ bālā abyattātiādinā nayena anusāsanipakkhe
atk-vin02a1:1313_1: ṭhatvā vadantiyā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīni anantarasikkhāpadasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1316_0: 1037. Catutthe – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato
atk-vin02a1:1316_1: kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Nimantitāya anāpucchā bhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato
atk-vin02a1:1316_2: siyā kiriyākiriyaṃ, pavāritāya kappiyaṃ kāretvāpi akāretvāpi bhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato
atk-vin02a1:1316_3: siyā kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1319_0: 1043. Pañcame – kule maccharo kulamaccharo, kulamaccharo etissā atthīti kulamaccharinī
atk-vin02a1:1319_1: kulaṃ vā maccharāyatīti kulamaccharinī. Kulassa avaṇṇanti taṃ kulaṃ assaddhaṃ appasannanti.
atk-vin02a1:1320_0: 1045. Santaṃyeva ādīnavanti kulassa vā bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santaṃ aguṇaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1320_1: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1323: 1048. Chaṭṭhe – ovādāyāti garudhammatthāya. Saṃvāsāyāti uposathapavāraṇāpucchanatthāya. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana bhikkhunovādakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
atk-vin02a1:1324: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1327: 1053. Sattame – pariyesitvā na labhatīti bhikkhuniṃ na labhati. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Imassāpi vitthāro bhikkhunovādake vuttoyeva.
atk-vin02a1:1328: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1331: 1056. Aṭṭhame – ekakammantiādīhi uposathapavāraṇāyeva vuttā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Imassāpi vitthāro bhikkhunovādake vuttoyeva.
atk-vin02a1:1332: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1335: 1058. Navame – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Imassāpi vitthāro bhikkhunovādake vuttoyeva.
atk-vin02a1:1336: Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1339: 1062. Dasame – pasākheti adhokāye. Adhokāyo hi yasmā tato rukkhassa sākhā viya ubho ūrū pabhijjitvā gatā, tasmā pasākhoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a1:1340_0: 1065. Bhindātiādīsu sace “bhinda, phālehī”ti sabbāni āṇāpeti, so ca tatheva karoti,
atk-vin02a1:1340_1: cha āṇattidukkaṭāni cha ca pācittiyāni āpajjati. Athāpi evaṃ āṇāpeti – “upāsaka,
atk-vin02a1:1340_2: yaṃkiñci ettha kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ karohī”ti, so ca sabbānipi bhedanādīni karoti;
atk-vin02a1:1340_3: ekavācāya cha dukkaṭāni cha pācittiyānīti dvādasa āpattiyo. Sace pana bhedanādīsupi
atk-vin02a1:1340_4: ekaṃyeva vatvā “idaṃ karohī”ti āṇāpeti, so ca sabbāni karoti, yaṃ āṇattaṃ, tasseva
atk-vin02a1:1340_5: karaṇe pācittiyaṃ. Sesesu anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1341: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1349_0: 1073-4. Dutiye – pāyantinti thaññaṃ pāyamānaṃ. Mātā vā hotīti yaṃ dārakaṃ pāyeti,
atk-vin02a1:1349_1: tassa mātā vā hoti dhāti vā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Ubhayampi tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1349_2: saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1352_0: 1077. Tatiye – sikkhāsammutiṃ dātunti kasmā dāpesi? “Mātugāmo nāma lolo hoti dve
atk-vin02a1:1352_1: vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitvā sīlāni pūrayamāno kilamati, sikkhitvā pana pacchā
atk-vin02a1:1353_0: 1079. Pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmīti yaṃ taṃ
atk-vin02a1:1353_1: pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, taṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ dve
atk-vin02a1:1353_2: vassāni avītikkamitabbasamādānaṃ katvā samādiyāmīti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Imā
atk-vin02a1:1353_3: cha sikkhāyo saṭṭhivassāyapi pabbajitāya dātabbāyeva, na etāsu asikkhitā upasampādetabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1356: 1084. Catutthe – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Sace pana paṭhamaṃ vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti, upasampadamāḷakepi dātabbāyeva. Imā dvepi mahāsikkhamānā nāma.
atk-vin02a1:1359: 1090. Pañcame – kiñcāpi ūnadvādasavassaṃ paripuṇṇasaññāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā anāpatti, sā pana anupasampannāva hoti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1362: 1095. Chaṭṭhe – dasavassāya gihigatāya sikkhāsammutiṃ datvā paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ upasampādetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1365: 1101. Sattame – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīnipi sabbesu dutiye vuttasadisāneva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yattha sammuti atthi, tattha kiriyākiriyaṃ hotīti.
atk-vin02a1:1368: 1108. Aṭṭhame – na anuggaṇhāpeyyāti “imissā ayye uddesādīni dehī”ti evaṃ uddesādīhi na anuggaṇhāpeyya.
atk-vin02a1:1369_0: 1110. Pariyesitvāti aññaṃ pariyesitvā na labhati, sayaṃ gilānā hoti, na sakkoti uddesādīni
atk-vin02a1:1369_1: dātuṃ, tassā anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1369_2: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1372_0: 1113. Navame – na upaṭṭhaheyyāti cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakenāti evaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1372_1: tena tena karaṇīyena na upaṭṭhaheyya. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1372_2: – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1375_0: 1116. Dasame – neva vūpakāseyyāti na gahetvā gaccheyya. Na vūpakāsāpeyyāti “imaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1375_1: ayye gahetvā gacchā”ti aññaṃ na āṇāpeyya. Sesamettha uttānameva. Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1375_2: – akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1380_1: sadisāni. Yā pana tā sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānā, tā atikkantavīsativassāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a1:1380_2: Tā gihigatā vā hontu agihigatā vā, sikkhamānā icceva vattabbā, gihigatāti vā kumāribhūtāti
atk-vin02a1:1380_3: vā na vattabbā. Gihigatāya dasavassakāle sikkhāsammutiṃ datvā dvādasavassakāle upasampadā
atk-vin02a1:1380_5: sammutiṃ datvā vīsativassakāle upasampadā kātabbā. Aṭṭhārasavassakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:1380_6: ca panāyaṃ gihigatātipi kumāribhūtātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati, kumāribhūtā pana gihigatāti
atk-vin02a1:1380_7: na vattabbā, kumāribhūtā icceva vattabbā. Mahāsikkhamānā pana gihigatātipi vattuṃ
atk-vin02a1:1380_8: na vaṭṭati, kumāribhūtātipi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sikkhāsammutidānavasena pana tissopi
atk-vin02a1:1383_0: 1136. Catutthapañcamachaṭṭhesu sabbaṃ uttānameva. Sabbāni tisamuṭṭhānāni catutthaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1383_1: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1383_2: tivedananti. Pañcamaṃ kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1383_3: kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti. Yañcettha saṅghena paricchinditabbāti
atk-vin02a1:1383_4: vuttaṃ, tassa upaparikkhitabbāti attho. Chaṭṭhaṃ kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1383_5: lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ dukkhavedananti. Yaṃ panettha “paricchinditvā”ti
atk-vin02a1:1386: 1150. Sattame – sabbaṃ uttānameva. Dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1392_0: 1158. Navame – sokāvāsanti saṅketaṃ katvā agacchamānā purisānaṃ anto sokaṃ pavesetīti
atk-vin02a1:1392_1: sokāvāsā, taṃ sokāvāsaṃ. Tenevāha – “sokāvāsā nāma paresaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādetī”ti. Atha
atk-vin02a1:1392_2: vā gharaṃ viya gharasāmikā, ayampi purisasamāgamaṃ alabhamānā sokaṃ āvisati. Iti
atk-vin02a1:1392_3: yaṃ āvisati, svāssā āvāso hotīti sokāvāsā. Tenāha – “sokaṃ āvisatī”ti. Ajānantīti
atk-vin02a1:1392_4: edisā ayanti ajānamānā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1392_5: sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin02a1:1395: 1164. Dasame – anāpucchāti anāpucchitvā. Bhikkhunīhi dvikkhattuṃ āpucchitabbaṃ – pabbajjākāle ca upasampadākāle ca, bhikkhūnaṃ pana sakiṃ āpucchitepi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1396_0: 1165. Ajānantīti mātādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ajānantī. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Idaṃ apubbasamuṭṭhānasīsaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1396_1: Catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – vācato kāyavācato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a1:1396_2: Abbhānakammādīsu kenacideva karaṇīyena khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ nisinnā “pakkosatha sikkhamānaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1396_3: idheva naṃ upasampādessāmā”ti upasampādeti; evaṃ vācato samuṭṭhāti. Upassayato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a1:1396_4: upasampādessāmīti vatvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ gacchantiyā kāyavācato samuṭṭhāti. Dvīsupi ṭhānesu
atk-vin02a1:1396_5: paṇṇattibhāvaṃ jānitvāva vītikkamaṃ karontiyā vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a1:1396_6: Ananujānāpetvā upasampādanato kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1399_0: 1167-8. Ekādasame – pārivāsikachandadānenāti pārivāsiyena chandadānena. Tattha catubbidhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1399_2: Tattha parisapārivāsiyaṃ nāma bhikkhū kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitā honti, atha
atk-vin02a1:1399_3: megho vā uṭṭhāti, ussāraṇā vā kariyati, manussā vā ajjhottharantā āgacchanti, bhikkhū
atk-vin02a1:1399_4: “anokāsā mayaṃ aññatra gacchāmā”ti chandaṃ avissajjetvāva uṭṭhahanti. Idaṃ parisapārivāsiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1399_5: Kiñcāpi parisapārivāsiyaṃ, chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a1:1400_0: Puna bhikkhū “uposathādīni karissāmā”ti rattiṃ sannipatitvā “yāva sabbe sannipatanti,
atk-vin02a1:1400_1: tāva dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti ekaṃ ajjhesanti, tasmiṃ dhammakathaṃ kathenteyeva aruṇo
atk-vin02a1:1400_2: uggacchati. Sace “cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti nisinnā “pannaraso”ti kātuṃ
atk-vin02a1:1400_3: vaṭṭati. Sace pannarasikaṃ kātuṃ nisinnā pāṭipade anuposathe uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a1:1400_4: aññaṃ pana saṅghakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ rattipārivāsiyaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a1:1401_0: Puna bhikkhū “kiñcideva abbhānādisaṅghakammaṃ karissāmā”ti nisinnā honti, tatreko
atk-vin02a1:1401_1: nakkhattapāṭhako bhikkhu evaṃ vadati – “ajja nakkhattaṃ dāruṇaṃ, mā imaṃ kammaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-vin02a1:1401_2: Te tassa vacanena chandaṃ vissajjetvā tattheva nisinnā honti. Athañño āgantvā “nakkhattaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1401_3: paṭimānentaṃ attho bālaṃ upaccagā”ti vatvā “kiṃ nakkhattena karothā”ti vadati. Idaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1401_4: chandapārivāsiyañceva ajjhāsayapārivāsiyañca. Etasmiṃ pārivāsiye puna chandapārisuddhiṃ
atk-vin02a1:1402: Vuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti chandaṃ vissajjetvā kāyena vā vācāya vā chandavissajjanamatteneva vā uṭṭhitāya parisāya.
atk-vin02a1:1403_0: 1169. Anāpatti avuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti chandaṃ avissajjetvā avuṭṭhitāya anāpatti.
atk-vin02a1:1403_1: Sesaṃ uttānameva. Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1406: 1170. Dvādasame – upassayo na sammatīti vasanokāso nappahoti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīni anantarasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1409: 1175. Terasame – ekaṃ vassaṃ dveti ekantarike ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dve vuṭṭhāpeti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīnipi vuttasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1414_0: 1181. Chattavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade – sakimpi dhāreti āpatti pācittiyassāti maggagamane
atk-vin02a1:1414_1: ekapayogeneva divasampi dhāreti, ekāva āpatti. Sace kaddamādīni patvā upāhanā omuñcitvā
atk-vin02a1:1414_2: chattameva dhārentī gacchati, dukkaṭaṃ. Athāpi gacchādīni disvā chattaṃ apanāmetvā
atk-vin02a1:1414_3: upāhanāruḷhāva gacchati, dukkaṭameva. Sace chattampi apanāmetvā upāhanāpi omuñcitvā
atk-vin02a1:1414_4: puna dhāreti, puna pācittiyaṃ. Evaṃ payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1414_5: Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1417: 1184. Dutiye – yānena yāyantīti etthāpi orohitvā punappunaṃ abhiruhantiyā payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Sesaṃ paṭhame vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1420: 1190. Tatiye – vippakiriyiṃsūti maṇayo vippakiṇṇā. Idhāpi omuñcitvā dhārentiyā payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo. Samuṭṭhānādīni vuttanayāneva. Kevalaṃ idha akusalacittaṃ hotīti.
atk-vin02a1:1423: 1194. Catutthe – sīsūpagādīsu yaṃ yaṃ dhāreti, tassa tassa vasena vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo veditabbā. Sesaṃ tatiye vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1426: 1199. Pañcame – gandhavaṇṇakenāti gandhena ca vaṇṇakena ca. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Samuṭṭhānādīni tatiyasadisānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1432_0: 1208-9. Sattame – ummaddāpeti āpatti pācittiyassāti ettha hatthaṃ amocetvā ummaddane
atk-vin02a1:1432_1: ekāva āpatti, mocetvā mocetvā ummaddane payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo. Sambāhanepi eseva
atk-vin02a1:1432_2: nayo. Gilānāyāti antamaso maggagamanaparissamenāpi sābādhāya. Āpadāsūti corabhayādīhi
atk-vin02a1:1435: 1210. Aṭṭhamādīsu tīsu sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyā, gihiniyāti idameva nānākaraṇaṃ, sesaṃ sattame vuttasadisamevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1438_0: 1214. Ekādasame – bhikkhussa puratoti abhimukhamevāti attho. Idaṃ pana upacāraṃ sandhāya
atk-vin02a1:1438_1: kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato
atk-vin02a1:1438_2: ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1441_0: 1219-23. Dvādasame – anokāsakatanti asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmīti evaṃ akataokāsaṃ.
atk-vin02a1:1441_1: Tenevāha – “anokāsakatanti anāpucchā”ti. Anodissāti asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmīti
atk-vin02a1:1441_2: evaṃ aniyametvā kevalaṃ “pucchitabbaṃ atthi, pucchāmi ayyā”ti evaṃ vatvā. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin02a1:1441_3: Padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ – vācato vācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1444: 1226. Terasame – parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti ekena pādena atikkante dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyena pācittiyaṃ. Upacārepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a1:1445_1: mahagghaṃ hoti saṅkaccikaṃ, pārupitvā gacchantiyāva upaddavo uppajjati, evarūpāsu
atk-vin02a1:1445_2: āpadāsu anāpatti. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1448_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo chasaṭṭhisataṃ pācittiyā dhammāti ettha sabbāneva bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1448_1: khuddakesu channavuti, bhikkhūnaṃ dvenavutīti aṭṭhāsītisataṃ sikkhāpadāni, tato sakalaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1448_4: mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya addhānagamanaṃ, rājantepurappavesanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin02a1:1448_5: anāpucchā vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ, nisīdanaṃ vassikasāṭikanti imāni dvāvīsati sikkhāpadāni
atk-vin02a1:1448_6: apanetvā sesāni satañca chasaṭṭhi ca sikkhāpadāni pātimokkhuddesamaggena uddiṭṭhāni
atk-vin02a1:1448_7: hontīti veditabbāni. Tenāha – “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo chasaṭṭhisataṃ pācittiyā dhammā…pe…
atk-vin02a1:1449_1: saṅghāṇi, itthālaṅkāro, gandhavaṇṇako, vāsitakapiññāko, bhikkhunīādīhi ummaddanaparimaddanānīti
atk-vin02a1:1449_2: imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – vināpi
atk-vin02a1:1449_3: cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni, citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni.
atk-vin02a1:1449_4: Avasesāni acittakāni, paṇṇattivajjāneva. Corīvuṭṭhāpanaṃ, gāmantaraṃ, ārāmasikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1449_5: gabbhinivagge ādito paṭṭhāya satta, kumāribhūtavagge ādito paṭṭhāya pañca, purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin02a1:1449_7: sikkhāpadāni sacittakāni paṇṇattivajjāni, avasesāni sacittakāni lokavajjānevāti.
atk-vin02a1:1456: Ye dhammā aṭṭha āruḷhā, saṅkhepeneva saṅgahaṃ;
atk-vin02a1:1458_0: 1228. Yāni hi ettha pāḷiyaṃ sappitelādīni niddiṭṭhāni, tāniyeva viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā
atk-vin02a1:1458_1: pāṭidesanīyā. Pāḷivinimuttakesu pana sabbesu dukkaṭaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṭṭhavidhampi
atk-vin02a1:1458_2: panetaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ catusamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyato kāyavācato kāyacittato kāyavācācittato
atk-vin02a1:1458_3: ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin02a1:1461: Sekhiyā pana uddiṭṭhā, ye dhammā pañcasattati;
atk-vin02a1:1465: Yasmā tasmā visuṃ tesaṃ, dhammānaṃ atthavaṇṇanā;
atk-vin02a1:1466: Na vuttā tattha yā vuttā, vuttāyeva hi sā idhāti.
